2040000yagambye nti pulezidenti museveni yayimirizza okugaba masiki mu bitundu byeggwanga ebirala nalagira nti basooke bawe bannakampala wakiso ne mukono era basookedde mu kampalayategeezezza nti kampala eri bubi nnyo ku bulwadde bwa ssenyiga omukambwe kubanga ku balwadde abataano abaakafa  bana bava mu kampala ate ku balwadde abaakakwatibwa  kampala erinako ebitundu 60 ku buli 100pulezidenti museveni abafaako nnyo abantu be era mwambale masiki ate mwekuume obulwadde gye buli era butta among bwe yagambyeate dayirekita wa kampala kisaka yagambye nti bannakampala basaana bongere okwefaako baakutandikirawo nga kaweesi yaakamala okuttibwa nga march17 2017 kyokka ne basooka bawa poliisi ekyanya ekole okwayo bbo nga bwe bagiyambako awaba weetagisizza okutuusa mu september wa 2017 lwe 2017 ku ssaawa nga 330 ezoku makyamu bye bagasse ne bikwatagana zentambula zabatemu noludda gye baava nengeri gye baayimiriza kaweesi oluvannyuma ne bamukuba amasasibaasembayo kutta ddereeva wa kaweesiokwawukanako nebyasooka okukungaanyizibwa poliisi nga biraga nti abatemu baasooka kukuba mipiira okunoonyereza kwa iso kwalaze nti emipiira baagikuba luvannyuma okubuzaabuza abanoonyereza nga ne gatandikaobujulizi bwe bakungaanyizza bulaga nti amasasi gaatandikira ku mukuumi wa kaweesi olwo ate abalala abaali bazze ku luggi lwa kaweesi nabo ne batandika okukuba era obujulizi bwe baggyeeyo bulaga nti ddereeva ye yasembayo okuttibwakino kyali kirukiddwa bulungi okutandikira ku mukuumi kubanga abatemu baali bakitegeddeko nti kaweesi ali mu kwekengera era nga yali awadde omukuumi we obuddekigambibwa nti kitagenda yasitula omukono gwa kkono mu bbanga nakozesa olumu ku ngalo ku mukono ogwa ddyo nalukuba mu kiseke awasibirwa essaawa ngalaga omu ku bakuuma amaka ga kaweesi nti akabonerookusinziira ku nsonda mu iso abakuumi ba kaweesi nabo baabafunye babayambeko mu kunoonyerezakino kiddiridde okuddayo e kulambiro ne beetegereza engeri olukwe gye lwalukibwa ne bwe baalutuukirizatwagala batunnyonnyole lwaki omu ku batemu yali abagamba okukuuma obudde ensonda bwe zaategeezezzammotoka eyal i ekanikibwa ani ya gibuzaawomu kiseera we baakubira kaweesi amasasi waaliwo emmotoka kika kya toyota harrier eyaliko ennamba ze kenya eyali ekanikibwa omuvubuka eyategerekekako erya mukwasi yattibwa oluvannyuma wansi ne munne ali mu mikono gyabeebyokwerindammotoka ono poliisi yagitwala ngekimu ku bizibiti mu musango gunonnanyini mmotoka yakanda kulaajana nti emmotoka yali yafudde ggulolimu terina kakwate ku butemu nga mpaawo amuwulirizaokusinziira ku nsonda mu iso abatemu bwe baamanya nti nnannyini mmotoka eyali munnansi wa kenya ayinza okubalandukirako kwe kutandika okumuyigga bamutteono bwe yamanya nti bapanze okumutta ate nga nolukwe lulimu boofiisa ba poliisi yadduka naddayo e kenya ebyemmotoka nabivaakomunnakenya okudduka yali amaze okutegeezebwa nti makanika mukwasi abatemu baali bamulondodde ne bamusalako omutwe mu ngeri eyentiisa era ne nokubafunako obujulizi ku bya kaweesi amagye gasooka kukwata omuserikale wa flying squad abel kitagenda era mu kiseera we battira kaweesi kitagenda ye yali akulira flying squad mu kampala north ngatuula kawempeoluvannyuma baakwata boofiisa abalala okuli herbert muhangi eyali aduumira flying squad mu ggwangaabalala abaakwatibwa kuliko moses kasibante martin kimbowa agambibwa nti ye yavuga bakulu nabakwasa omuserikale silas abawe obukuumi wabula kyababuukako ate bwe byabakyukira ne batandika okubatulugunyasilas yabatwala mu wooteeri emu e nakulabye gye baabatulugunyirizanti abaabatulugunyanga baabakwatanga ne bateeka amazzi mu bbaafu ne bateeka waya ku bbaatule ne bazisuula mu mazziamasannyalaze ga bbaatule gaabakubanga nga gayita mu bigere era byonna ne bizimba nokusiriiramukwasi bwe yafuna omwagaanya yeemulula nadduka kyokka munne ne bamusigazaokusinziira ku nsonda okuva mu cmi omuntu bwomukubya amasannyalaze nga gayita mu bigere gagenda butereevu ne gatuuka ku bwongo era bwe kitwala ebbanga omuntu awunga ne yeerabira buli kimukigambibwa nti kino nakyo kyakolwa mu bugenderevu okutta obujulizi bwabavubuka bano era mukwasi bwe yadduka baamulondoola ne bakakasa nti attibwasilas ne banne be yali nabo balina okunnyonnyola lwaki baatulugunya abajulizi abakulu mu musango guno omu natuuka nokuttibwa ensonda bwe zaategeezezzaku ddyo ye muvubuka eyattibwaokumpi ne we battira andrew felix kaweesi waaliwo emmotoka eyali efiiridde ku kkubo nga bamakanika babiri bagikanikaebyaliwo byonna baabiraba era ne bakuba ebifaananyi ebyakwatiramu nabatemuwabula oluvannyuma baali badduka baveewo abatemu ne babalaba kyokka ne batasobola kubakwatabamakanika bano baalondoolwa era omu nasalibwako omutwe omulambo gwe ne bagusuula e masakaobujulizi buno bwazuuliddwa bambega ba iso ne cmi abeefunyiridde okuzuula ekituufu ku nfa ya kaweesikaweesi yatemulwa nga march 17 2017 e kulambiro okumpi namaka geyatemulwa ne ddereeva we godfrey mambewa nomukuumi we kenneth eraubamakanika okuli eyakazibwako erya mukwasi baali bakolera ku galagi emu e kabowa  ndeebawaliwo kasitoma eyakuba essimu ku galagi ku lwokuna nga march 16 ekiro ngayita bamakanika kubanga emmotoka ye toyota harrier yali efiiridde ku kkubo e kulambirobaakeera ku lwokutaano kaweesi lwe yattibwa okukanika emmotoka eyobano baalaba buli kintu okuva ku muserikale wa poliisi agambibwa okuba abel kitagenda yakwatibwa eyavuga pipikipi okugenda ku geeti ewa kaweesi nalabibwa ngayogera nabaserikalebaakozesa essimu ne bakuba ebifaananyi era abatemu oluvannyuma baalaba bamakanika kyokka ne batasobola kubakwataebintu byaboonoonekera luvannyuma lwa poliisi kussaawo kirabo kya bukadde 100 eri oyo anaawa amawulire amatuufu agatuusa poliisi ku kukwata abatemuabavubuka beetwala ku kitebe kya poliisi e naguru era baasobola okulaba omu ku boofiisaofiisa yalagira omuyambi we ayitibwa silas abatwale mu woteeri emu baweebwe obukuumikyokka bamakanika byabasobera abaserikale bwe baatandika okubatulugunya nga babuuza gye baggye obujulizibaabaggyako essimu zaabwe okuli ebifaananyimakanika omu mukwasi yafuna omwagaanya watolokera nagenda yeekukuma mu kyalo e mbalewabula we yaddukira yali amaze okuwa abaserikale byonna ebimukwatako okuli ne gyakolera kabowa gyasula e kawaala  kasubi ne gyava e mbaleabaserikale baamunoonya okutuuka e mbale mu bugisu gye baamuggyaokuddayo okuwuliza mukwasi ngattiddwa omulambo gwe ne gusuulibwa e masakamunne amannya galekeddwa yatulugunyizibwa nnyo kyokka ngakyaliyo mulamuiso ne cmi bafuna ebifaananyiamagye gaayazizza amaka gomu ku baserikale abaakwatiddwa ku byokutemula kaweesimu bye baasanzeeyo kwabaddeko essimu bbiri okuli eya mukwasi ne munneku ssimu kuno munne wa mukwasi yabadde amaze okutegeeza bambega nti kuliko ebifaananyi ebyakubwa abatemu nga batta kaweesi ne byonna ebyaliwobambega baatutte essimu ne bakozesa tekinologiya okukomyawo byonna ebyali ku ssimuebifaananyi byonna ne baddamu okubifunakyategeezeddwa nti ebifaananyi byalaze abamu ku baserikale abaakwatibwa kyokka birimu nabantu abalala abatannakwatibwamunne wa mukwasi ali mu mikono gyabebyokwerinda ajja kukozesebwa ngomu ku bajulizi mu musango gunoekkomera lye makindye gen kayihura 62 gye baamusibidde okuva nga june13 amagye bwe gaamukimye ku faamu ye e lyantonde nga talinnya lye limu ku makomera amakakali ennyo era ebyafaayo byalyo okuviira ddala mu biseera bya iddi amin bitiisaensonda mu byokwerinda zitegeezezza bukedde nti gen kayihura atandise okukaluubirirwa obulamu olwobukwakkulizo namateeka amakakali bannamagye abaddukanya ekkomera lino bye baamutaddekookwawukanako nabasibe abalala nga kitatta nixon ne boofiisa ba poliisi abalala gen kayihura asula mu ngeri yamaka kubanga ekisenge kye yaweereddwa okusulamu kifunda nnyo nga tekisobola kugyamu kitanda ekya mukaaga ku mukaagaekisenge kya kayihura kyasulamu kyakolebwa nga kirina okubaamu obutanda bubiri era kitwalibwa nti kisenge kya kitiibwa bwokigeraageranya ku buduukulu bwa ba kitatta obufunda okufa obufi nga kyenkana omusibe talina na we yeekyusizaomu ku bantu abaalambudde ku gen kayihura baategeezezza nti akasenge ke kaliko obugazi bwa ffuuti nga munaana ate mu bukiika kali ffuuti nnya nekitundukayihura kye yakola kwe kwawuzaamu akasenge kano ebitundu bibiri ekimu ne kikola ngekisenge omuli ekitanda ate ekifo ekyasigalawo nassaawo engeri yomukeeka wawummulira ngakooye ekitandaku kisenge kye kwakookerwako engeri yakanaabiro akalimu ne ttayiro nga mwe muli ne kaabuyonjo era byonna biggwera omwoenjawulo ku kisenge kye ku buduukulu bwabasibe abalala nga kitatta ne nixon ye kayihura afuna ku kitangaala era alinamu ne ntimbe kyokka basibe banne bo omusana bafunako nga bafulumye ku ssaawa 1200 okumala eddakiika 30 zokka ne babazza mundaekifo kayihura walabira abagenyi aba famire ne balooya waliwo entebe ssatu ngebbiri buli emu etuulamu omuntu omu ate eyokusatu ya mitto ebiri ngetuuza abantu babirimu kasenge ako mulimu firiigi ngerimu amazzi agokunywa agali mu ccupa mineral water era ku kisenge waggulu wa firiigi we wali ttivvi eyekika kya samsung era ebbanga lyonna ttivvi eno kukubabuli essimu lwevuga ngaba miritale basembera okuwulira byayogera ku ssimu kubanga etteeka bwe lityo bwe liragirabwaba ayagala okwogerako naba famire ye oba balooya be gen kayihura ateekwa okusooka kusaba akulira enkambi yamagye e makindye col william bainomugisha bwamukkiriza ngakuba essimu kyokka bwagaana nga gen kayihura akkakkana abaakwatiddwa kuliko eyali omukuumi wa ssp nixon agasirwe karuhaga ayitibwa herbert ahaisibwe wamu ne wilson ategekakigambibwa nti ahaisibwe yomu ku baserikale nixon be yali akozesa okuluka misoni enkambwe era nga okukwatibwa kwe bambega balowooza nti kwakubongera amaanyi mu kuzuula abatta kaweesi nokuwamba ssaako okukukusa abanyarwanda abanoonyi bobubudamu ko nokubattaensonda zategeezezza bukedde nti amagye olwakwata nixon olwo musajja we eyali amukuuma ahaisibwe nasigala ngaddukanya bizinensi ze ezekyama era nga gye buvuddeko yasangiddwa nganoonyeza ebimu ku byobugagga bye akatale sso nga bibadde bikyanoonyerezebwaakoahaisibwe yakwatiddwa abaserikale ba iso akawungeezi ku lwokutaano lwa wiiki ewedde wamu ne munne ayitibwa wilson ategekakigambibwa nti ategeka abadde amanyiddwa nnyo mu kukutula diiru za zzaabu nga yeeyambisa yandikozesebwa ngomujuliri okulumiriza eyali mukamawebano beegasse ku baserikale abalala abazze bakwatibwa ku misango okuli ogwokutta aigp andrew felix kaweesi wamu nokubuzaawo abanyarwanda abanoonyi bobubudamuamaanyi ettutumu nobuganzi gen edward kale kayihura byabadde nabyo bangi balowooza nti abifunye mu myaka 13 gyamaze ngaduumira poliisiekyo si kituufu kayihura obuganzi bwe eri museveni bwaviira ddala mu nsiko mu lutalo lwekiyeekerayali musajja muwulize mugezi ekyenjawulo ate omumalirivunga yaakeegatta ku lutalo kayihura yasooka kuganja lwa nsonga bbiriesooka yali ya kitaawe john kale eyalwana ennyo uganda okufuna obwetwaze kyokka ebyembi nafa ngekirooto kye tekinnatuukirirayafiira mu kabenje kennyonyi nga august 17 1960yali ne basaabaze banne 33 mu nnyonyi yekika kya nnyo ku museveni ngalina essuubi nti ne mutabani we kayihura ajja kuba atyoensonga eyookubiri yali ya kayihura butafuuwa segereeti nokugaaya enjagaemize egyo museveni yali tagyagalira ddalayatuuzanga enkiiko zabayeekera be nabalabula obuteesembereza njaga na ssegereetiyadde museveni yali takolagana na banywi ba njaga bangi ku bayeekera baali bagikozesa era lumu yalabula okufiira yajja mu kampala okubaako obubaka bwakima ku munnabyabufuzi omubwe yamaliriza kwe kugulayo ekyennyanja era aba akifumba basajja ba obote ne bakitegeerabaakuba ebikompola we yali afumbira nasimattuka ngazuukuka ssaawa 1230 nga bukya ate ne yeebaka mukaaga ezekiromu ofiisi ngasooka kusisinkana amos ngabirano eyali avunaanyizibwa ku byempuliziganya mu poliisibwe zaaweranga ssaawa bbiri ezekiro abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumentibuli kye yasabanga okuva ewa pulezidenti nga kimuweebwa era yatandikira ku nnyonyimuseveni yalagira eyali akulira amagye ebiseera ebyo gen aronda nyakayirima yakozesa ezaasookakayihura yakwatirawo mangu essimu eyoku mmeeza nakubira muwanga namugamba nti ensimbi azeetaaga awatali kulwa kwonna naggyako essimumu ddakiika 30 ensimbi zaali zimaze okutuuka ku poliisiamegga aronda ne tinyefuza sejjusaamaanyi ge yalina kayihura yamanyirawo nti aliko bangi abatandise okumupangira okubaako kye bakolawo okutema ebiwaawaatiro byeera ekisanja kye ekyasooka bwe kyaggwaako mu october 2011 yamala ebbanga nga yeeraliikirirayali afunye olugambo nti gen aronda ne sejjusa baali bapanga kugamba pulezidenti alonde brigsilver kayemba okudda mu kifo kya kayihuraate yali akyeralikirira ebyo ne wabaawo amuleetera olugambo olulala nti kati museveni ategeka kuleeta gen david muhoozi kati akulira amagye okudda mu kifo kyeera lumu yali ku mukolo gwa gavumenti ogumu ebyokwerindaabaserikale abeeyanjudde ku cmi baabakunyizza ku ngeri gye baali bakolamu emirimu gya mukama waabwe nentambula zeokusinziira ku nsonda mu cmi baababuuzizza okunnyonnyola ebyaliwo ku zaategeezezzabaabuuzizza nekifo we baasimbula okugenda e kulambiro nga kaweesi amaze okutemulwabano era baabuuziddwa nebintu ebirala omuli entambula zeyali mukama waabwe nabantu be yasisinkananga eyiseewobaamuggya ku faamu ye ku kyalo katebe mu ggombolola ye kashagama e lyantonde ne bamuggalira mu kaduukulu kamagye e makindyeokuva lwe yakwatibwa yagaana okukola sitatimenti wadde bamwokya nansana ne katabibino byonna byaliwo mu kiseera nga kayihura ye muduumizi wa poliisi era alina okunnyonnyola byatuukawo bitya natasobola kubisalira magezitukulaze engeri gye baakutte ababadde bakuuma gen kayihura ne bye baboogezzamulimu ebipya ebikwata ku muserikale gwe baakutte ku bya kaweesi so nga ne  dr kiiza besigye omuserikale ono naye amuwanda lulusutukuleetedde ebisibye obubbi bwessimu mu kampalamu sanyuka ne wiikendi tukulaga omuyimbi irene namatovu engeri bba lutaaya bwe yamupacca oluyi nomutereeza mu layini yomukwano ne myuzikimu byemizannyo tosubwa engeri ekibinja abatuuze ne balemwa nokumanya we bakuttebino babizudde oluvannyuma lwokukunya abamu ku baakwatiddwa mu byokutta kaweesipulaani yalimu emmotoka gye baakwekamu pikipikiabaaluka olukwe baasooka kutegeka kimotoka ekyekika kya isuzu box body ekyasimba mu kkirommita nga bbiri okuva ku maka ga kaweesiekimotoka kino kyali kya langi ya siriva era abaavuga pikipiki baasooka kulambula kifo ekimotoka kino we kyali kisimbye ne bakuba ne pulaani yoluguudo we banaayita okukituukako nga misoni eweddeabaakwatiddwa bagamba nti tebaakwata nnamba ya kimotoka kino wabula abamu baabadde bagamba nti bajjukira ngennamba ezaaliko tezaali za ugandakiteeberezebwa nti ennamba yali njingirire era bambega bateebereza nti ennamba ezaassibwako zaali za congobwe baamala okutta kaweesi ne banne pikipiki ebbiri okwali abaamukuba amasasi baazivuga boolekedde ekifo awaali wasimbye ekimotokaddereeva wekimotoka bwe yawulira ngamasasi gavuga namanya nti misoni ekoleddwa naggulawo ekimotoka navugakigambibwa nti ekimotoka kyasibira mu kimu ku bikomera bya boofiisa ba poliisi era wakati mu kuvuga abaali munda baali beggyamu ebijaketi nobukookolo obwali ku maaso era baafuluma ekimotoka nga bali mu kikomera nga nebizibiti byonna babirese mu kimotokaofiisa nnyini kikomera eyali akoze ku byokuleeta ekimotoka yamanyi ebizibiti ne pikipiki ezaakozesebwa gye byateekebwaebizibiti ebyo kati aba iso bye bakyagezaako okukozesa wabula ensonda zaategeezezza nti emmundu ssatu ezigambibwa nti ze zaakozesebwa baazikutte era balina essuubi okukwata nebizibiti ebiralakigambibwa nti kyakolwa mu bugenderevu abapoliisi okukwata abantu abangi mu byokutta kaweesi era nekwatiramu ne pikipiki ekika kya bajaj boxer ezabantu abo era ezo ze yalaga ngebizibiti nti ze zaakozesebwa okutambuza abatta kaweesi era ne zitwalibwa ku poliisi ya kira road nga bataddeko nnamba yomusango gwokutta kaweesiiso egamba nti bino byali bya kiguumaaza kubanga pikipiki ezaakozesebwa zaali za maanyi nnyo era ssi za bulijjokaweesi yattibwa nga march 17 2017 ku makya nga yaakava ewuwe e kulambiromuseveni afulumizza pulaani kakongoliro ku byokwerinda era nalangirira nti ebyokutemula kaweesi yabyekwatiddemumunnamagye agenda okuwozesa gen kayihura ayogeddeomubaka nambooze bamututte mu kyuma ekikuba ebifaananyi kyokka ebivuddeyo ne biraga nti akyali mu mbeera mbimu asiika obulamu omukugu akulaga enkozesa ya butto etali ya bulabe eri obulamu bwomu byemizannyo tukulaze cristiano ronald bwe yayongedde okukola likodi portugal bwe yabadde ettunka ne morocco mu za world cupomuserikale eyavuga abatta kaweesi bamwogezza ebiwuniikirizaabakuumi nabayambi ba kayihura nabo bayitiddwa okubaako bye babuuzibwamu yiiya ssente omukugu akulaga byosobola okusuubula e china nofuna ekiweramu ono ye kampala mulimu abaali ewa kisekka abeeyubudde okwegobako abaferebataddewo amateeka kwe bakanikira nokutunda sipeeyamu byemizannyo morocco ereese omusambi gwesibiddeko olukoba okulemesa kaweesi bwe yeekobaana nabatemuokuva mu september 2017 akuumibwa baserikale mu nnyumba e lungujjaku ntandikwa ya wiiki eno yafunye kamunguluze nagwa nayisibwa bubibaakubidde essimu akulira ekitongole kya iso col frank kaka bagyenda essimu namuweereza omusawo eyamukebedde namujjanjabakyokka ngembeera eyongera kwonooneka omusawo nasemba bamwongereyo mu ddwaaliro eddeneensonda zaategeezezza nti yakebeddwa ne kizuulwa nga puleesa emuli bubi ate namabwa gomu lubuto aga alusa gaabadde gamuluma olwobutalya nokweraliikirirabukedde yagenze okumulaba nasanga ngeddwaaliro lyebulunguluddwa abaserikalekaweesi yatemulwa march 17 2017 nga yaakasimbula okuva ewuwe e kulambiro mu munisipaali ye nakawaaba iso baakwata omusajja eyakazibwako rasta agambibwa nti olukwe lwokutta kaweesi lwakolebwa munda mu poliisiwaliwo enkiiko ezaatuula ku wooteeri kati kati e lugogo nga zeetabwamu mbabazi nabaserikalekigambibwa nti mbabazi yakolagana nabatemu era bwe baali ku kati kati baasoma pulogulaamu ya kaweesi ya wiiki yonna ne balondako ennaku bbiri ezaali ennyangu okumuttirakobaayagala okumutta ku lwokuna nga march 16yalina abantu bagenda okusisnkana e ntebe oluvannyuma asisinkane mbabazi mu kifo ekimu e ntebembabazi yalina okuwuliziganya nabatemu ku ssimu balumbe kaweesi e ntebe oba okumuteega mu kkubo ngakomawo e kampalakyokka kaweesi yakubira mbabazi essimu ngamutegeeza bwafunye pulogulaamu endala ne bakkaanya basisinkane e mukono enkeera ku lwokutaano nga march 17 nga kaweesi amaze okwogera eri abayizi ku yunivasitekigambibwa nti mbabazi yaddamu kitundu temwalimu baserikalekyokka mbabazi bino byonna abyegaana nti tabeerangako mu lukiiko era ne rasta tamumanyiasaba bwaba alina omusango atwalibwe mu kkooti avunaanibwekigambibwa nti rasta alumiriza olukiiko alwateesa okutemula kaweesi lwalimu nomuserikale abbey kitagenda eyali amanyiganye obulungi ne kaweesi era yeenyigira mu butemukitagenda yakwatibwa aba iso wiiki ewedde           angella kayihura ku kkono ngali ne mikwano gye ku kabaga akamu gye buvuddekoku ddyo kye kiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwamukazi weyali omuduumizi wa poliisi mu ggwanga genkale kayihura afulumizza nju ennene nenju entono mu kikomera ne balinnya ne waggulu mu siiringi wakati mu kwerinda okwamaanyiensonda zaategeezezza nti amagye gaazudde ebitiisa mu kasenge akeekusifu gen kayihura gyabadde buwanaanabaasanzeeyo nebyuma ebiyitibwa gps nga kigambibwa nti abadde abikozesa okulondoola entambula zabanene mu gavumenti nomuntu yenna gyaba alagaabaayazizza ewa kayihura beewuunyizza lwaki cidensonda zaategeezezza nti kayihura bamubuuza ku bintu mukaaga nga muno mulimu ebyokukwata abanoonyi bobubudamu ne babazzaayo e rwanda era abamu ne battibwa okukozesa obubi ofiisi ebyokutemula bwamateekaaba famire ya kaweesi nga bakiikiriddwa mutoowe leo ruhinda baategeezezza nti baakola olukalala lwaba poliisi abeenyigira mu kutta kaweesi nga luliko abantu 25 nga nerinnya lya kayihura baakakwatibwa ku byokuttibwa kwa abiriga bonna batuuze be kawandamulimu abasuubuzi nabavuzi ba bodabodaabamu baakwatibwa abiriga yaakattibwa ate abalala baakwatiddwa ku mmande ya wiiki eno ne batwalibwa mu kifo ekitannamanyikaku baakwatiddwa kuliko bakari bukenya omutuuze we kawanda kirinyabigo ngatunda ttaka nokuvuga bodaboda e wandegeya jonathan walusimbi omusuubuzi webyamasannyalaze omutuuze omulala eyategerekeseeko erya fred nabalala basatu abatannamanyika mannyacate nantongo 55 omutuuze we saayi matugga nga ye nnyina wa walusimbi yagambye nti batambudde ku buli poliisi gye basuubira nti omwana we ayinza okuba nga gye bamukuumira nga taliiyoono agamba nti ekisinga okubamalamu amaanyi tewali muserikale yenna abagamba wa gye baamusibiddewalusimbi ne banne abasatu wakolera e kirinnyabigoyagasseeko nti abaana be baabagobye ku ssomero tebalina muntu agenda kubasasulira bisale bya ssomero nga kitaabwe abantu abamulina tebabategeezezzabwe baba baamukutte mu makubo amatuufu batubuulire nti ffe tumulina nemisango gye bamuvunaana tugimanye nantongo bwe yategeezezzaedward walusimbi lubwama muto wa walusimbi yagambye nti gavumenti emanyi abatta abantu erikaayanirwa charles ssembatya omukungu mu kitongole kyebigezo uneb ne hussein zziwa omutuuze we kanyana mu quarter zooni mu ggombola ye kawempe tebinnaggwassembatya talabiseeko enkya ya leero mu nteekateeka ekoleddwa okussa mu nkola ekiragiro kya kkooti ekyokuddamu okulipima ekitabudde zziwa ne babadde nabo ne basalawo okugenda mu maaso nokupima oluvannyuma bagenda kubuulira kkooti okupima ettaka erikaayanirwa erisangibwa e kanyanya mu quarter zooni ku block 210 poloti nnamba 1640 ne block 210 poloti nnamba 1985 bafune ebipimo ebituufu olwo omusango gutandike  okuwulirwazziwa ategeezezza nti ettaka erikaayanirwa eriri ku bugazi bwa desimoolo 22 lyali lya  mugenzi  hajji yusuf mutenda kyokka bwe yafa ne lidda mu mikono gyabaana be okuli ne asuman  kazibwe kabuzubwe taata wa zziwa naye eyafa olwo hadijah nannyonga omu ku booluganda ssenga wa zziwa kwe kuliguuza charles ssembatyazziwa annyonyola nti nanyonga mu kuguza ssembatya ettaka yatundiramu nomugabo gwe ne baganda be era wano we waava ssembatya okuloopa  zziwa ne banne mu kkooti ngabalanga okusalimbira ku ttaka lye yagulaabasirikale okuva ku poliisi  ye kanyanya abakulembeze bekitundu nga bakulemeddwamu ssentebe paul lubwama baker matovu looya wabawawaabirwa ba zziwa okuva mu mayanja nakubuule and coadvocates be bamu ku babaddewo nga abajulizi ngokupima ettaka kukolebwaomusango gutandika okuwulirwa nga november 20 2017ronald nsubuga 34 yatemuddwa abantu abatanategerekeka kyokka ne nnyina sarah ggaliwango namusoke ne baganda bomugenzi nabo basula ku tebuukye olwabazigu be bamu ababakubira essimu allan ssewanyana [ kawempe west]  ne mubarak munyagwa bakwatiddwa ne baggalirwa ku cps nga balangibwa kukuma muliro mu basuubuziolutalo lubaddewo emisana gya leero ku lwokusatu mu katale abasuubuzi bwe batabuse ne bakaggala nga bawakanya beti kamya okuwandiika ebbaluwa ebagoba mu katale ako mu bbanga lya nnaku 30 wabula erias lukwago nababaka ba palamenti bonna abakwatiddwa babadde bawakanya ne mubarack munyagwa [kawempe south] batudde mu ofiisi ya lukwago ne basalawo nti bagguddewo olutalo ku minisita beti kamya ababaka baagenze mu katale bannyonnyole abasuubuzi kyokka ekifo kyonna nga mu kakiiko ka palamenti akavunaanyizibwa ku nsonga zobwapulezidenti kcca eri wansi wa ofiisi ya pulezidenti nakwata wansi ne waggulu nti kcca tekagitanda newa basajjabalaba wadde ennusu kubanga obulyake bwe yakola mu mivuyo gya lufula alina kangavvulwa so si kuliyirirwa okuva june 2001 basajjabalaba lwe yaweebwa okuddukanya lufula omwami oyo talina wadde ekikumi kye yali asasudde kcca sso nga mu ndagaano gye yakola ne kcc nga tennafuuka kcca yalina okusasula obukadde 20 buli mwezi lukwago bwe yategeezezza ababaka bakakiiko akaakubiriziddwa amero susan mukazi amurialukwago yagasseeko basajjabalaba atandise obuzannyo bwe nga bwe yazannya mu katale ka st balikuddembe ne nakasero bwe yali atuttemu emivuyo ate oluvannyuma gavumenti nemuyirira obuwumbi 160 okusobola okweddiza ebifo ebyolukwago yakisimbyeko amannyo nti basajjabalaba ateekwa okusesema ssente ze yasolooza mu lufula wakati wa 2001 ne 2011 lwe yafumuulwa abasuubuzi abaddukanya lufula nasemba lukwago nti kcca yeddize lufula era egyeddukanyizebino biddiridde nnaggagga basajjabalaba naye okugenda mu palamenti mu kakiiko ke kamu nga november 16 2016 nalumiriza lukwago omuduumizi wa poliisi gen kale kayihura nomwogezi wa poliisi andrew kaweesi nti be bamanyi ku mayitire ga ssente obukadde 10 ezikuhhaanyizibwa mu lufula buli lunakubasajjabalaba eyatwala omukuku gwebiwandiiko yannyonnyodde ababaka nti mu 2001 lwe yafuna liizi yettaka lya plot 15 old portbell road okuli lufula kyokka mu 2011 loodi meeya lukwago ne bofiisa abanene mu poliisi baagimulemesa bwe baafubutula omusajja dan katalirwa kwatampola gwe yali awadde obuvunaanyizibwa ku lufulalukwago bwe yabuuzizza ku kya ssente obukadde 16 zagambibwa okuweebwa buli mwezi okuva mu lufula yategeezezza nti waliwo olukwe oluludde nga lulukibwa okumusiiga enziro nokumwonoonera erinnya nga bamulumiriza okulya ssente nasomooza omuntu yenna okulaga obujulizi oba sekyo ajja kubakuba mu mbuga zamateekabwe mba nnina abantu be nassa mu lufula mu 2011 lwaki ebbanga eryemyaka esatu gyamaze nga ofiisi ya lord mayor  nzigale kayihura nga yansibira waka lwaki abantu abaddukanya lufula tebaagobwamu lukwago bwe yabuuzizza nalaga abakakiiko ebbaluwa ezenjawulo abakungu ba kcca omuli ne jennifer musisi ze babadde bawandiikira abekibiina kya catda abaddukanya lufulalukwago yeegaanyi ebimussibwako nti yakulemberamu ebbiina lyabantu eryasiguukulula basajjabalaba mu lufula mu 2011 nagamba nti talinnyanga kigere mu lufula kubanga kayihura yamuyungulira abaserikale be ne bamutwala nga talinnyaakakiiko kali mu kubuuliriza lwaki kcca terina ssente zefuna mu lufula okuva mu 2001 lwe yakipangisa basajjabalaba ku liizi ya myaka 49lukwago yagambye nti abazze baddukanya lufula balina okusasula kcca nga basajjabalaba ateekwa okusooka okusasula ssente ze yasolooza okuva mu 2001 okutuuka mu 2011 ate ababadde bagiddukanya okuva mu 2011 nabo basajjabalaba basasule kccazaabadde ssaawa nga 600 poliisi okuva e kabalagala nefuna amawulire nga bwe waliwo omuntu asaliddwaako obulagoyasitukiddemu bunnambiro era okutuukawo nga mu loogi emu mu kataba we wagaalamye omulambo gwagambibwa okuba malaayaomulambo gwasangiddwa mu kitaba abeebyokwerinda okunyweza obukuumi mu loogibaasabye abasajja okukomya okutta bamalaaya kubanga baba bayiiya kikumiomutuuze teopista nagujja omusango yagutadde ku bannannyini loogi okuteekanga essira poliisi yagututte mu ddwaaliro e mulago ate omwana womugenzi natwalibwa ku poliisi e kabalagalaakiram ssonko 13 eyakedde okusena amazzi agokunaaba ye yasanze ekintu kyataasoose kutegeera nti mmundu negiggyawomansoor kasule akulira ebyokwerinda mu zooni eno yagambye nti mu ndeeba tebabadde na babbi babbisa mmundu era yeewuunyizza abaakwese emmundu eno mu kitundu kyabwenagamba nti ekyewuunyisa emmundu teyabaddemu masasi nga kirabika abaagikwese baasoose kuggyaamu masasi oba okugakozesayasabye abeebitongole ebikuumaddembe okwongera obukuumi mu kitundu kino kuba emmundu ezuuliddwa mu kitundu kyabwe ebatiisizzaatwala poliisi yomu ndeeba mugira kato yeetegeerezza emmundu nagitwala ku poliisi gyekuumibwatonny obel owekitongole kya range protection yagenze ku poliisi yomu ndeeba nategeeza okuzuula angeri gye yabbiddwaobel yagambye nti onguzi yamutuukiridde namutegeeza nga bwe baabadde bamubbyeeko emmundu ye era natya okubuulira bakama be kwe kusalawo okuddukaakulira bambega ku poliisi mu ndeeba frank tulyasiima yagambye nti banoonyereza okuzuula abaanyaze emmundu nga baagala kusooka kufuna nnannyini yo ababuulire ebyabaddewopoliisi yagguddewo fayiro nnamba sd 16040216 okunoonyereza ku musango gunoabamu ku batuuze mu ndeeba balumirizza abaserikale bebitongole ebikuumaddembe okwenyigira mu bubbi ngemmundu zaabwe bazipangisa ababbi abatigomya abantubagamba nti      patrick mugisha ngayogerako eri abantu beggombolola ye kalangaalo  mityanaalangaalomugisha agamba nti ekimuwalirizza okujja ku kifo kino bwe bukulembeze obuli mu kitundu kino obutamatiza bulungi okukola mu kampalaakabinja ka ssejjembanga april 21 2017 baalumba omusuubuzi mathias byamugisha ku luguudo lwe salama mu ttumbi ne bamukuba amasasi nagwa mu buwunga bwe yali atunda mu dduukamilly byamugisha muka byamugisha eyattibwa yagambye nti ku lunaku olwo baamukubira essimu ngali waka ne bamutegeeza nti bba yali atemuddwa era yagenda okutuuka ngomulambo gulu mu buwunga nga ne ssente ze yali akoze zonna zitwaliddwaagamba nti edduuka lyabwe lyali likola okukeesa obudde era bba baamulumba mu kiroharman ssenkoni amanyiddwa nga kadogo alina ebbaala ku nkulungo e kibuye baamulumba kabuusu ne bagisuula ku kkubo abatuuze we baagisanga ne bakubira poliisi we yagiggyaono alina nenkovu zejjambiya ssenyonjo nakabinja ke ze baamulekako nga bamaze okumubbamu 2017 wiiki emu nga afuddebano era baalumba omubaka wa palamenti amanya gasirikiddwa agambibwa nti yali agenze e makindye mu kafo akamu bamalaaya we beetundira ne bamenya emmotoka ye ne baggyamu ensawo nga bamanyi batutte ssente kyokka mwalimu mmunduomubaka yaloopa omusango ku poliisi ye katwe emmundu netandika okunoonyezebwa kyokka oluvannyuma ne kizuulibwa nti ye yakozesebwa okutta mugisha ne mubirussenyonjo kibadde kizibu okumuteebereza nti yandiba omumenyi wamateekamusajja mukozi era mu katale e kibuye abakoleramu bamwogerako ngomu ku bakanyama ababadde batikkula amatooke ku mmotoka era poliisi bwe yamukwata ku byokulumba amaka ga mikisa yagitegeeza nti ye musuubuzi wamatooke mu katale e kibuye ebyobubbi yabivaamu ddamu nkyukakyuka baminisita bana abava mu buganda hajati jannat mukwaya  haji abdul nadduli  ida erios nantaba ne charles bakabulindi baasuuliddwa abantu abenjawulo kye baatapuse nti buganda tefunyee mu nkyukakyuka zino kubanga abapya abalondeddwa yafunyeemu judith nabakooba yekka mpozzi ne gen edward katumba wambala eyafuuliddwa minisita omujjuvuomwogezi wa mmengo minisita noah kiyimba yagaanyi okwogera ku kya buganda okufuna oba okufiirwa mu nkyukakyuka zino ngagamba nti mukama waabwe yamanyi ensonga kwe yasinzidde okusuula be yasudde nokuleeta abapyaabaalondeddwa kiyimba yagambye nti balina okusoomoozebwa okwokutuukiriza bakukkuluma nti nabantu baabwe abolubatu be babadde nabo ku kabineti nabo babasudde ne bagamba nti ensonga bazirekedde allahomwogezi wekitebe kyobusiraamu e kampalamukadde haji nsereko mutumba 2018omulamuzi yasindika zaake mu kkomera lye gulu okutuusa nga march 14 2019 olwokuba nga kkooti ye yali terina buyinza buwulira musango gwa naggomolamu kkooti eyatudde eggulo omulamuzi mubiru ligenda kusikira etteeka eriyitibwa minimum wages advisory boards and wages councils act eryabagibwa mu 1957 nga uganda tennafuna bwetwazeetteeka ekkadde eriyitibwa minimum wages advisory boards and wages councils act lyaggwa dda ku mpagala kubanga lwe lyabagibwa mu 1957 lyassaawo essalira ya ssiringi 33 ngomusaala ogusookerwako era mu 1984 bwe kyazuulirwa nti omusaala ogwa 33 tegukyakola makulu omusaala ogusookerwako gwalinnyisibwa okutuuka ku 6000 wabula mu 1987 gavumenti bwe yawanyisa ssente siringi 6000 zaafuuka 60ababaka abenjawulo okuviira ddala mu 1996 mu palamenti eyoomukaaga bazze bagezaako okuwoma omutwe mu kuleeta ebbago lyetteeka ku musaala ogusookerwako kyokka nga balemesebwa nga gavumenti egamba nti ensonga eyo egikolako okutuusa omubaka rwakajara lwe yeevuddemu naleeta ebbago lyetteeka erya minimum wage bill mu 2013olwakazito gavumenti ke yassibwako abebibiina byobwannakyewa ebibiina byabakozi nabalala mu june 2015 olukiiko lwa baminisita lwayisa ekiteeso ekissaawo akakiiko okwekenneenyeza nokusalawo ku musaala gusookerwakoakakiiko ako akayitibwa minimum wages advisory board nga kakulirwa eyali omuwanika weggwanika lyeggwanga omugenzi chris manyindo kassami ne bammemba okuli  chris kanya milton turyasiima juliet nazziwa musoke  fred robert wapakhabulo namawa naye kati mugenzi joram bruno pajobo ne dinah kusasira kaasemba nti omusaala ogusookerwako tegulina kukka wansi wa 136000 awatali kufaayo ku mulimu omuntu gwakola ne bwabeera mukozi wa wakaomubaka arinaitwe rwakajara yayongera amaanyi mu tteeka lino ngawagirwa bannamateeka bannabyabufuzi ebibiina byabakozi nebibiina byobwannakyewa ebyenjawulo era ku lwokubiri lwa wiiki eno nga february 19 2019 yaggusizza ensonga eno palamenti bwe yayisizza ebbago lyetteeka lya minimum wages bill 2015ebbago lyetteeka lya minimum wages bill 2015 lyasooka okwanjulwa mu palamenti mu december 2015 sipiika rebecca kadaga nalisindika mu kakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku kikula kyabantu nembeera zabakozi akayitibwa committee on gender labour and social development gye limaze emyaka esatu okutuusa ababaka abaakakiiko akakulirwa alex ndeezi bwe baayanjulidde palamenti lipoota yaabwe ku ntandikwa yomwezi gunoetteeka lya minimum wages act 2015 eryayisiddwa palamenti lisengekeddwa mu bitundu bina ngekitundu ekisooka lirambika ensonga lwaki etteeka lireeteddwa nennyinyonnyola yebigambo ate ekitundu ekyokubiri kirambika engeri akakiiko akasengeka omusaala ogusooka aka minimum wages board gye kalina okussibwawo ani akalonda bani abakatuulako obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe nengeri gye balina okukolamu emirimu gyabweekitundu ekyokusatu ekyetteeka lino kikwata ku nkolagana wakati womukozi nomukozesa naddala ku bya kontulakiti ensasula embeera abakozi gye bakoleramu nengeri eyokutawululamu enkaayana nobutakkaanya wakati womukozi nomukozesamu kitundu ekyokuna kikwata ku kalonda omulala omuli nebibonerezo ebiweebwa omukozi oba omukozesa singa amenya obuwaayiro mu tteeka linoetteeka lino likirambika bulungi nti ligenda kukola ku bakozi bonna okuggyako abali wansi webitongole ebyokwerinda nga poliisi amagye ga updf abakozi ba gavumenti nabantu abalala bonna abakozesebwa kagereka omuwendo gunopaul mwiru jinja municipality east yagambye nti abakozi bangi basasulwa ssente nga ne bwakolera emyaka egiwera tasobola kukyusa mbeera yeyawadde ekyokulabirako nti abakozi mu kkampuni eyeebuuzibwako consultancy fi rmisabirye akola guno na guli naddala mu byokwebuuzibwako mu makampuni gebyempuliziganyamu bwangu ngamufunye isabirye yakyala mu bakadde ba nabikolokigambibwa nti nabikolo yomu ku baali ku lyato eryatta abantu nga november 24 2018 okuliraana mutima beach mu disitulikiti ye mukonokyokka isabirye eyagaanye okwogera ebingi ku nsonga yamaka nabikolo anobye nagenda nomwana wa isabirye gwe balinaisabirye yakakasizza bukedde eggulo nti mukazi we yamudduseeko naye alina omulala gwasuubira okuzzaawonabikolo bwe yatuukiriddwa yagaanye naisamura ritah kaggwa latifah ssenyondwa lilian mukasa lianne nakaweesiomuyimbi dr tee era nga ye pulezidenti wekibiina kya uprs ekikuuma obwannannyini bwebiyiiye bya bannakatemba abayimbi nabalala addinganye ne muyimbi munne betty mpologomadr tee ngamannya ge amatuufu ye travis kazibwe yawasa omukyala nkubakyeyo e bungereza mariane kijjambu bashabire mu january wa 2014 oluvannyuma lwokukyala mu bakadde mu 2012 e bulenga ku lwe mityanaebigambo byali bingi ne mikwano gya dr tee bangi beesika olwokulowooza nti yali agenda kuwasa betty mpologoma wabula nagenda nomusama gwe yali alinamu abaana ababiri mu budde obwomu october wa 2012 nga wayise akabanga katono nga dr tee akyadde mu bakadde ba bashabire betty mpologoma yafulumya oluyimba lwe yatuuma tewali alitwawukanya ngalinga alaga nti ye ne dr tee tebayinza kwawukanakyokka mu february wa 2016 mpologoma kyamusukkako nalumba bukedde nategeeza nga bwe yali anoonya omusajja era amawulire gaategeeza buli gwe kikwatako naye agamba nti baamusukkako obungi natafunamu mutuufuokuwasa bashabire dr tee yalekawo nomukyala omulala grace malaika ngono yabeeranga nnyo naye naddala ku mikolo gye baabanga bamuyise ate nga betty abeera nnyo naye mu byemirimubwe yawasa bashabire bonna baabula eri abantu okuggyako betty obwolumu lwe beekanganga nga basisinkanye ku mikolo gye balina okuyimba bombibetty yategeezezza bukedde nti nze first lady era nze nakimanya dda essaawa yonna nti ne bwe kiriba kiki oyo ye wangedr tee ne betty baakoze noluyimba lwe bayita fasi fasi mwe bayimbira nti  leka tubayiteko katono nebigambo ebirala bashabire baayawukana kyokka ebyo dr tee yabiyise bya bwewussaono eyasangiddwa ku situdiyo ye eya song factory e mengo gye buvuddeko yategeezezza nti muntu wa buvunaanyizibwa atayinza kuzunga bwatyo muka dr tee owempeta ayanukuddebukedde yayogedde ne bashabire ali e bungereza mu budde buno nagamba nti abatamwagaliza dr tee be bazunza ehhambo nti baayawukanyetee noyo betty baakoze bukozi luyimba naye tebalina kirala kibagattabetty ne kazibwe baayawukana bubi nnyo ekitali kyangu kya kumuddira mu bya mukwano okuggyako ebyemirimubetty mpologoma ne dr tee lwe baasisinkanabaasisinkana mu 1999 mu situdiyo za vcl ekwata emizannyo gya ebonies mu biseera ebyo nga dr tee pulodyusa mu vclmpologoma agamba nti mu ebonies yali muyimbidr tee yayagala nnyo betty olwokumanya ennyo okuyimba katikkiro wa uganda dr ruhakana rugunda ngaggulawo essomero lyabasawo erya uganda chrstian university school of medcine e mengo dr rugunda yategezezza nti mu uganda omusawo omu ajjanjaba abalwadde yategeezezza nti wadde eggwanga lyetaaga abasawo naye tebalina kukoma kuba bangi wabula balina okuba nga batendeke bulungi ate nga beetegefu okufa ku bulamu bwabantu mu ggwangaebyobulamu essira bwe yategeezezzayagambye nti abaana bano be bamuleetedde bali wakati wemyezi omukaaga nemyaka ebiri wabula nawa amagezi abakyala bonna abatannaba kuleeta baana ba mutabani we babaleete mu nnaku zino yebyokwerinda era nga yagambye nti amaze ne kirumira ebbanga lya myaka munaana wabula okuzaala kwasooka ne kugaanawabula katonda abadde yaakabawa omwana omu ayitiibwa shahaz nakawooya 1ne saudia karabia we bwera ku booda ya uganda ne congo azaala hassan jjungo 2muzeeyi kawooya agamba nti kirumira abadde alina abagagga abamuyambako okumuwa ku ssente okuva lwe baamugoba ku mulimu nabalala mikwano gye babadde akolagana nabo mu ngeri eyenjawulo okuli hajji hamis kigunddu [ham]  sofia namutebi [maama fiina] godfrey kirumira nabalala asabye baveeyo bamudduukirire waakiri buli omu ngakyuse nnyo mu nkola yebintu byenga yatuuka nokunnsyimiriza ne muwala waffe omukulu mu kiro ekyakeesa olwokutaano okulaba oba amusinga obuwanvu era yakomekkerezza amukuutira kundabirira ne bato be ngalinga atusiibulaafande wange feesi ye ebadde epeeruuse nnyo ennaku zino wabula nga nange sitegeera bigenda mu maaso mariam bwe yategeezezza oluvannyuma lwokukomawo mu maka gaabwe e bulenga mu gogonya zooni b ku lwe mityanabwe yabuuziddwa ku byabaana abebbali mariam yagambye nti takimanyi era abadde tabalabangako wabula nagattako nti tabalinaako mutawaana kubanga bonna baana ate abatalina ebbujje lya mwaka gumu nagamba aba famire naye tebamubuusa amaaso nga babala bamulekwa abalina okuyambibwaomwana yabbulwa mu mannya ga kirumira era ye muhamad kirumira namwongerako nerya jjajja we erya kawooyanakimbowa agamba nti omugenzi abadde muganzi we newankubadde ngenkolagana yaabwe tebadde mu lujjudde kyokka yali yamupangisiza ennyumba ku luguudo lwe bombo era gye babadde basisinkananakimbowa yagambye nti kirumira abadde akyogera lunye nti waliwo abantu abamutambulirako era ebiseera bwe tubadde tusisinkana ngakihhamba nti essaawa yonna bagenda kumutta wabula nga kyasinga okweraliikirira kwe kuleka abaana be nga bakyali batookumanya baze abadde atambulira mu kufa bwe twazaala omwana ono yasalawo okumubbulamu amannya gebwe namubuuza lwaki asazeewo okukikola kwe kuba nga simanyi bwe ndinnyonnyola mwana ngakuze engeri kitaawe gye yafaamunakimbowa yagambye nti twatandika okwagalana ne kirumira emyaka nga 15 egiyise era omukwano gwaffe gwatandika nga tannaba na kuwasawabula omukwano gwaffe gwaddirira bwe yatwalibwa e kagadi ne tuba nga tetukyalabagana bulungi naye ate bwe yakomawo ne tuddamu buto era mu nkwatagana eno mwe mwava okusalawo okuzaala booluganda lwe ne jjajja we mwkawooya muzzukulu we ono amumanyi bulungiyankubira essimu ku lwokutaano lwa wiiki ewedde ne tumala ekiseera nga twogera ku nsonga ezenjawulotwali tumaliriza okwogera yagambyemu kwogera natuuse okumwekaanya nga bwe nakoowa emboozi ye eyokufa kuba ebadde temuva ku mumwa kumbe nabadde simanyi nti bye bigambo bye bye nsemba okuwuliraenkeera ku lwomukaaga ku ssaawa nafanakimbowa yaliko munnamawulire wa star fm voice of teso naye nga mu kiseera kino akola nekibiina kyobwannakyewa ekiyamba abantu ku byobulamu           taata wa kirumira ku ddyo nabaserikale nga bayiwa ettaka ku ntaana ya kirumira abamu ku bakungubazi abeetabye mu kuziika kirumira ku ssande ku biggya e mpambire ku lwe masaka baagaanyi abakungu ba gavumenti ne poliisi okwabadde omwogezi waayo kubatuukakoyayongeddeko nti nakulira abakozi mu poliisi aigp moses balimwoyo yamukubidde ku ssimu eggulo mmande namusaba agende ku poliisi e naggulu anone amabugo nobubaka obulala bwe babadde ebireeseabamu ku mikwano gya kirumira kwossa aba famire baategeezezza nti emmotoka ya kirumira babadde bagitya kuba abadde alondoolwa era nga ne kirumira ye nnyini akibagamba nti nolumu awalirizibwa attibwa abantu abaludde nga bamulondoola buli waddabannyonyodde nti abadde talina buzibu kutwalako muntu yenna mu mmotoka ye wabula ngasooka kukubuuza oba totya kufajamirah nagingo yategeezezza nti      bobi wine ne looya weebiragiro bino biddiridde bobi wine okwongera okukaaba obulumi mu mugongo naddala wansi okumpi nekiwatoobulumi obwamaanyi bumumazeeko ennaku bbiribobi wine abasawo bruce musema wakati nomumyuka wa ssentebe wekibiina e nakawa harriet ssebuufu nga bali mu lukungana lwa bannamawulire e najjanankumbifdc etegeezezza nti etandise okukunganya obujulizi ku bantu abeenyidde mu bikolwa bino ssekinnoomuababaka ba palamenti  okuli robert kyagulanyi  amanyiddwa nga bobi wine kyadondo east owekibuga mityana francis zzaake paul mwiru owa jinja east ne bannayuganda abalala abawerako banyiga biwundu bya miggo namasasi  ebyabakubwa abebyokwerinda oluvannyuma lwobwegungo obwabuutikidde ebitundu byeggwanga ebitali bimu oluvannyuma lwokulonda kwekibuga aruakino kyaddiridde ebigambibwa nti waliwo abaakanyugira emmotoka za pulezidenti museveni amayinja ngagenze mu arua okuyiggira owa nrm nusura tiperu akaluluokulonda kwawangulwa kasiano wadri ataalina luddaomwogezi wekibiina kino ssemujju nganda abadde nabakungu baakyo e najjanankumbi ku lwe ntebe agambye nti abakulembeze ba fdc baatudde ne bakola lipooti eyekiseera ku byabadde mu kulonda kwa arua nebyo ebyaddiriddeera oluvannyuma bagenda kwongera okugyekenneenya bakole eyenkomeredde  gye bagenda okusinzirako okulaba ekigenda okuddirira ababadde emabega weffujjo lino tugenda kubatwala mu mbuga zamateeeka  ssekkinnoomu bavunaanibwe semuju abadde  neyavuganyizibwa mu kulonda ku tikiti ya fdc nawangulwa bruce musema bwagambyemusema agambye nti ngoggyeeko abakulembeze aboogerwako amawulire waliwo abantu ba bulijjo bangi abaasigadde nga banyiga biwundu olwobuvuyo bunossemuju ayongeddeko nti fdc egenda kusigala ngerwanirira eddembe lyabaatuusiddwaako ebisagone yeemulugunya olwa gavumenti okuyiwa amagye ku nguudo ne geddiza omulimu ogwandibadde ogwa poliisiono era omulamuzi wa kkooti ewozesa abalyaake   lawrence gidudu yamuwadde ekibonerezo kyakusibibwa mu kkomera okumala emyaka 10omulamuzi era yawadde senkeeto ekibonerezo ekirala kyakusibibwa emyaka esatu ku buli musango ku egyo omukaaga egibadde gimuvunaanibwaku misango omukaaga etaano ku ggyo gya yeekobaana nabba ssente mu kitongole ekikola ku byenguudo ekya uganda national roads authority unrakkooti era yasindise eyali diyirekita wa unra  avunaanyizibwa ku byensimbi nabakozi joe semugooma mu kkomera amaleyo emyaka etaano ngemulanga kukozesa bubi ofiisi ye nemirala etaano nga gya bulyakeomulamuzi era yakinogaanyizza nti senkeeto ye yali wakati wobubbi bwensimbi zonna ezaabula kino kiri mu kisaawe e namboole era kirimu ebipya omuli okuwa abalongo abanaasinga bannaabwe ssente 3500000 nebirabo ebirala okuli okuyoola ssente okuva mu kyuma kya post bank emijoozi nebirala okuva mu bitongole ebiwerako okuli palamenti ya uganda ne vision group etegese ekivvulu kinobakasitoma baffe tubategekedde ekifo kye namboole ekigazi obulungi nokubawa ebirabo ebyenjawulo okuli ssente enkalu nebirala  hajara batuuka omu ku bateesiteesi bekivvulu kino okuva mu vision group bwe yategeezezzaaba post bank era bagenda kuwa abantu omukisa okuggulirawo abaana baabwe akawunti eziyitibwa kids account ku ssente entono kisobozese abaana baabwe okuyiga okutereka ensimbi mu bbanka yaabwe ate abo era abo abanaggulawo akawunti be bagenda okuweebwa omukisa okuyoola ssente mu kyumaate joweria nabuuma avunaannyizibwa ku kutegeka ebivvulu bya vision group yategeezezza nti ebyokwerinda binywezeddwa era buli agenda okuyingira ekivvulu kyabalongo agenda kunyumirwa awatali abalongo abakulu  anne nakato  ku ddyo ne magadalene babiryeabato laura nakato  ku kkono  ne lwoise babirye nga bali ku kisaawe e ntebe balinda bannaabwe okuva e zimbabweabalongo abagenda okuva e zimbabwe be bamu kwabo abongedde ebbugumu mu kivvulu kino ekigenda okubeerawo ku ssande enoabalongo bano gift petro ne mugandawe pachawo abalongo omuli abaana abavubuka nabakadde babeesungaekivvulu kino ekiyitibwa kampala twins festival kya kubeera mu kisaawe e namboolekyasooka kutegekebwa ku kisaawe kya rugby e lugogo naye olwobungi bwabantu abeeyongera buli mwaka mu kibbiitu kino kyasaliddwaawo ku luno kitwalibwe e namboole awagazi obulungi era abantu abasukka mu 6000 be basuubirwaekivvulu kino ekigenda okutambulira ku mulamwa ogugamba nti abalongo abalina ebitone [twins got talent] kigenda kubeeramu buli kika kya ssanyu eriva ku mizannyo egyenjawulo egitegekeddwa okunyumira abalabiabalongo abavudde e zimbabwe baleeteddwa kkampuni yennyonyi eya rwanda air era bagenda festival okusasulira abalongo bano okubawa byonna okukakasa nti banyumirwaabalongo bano okwetaba mu kkivulu kino bakiikiridde bannaabwe mu kibiina ekibagatta e zimbabwe           pisito okuli namasasi ebyakwatiddwa ne musoke mu katonomu katono ku ddyo ye mugenzi birabwaabebyokwerinda baludde nga bamunoonya ku musango gwokutta muganzi we agnes birabwa nabakooza ekyaliwo mu september wa 2017 e makindye mu kampalakigambibwa nti musoke yali amaze ekiseera ngagenze bweru kyokka yaweerezanga muganzi we obubaka obutiisatiisa okumutta ne nnyina wa birabwa josephine nannyanzi okutuusa kino bwe yakituukiriza ngakomyewo mu ugandakigambibwa nti musoke ne birabwa baalina obutakkaanya nga bwekuusa ku nsimbi obukadde 85 ezekizimbe musoke kye yali atunze e kawempe kye yatunda obukadde 300 kyokka nagenda ebweru ngakyabanja obukadde 85 ku bantu be yakiguza era nalagira baziwe birabwa nga yali waakuzimuweerezamusoke ku poliisi yategeezezza bukedde nti yakanda kubanja ssente zino nga birabwa aziremedde era yazikolamu bibye ekyamuleetera obusungu obwamutuusa okumukuba amasasi namuttamusoke bwakomawo e uganda nakola olukwe bwe yalimbalimba birabwa namusaba baddihhane era ebyabaawula biggwe namusaba okumusisinkana awamu ne nnyina ne baganda be basisinkane ewa mukwano gwa birabwa ayitibwa zaraha nabbona e makindyebirabwa ye yasooka okutuuka era musoke najjira ku bodaboda kyokka olwesogga ennyumba yamukuba bukubi masasi ku mutwe nabuukira bodaboda eyali emulinze nga nnyina wa birabwa ne baganda be abalala baali batuuka nga musoke abuukira bodaboda addukaokuva olwo musoke abadde anoonyezebwa okutuusa bwe yakwatiddwa poliisi ye kyotera ne rakai bwe baatemezeddwaako omutuuze nti balina gwe balabye nemmundu mu bbaala era ne batandika okumulinnya akagerebaamukwatidde mu ssabo lyomusamize ku kyalo kammengo mu ggombolola ye lwanda era okumwaza baamusanze ne pisito namasasi agawerabaamulizze emiguwa era nabategeeza nti emmundu agirina mu kumukola kiyagambye nti ekizibu kyalaba kya bannabyabufuzi abalinga kassiano wadri ne bobi wine abakkirizza abakozi beffujjo okubayingiramu ne bavaako okufa kwabantu abatalina musango nokutiisatiisa ebirala byonna bijja kugondaminisita ssekabembe era yakunze abantu mmengo okuteeka essira ku kuweerera abaana nokukola obutaweera okusobola okugoba obwavu nabasaba nokujja mu bungi e kibibi  butambala nga august 252018 nga kabaka aggalawo empaka zomupiira gwebika byabaganda wakati wenkima nempindimutuba xii kkingo nga baakulembeddwamu elizabeth nalwanga muwanga baleese 3530000mutuba vii lwengo 1740000 mutuba xiv malongo 575000 mutuba xiii kisekka 2500000 ne mutuba i buwunga1550500 nga zonna wamu zaasusse obukadde 10ate omubaka omukazi owa lwengo mu palamenti cissy namujju yawaddeyo 900000           haji kasule ali ngalaga ensala ya kkooti ekifettaka  eryogerwako liri  ku kyapa mawokota block 1 plot 106 e e jeza ne kawela mu disitulikiti ye mpigi era kasule agamba nti lyamuguzibwa  omugenzi  asaafu galabuzi ku bukadde mukaaga mu 2006 ngakyali mulamu kyokka bwe yafa abamu ku benganda ze ne bamwefuuliragalabuzi yafuna omugabo ku ttaka lya kitaawe omugenzi simon ssemambo  era omugabo gwe gwe yaguza kasulebaganda ba galabuzi kyategezeddw nti nabo baafuna ebyabwekkooti ya buganda road mu kampala eyakuliddwa omulamuzi marion mangeni ye yejjereza kasule omusango guno ogwamuwawabirwa abamu ku benganda zomugenzi nga bagamba nti kiwandiiko  ekyalikyusa okulissa mu mannya ge yajjinga kiginge omulamuzi kye yazudde nti ssi kituufuoludda oluwaaba lubadde lulumiriza nti kasule nga september 4 2006 e kampala yaginga ffoomu zokukyusa obwanannyini bwettaka lino alage nti galabuzi ye yazissaako omukonokino kasule omutuuze we nkozi ku lwe ntebe abadde akyegaana ngagamba nti omugenzi ye yabissaako omukono era abamulumiriza kwe kuleeta abajjulizi bataano okwabadde christopher bbuule batte muganda womugenzi moses ssebunnya kibirigesylivia chalangatokello francis  ne joseph kibandeoludda oluwawabirwa  nalwo lwaleese abajjulizi okuli kasule yennyini munnamatteeka yusuf nsibambi ne john baptist mujuzikasule yagambye nti ettaka yaligula 6000000 okuva ku galabuzi nga ne munnamatteeka we yusuf nsibambi yaliwokyokka omulamuzi yagambye nti abawaabi baalemeddwa okuleeta obujjulizi obumala okulaga nti kasule ekiwandiiko yaginga kiginge nagamba nti ebiriwo biraga nti omugenzi asafu ye yabissaako omukonoomuwawabirwa talina musango yejjeredde omulamuzi bwe yawunzisekadaga agamba nti gavumenti yandibadde yeeyambisa lipooti eyava mu kubala abantu erambulula obulungi obungi bwabantu abali mu bitundu nga ku bano kwe yandisinzidde okuwa disitulikiti ebyetaago okugeza eddagala mu malwaliro nensimbibino yabyogedde asisinkanye akakiiko ka gavumenti akavunaanyizibwa ku gavumenti zebitundu aka local government finance commission abaakulembeddwa akakulira dr agnes atimbamukwasizza lipooti ekwata ku gavumenti zebitundu eyomwaka 201617kadaga yagambye nti disitulikiti namagombolola geetaaga okufuna engeri gye gafunamu ensimbi galeme kwesiba ku kulindirira ziva mu gavumentiatim yagambye nti ensimbi ezisinga gavumenti zewa disitulikiti zikola ku misaala sso ssi nkulaakulanayagambye nti akakiiko kagezaako okufuna ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku bawi bomusolo  basobole okunoonya awasobola okukunganyizibwa omusoloomuwandiisi wakakiiko lawrence banyoya yagambye nti ebifo ebimu we bandiggye emisolo nga ppaaka zemmotoka nobutale kizibu okugufunamu kuba teri nkola nnungamu erambikiddwa egobererwa mu kugiwoozaamupulezidenti agamba nti  abamu ku boludda oluvuganya okwabadde kasiano wadri abadde abavuganya ku bubaka bwa palamenti omubaka wa kyadondo east robert kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga bobi wine masasi  abo abaatukasukidde amayinja abantu bangi bandifiiriddwa obulamu bwabwe museveni bwe yagambye mu kiwandiiko kye yafulumizza ku byabadde e arua ku mmande omwabadde abantu okukanyugira emmotoka ye amayinja  novubuyo obulala obwafiiriddemu  ne ddereeva wa bobi winemuseveni yagambye  nti ye  eyeyise musajja mukulu owenkufiira teyatuusiddwaako  bisago kyokka ejjinja lyayasizza endabirwamu yaayo mu kifo awakuumirwa emigugu nga kino ssi kyekimu ku bifo byemmotoka ebitayitamu masasiyategeezezza nti wadde abajaasi tebayanukuzza masasi kyokka aboludda oluvuganya abaabadde bavuga tinga tinga baasigadde bakola effujjo mu kibuga ne basisinkana abawagizi ba nrm abaabadde bava mu lukungana lwa kampeyini  ne batandika okubakanyugira amayinja  nga mu buvuyo buno mwe mwafiiridde omuntu       omutuuze ku kkono ngakaabira enju ye eyasuuliddwa ku ttakabuluhani kabanda omu ku baasaayiddwa yiika zolusuku ttaano yategeezezza nti tebafunangako kulabulwa kwonna nti we baagula waliwo enkaayanawabula kyabeewuunyisizza okusanga ensuku zaabwe nga najjemba azisaawanajjemba yabakudaalidde nti tebalina kye bayinza ku mukola wabula bave ku ttaka lyenajjemba yazze nabaserikale abemmundu nga tasalikako musaleabatuuze bwe baagezezzaako okumutuukirira abaserikale ne bawandagaza amasasi mu bbanga abatuuze ne babuna emiwabojudith buteera agamba nti baamukoonedde ennyumba byapa binalyasooka kuba lya kopolio lule ssaalongo lubega cosmas naligula ate naliguza betty lubega ngono ye yamuguzamu kiseera kino nnamwandu wa kopolio yayagala ettaka lino limuddizibwe ngagamba asobole okulikulaakulanya          amaka ga basiima gwe baatemudde mu bukambwefred basiime 70 owe nsimbo mu ggombolola ye ddwaaniro e rakai omutuuze eyabadde agenze okumuyita okwetaba mu lukiiko nebintu byepoliisi ye rakai ngekulembeddwaamu agikulira patience baganzi baakoze omuyiggo ne bakwata mutabani womugenzi gonzaga kyagera 22 abatuuze gwe balumiriza okubaako kyamanyi ku ttemu lino nti awaka yavuddeyo nga basiima mulamu bulunginagamba nti embeera abaana gye baabadde bamuyisaamu omuli obutamubuuza ate nga ne bba emirimu gyomu kisenge tagituukiriza kye kyamuwalirizza okuvaayopoliisi yagguddewo omusango gwobutemu ngokunoonyereza bwe kugenda mu maaso            abatuuze nga bali ku kabangali ya poliisi eyatutte omulambo gwa nampijjaresty nampijja 22 abadde asiba enviiri ku luguudo lwa kitovu  nakayiba ye yattiddwa era omusajja olwamaze okumutta naddukanampijja abadde yaakasenga mu kifo kino ngava e kyamuliibwa mu disitulikiti ye kalungu nga bajja nabaana babiri ngomukulu wa myaka mukaagakigambibwa nti nampijja yasoose kuyomba ne muganzi we era ekyaddiridde kulwana omusajjanamusogga ekiso ekyamussecharles kyeyune muwanga ssentebe wekyalo yategeezezza nti baliraanwa baawulide okuyombagana kyokka ne batafuluma nga balowooza nti olutalo terujja kuba lwamaanyikyokka beekanze okukeera ku makya ne bakizuula nti omukazi yattiddwakyeyune yagambye nti abatuuze okubuulira abakulembeze baabwe nga waliwo abantu           nafuna eyanyaze mukama we naddukapoliisi mu kampala eri ku muyiggo gwomuwala abadde omukozi wawaka eyabbye ebintu bya mukama we nabulawoanoonyezebwa ye rose nafuna 18 abadde akola obwayaaya mu maka ga agnes nakasi omutuuze we namugongo mu kamuli zooni a  nakasi yategeezezza nti omukozi yamubbye ku lwamukaaga nga august11th2018 bwe yabadde agenze okukolaekisenge kyange ndeka nkisibye naye kirabika omuwala ono yabadde nekisumuluzo ekiggula kufulu ezenjawulo kubanga nnasanze wasibe nga bwe nnaleseewo naye ngebintu bitwaliddwa nakasi bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti omwana we gwabadde alabirira yamulekedde baamulirwana ngabalimbye nti yabadde agobeddwa mukama we era nga yamuwadde ebiragiro obutamusangawo ngakomyewoebimu ku bintu bye yabbye kwabaddeko ssente enkalu 1900000 engatto ensawo ezitula ebintu neyo mu ngalo densite yeggwanga ne driving permityategeezezza nti omukozi ono yamujja wa mukulu we rebbecca namukwasi omutuuze we mpereerwe mu kiyanja zooni era ngabadde amaze naye emyezi etaano gyokkaamyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga patrick onyango yakakasizza okubbibwa kwebintu bya nakasi nkolagana yayo na kkooti enonategeeza nti uganda yali nsaale mu kuloopa abamenyi bamateeeka  mu kkooti eno era enkolagana yayo nayo ekyagenda maasouganda yaloopa mu kkooti eno abajjambula ba kony south sudan nga bukosa uganda ne sudanmuyingo bino yabitegeezezza  mu kiwandiiko eri palamenti eyakubiriziddwa omumyuka wa sipiika jacoub oulanyahmuyingo yategeezezza nti olukiiko olukulembera abayizi nabaddukanya yunivasite eno bakaanya nti ffiizi zongerweko ebitundu 15 buli kikumi mu kifo kyokuzongeza okuva  bitundu 49 91 buli kikumi nga yunivasite bwe yali eyagalanategeeza nti ngogwongeza ffiizi tekunabaawo waliwo okunoonyereza okwakolebwa ku yunivasite ye nairobi ne wabaawo okugerageranya ku nsimbi ezisabibwa yunivasite eyo ku koosi ezitali zimuera ne kizuulibwa nti makerere yali esaba ssente za wansi nnyo nga zirina okulinyisibwa ebintu bisobole okutambula obulungiekyokulabirako  abasoma obusawo bwokulongoosa abantu e nairobi basasula obukadde 17 buli mwaka nge makerere basasula obukadde bubiri nemitwalo 60ate abasoma amateeka basasula obukadde bubiri nekitundu e makerere nge nairobi basasula obukadde mukaaga nekitundumuyingo yagambye nti kyakanyizibwako yunivasite abapya           kakooza gwebatemye nga bamutusizza mu ddwaaliro e gombeabazigu abatannategeerekeka baateeze paul kakooza 58 eyaakalondebwa ku bwassentebe bwekyalo kalwanga mu ggombolola ba bodabodabaamuteeze ngava mu kabuga ke kifampa ne bamukwatira ku kkubo erikyama ewuwe ku ssaawa nga 400 ezekiro ne bamutema kyokka abewuwe ne bawulira ngalaajana ne bakuba enduulu olwo abazigu ne badduka ne baleka ngataawabaamuddusizza mu ddwaaliro e kifampa gye baamuggye ne bamwongerayo mu ddwaaliro lye gombeabooluganda lwa kakooza baagambye nti abatemu bakira batema basirise okwewala okuyigga abatemu bano          lukwago ne betti kamya nga bali mu lukiiko olumulukwago azzeemu ebbaluwa ya kamya ngamujjukiza yamuwandiikira ebbaluwa nga january 23 2018 ngayimiriza enkiiko ze ebintu byabwebwe twayogedde ne ssaabanyala ku ssimu yagambye nti naye abaasenze ebifo byabatuuze tabamanyi era nalabula buli agezaako okwonoona erinnya lye okukikomyayagambye nti ye mukulembeze nnamba ug 1780w eya minisitule yenguudo eyapangiddwa okusenda ebibanja byabatuuze poliisi neyingirawo nebalemesaabatuuze nga bakulemberwa ssentebe weggombolola jamada musana ne kansala ku disitulikiti fred ssemyalo baalaze obutali bumativu ku ngeri amayumba nennimiro zabantu bwe byasendeddwaakulira poliisi ye kawongo joseph bongo yagambye nti guleeda bagikuuma kubanga ya gavumentiera yasabye abatuuze okubeera abakkakkamu kuba kijja kuggwaaba nrm beewanye nti bawangudde col kiiza besigye  gye bamuzaala e rukungiri mu kulonda kwa bassentebe ba lc1 okuweddeomwogezi wa ssabawandiisi wa nrm justine kasule lumumba yategeezezza nti ebyavudde mu kulonda  mu magombolola 16 ku ago 17 agali e rukungiri biraga nti nrm yawangudde ebifo 419 ate aboludda oluvuganya ne bawangulako 217kyokka bagamba nti bino tebiriiko bya ggombolola ye nyarusanje nrm gyesinga obuwagizie kasese ewava akulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti  winnie kiiza nrm yafunye 481 ate aboludda oluvuganya ne bafuna 753eno yategeezezza nti wadde aboludda oluvuganya baawangudde kyokka guno mugatte gwa bibiina byonna ebivuganya ekiraga nti nrm eyabadde obwannamugina ekyabalinako enkizoyayongeddeko nti nrm yawangudde pulezidenti wa fdc patrick amuriat gyazaalwa mu ggombolola mwava  e kanyumu mu disitulikiti ye kuminrm yafunye ebyalo 15 fdc bibiri 2 nabatalina ludda ne batwala bisatu 3ogenga  latigo yategeezezza kkooti nti nga august 7 2010 nkata yasimbula mu maka ge e kitebi ngagenda okutunda ettakayamuyimiriza namutegeeza nga bwe waliwo ettaka eritundibwa e nakigalala e kajjansi era yakkiriza kigenda kutuwa ebintu bino ku bbeeyi ya wansikieran murphy ku lwekitongole kya general electric yagambye nti bagenda kukolagana bulungi ne gavumenti ya uganda okukakasa nga batuusa empeereza pulezidenti museveni ngayaniriza omar al bashirbino byabadde mu kafubo kabakulembeze abasatu akaatudde ku lwomukaaga mu maka gobwapulezidenti e ntebe nga kaakulungudde essaawa ezisukka mu munaana afp nti akafubo kaawedde ku lwomukaaga ekiro nga kikkaanyiziddwaako dr machar okuzzibwa mu gavumenti ngomumyuka asooka owa pulezidenti kiirkyakkaanyiziddwaako nti gavumenti ya south sudan agenda kugaziyizibwa okuva ku baminisita 30 okutuuka ku baminisita 45 ngebifo 15 ebyongezeddwaamu bya kulondebwamu abooludda oluvuganya olwa sudan peoples liberation movement in opposition splaio ekikulirwa macharaldierdiry yategeezezza nti mu nteekateeka empya pulezidenti kiir waakubeera nabamyuka ba pulezidenti bana 4 ngababiri ba ludda oluvuganya okuli machar nomukyala gwe banakkaanyaakodr machar yali yaweebwa ekifo ekyomumyuka wa pulezidenti mu ndagaano eyokukomya olutalo eyassibwako omukono mu august 2015 enjuyi zombi era yalayizibwa mu kifo ekyo mu april 2016 kyokka yakiweeerezaamu emyezi ebiri gyokka nadduka mu ggwanga mu july 2016 ngagamba nti kiir yali aluse olukwe okumuttamachar yasooka okubeera omumyuka wa pulezidenti okuva nga july 9 2011 south sudan lwe yatondebwawo nga yeekutula ku sudan wabula baafunamu obutakkaanya ne gen kiir nagoba dr machar nga july 23 2013 olwebigambibwa nti yali ateekateeka okuwamba gavumenti nekyaddirira lutalo kubalukawo mu december 2013 ne bakubagana okutuuka mu july 2015 lwe bassa wansi ebyokulwanyisa ne batandika okuteesa           tanga odoi wakati john alimpa ne jane alisemera nga boogera ku nteekateeka za nrmtanga odoi yasinzidde mu lukuhhaana lwa bannamawulire ku lwokuna ku kyadondo nalambulula enteekateeka ze bataddewo mu kulonda kuno okugenda mu maasoodoi yategeezezza nti ngenteekateeka zokulonda kwa munisipaali ya arua zigenda mu maaso okuwandiisa abagenda okuvuganyiza ku kaadi ya nrm kwakubaawo nga july 6 ne 7 olwo okunoonya akalulu kutandike nga july 9 okutuuka nga july 15 ate nga july 17 balonde anaabakwatira bendera yekibiinaabazze okukwatira nrm bendera bali mukaaga okuli mohammed ali aruma simon ejuwa john lematia ali buti atim nusulah kiperu ne sadik angupare era nga ku bano ayitawo yagenda okuvuganya obutereevu mu kalulu kokujjuza ekifo kyomubaka wa arua munisipaali oluvannyuma lwomubaka ibrahim abiriga okutemulwa ngadda awakaono era yategeezezza nti akakiiko kebyokulonda mu nrm kalina enteekateeka zokukuba akamyufu kobukiiko bwabakyala ku miruka amagombolola ne disitulikiti era nga ku miruka akamyufu kaakukubwa nga july 9 ate ku magombolola kabeewo nga july 27 olwo ku disitulikiti kabeewo nga august 4 omwaka guno era oluvannyuma lwakamyufu abanaaba bayiseemu bagenda kuvuganyiza ku bendera ya nrm mu bifo ebyenjawulookukuba akamyufu ku bassentebe bebyalo nemiruka kwa july 16 okunoonya akalulu kutandike nga july 20 olwo okulonda kubeewo nga july 20 omwaka gunokiddiridde omulamuzi okumusomera emisango ebiri egimuvunaanibwa nagikkirizaomubaka ono yategeezezza nti omuvubuka ono yamuteeka ku bunkenke ne famire ye ngamuweereza obubaka bwomukwanobrian isiko omuyizi ku ymca e jinja yasindikiddwa mu kkomera olwokusingibwa emisango okuli ogwokutulugunya nokulebula omubaka omukazi owa disitulikiti ye kabarole sylvia rwabogorwabogo eyabadde akulukusa amaziga yategeezezza kkooti yomulamuzi gladys kamasanyu nga isiko bwe yamweraliikiriza bwe yatandika okumukubira amasimu nokumuweereza obubaka ngamugamba nga bwamwagala ennyo era agenda kumufiirakoisiko yategeezezza nti ennamba ye yagiggya ku yintanetiomunakenya ono ye yagenze mu kkooti nawaaba olwa kondomu okumwabikako ngali mu kikolwa kyagamba nti kyavuddeko okumusiiga obulwadde bwekikaba naye bwe yasiize  mukazi we  namunobakoomusajja ono amannya galekedwda  yaddukidde mu kkooti e kenya nawabira  kkampuni ya beta healthcare ezisasaanya nekitongole ekivunaanyazibwa ku mutindo gwebitundibwa mu ggwanga eryo ekya kenya bureaus of standards wamu nekitongole kyomusolo ekya kenya revenue authority  ngagamba nti bakkiriza batya kondomu ezekika kya zoom okutundibwa  nga teziri ku mutindo nazikozesa emu  netuuka nokumwabikako ngali nomuntu atali mukazi weemikutu gyamawulire e kenya gyategeezezza nti omusajja ono agamba yagula kondomu ngalowooza zijja kumukuuma nokusanyusa omwagalwa we  kyokka nemu ku zo neyabikakondomu ezkika kino ziwunya nga kyokuleetiagamba nti kondomu bwe yayabika teyasoose kukimanyirawo yakirabye avudde mu kikolwa era natakitwala nga nsonga nnyo okutuusa lwe waayise ennaku ssatu nafuna olukuku ku bitundu byekyama nokufuna obulumi ngafuuyisaalumiriza nti yagenze ewomusawo wekinnansi naweweeza ku bulumikyokka ate ne bitabuka so nga ne mukazi we yafunye obulwadde bwekikaba buno namutabukira nanobaagamba nti oluvannyuma lwomukazi okunoba ngamulumiriza obutaba mwesigwa yasazeewo kwenyweera mwenge nafuna nokutabuka mu mutwe ekyamuviiriddeko nokufiirwa omulimu gweagamba nti mikwano gye gyamugambye nti nabo baaafuna ekizibu kye kimu ne kondomu ezekika kya zoomye kwe kwesowolayo nakuba ekitngole ekivunaanyizibwa ku mutindo mu mbuga zamateeka ngayagala bamuliyirire           eddwaaliro lye mulago bwe lifaananaomwogezi weddwaaliro lino enock btino ne lubulwa buli omu yalumiriza munne mu maaso ga poliisi nga tino agamba nti yali mu nnyumba ewa ziribaggwa gye yali yanobera abasajja okwali ne lubulwa ne bakonkona bwe yabaggulira baamukwata gwobuvanjuba bwafrica zassiddwaamu obulambe obukusike obusukka mu 10mu kutongoza pamiti zino ku kitebe kya kkampuni ya face technologies e kyambogo ku lwokutaano gen katumba wamala yagambye nti wabaddewo okujingirira kwa pamiti mu nkuubo za kampala ekimu ku bibadde bivaako obubenje nga mmotoka zivugibwa abantu abeekibogweyagambye nti olwomutindo gwa kkaadi okwassiddwa pamiti enkola empya        rodriguez nga bakumukunguzza okumutuusa ku poliisipoliisi yoku kisaawe kyennyonyi e ntebe ekutte neggaliora omukazi enzaalwa ya venezuela lwa kusangibwa ngakukusa enjaga okugifulumya ebyenjawuloakwatiddwa ye christopher muwanguzi omutuuze we kabembe mu ggombolola ye kyampisi mu disitulikiti ye mukonookusinziira kwakulira ekitongole ekikessi nga yatwala disitulikiti okuli mukono kayunga buikwe ne buvuma maj moses ssegujja baafunye amawulire okuva mu batuuze be kabembe nga beemulugunya ku nneeyisa ya muwanguzi ne basalawo okusitukiramussegujja ategeezezza nti muwanguzi abaddenga atambuliranga mu byambalo byebitongole byokwerinda ebyenjawulo omuli ekyamagye poliisi nekya poliisi yoku nguudo ekyareetedde abatuuze okwekengera ki ekituufu kyaliategeezezza nti oluvannyuma lwokumala akabanga nga basuula enkessi olwokwagala okumanya ekituufu muwanguzi bamusazeeko enkya ya leero nga bwe baayazizza ennyumba ye basanzeemu ebyambalo bya poliisi nebisosonkole byamasasi wadde nga tannayogera wa gyatereka emmundu nebyambalo ebiralamuwanguzi yatutte poliisi ewa muganziwe rahuma  babirye alina ebbaala e kabembe ngono oluvannyuma lwokuwa poliisi obujulizi emukutte negenda naye ne bba ku poliisi ye mukono wadde ngoluvannyuma ayimbuddwababirye atutegeezezza nga muwanguzi bwe yamukwana emyezi ngena emabega namugamba nga bwe yali omusirikale kyokka nga ne bwe yagendako ewuwe okulongoosa yasangayo ekyambalo kya poliisissentebe weggombolola ye kyampisi ibrahim kabambwe akakasizza nti ddala ebyambalo muwanguzi byabadde nabyo bibadde bikola kinene ku butali butebenkevu mu kitundumuwanguzi akuumirwa ku poliisi ye mukono ngokunoonyereza bwe kukyagenda mu maaso          lubega ngali nomuserikale wa poliisi ongomomupango gwe teguyiseemu be yakolaganye nabo bwe bamuwaddeyo eri poliisi nemukwattalubega owe namungoona lubya zooni l yakwatiddwa poliisi yoku kaleerwe oluvannyuma lwokukikakasa nti yabadde aluse olukwe lwokutta omuntu e kakiri eyategeerekeseeko erya muleefulubega yagenze ku kaleerwe natuula ku limu ku dduuka nafuna omuvubuka gwe yabuulidde ku ddiiri eno oluvannyuma lwokwogera naye okumala ebbangaomuvubuka lubega gwe yayogedde naye yatuukiridde omuserikale weggye ezibizzi ne crime preventer patrick kizito nababuulira kye yabadde ayagala bamukolere nga yakitegeeredde ku poliisi nga bamukutte nti be yabadde akolaganye nabo bakuumaddembekisekka yategeezezza nti kituufu lubega yatumye omuntu okumufunira abavubuka abasobola okumutiira omuntu nga baasoose kumulaga ngabajja okumukolera omulimu ne bamusaba gyasula gyanywera omwenge nendabika ye kuba yabadde talina kumweragakisekka yagambye nti bwe baamze okukakasa nti lubega yabadde mu malirivu okutta omuntu baakubidde abaserikale abalala abaamukutte abajja mu ddwaaliro linoabalwadde bagamba nti ngoggyeeko okusimba layini ne basiiba mu ddwaaliro olunaku lulamba neddagala tebalibawa nga babalagira okuligula kyokka nga tebalina ssente nga bangi bafa nokubeera mu bulumi olwebbula lya ssentessentebe weggombolola ya kyazanga rural musa kayondo kisanja yategeezezza nti abantu abasoba mu 2000 okuva ku byalo 50 be bakozesa eddwaaliro lino ngabakulembeze basaba gavumenti okulinnyisa eddwaaliro lino lifuuke health centre iii basobole okufuna ebyetaagisa ebisingawo olwabantu abangi abalyeyambisa           ssentebe weggombolola ya lwengo rural joseph lubega bazonoonassentebe weggombolola ya lwengo rural joseph lubega bazonoona yagambye nti abakulembeze babadde basanyufu nti ennaku enkulu zinaagenda okutuuka nga balonze lc kiyambe okulwanyisa obumenyi bwamateeka obutera okubaawo mu kiseera kinobazonoona yagambye nti balina ebyalo 456 mu disitulikiti eno nga bassentebe abamu baafa ngabaliwo tebaalondebwa bantu nga kirabika kye kivuddeko obubbi nobumenyi bwamateeka okweyongerakansala abuduh kabugo akiikirira eggombolola ye ndagwe yasabye gavumenti nakakiiko kebyokulonda ensonga yokulonda lc ekwatibwe nobwegendereza kuba be bayamba okukuuma obutebenkevu mu bitundunagamba ti gavumenti bweba terina ssente za kugula bukonge bawe abantu ebbeetu okwegulira ebitabo mwe baba bakuula empapula bawandiikeko amannya gabantu be balonze okusinga okusimba ennyiririhajji jamil kiyira wa lc 2 mu buluhane zooni e kinono yagambye gavumenti ennaku ze yayongeddeyo zireme kufuula myaka kuba abeefuula nti balumirirwa abayizi tebamanyi bizibu biri ku byalo ebitalina lcmurisid kafuuma yagambye nti kkooti teyanditunuulidde abo bokka abaalopye wabula abantu abangi abaakoseddwa nenkyukakyuka enoyagambye nti abantu babadde lwokwolesa ebitonegen edward katumba wamala nga ye minisita omubeezi owemirimu asabye abazadde okukuuma ennyo abaana mu luwummula balame kubalagajjalira nokubalekera abakozikatumba yagambye nti mwogezi wa updf brigkalemire omuntu okukyusa amannya alina okugenda ewomukungu wa gavumenti akola ku birayiro commissioner of oath nalayira mu kiwandiiko ekitwalibwa ne mu kkooti affidavit wabula baagala gashumba avunaanirwe mu kkooti yamagye e makindyebalina okutya nti bwanaatwaalibwa mu kkooti eza bulijjo wa kusaba yeeyimirirwe era mu nnaku ntono addemu alye butaalarichard kalemire musango bakyagenda mu maaso era bye banaazuula kwe bagenda okusinziira okusalawo kkooti mwe bagenda okumuvunaaniraababaka era basabye poliisi ya uganda okukolagana neyensi yonna interpol okulondoola nokwetangira obutabatulugunyakigambibwa nti bannayuganda abamu bava kuno nga basuubiziddwa emirimu nemisaala emisava kyokka bwe batuuka gye bagenze nga baggyibwako paasipooti olumu nga basindikibwa mulago ne bamukebera ne bamutegeeza nti alina kookolo wamabeereagamba nti yakkiriza ebbeere ne balisalako kyokka obulumi bwagenda mu maaso ne bweyongerabaamuteeka ku ddagala lya kookolo ne limutwalako ssente ne zimuggwaako kyokka nga tafuna nkyukakyuka ekyamuwaliriza okuddayo mu ddwaaliro baddemu bamukeberewabula ku luno baamutegeeza nti baakola nsobi okusalako ebbeere lye kubanga nga tafuna bujjanjabineumbe agamba abasawo baamutadde ku ddagala lya kookolo wemisuwa kyokka nga lya ssente nnyingi ngate zaamuggwaako ngagula eddagala lya kookolo wamabeere ate nga tamulinaagamba nti buli lwagenda mu ddwaaliro asasula 200000 nga tekuli ssente za ntambulaneumbe agamba nti alina abaana bana okuli nababadde basoma basatu naye okuva lwe yalwala baava mu ssomero talina fiiziagamba nti ensobi yali ya basawo abaasooka okumukebera ne bazuula kirala nga nekimuluma kirala           sheikh kamoga  wakati ngalinnya bbaasi yabasibe okuzzibwa e luzirabya joseph mutebi ne mahad wamalasheikh muhammad yunus kamoga nnatandika okumulaba mu myaka gya 1980 ngali mu mirimu gye ngomusuubuzi nga nze omu ku bakulembeze be nakasero nga nkola ngomuwandiisi era nga ndi imaam owookubiri nga sheikh abdulhakim kimbowa ye yali imaam omukulu mu 1991 nnali saudi arabia ku misomo ne mpulira nti abatabbuliiki baawambye ekitebe kyobusiraamu e kampalamukadde era sheikh kamoga nomugenzi sheikh abdulkalim ssentamu ne baddukira e nairobi nga sheikh kamoga nomugenzi abdulkalim ssentamu abali mu buwahhanguse bampandiikira ebbaluwa nga bansaba ntwale obutabbuliiki mu maasonakkiriza okutwala obukulembeze oluvannyuma lwokuwagirwa sheikh kamoga nomugenzi ssentamumu 1995 nasisinkana pulezidenti museveni ne mwetondera byonna ebyaliwo ne mmusaba okuyimbula abantu baffe era batandika okuyimbulwa mu bibinja era ne jamir mukulu nayimbulwawaayitawo akaseera katono nekibinja ekirala ekyali kikulirwa sheikh abdulhakim ssekimpi ne kitweyawulako ne badda ku market street ne tubeera ebibinja bisatumu mwaka gwa 2000 sheikh kamoga yakomawo ne yeegatta ku sheikh ssekimpi ne hassan kirya mu 2010 ne balumba nakasero nga bagamba nti atundiddwa oluvannyuma kamoga yafuuka amir ummah wabatabbuliiki mu ggwangaono yakulira ebyokunoonyereza nobulambuzi ku uganda muslim supreme council agamba nti kamoga amumanyidde ebbanga okuva mu 1990 era bino wammanga byamumanyikonze natandika okumulaba mu 1990 ngakulira abatabbuliiki oluvannyuma lwokuwamba obukulembeze bwa zubair bakali nga bakali agobeddwa e nakasero kamoga yassaawo embeera eyobunkenke nti ntebe luwemba nagenda mu kkooti era kkooti nesala omusango luwemba adde mu nntebe enowano sheikh kamoga yeegatta ku sheikh kakooza gwe baali baggye mu ntebe balemese okulayira kwa luwemba era baakola okumpi namalaalojane kamariza mukwano gwomugenzi atunda edduuka wabadde atera okubeera ngavudde ku ssomero yagambye nti ku dduuka teyabaddewo era lyabadde liggalekamarizi yagambye nti wanyana abadde masomerotwayawukana era mu 2004 ssente zannema ne batunda essomero lyangenga bamaze okutunda essomero lyange nabimuyitiramu nga ndowooza ayinza okumpa erimu ku masomero ge mbeere hedimasita nagaananamulemereko annyambe nahhamba nti kasooke ayogere nabaana be era bwe yayogera nabo enkeera yampa 1000000 ezimu ku zantwala e kenya gye natandika okusomesawabula nga sinnagenda kenya nasomesa ewa mutabani wa mukiibi omulala herman ssemakula mukulu wa mukiibi yamuzaala eyalina amasomero ku lwe ntebe okuli kisubi high e namulandae kenya nabeerayo okuva 2005 okutuuka 2007kahwa yampita ne nkomawo mu progressiveeyo byannema ne nzira mu kkampuni ya mk publishers ngomuwandiisi webitabokati ndi heedimasita wa st marys high school mukoko mu kalungubatume yategeezezza nti ntake yamuwandiikira ebbaluwa nga september 29 2015 namutegeeza nti afunye omupunta stanley bemba okugenda okupunta ettaka eriri ku 272 poloti 75 ne 83 baggule empenda nawandiikira ssentebe wekyalo alabirire omulimubatume yategeezezza nti ntake bye yayogedde mu kakiiko nti kyatwalira aba disitulikiti ye wakiso emyezi ebiri okumuwa omupunta okukola ku mirimu gye kikyamu kubanga olunaku lwe yawandiika lwe baamuddamu era ne bamukwasa bemba akole emirimu gyeku lwokusatu akakiiko lwe kaatandise okuwuliriza obujulizi okuva mu bantu be wakisoabasajja babiri moses kama ne milton bukanzi baategeezezza akakiiko nti ntake yagula ettaka lino erisangibwa e birongo kitiko nabagobako so ngabamu baalinako ebibanja ate ye bukanzi alina nekyapa kya poloti kwe baamugobabagamba nti ntakke alaga ekyapa ekitasalibwangako poloti ndalaakakiiko kano akabuuliriza ku mivuyo egiri mu ttaka kaasimbye amakanda ku kkooti e wakiso okuwuliriza okwemulugunya kwabantu okumala ennaku ssatu okuva lwokusatu okutuuka leero lwakutaanogaster lule ntake naye eggulo yazzeeyo mu kakiiko okulwanirira ettaka lye bamulumiriza nti yaligula mu mankwetuagambye nti yejjusa okuyingira mu mivuyo teyamanya nti ettaka lyagula liriko abantuyasoose kunnyonnyola nti ettaka erirye liri ku bulooka 272 poloti 75 ne 83 era bwe yali agula yasaba sentoogo amuguze ne poloti 84 namutegeeza nti yagirekerawo abantu abaali ku bibanjabatume yategeezezza akakiiko nti omupunta eyakola omulimu alabika teyagukola bulungi nagamba nti amateeka gamukkiriza okusazaamu lipooti omupunta gye yakola natereeza ebyasoba           abatuuze be lwengo mu kibuga nga beekalakaasamu katono ye town clerk hajji badru majwala gwe beemulugunyizzaakobaakutte ebipande nga bamulumiriza okuwamba ebisolo byabantu ne babawaayiriza nti baabisanze bitaayaaya mu kibugaabatuuze nga bakulembeddwaamu olivia nakintu ategeezezza nti majwala yatwala embuzi ze nnya nga march 21 2017 nokutuusa kati tebazimuwanganakintu agambye baamusaba atange 200000 era nga ziri masaka gye zikuumirwabaayongeddeko nti nomusolo ogubaggyibwako ku mayumba guyitiriddemu ngeri yemu abatuuze beemulugunya ne ku ngeri amayumba gaabwe gye gamenyebwa nti tegatuukana na mutindo kyokka ne baleka ebifulukwa ebyekwekamu abamenyi bamateekabaagambye nti ku ssente ze babasoloozaamu kasasiro acuuma mu kibugabbanka ya uganda enkulu evumiridde ekyabavubuka abagagga abeeyita rich gang okudda ku ssente zeggwanga ne bazimansula nokuzisuula mu ntaana ya ivan ssemwanga mu kumuziika ne baziyiwako nomwengeomwogezi wa bbank of uganda christine alupo agambye nti nabo bakyewuunya engeri abantu gye bongedde okusiwuuka empisa ne batuuka nokuvvoola ssente zeggwanga ze bamanyi nti tewali azilinako bwannannyinialupo agambye nti bakyekenneenya amateeka balabe akawaayiro mwe basobola okuvunaanira abavubuka abaakoze ekikolwa kino kubanga nabo babadde tebakirabangako bantu basuula ssente mu ntaana yomuntu afudde mu ngeri eyokulaga obwagazi eri omugenzi mu kiseera ekyokuziikassemwanga yaziikiddwa e kayunga ku biggya bya bajjajjaabe ku lwokubiri           dr stella nyanzi ngayogera eri bannamawulire ku hotel africanadr stella nyanzi agambye nti tagenda kupowa kukozesa bigambo bizitowa  kuba mukazi muganda ate nnalongo nga nebigambo byabakozesa abamu bye bayita ebyobuwemu ssi ye yabigunjaawo yasanga  abaganda babikozesa nokubyogera lwatu mu lujjudde ne mu kwalula abalongossi nze nagunjaawo ebigambo binoetta  emb  okufumita bigambo birungi bye tuludde nga tukozesa mu lulimi olulungi olugandassi nze muganda asoose okubikozesannasanga babikozesa misana ttuku era tubiyimba ne mu nnyimba zabalongongenda kusigala nga nkozesa olulimi lwange nga bwenjagala kuba ddembe lyange nyanzi bwagambyegavumenti yandiwoomye nnyo ffe ngabakazi ne tusiagenze maaso nokuyimba ezimu ku nnyimba zabalongo ezirimu ebigambo ebikaawa ngomususakyokka agamba nti ssi mulabe wa gavumenti wabula  ajagala naye yennyannyamule etandike okuwa abawala paadi ne bawakanya ebigambibwa nti nakibuuka si mwana wa mugenzibaakakasizza omulamuzi nti ekifo kya muyenga club ssematimba kye yakyusa erinnya nakituuma muyenga resort hotel nti kya mugenzi sebalu era nti enda kubeera nobuwerero nga nnyimbuddwa naye si bwe gulibalinga abaddira ekkomera lye luzira ne balireeta mu maka gangempulira mbikooye mumbere bwe yategeezezza wabweru wa kkooti e jinja ku lwokuna oluvannyuma lwomulamuzi akulira kkooti ento john francis kaggwa okwongezaayo okuwulira emisango gye okutuusa nga june 16 2017mumbere avunaanibwa nabantu abalala 180mumbere ne banne nsonda ezenjawulo nga mwe muli abaddukanya ebyafirimu mu uganda nti vj junior alina kkampuni nnamba eyogerera nokusaasaanya firimu zobuseegu mu ggwangawabula bino vj junior yabyegaanyi nateegeeza nti
