yatiisatiisa okutta omu ku bakulira abatwala ebya firimu gerald sserunjogi era naggulawo omusango ku poliisi kyokka vj junior nabategeeza nti ebyo byonna bipangiddwassekate yayongedde nategeeza nti vj junior ne bbosa balina omukutu gwa yintaneeti ogwa whats app kwe bayisa obubaka obutiisatiisa okuvuma nokuvvoola ababagambako okukomya ebyobuseegu era poliisi olwabyetegerezza kwe kubakwata           hajji katende ngalaga bakyala be eri abantuokwogera bino yabadde ku mukolo gwamatikkira ku kyalo kibibi mu butambula hajji ibrahim star katende bwe yabadde ajaguza olwabaana be ibrahim katende ne zuriah nansimbi okuwangula diguli mu byamateeka ku yunivasite yobusiraamu eya iuiuwadde omukolo gwabadde gwa matikkira naye hajji katende yagwetisse nabamu naddala abazze ngomukolo gutambuddeko ne batuuka okulowooza oba nga hajji yabadde agutegese kwanjulirako hakki zemu kwogera kwa hajji katende essanyu yasoose naliggya ku baana nattottola bye bayiseemu okusomesa abaana ate ye hajji yatottodde engeri gye yafunamu hakki zino nebyamuwaliriza okuva ku omu okutuuka ku banamukyala wange omukulu ye faridah naggayi nagenda okulaba yeetaagayo kiyambi kwe kumuzzaako ayanjula omukyala addako aisha nansubuga kyokka ate ono naye byamuzitoowerera ne wabaawo ebirema ate kwe kuleeta vero kirabo ate waliwo nomugole grace katende naawe bawuubireko olwo enduulu nesaanikira ekidaalayalabye tekimumalidde kwe kusaba eyabadde mu byuma akayimba ka olimuggya wa omusajja ansinga ne yeetala ne bakyala beomukolo gwetabiddwaako ne loodi meeya wa kampala ssaalongo erias lukwago eyakulisizza abayizi emisomo nabawa nebiraboyabasabye okuba abeesigwa kibayambe okuganja nokuwangaala ku mirimu ate nabakubiriza obutatya kuvuganya ku bifo ebyenkizo mu byobufuziyagumizza abantu ngomuyaga oguyita mu kampala ennaku zino nga baagala okumuggyako entebe ye nga bwe kitamuyigudde ttama kubanga ye yalondebwa bantu era be bokka abalina obuyinza okumuggyayo sso si bannabyabufuzi abeenoonyeza ebyabwemu balala abaagwetabyeko ye mubaka omukazi owe butambala lydia mirembe eyakubirizza abazadde okuweerera abaana ate nabaana okusoma ennyo kuba eno yengeri yokka eyokutwala butambala neggwanga mu maaso           ssesanga bwe yabadde atwalibwa mu kkooti ku mmandeyamuyimbudde ku mmande oluvannyuma lwokujulira ngawakanya omulamuzi wa kkooti ya buganda road jameson karemani okumusingisa omusango gwokufuna ssente obukadde 151 okuva ku joshua agabassesanga yamanyibwa olwokuganza abakazi abooluganda babiri ne yeekubya nabo ebifaananyi ebyafulumira mu mawulirekigambibwa nti mu august 2015 yafuna ssente okuva ku agaba nga za kumuguza ennyumba esangibwa e lusaze ku plot 62 block 37 ku bukadde 151 wabula nga teriiyoomulamuzi karemani yasalira ssesanga ekibonerezo kya kusibwa emyaka ebiri nokuliyirira agaba obukadde 151ssesanga yajulira ngawakanya ensala yomulamuzi karemani ngagamba nti ku bajulizi abaaleetebwa ku kkooti okumulumiriza ku musango guno kwabulako omuserikale eyanoonyereza kubanga teyalabikakoomulamuzi kwesiga yakkaanyizza ne ssesanga eyabadde akiikiriddwa munnamateeka dalton oponya nasazaamu ensala yomulamuzi karemanigavumenti ebeeko kyekola okubakangavvula nokuyamba omukaziomubaka we nakaseke luttamaguzi ssemakula ye yazitutte mu palamenti nalangira abasawo obulajjavu ngayagala gavumenti ebeeko kyekolawo okuyamba omukazi ono nokukangavvula abasawolutamaguzi yategeezezza nti zaina yalongoosebwa mu ddwaaliro e nakaseke oluvannyuma nafuna obulumi ngazze engulukyokka bwe yatwalibwa mu ddwaaliro lya kcca e kawempe nasangibwamu ppamba era nga yavaako obulumikyokka agava mu ddwaaliro e mulago galaga nti nnatambi yazzeemu okulongoosebwa era kati embeera ye egenda erongookakinajjukirwa nti zainabu nantambi 19 owe bulungi engulu ngazadde omwana muwalannyina margaret namaganda agamba nti yamuleseewo nagenda okumufumbira ebyokulya yagenze okudda ngakaaba ebintu bimufumita omutima nga bimusimba mu lubuto kyokka rugundabino bibadde mu palamenti ekubiriziddwa omumyuka wa sipiika jacoub oulanya ababaka bwe batadde dr rugunda ku nninga nga bamubuuza gavumenti kyekola ku basuula ebibabula nabatemu bebijjambiya centenary ss e kangulumira mu s 2maama womuwala habiba namutebi ye yawendudde abobuyinza ne babakwata oluvannyuma lwabantu okumutemyako nga muwala we bwatatuuka ku ssomero era nti oluva awaka asibira gavumentimuhammed ssemakula 38 owe kawempe  kirokole omulamuzi esther rebecca nasambu owa kkooti ye nabweru ye yamusindise e luzira oluvannyuma lwomuwala owemyaka 20 okumulumiriza nga bwe yamulimba eweddeomuwala yategeezezza nti ssemakula yamusanga ku mulimu e kyebando namutegeeza nga bwe yali ajja okumutwala ebweru amufunire omulimunagendayo nga sisuubira ntio alina ekigendererwa ekirala kuba nnali maze okumuwa ssente zaangekyokka olwayingira saddaamu kutegeera era nagenda okudda engulu ngamaze okunkwatanagenda mu ddwaaliro okwekebeza ne bakatema nti nnina akawuka ka siriimu era bwe nagaanassemakula wakudda nga may 12           mutumba ngalaga kansala rehema fuge natwala poliisi ya kibumbiro oliver kunihira okugulu kwe baamenyemu katono ye kayanja eyakubiddwadiriisa kitooke ayamba ku poliisi ya kibumbiro mu munisipaali ye lubaga yakubye sulaiman mutumba ne richard kayanja abavuzi ba bodabodamutumba yamenyese okugulu ate kayanja ne bamwasa eriisomutumba yategeezezza atwala poliisi ye kibumbiro oliver kunihira nti zaabadde essaawa 800 ezekiro kitooke najja natandika okubakuba awatali kye bamukozeate kayanja ye agamba nti kitooke yamusanze mu bbaalabaatuuzizza olukiiko lwekyalo ne bavumirira ekikolwa kino           muka ssekiboobo sarah mulowooza kigongo omu bali ku kakiiko kebyettaka akapya mu disitulikiti ye mukono ngalayizibwaomubaka wa pulezidenti e mukono maj david matovu alabudde akakiiko kettaka akaggya aka disitulikiti okwewala okwenyigira mu mivuyo gyettaka kuba mweteefuteefu okufaafaagana nabo bwe kanaabatandamatovu bino abyogeredde ku kitebe kya disitulikiti ye mukono ku mukolo gwokulayiza akakiiko kettaka akaggya nabakuutira okufuba okumalawo emivuyo gyettaka egikyagulumbya abatuuze so ssi kwongerako miralaomukolo gwokulayiza egobye okusaba kwa mathew kanyamunyu okwokweyimirirwa era nazzibwayo mu kkomera e luzira kyokka muganzi we cynthia munwagari ne muganda we joseph kanyamunyu bo beeyimiriddwaa kati balya butaalaomulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu yasin nyanzi bwadde agaana kanyamunyu okweyimirirwa tawadde nsonga yonna okuggyako okutegeeza nti waakubateegeza lwaki asazeewo bwatyo  nga  30 omwezi  guno marchkanyamunyu ngono ye mutwe omukulu mu musango gwokutta omugenzi kenneth akena  ngazzibwa e luzira agambye nti waakiri kisingako okutaako abamu mu kifo kya bonna okubakuumira mu kkomeraomulamuzi okuta joseph ne munwagari asinzidde ku bujulizi bwoludda oluwaabi obulaga nti bano tebattira ddala mugenzi wabula balina engeri gye baayambako munnaabwe mathew kanyamunyu ngamaze okukuba akena essasi okweyimirirwa kyokka nga kkooti emugaana           oulanya ddyo nabanene abalala mu lukunganakkooti eno eyitiridde okutulugunya abakulembeze ba africa era yeeyisizza ddala ngekyatwala mu maaso baayooulanya agambye nti uganda yeegatta ku kkooti yensi yonna okulwanyisa abajambula ba kony be yali tesobola kukolako yokkanayongera nti amawanga amalala gaagyegattako olwokulwanyisa abatyoboola ngayaziirana olwokufiirwa omwana weabatuuze be kashenyi mu ggombolola ye birere mu disitulikiti ye isingiro baguddemu ekyekango omuwala bwe yeebakidde omwana we nafaomuwala ategeerekeseeko erya ninsiima ye yeebakidde omwana we agenze okugolokoka ngomwana yafudde ddassentebe wekyalo kino yategeezezza nti omwana eyafudde abadde mulenzi wa mwezi gumu nekitundussentebe yategeezezza nti omuwala ono anywa sigala nomwenge era ngomwenge agukeera nga mmisa oluusi agwa ne ku kkuboomu ku batuuze john ssengooba yategeezezza nti ninsiima mu kunywa omwenge tamanyi basajjayagasseeko nti era emabegako alina omwana we omulala gwe yeebakira nafaomulambo gwa kaweesi gutuusiddwa e kitwekyanjovu  kyazanga mu makaageolubadde okutikkula omulambo okuva mu mmotoka abakungubazi okuli abooluganda wamu nemikwano ne bakulukusa amaziga era abamu ne bazirise ne baddusibwa mu malwaliro agaliranyeewo okufuna obujjanjabi obwamanguomulambo gutuusiddwa mu ssaawa 1130 ezakawungeezi olwo rev frpius kamegeya naggulawo mmisa yokusabira omwoyo gwomugenziomukuumi wa afande kaweesi kenneth erau bwe battiddwa abazigu ku lwokutaano aziikiddwa ku kyalo orungo mu disitulikiti ye amuriaabadde omukungubazi omukulu minisita wensonga zomunda mu ggwanga general haji abubaker jeje odongo ategeezezza nti erau baamuggyeemu amasasi 33 lwakuba yabadde agezaako okutangira abazigu obutatuusa bulabe ku mukama weodongo era nga ye mubaka wekitundu kye orungo mu palamenti ategeezezza nti ekikolwa erau kye yayolessezza kya muzira era tewali kubuusabuusa erau yafudde nga muzirawaasoose kubaawo kusabira omwoyo gwomugenzi nga kwakuliddwa revjulius ariko bwanamukulu wekigo kya orungoabantu beeyiye ku lutikko e lubaga okusabira omwoyo gwomugenzi felix kaweesi          kaweesi ngayogerera mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gye buvuddekomu kiseera ngabazigu abemmundu beeyongedde okutta abantu naddala aba mobile money kaweesi yayisa ekiragiro eri abapoliisi okukuba ku nnyama omuzigu yenna gwe basangirizaekiragiro kino tewali mukama we yenna yakiwakanya era abazigu bemmundu ne bakendeera mu kampala nemiriraanogen kayihura yaggya kaweesi mu kampala nemiriraano namutwala okukulira ebikwekweto mu poliisi nga mu kaseera ako ebbugumu lyebyobufuzi mu kulonda kwa 2016 lyali litandiseeyasinga okuleeta ebbugumu yali amama mbabazi eyali alangiridde okugenda e mbale ayogereko eri abawagizi be wabula kaweesi namukwatira e njeru okuliraana olutindo lwomugga kiyira namukomyawo e kampalassaalongo kikambi ssendi yatutte mukyala wa robert kato namukweka mu kazigo e kasokoso nabaana baabwe bombirobert kato akolera ku bbiri e wandegeya yalumirizza mukwano gwe ssendi owe nansana okumusigulako omukazi we hellen gwalinaamu abaana babiri nga yamuggye mu maka gaabwe e namavundu gayaza    kakoba mukisa ne mukasa abaakwatiddwapoliisi mu disitulikiti ye kayunga ekutte abasuubuzi basatu mu bufere bwa doolabano kuliko stephen kakoba owe namasuba ngasuubula byennyanja emmanuel mukisa       omusuubuzi basajjabalaba eyawawaabiddwa wamu ne yunivasite ya kiuomusubuuzi hassan basajjabalaba bamukubye mu mbuga zamateeka lwa bbanja lya bukadde 256mathias tumwesigye yatutte basajjabalaba mu mbuga agamba nti nga april 15 2015 yaweebwa omulimu nga ssentebe wettendekero lyebyekisawo ku yunivasite ya kiu ku kontulakiti ya myaka ena ngeno yali esobola okuzzibwa obuggya okusinziira ku ngeri gyakola emirimu oba ematiza nga yali waakufuna obukadde 8 buli mwezitumwesigye agamba nti emirimu gye yagikolanga bulungi nga ne liivu gye yalina okufuna buli mwaka oba okusasulwamu singa abeera akoze  teyagitwala wabula okutuusa nga september 30 2016 lwe yafuna ebbaluwa eyali emuyimiriza ku mulimu embagirawo  eno nga yamusanga wakati mu ssomo ngaliko abayizi basomesa nga tasoose na kutegeezebwako ku nsonga yonnaagamba nti okugobwa ku mulimu kyali kitegeeza kumenya ndagaano eyamuweebwa ngesiddwaako nomukono mu april wa 2015ayongerako nti kino kyamukosa mu birowoozo nembeera ze ezobuntu saako okufiirizibwa ennyingiza yekati ayagala basajjabalaba ne yunivasite ya kiu bamuliyirire obukade 289 okusasulira ebyo byonna bye yayitamu nga kuliko obukadde 256 ngomusaala  gwe ogwemyezi 32 egyali gisigadde ku kontulakiti ye omusala gwa september ensako yokukozesa essimu airtime mu bbanga eryali lisigaddeyo eryemyezi 32 ngeno  eweza obukadde 25 nemitwalo 60mu kwewozaako kyokyamukyala we winnie kitesi gwalinamu abaana basatu ye yamukubyebyabaddewo ku ssaawa 500 ezekiro e mulagokatende yalaajanye nagamba nti mukyala we aludde ngamukuba nasaba babaawukanyekatende abaana ssabbuunibadru sebirumbi 32 omutuuze ku kyalo nakanyonyi mu ggombolola ye nabbaale e mukono ye yeekalizza ku poliisi yomu kabuga komu kalagi gyakuumirwaomutuuze kityo eyabbiddwaako endiga        mukwaya mukazi we namwanje gwe yafumise ekiso mu bulagoomukazi afumise bba ekiso ku mutwe ngagamba nti akooye okumulondoola buli walagahawah namwanje 25 owe bweyogerere mu kakajjo zooni mu bagamba nti bakuze era ssente bamanyi bulungi maama waabwe bwabadde azikola           kisolo lwe yagattibwa ne nabakiibi mu 2007omulamuzi akulira abalamuzi abato e masaka samuel munobe asaze eggoye mu musango omukungu wa gavumenti oweggombolola ye lwemiyiga e ssembabule gyaviira kisolo ne mukazi we owempeta maria nabakiibi gwalinamu abaana ababiri namulagira obutaddamu kwesembereza baana ne mu kisolo alina mukenenya ngate nabakiibi talina ne batabuka nabakiibi namukuba omugongo ne batandika okulwanira mu kisengemaria nabakiibi musawo mu ddwaaliro ekkulu e masaka nga yagattibwa ne bba eyasobya ku mwana wessomero oluvannyuma namutta naye awanikibwe ku kalabba olwettemu linogeorge william ssenfuka nga mutuuze mu zooni ya bukoola mu kibuga kye mpigi ye yali avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga emyaka 13 gyokka omuyizi mu konge ps mu p6 yali muwala wa matia mulumba ne margaret nakiyingi aboku kyalo kitavujja yasiibula okugenda ewa ssenga we muka ssenfukanajjuuko bwe yatuuka ewa ssenga teyamusangawo kwe kusula amulindebwe butuuka ekiro ssenfuka yamwekakaatikako namusobyako namufunyisizaawo olubutoomwana bwe yadda awaka nabiyitiramu bazadde be ne batuukirira ssenfuka nabyegaanabwe waayitawo ekiseera kyazuulwa nti omwana ali lubutossenfuka yatandika okutiisatiisa buli muntu eyali ayingidde mu nsonga zinossenfuka yalabula omwana ono obutaddamu kumusibako lubuto nga bwamutiisatiisa okumuttaekiseera kyatuuka nga najjuuko nokugenda ku ssomero ngatyaayomu kiseera kino olubuto lwali luwezezza emyezi etaanolumu ssenfuka yajja awaka nayita najjuuko akawungeezi nga yeekwese mu kitooke kyokka najjuuko nagaana okufuluma mu njuolumu najjuuko yali ali mu luggya ngawaata nga bato be bazannya ssenfuka nakyama awaka nejjambiya gye yali awagadde nagwa ku najjuuko ekiyiifuyiifu namutema namuttirawobazadde ba najjuuko abataali waka mu kiseera kino bagenda okudda nga muwala waabwe attiddwabaalaya enduulu era abaana abato abaaliwo baalumiriza nti baali balabye yazirya            nnaalongo mariam mukyekya ngali nabalongo be mu ddwaaliro e mulagonnaalongo akubye mulirwana we mu mbuga zamateeka ngamulanga kuta mbwa ze ne ziruma abalongo be kyokka nagaana kaboozinamutebi asangidwa ku poliisi e nateete ngakaaba nagamba nti bba yakomyewo namusaba banyumye akaboozi nagaana kwe kuggyayo akabaawo nasaba abaserikale baggalire bba kuba ayitirizza okukubanga tekirobedde poliisi kumuggalira naggulwako nomusango gwokutulugunya mukazi fayiro nnamba sd3721102016           abamu ku bakozi nga bavabakozi 60 ku faamu yebimuli baddusidddwa mu ddwaaliro e bulaga okujjanjabibwa oluvannyuma lwokuwunyiriza eddagala lyobutwa eryateereddwa mu bimuliabakozi bano bakolera ku faamu ya royal van zanten e nkonya mu ggombolola ye nsangi mu disitulikiti ye wakiso abakozi abaalwade baabadde balabirira ebiyumba bibiri nga bano be baayisiddwa obubi ne baddusibwa mu ddwaaliro lya first care medical centre e bulaga baabadde basesema baddukana embuto nga zibaluma nga nemitwe gibaluma obutasalakoabamu baaweddemu amaanyi nga tebasobola kutambula nga nabasobodde okwetwala mu ddwaaliro nga bali mu bulumiabamu ku bakozi baagambye nti baatandika okuwulira obubi nga baakayingira ekiyumba ekyali kyakafuuyirwamu eddagalabakama baffe baatulagidde okugenda okusala ebimuli nga baakafuuyira eddagala eryobutwa erya  metum sodium eritta obuwuka bwonna mu ttaka bwereere ku kitandagerald muwonge muganda wa muwonge yagambye nti beewuunyizza omuvubuka okukajjala ngeno bwaboggola nti ono mukazi wange munjagaza kikino kyabanyizizza ne bamusikambula okumutwala nti kisusse ku butemu eddalu lifuuse kkankadaembeera eyo josephine nakyanzi nakalyango 60 mwe yafiiridde ngabamutta bamukuba bwe bamulumiriza nti wasindise embwa yo neruma omuntu waffemukaziwattu emitwe gya baliraanwa ba nakyanzi ne batandika okweyisiza ddala ngabalinnyiddwaako emmandwabaasoose kwerogozza nti embwa eyalumye paul ssonko kyaluzi 38 yabaddemu eddogo era yensonga lwaki baasazeewo okuyita ku malwaliro ge masaka gonna ne basibira mu ssaboobwedda bajegera nti eddogo eryajjidde mu mbwa nakyanzi ye yalissaamu nowulira ettima lya sitaanittima lyennyini erituusa abantu ababiri kutema embizzi ku mudaala gwe oguli e kyantale  kyannamukaaka mu masaka yagazzizza ku muntu ate olwamaze nabomba era tekikwewunyisa ngasibidde mu ssaboessabo lyennyini eryalemeddwa okuwonya eyalumiddwa embwa ngali mu kukoowoola mmandwa zimutaase omusangobaliranwa babiri we baabadde kati bwotuukawo ku ludda olumu ogwoto gwe gukwaniriza ate ku ludda olulala amayumba agali ku ttakagaakooneddwa abatuuze abaabadde abanyiivu olwokubattira mutuuze munnaabwe ngabamutta balerembukira mu ddogobagundi muve mu kweraguza bwe muteesammule bikolwa bya sitaani ensi eno yaakulaluka ffenna etufuukire enzibu okubeeramupulezidenti museveni atongozza  enkola yokunaaba mu ngalo ku lunaku lwensi yonna olwokunaaba mu ngalo olwabadde ku kisaawe kya boma ku kitebe kya disitulikiti ye kamuliwabula yavumiridde enkola yabasawo gye yayise eyettima eyokwesigaliza ebintu bye banoonyereza ku ndwadde ezitta abantu nagamba nti singa balabula abantu kyangu nnyo okutangira endwadde kasangati olwemirimu gya palamenti wabula baatuuzizza olukuhhaana lwa bannamawulire ne bavumirira engeri besigye gye yayisiddwaamu ngadda mu ggwangaensonda zaategeezezza nti nenkuhhaana besigye zategese ku lwokukutaano e bweyogere ku lwomukaaga e kawempe ne ku ssande e katwe muntu nabenkambi ye si baakuzeetabamugye buvuddeko muntu yategeeza bannamawulire nti ekiseera kituuse fdc okukkiriza nti pulezidenti museveni yali mu buyinza okutuuka 2021 nolwekyo fdc erina okwetereeza okwetegekera 2021 mu kifo kyokudda mu kampeyini ya defiance           odrek rwabwogo ngasomesa abakulembeze ba nrm mu munisipaali ye nakawaodrek  rwabwogo ayagala wabeerewo ennongoosereza ku bisaanyizo ebifuula omuntu omubaka wa palamenti kiwonye eggwanga okufuna abakulembeze abalowooza nti eggwanga lye lirina okukola ku buli kizibu kyabweyagambye nti takyewunya okubeera ngababaka ba palamenti balowooza nti eggwanga lye lirina okubakolera ku buli kyetaago omuli okubagulira emmotoka nokutuukira ddala okubalondabwe batyo bwe bayitamu basooka kulowooza ku kyakuzzaamu ssente ze baateekamueno ye nsonga lwaki ababaka bano be beesalirawo ne nsako gye balina okuweebwayewuunyizza okubeera nga palamenti boogera amazimamu uganda tetulina ludda luvuganya wabula okulwanira ebifosinga baaliwo bandibadde bwe balaba ekisobyo nga basobola okulaga ekituufu we kyandikoleddwaeno ye nsonga lwaki bwe kituuka esatu nnyabo nantumya kye saamanya nti yali ampiseeyo kunsiibulaogwo gwe mukwano mmange gwe yalina naye nga nokutuusa kati agutulaga ekitegeeza nti omukwano gwa maama tegufabwe nadda ku kyeyo ne nsanga ngakalimu kaweddeyo nanfunira omulalaali mufti kinobe34 owe bunnamwaya bwatandika okunyumya ku nnyina omugenzi ferista namukwaya65 eyali omutuuze we bisanje mu masaka oyinza okulowooza atudde awoagamba maama yasooka nalwala amagulu nomugongo mu 2010 nafuna obujjanjabi mu ddwaaliro e masaka nawonayatuzaala abaana bataano okuli grace nannono fatumah kinobe ali kinobe aisha kinobe nomugenzi nakabuyemu 2013 maama ate yalumbibwa obulwadde bwomutwe gwe yagambanga nti gumulumya amaaso era ngokusooka twali tulowooza maaso ge gamulumayampita ngaamba nti mwana wange mpulira nnafuye naye tekijja kunkola bulungi ssinga nnaafa nga siryabye ku mukaamwana gwogenda kuwasayansaba nfube nga bwe nsobola mmuleetere omuwala gwe njagala amulabeko ngamaaso gakyalimu akalabakino kyampitirirako ne mbirowoozaamu kuba waliwo gwe nali ndaba naye nga tetunnagenda walamba nva e masaka ne nkubira mwana muwala ne mmusaba ajje ewange nnina kye mmugambanamugamba ategeke tugende mu bazadde be tukyale era ekyo twakikola mu wiiki bbiri ezaddakoabakadde nabasaba tukole omukolo gwokwanjula mu myezi ebiri egiddako ekintu kye bakkirizaolwamaliriza okukyala waayita ennaku ssatu ne nsitula omukyala ne mmutwalira maama nasanyuka era nanneebaza okumugonderamaama twamutegeeza ku ntegeka zonna ezokwanjula era natuwa emikisa gyenga wayise wiiki emu mba ndi awaka ne bankubira essimu nti maama omutwe gumuluma nnyo namaaso gazibye agamba takyalabanasitukirawo ne njolekera masaka maama ne mmuggyayo ne tumuleeta mu ddwaaliro e namirembebwe twamutuusaayo ne batugamba nti tumutwale mu ddwaaliro e nsambya mu kattivvi akakebera obwongo bazuulire ddala ekituufu ekimulumisa omutwetwagenda e nsambya ne bamuteeka mu kattivvi era ne batugamba nti yali alina kookolo woku bwongo awo ne batusindika e mulago okufuna obujjanjabie mulago baatugamba nti alina kugenda mu amerika oba buyindi gye bayinza okumujjanjabira nawonaoba okulindamu emyezi mukaaga kuba waaliwo abasawo abaali basuubirwa okujja e mulago nga bava buyindi abasobola okumujjanjabira wano era naffe ne tusalawo okubalindabaamuwa eddagala eriweweeza ku bulumi era ne tumuzzaayo mu kyalo e masaka nga bwalimira abeera bulunginali nakola dda ku bintu byange ebyokugenda okukolera ebweru wa uganda era bwe nalaba ngafunye eddagala erimuweweeza ne endaeno nali naakakolayo emyezi esatu nankubira essimu nti nkwetaaga ojje wano nina bye njagala okukugambasaalina kyakukola okuggyako okulinya ennyonyi nkomewo kunobwe namutuukako naamba nti onkoze bulungi kuba bulijjo nneebuuza nti onaawulira otya nti nnafa notombeerako nga ngalamidde mu ddiiro yadde okunzikakonalowooza nti ali mu lwali kuba yateranga okusaagiririra naye nga mu kiseera kino amaaso gaali gazibidde ddala nga takyalabamu kyalo naliyo ku mmande ku lwokuna ku ssaawa eyakawungeezi ne bankubira nti maama afuddeyasulawo era enkeera ne tumuziika e bisanje masakabwatyo nafa ngabasawo babuzaayo wiiki bbiri batuukemu kyalo namalayo omwezi mulamba ne nninnya okudda ku mulimu enda okutuukayo ngekifo kyange baakiteekamu dda omuntu omulalanasoberwa nga nneebuuza we ntandikira mba nneebase ne ndaba maama ngaamba nti kutulugunyizibwa ne bamutta era yasangiddwa akonzibye nga kirabika kye kyamuviiriddeko okufa olwo omulambo gwe ne gusuulibwa ku kkuboakulira bambega ku poliisi e kitebi francis kateega yategeezezza nti omulambo gwatwaliddwa mu ggwanika e mulago ngokunoonyereza bwe kugenda mu maaso           besigye ngali mu kaguli ka kkooti e nakawa eggulo ku lwokusatuomulamuzi wa kkooti ento e nakawa james eremye mawanda agambye nti agenda kwesitula bagende mu kkomera e luzira okwogera ne besigye ababuulire embeera gyayitamumawanda yagambye nti agenda kwesitula nolukiiko oluyitibwa disitrict coordination committee dcc olwassibwawo okulaba ngabantu abasibiddwa mu makomera bafuna obwenkanyaolukiiko luno lutuulako ebitongole okuli ekiramuzi poliisi abamakomera abakulembeze ba gavumenti ezeebitundu ne balooya batuule ne besigye abannyonnyole ku mbeera gyayisibwamu e luzira balabe ekyokukolanti akakiiko kano kaakwekkenneenya nembeera yekkomera besigye we yasibirwa nga bino bya kukolebwa mu ntandikwa ya wiiki ejjaomulamuzi mawanda okwogera bino kiddiridde besigye okwekubira enduulu eri kkooti nga yeemulugunya ku mbeera gyayisibwamu omuli obutamukkiriza kwogerako nabantu abamu abajja okumulaba ate nga mukulembeze taweebwa mukisa kuweereza bubaka bwe eri bantu ekityoboola eddembe lye eryobuntubesigye yayongedde ne yeemulugunya nti oluuyi oluwaabi luluddewo okuleeta obujulizi ku musango ogwokulya mu nsi olukwe ogwamuggulwako era nayongerako nti ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku misango ekya poliisi kiri mu kkobaane okumujwetekako emisango gino nga bwe kyalayiraayongeddeko nekyokulemesa abawagizi be okujja nemmotoka zaabwe ku kkooti abamu ne baziyizibwa ate kkooti bweggwa abamu ne bakwatibwa poliisi ne batwalibwa mu buduukulu bwayo nakyo kyagambye nti kyatutyoboola ddembe lyabweomulamuzi mawanda yagambye nti omulundi omuwawaabirwa lwe yasembayo okuleetebwa mu kkooti baali bakkiriziganyizza noluuyi oluwaabi nti we lutuukira olwa jjo olwokusatu nga bamaze okukuhhaanya obujulizi ku musango guno ekitaasobosewabula ku kyabawagizi ba besigye okulemesebwa okujja ku kkooti omulamuzi yategeezezza nti nabo balina okugoberera ebiragiro byabakuumaddembe baleme kukwatibwa poliisi era nagamba nti ne kkooti ntono etesobola kubeeramu buli muntuomuwaabi wa gavumenti deborah itwau yategeezezza nti bakyalina okwebuuza kwe bakyakola nekitongole kya poliisi ekikola ku kunoonyereza ku musango guno nasaba gwongerweyo era omulamuzi nagwongerayo okutuuka nga july 13 2016 wabula nabalagira banguyeeko okunoonyerezabesigye yatuusiddwa emmundukenneth mugombeshya 35 omujaasi akolera mu nkambi yamagye e bombo ngavuga mmotoka zamagye akuumirwa ku poliisi ye naggalama oluvannyuma lwokukwatibwa poliisikino kiddiridde ababbi abemmundu nga bambadde ebyambalo byamagye okussa emisanvu mu kkubo mu kiro ekyakeesezza olwomukaaga ku kyalo nkonge mu ggombolola ye kyampisi ku luguudo oluva e mukono okudda e kayunga ne banyagulula abantuono okuba eyamaanyiedda buganda yalina enkola ennungi era eyamaanyi eyebyobulimiwadde nga kati mmengo efuba okukoowoola abantu okulima naddala emmwaanyi nga bayita ku mikutu gyamawulire naye ekyo nobugimu bwettaka mu ssaza eryobwe yamalanga okusalira amasaza ngenkiiko zamasaza nazo zituula nga zisalira abaamagombolola  namagombola bwe gatyo nago nga gasalira abeemiruka ate nabeemiruka nabo ne batuuka mu maka agali mu miruka gyabwe nabo ne babasaliraessaza nga lirina okutuukiriza omutemwa gwalyoenkola eno yayamba buganda okubeera ku ntikko mu byobulimi ne mu byenfunabuganda era yalinanga abalimisa abaagendanga mu byalo ne basomesa abantu ku byennima ennungi baabasimbisanga paasikalamu okukwata ettaka lireme okukulukutabuli maka gaalinanga obuvunaanyizibwa okukola ennyo nga galina okubeera nemisiri oba ennimiro ezokulya nokufunamu ssente nga ppamba oba emmwaanyiabaami ba kabaka baalambulanga abantu okulaba nti kino bakituukirizabino mmengo byesaana okuddamu okukola okuteekawo omuwendo ogwessalira ku birimibwa mu buli ssaza bwe tujja okudda ku ntikko          omugenzi maj gen eric mukasaobubaka buno yabutisse katikkiro wekika kyemmamba omutaka kagenda luyombo mulindwa bwebwasomyekabaka yayongedde nagamba nti ebyafaayo byomugenzi biraga nti yali omu ku bavubuka abazira abasalawo mu 1981 okulwanyisa embeera embi eyali ekkomezeddwawo mu ggwangaolwobuzira nobukozi andrew benon kibuuka yasabye abaana wamu ne famire eno okusigala nga benyigira mu mirimu gyobwakabakaekika kyaabwe ku mitendera gyonna ngomugenzi bwabadde akikolamunnamaggye eyawummula colfred abaawummula okwabadde yingjb walusimbi dan muliika ne joseph mulwanyammuli ssemwogerere wamu ne polofssemakula kiwanuka ngensisinkano eno yabadde mu lubiri e mmengomu kwogerako ne bannamawulire nga ye mwogezi wekitebe kya amerika mu uganda yafulumizza obubaka okutangaaza ku nsonga eno nagamba ntiekitebe kya amerika e kampala kyaawa obuyambi bwensimbi emyaka mingi emabega ku pulojekiti kabaka mutebi ii bwe yabadde e kitovu gye buvuddekobino biri mu bubaka bwe obwafulumiziddwa ku lunaku ensi yonna kwe yeefumiitiririza ku bulwadde bwa siriimu buli mwaka olukuzibwa nga december 1yakubirizza abasajja okukulemberamu kaweefube wokutaasa amaka gaabwe nga ambaasada wekibiina kyamawanga amagatte ekirwanyisa mukenenya mu buvanjuba namaserengeta ga africa okukubiriza abaami okwenyigira mu kaweefube wokumalawo obulwadde buno 2030 we gunaatuukira nkubiriza abasajja okubeera emmunyeenye zobulamu obulungi mu bitundu byabwe nga beekebeza nokumanya bwe bayimiridde ku bulwadde bwa mukenenya nokwekebeza obulwadde obukosa ekibumba kkookolo wobusajja akafuba ne puleesa kabaka bwe yagambye mu bubaka bweyayongeddeko nti  nga sinnafuulibwa ambasada noluvannyuma lwokufuulibwa nkoze ekisoboka okubawa amagezi gonna ageetaagisa ku bulwadde buno kubanga saagala muntu yenna kufa olwobutamanyandi musanyufu okukitegeera nti bangi ku mmwe mutandise okuvaayo nga mwanukula omulanga gwange era omuwendo gwabasajja abeekebeza gweyongedde okulinnya mu bitundu eyo obujjanjabi gye buli ate nabo abafuna eddagala beyongeddeekyabasajja obutajjumbira kaweefube ono kabaka agamba nti kyetaaga okumenyebwawo okusobola okukendeeza ku muwendo gwabaana abazaalibwa ne mukenenya nabafa obulwadde buno abavubuka abawala abasajja nabakyalaomulamwa okukuliziddwa olunaku luno gugamba nti ebitundu yentabiro yokulwanyisa mukenenyakabaka yamalirizza obubaka bwe ngagamba nti muli mmunyeenye za famire zammwe era nobulamu obulungi mu bitundu byammwe butandika nammwe mbasaba okusigala nga mukutte omumuli gwobulamu obulungi nokumalawo mukenenya omwaka 2030 we gunaatuukira ku lunaku luno olwokwefumiitiriza ku bulwadde buno 2019           jjajja womulangira ssemakookiro  christine nnalubanjwa sserebe ngaziikibwammengo ekungubagidde nnyina womuzaana rose nansikombi eyaziikiddwa ku mmande ku biggya bya bba george william sserebe e nswanta mu ggombolola mutuba ii mukuma katikamu  mu bulemeeziomukadde christine nnalubanjwa nga yabadde jajja omukyala owomulangira  richard ssemakookiro yafa ku ssande oluvannyuma lwokulwalira emyaka 32 nga alumizibwa obuvune bwomugongookusinziira ku bba  george william sserebe omugemzi yazaalibwa mu mwaka gwa 1932 ne bafumbiriganwa mu mwaka gwa 1962 omwezi gwa december era waayita emyaka mitono munne natandika okulumizibwa omugongo ogwamutabukira era tegwadda mabega okutuusa lweyafuddetwebaza nnyo abantu abatukwatiddeko okumujjanjaba okuli ssaabsajja kabaka sipiika wolukiiko lwa buganda eyawummula nelson kawalya nabako bonna abakoze obutaweera okulaba nga munnaffe abeera obulungi sserebe bweyagambyeomukubiriza wolukiiko lwa buganda patrick luwaga mugumbule eyeetisse obubaka bwa katikkiro yagambye nti obwakabaka bwanyoleddwa olwokuviirwako omuntu abadde owomugaso era ne yeebaza omugenzi nnalubanjwa olwebibala ebirungi byalese munsi munotusaaliddwa nnyo olwa maama okutuva ku maaso kyokka era twebaza abao bonna abamujjanjabye nga ssebo sserebe ggwe okulembeddetwebaza maama olwebibnala byalese munsi ate naawe tukusabira ogume bwatyo mugumbule bweyagambye nategeeza nti obwakabaka bwanyoleddwa nnyo olwensonga eyoabataka abakulu bobusolya nga bakulemberwamu omukubiriza waabwe omutaka kayiira gajuule mu bubaka bwe baatisse katikkiro wekika kye mpologoma omutaka patrick kisekka ddungu baasaasidde nnyo omutaka kalibbala ne muzzukuluwe sserebe olwokuviirwako mukwano gwemu kiseera kye kimu kisekka yagaanye enteekateeka eyabadde ekoleddwa okulaga omusika nga baakava e magombe  nti kubanga eno ssi mpisa ya wano mu buganda era nga batereeza ennono tekiggya kukolebwa nabawa amagezi okukola enteekateeka oluvannyumaomukubiriza wolukiiko lwa buganda eyawummula nelson kawalya yategezezza nti abadde wa munda mu nnyumba eno nga okuva bwe yalagirwa okugendanga mu kisenge omulwadde gyabadde nga gyamulabira nokunyumyamuyeebazizza sserebe olwokufaayo ku munne namulabirira nga bwamujjanjaba ebbanga eryo lyonna awatali kumwekaanya oba okumusuulirira era nasaba abantu okumutwala nga ekyokulabirako baleme kusuuliriranga bannabwe nga bafunye obuzibuomukolo gwetabiddwako namasole margaret ssiwoza omumbejja nnaalinnya dina kigga ssaabaganzi emmanuel ssekitooleko ba nnaava nabakungu okuva mu gavumenti eya wakati bangi newankubadde nga yye omuzaana nansikombi teyalabiseekocan mulyanti owe kakoola bwe yabadde abuulira abantu yabasabye okudda eri katonda nti kubanga yye tayiwa mu buli mbeerakabaka ronald mutebi ii akungubagidde musajja we james bwogimu bubaka obwasomeddwa kaggo eyawummula tofiri kivumbi malokweza yatenderezza omugenzi olwokwagala obwakabaka nobutaba mutiitiizi ye ne banne ne baataasa ssekabaka edward muteesa ii mu 1966 nawona okuttibwayagambye nti obwakabaka bufiiriddwa omuntu abadde afaayo okulaba nga buganda edda ku ntikko abadde nobumalirivu nokufaayo mu buli nsonga tufiiriddwa nnyo bwe yagasseekossaabadinkoni we mengo eyawummula revcanon daudi sserubidde yatenderezza omugenzi olwokwagala ekkanisa nokufaayo okulaba ngomulimu gwenjiri gutambula bulungiyasabye bamulekwa okusigala mu kkanisa nga kitaabwe bwabadde nokutuukiriza ebyo byabadde tannamalirizaomugenzi yaliko omuserikale mu lubiri lwa ssekabaka muteesa iibino abyogeredde lungala  mpigi mu ssaza lye mawokota bwabadde akuliddemu emikolo gyokujjaguza emyaka 10 egya pride college school bukya litandikibwawo naagamba nti ebyenjigiriza gwe mubumbulano ogutambuza eggwangamayiga asinzidde wano nayongera okuwa abantu amagezi bulijjo okubeeranga abamalirivu okutandika ebintu bwatyo naasinzira wano neyebaza bonna abatadde ekiragiro kabaka kyeyawa emyaka 20 egiyise mu nkola bweyalagira abantu be okutandika okuzimba amasomero okutumbula ebyenjigirizaomukolo guno gwasoose nokusaba okwakulembeddwamu revkizito ssebunya ngono yasabidde nabayizi abagenda okukola ebigezo ebyamalirizo nabayizi nti essaala zabawadde nkulu wabula si zakubagada singa tebasoma bitabofrancisco ssemwanga nga ye dayirekita wessomero lino yawadde basomesa banne amagezi nti nabo basobola emirimu gyenkulakulana gyebatandika era naasaba abakozi ku mitwndera gyonna okukola obutawera okutuukiriza obuvunanyizibwa obubaweereddwaakola nga omwami wessaza lye mawokota kayima kabonge yategeezezza katikkiro nti abazadde batandise okutegeera obukulu bwebyenjigiriza era nasaba amasomero okwongera okudduukirira ensawo ya kabaka eyebyenjigiriza nga bagaba bbasaleomukolo gwetabiddwaako baminisita okuli omumyuka owokubiri owa katikkiro era omuwanika wa buganda waggwa nsibirwa david kyewalabye male nabakungu abenjawulo okuva e mmengo okuli ronald kawaddwakabaka alabiseeko eri obuganda ku mikolo gyolunaku lwa bulungubwansi e busirossaabasajja kabaka ayaniriziddwa mu ssanyu ku kisaawe kyeggombolola ye masuliita wakati mu kukuza olunaku lwa bulungibwansi omwaka guno nokujjukira ameefuga ga buganda            nnaabagereka ngatuuka ku hotel africana mu kampalaku kkono ye dr nankindu kavuma nabakungu abalala bino yabyogeredde ku hotel africana ku lwokutaano nga october 4 2019 ku mukolo gwokujjukira olunaku lwomwana omuwala mu nsi yonna wansi womulamwa ogugamba nti okusibusa obuntubulamu ku lwokukomya okufumbiza abaana abatanneetuukaomwana okukulemerera ebiseera ebisinga kiva ku butamuteekamu mpisa mu buto bwetugambibwa nti okuva omwana lwazaalibwa okutuuka emyaka etaano ekiseera ekyo kikulu nnyo okulaba nti abaana tubasigamu ensigo yobuntubulamuoluusi tutandika bamaze okusoma ne tugamba nti abaana bannemeredde ngate mu myaka we yali awulirira tewamukwatako nnaabagereka bwe yategeezezzayeebazizza gavumenti olwamateeka getaddewo okutumbula omwana wa uganda nagamba nti okwongera ku maanyi gano yasse omukago nekitongole kya world vision okulaba nga bakuza abaana abomugaso eri eggwangaminisita wabakyala ebintu ebigasiza awamu abantu ba buganda ne ofiisi ya nnaabagereka dr prosperous nankindu kavuma yawadde amagezi abaana abavudde mu masomero agenjawulo mu disitulikiti mukaaga eza buganda nabalala nti basaanye okutegeezanga aboobuyinza mu bitundu byabwe bwe wabeerawo abantu abagezaako okusimira ettaka ku biruubirirwa byabwe atwala ekitongole kya world vision mu ggwanga jason evans yategeezezza nti basanyufu okutta omukago nekitongole kya nnaabagereka development foundation era bakimanyi nti obukulembeze bwennono bukola kinene mu kutumbula nokugunjula empisa ennungi mu baana nbantuate ye kamiisona wabaana mu minisitule yekikula kyabantu nenkulaakulana mu ggwanga fred ngabirano yategeezezza nti eggwanga lifiirwa obutitimbe bwensimbi olwabaana abafumbirwa nga tebanneetuuka bwatyo nasaba nnaabagereka asiime bakwatagane bamalewo ekizibu kinoyasoomoozezza bonna abeegwanyiza ebifo byobukulembeze mu kalulu ka 2021 baweereze kabaka nga tebeebalirira naye baleme kugatikka buweereza mu bwakabaka na byabufuzinakibirige bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo ogwabadde mu ggombolola ye ssaabagabo mu muluka gwe lufuka ku mukolo gwokutongoza ekibiina kyabakyala abakola ebyemikono nokukola ssabbuunibwatyo kaggo nakibirige bwe yategeezezza           entaana omwaziikiddwa eyabadde omukulu wekika kye nseenene eya fuuti 15 wano ngabataka basseeyo ku ddaala okumugalamiza obulungiomutaka george nsozi kalibbala kalibbala 62 abadde omukulu wekika kyenseenene yaziikiddwa ku butaka bwekika kino e nsiisi mu busujju ssaabasajja kabaka namutendereza olwobujjumbize bwabadde nabwo mu kuweereza ekika kye nobwakabakaobubaka bwa ssaabasajja bwamusomeddwa minisita we owensonga zebyobuwangwa embiri nennono e mmengo david kyewalabye male nga yayogedde ku mugenzi ngabadde omujjumbize era akoze obuteebalira ngaweereza ekika kye ate nga ne mu nkiiko zabataka abadde teyeeganya bwatyo nasaasira abazzukulu olwokuviibwako jjajjaabwekyewalabye nga tannasoma bubaka bwa kabaka yasoose kuwabula bakungubazi nti omutaka tafa oba okukisa omukono wabula yeesittala nagwa ate nga ye kabaka akisa mukono olwo  nnamasole nabolulyo olulangira bo boogerwako nga abaseereraabakulu bebika yabakubirizza okuteekawo ennaku ezokulamaganga ku butaka buli mwaka kyongere okusembeza abazzukulu ate nga noluusi kabaka akyayinzanga okusiima nalamaga ku butaka bwaba asazeewoomwami wa kabaka owessaza lye busujju mark jjingo kaberenge ii ye yasomye obubaka bwa katikkiro ngono yajjukizza abantu nga obuganda bwe bugenda yaziikiddwa mu mbugo 112 era nga omulambo gwe gwasituddwa ku kannyo akaawundiddwa obulungi nembugo era nga baatindizze akagendo akawerako okutuuka gye yaziikiddwaabemituba 12 nga bonna baabadde bambadde kkanzu enjeru nga beesibye ebimyu ate mu bigere nga tebambadde ngatto be baasitudde omufuku ntaana eyabadde eya ffuuti 15 baataddeyo ddaala okusobola okukkayo era nga bakira abantu abaakungaanye okuziika basindikagana wakati mu kuyoogaana nga batya okugwaayoabataka abemituba basse mu ntaana okulinda omufu era nga waliwo abaalinnye ku ddaala ne ku bifunvu ebyalekeddwaamu okuyambako omufu okutuuka ku baabadde mu ntaana wansi obulungiomulambo baagussizza mu ntaana na nfuvu ezaabadde empanvu ddala kumpi ffuuti 40 buli limu noluvannyuma ne babikka embugo endala ku mufu olwo ne balyoka bavaayo okuziikaenkola eno yawuniikirizza abantu bangi nga bakira balabwako nga bakwata ebigenda mu maaso ku masimuokutuuza omutaka nsozi kalibbala adnan 4 ku bukulembezelyabadde ssanyu wakati mu kukuba enduulu nengalo ngabazzukulu mu kika kye nseenene  baayanirizza jjajjaabwe omuggya omutaka adnan nsozi kalibbala eyabalagiddwa amangu ngomutaka george nsozi aziikiddwa ku lwokunaabataka abakulu bobusolya nga bakulembeddwa omutaka kayiira gajuule beetabye ku mukolo guno era ne basumikira omutaka okuba omukozi nokwagala kabaka we nekika           katikkiro charles peter mayiga omutaka adnan kalibbala omuggya atudde ku ntebe lubuga we rehema nakimera ne katikkiro wekika ku ddyo robert mujabi kajubi ku bulangeomukulu wekika ky enseenene omutaka kalibbala e nsiisi  bbala omuggya ayanjuliddwa katikkiro mu bulange e mmengo abataka abakulu bobusolya ne basaba abakuza be batunuulirwe neriiso ejjoji okulaba nga bamukuza mu kitiibwa nempisa ezigwaniddekatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga yagambye nti kyekiseera abakuza abaalondeddwa okukuza omutaka adnan kalibbala eyatuuziddwa ku bukulu buno ku myaka esatu gyokka nga wa ggonjebwa wa mpisa asomesebwe era bamuwagire okulaba nga ekika akitwala mu maasoyo e nsiisi bbala ku butaka bwekika kino abakungubazi baatandise okwekuluumulula nga beeyiwayo oluvannyuma lwomubiri gwomugenzi omutaka nsozi kalibbala okuggyibwa mu maka gabakuuma abafu e mulago ne gutuusibwa ku butaka emisana ya leero era nga waabaddeyo nokusabira omugenziokusinziira ku mutaka patrick kisekka ddungu katikkiro wekika kye mpologoma era ssentebe wolukiiko oluteekateeka okuziika entaana omugenda okuziikibwa omutaka kalibbala yasimiddwa mu buwanvu bwa ffuuti 15 ate obugazi bwa ffuuti munaana nga waakuziikibwa mu mbugo ezisoba mu kikumiabataka abakulu bobusolya buli omu yaleese olubugo abamasiga ennyiriri emituba nabazzukulu ba ssekinnoomu nemikwano baawaddeyo embugo okuziika omutaka mu kitiibwaomugenzi waakuziikibwa leero ku ssaawa 1000 ezakawungeezikibadde kijjobi ku nga kabaka ajaguza amatikkira ge agemyaka 26   laba ebifaananyi okuva omukolo lwe gwatandise okutuusa lwe gukomekkerezeddwa          omutaka nnamuguzi omukulu wekika kyempologoma ku kkono ne katikkiro wekika kisekka ddungu ngayogera ku mbuga emu gye baalambuddeomutaka wilson ndawula ssebuganda nnamuguzi omukulu wekika kyempologoma alabudde bazzukulu be abeefunyiridde okwegabanya nokutunda ettaka lyekika okukikomya mbagirawo nti kubanga mu kino baakusaanyaawo obutaka bwabwe olwo abaana be bazaala gye buggya baleme kuba na nsibukonnamuguzi bino yabyogedde alambula ettaka eriweza mayiro nnya e kasaka mu buddu kabaka lye yawa abaamasiga ana 4 mu kika kyempologoma okusimbangako emiti gyemituba okukomaganga embugo ze kyokka nga zino zaasangiddwa zisengeddwaako abantu nendala ngabaana babaaliko abakulembeze mu masiga gano balyeddizzassebuganda yasookedde ku kyalo kye wamala mu kasaka ku ssiga lya lubyayi erikulemberwa pius sserwadda kiwanuka waswa ngeno embuga ye yasangiddwa ku yiika bbiri nekitundu zokka yagenze e kijujuzi ku ssiga lya kanajje erikuumibwa katikkiro waalyo ssaalongo edward  kayondo owa kayondo plaza e masaka oluvannyuma lweyali alikulira kanajje okufa ebbanga ttono eriyise ngembuga ye yasangiddwa ku yiika 10yeeyongeddeyo e birongo ku ssiga lya kiyuuka eritwalibwa christopher kalema noluvannyuma ne yeeyongerayo e kaamulagadde ku ssiga lya kasendwa erikulemberwa steven jjuuko nga bano baasangiddwa tebalina mbuga za butaka bwabwe nga wonna waasengawo be baayise bannakigwanyizissebuganda yakubye olukiiko ku mbuga ya kanajje nga wano we yasinzidde nalabula abeesenza ku ttaka lino nti ensonga zaalyo zaakutwalibwa mu kkooti zamateeka ziramulekatikkiro wekika kye mpologoma omutaka patrick kisekka ddungu yaloopedde ssebuganda nga bwe batutte ebbanga ddene nga batuula mu nsonga zettaka lino nabaana nnabuufu ne nakalema abamu ku baali abaana ba emilio luwaga eyali katikkiro wessiga lya lubyayi nga kitaabwe yali musika weyali omukuumi wettaka eryo nti kyokka ebituukibwako ekika babiziimuulapius sserwadda kiwanuka waswa owessiga lubyayi agamba nti ebintu bingi biremye okukolebwa lwa kubulwa buwagizi bwabazzukuluono yasomedde abaana beyali owessiga lya kanajje ekkumi nabasatu 13 ekibonerezo ekyabaweereddwa olwokukuba amayinja abakulembeze bolukiiko olufuzi olwekika bwe baali bagenze okuziika kitaabwe ngabaana bawakanya ekyokumuziika ku mbuga so nga ekika kyali kyagala aziikibwe ku butaka bwe awali ba kanajje abalalabuli mwana omulenzi waakutanga ente ennume ate omuwala ente enkazi nga ekika si kyakuta lumbe lwa kitaabwe kwabizibwa okutuusa nga batanze           kayima ngawera mu maaso ga ssaabasajja ku mukolo ogumukatikkiro charles peter mayiga abikidde obuganda okufa kwabadde omwami wa kabaka owessaza lye mawokota david ssekyeru kayima eyagudde mu kinaabiro ku lwokubiri ekyavuddeko okufa kwekatikkiro era ataddewo olukiiko olugenda okukola ku nteekateeka zokuziika nga luno lugenda kukolaganira nabenju yomugenzi okutambuza ebyokuziikamu kiwandiiko ekisomeddwa minisita wolukiiko namawulire e mmengo noah kiyimba katikkiro yasaasidde abantu ba mawokota ne buganda okutwaliza awamu olwokuviibwako omuntu abadde omukozi ate ngayagala kabaka wekayima ssekyeru mu ttaayi eyebikuubo ngaliko byayogera ne minisita kawuki ku bulange gye buvuddekoolukiiko lwakukulemberwamu minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu joseph kawuki ngamyukibwa ssekiboobo alex benjamin kigongoate hajji twaha lwanyaga kibalizi katambala nga ye muwandiisiabalala kuliko omumyuka asooka owa kayima gabriel kabonge omumyuka owookubiri owa kayima hajjati rehema kasibante kaggo agnes ssempa nabalala omumyuka asooka owa kayima gabriel kabonge omu ku bali mu nteekateeka zokuziikadavid ssekyeru yafuuka kayima mu 2013 okutuusa wafiiriddeabadde mukiise mu lukiiko lwa bugandayaliko omumyuka wa mutuba ii kiringente okuva mu 2010 okutuuka mu 2013yaliko ssentebe wa bulungibwansi mu buganda mu 2010abadde ne diguli mu byeddiini theologyyafuna dipuloma mu kunoonya obutaleabadde mulimi owemmwaanyi omututumufu era nga mulunziabadde asomesa abantu ku byobulimiabadde musuubuzi wa mmwaanyi nebintu ebirala era ngabadde akamula omubisi gwamatooke ngagutunda mu mawanga ga bulaayayabadde ajenti wamazzi gobwakabaka aga olwendo mu mawokotaabadde mufumbo ne jesca ssekyeru nga balina nabaanaomumyuka wa kayima ayogedde ku mukamaawegabriel kabonge abadde omumyuka asooka owa kayima ategeezezza nti omugenzi abadde amaze ebbanga lya wiiki ssatu nga takyetaba mu nkiiko za ssaza nga teyeewulira bulungi nga nomulundi ogwasembyeyo olukiiko yalagidde ne lutuula mu makaage e katende ngayagala abeereko byateesa ku kulwanagana okwaliwo wakati wabazannyi bessaza lye mawokota ne budduera twatuula wuwe natugabula nokutugabulayatusaba bulijjo okukuumanga empisa bwe tuba twagala obuwanguzi nokwongera okuba obumu bwe tuba baakutwala essaza lyaffe mu maaso kabonge bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti kayima yabakubirizza okwanguya buli omu okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwamukwasibwa ku nteekateeka yaabwe okuzimba ekyalo kyebyobuwangwa ku ssaza okwongera okufuula ekifo ekyebyobulambuziabadde ayagala ebika bitandike okukiikanga ku ssaza buli wiiki okumalako omwaka mu ngeri eyokutumbula ebyobulambuziabadde ddereeva womugenzi asadu ssemwogerere ku ssimu yategeezezza nti ebbanga ddene lyamaze ngavuga omugenzi era oluusi abaddenga asalawo ne yeevuga wadde abadde oluusi atawaanyizibwa puleesanaye abadde antwala nga mwana ngambuulirira naddala ngayagala okulaba nga nneezimbampulira nnemereddwa okumwerabiramu wadde eddakiika ssemwogerere bwe yagambye           onyango ngakwasa katikkiro mayiga omujoozi gwe yazannyiddemu empaka za afcon e misirikatikkiro charles peter mayiga asisinkanye kapiteeni wa ttiimu yeggwanga the cranes denis onyango masinde namusiima olwokuba omu ku bantu abakoze ennyo okussa eggwanga lyabwe ku maapu yensi yonnaensisinkano yabadde mu bulange e mmengo gye buvuddeko era katikkiro yakalaatidde abazannyi abayitimuse mu mizannyo okuwabula abazannyi abato nokubakubiriza okuyiga okutereka ate nokubaako ebintu ebyenkukunala mwe bassa ensimbi zaabweabatasobola kukola yinvesitimenti  waakiri ssente zaabwe bazisse mu ttaka kubanga bajja kukungula katikkiro mayiga bwe yagambye nakubiriza abantu okwenyumiriza bulijjo mu bantu abaliko bye bakoze ate nokubazzaamu amaanyiyajjukizza abazannyi okujjumbira okunnyikiza empisa mu mizannyo kubanga lino kkubo eriyamba emizannyo okuyitimuka ate ekiweesa eggwanga ekitiibwaonyango yasabye abantu okuwagira ttiimu yeggwanga the cranes nga bwe bawagira emipiira gyamasaza mu buganda ate nokuwagira ttiimu yonna so si bantu ssekinnoomukatikkiro yatonedde onyango akabonero ka buganda ke yamunaanise ku kkooti ate ne onyango namutonera omujoozi gwe yazannyiddemu mu mpaka za afcon omwaka gunonatuula ne bannange kabaka be yankwasa okutambuza emirimu gye ne tubaga enteekateeka nnamutaayiika etusobozesezza okubaako ebitonotono bye tutuukakobonna be ntambudde nabo ate nabantu ne buganda ne bannayuganda bonna mbeebaza olwobuwagizi bwe bampadde mu bbanga lino nga bwe nnabubasaba mu kwogera kwange okwasooka eri olukiiko lwa bugandaemyaka we giweredde omukaaga nga nkutte ddamula nga ssaabasajja akendeezezza baminisita be okuva ku 14 okudda ku 9 minisitule ezimu ne zigattibwa era baminisita ne bongerwa obuvunaanyizibwakino kyakolebwa olwokwagala okukomya obwannakyewa nga nnyinimu atandikira ku baminisitabaminisita kati bakola obudde bwonna era waliwo essuubi ddene nti enteekateeka eno egenda kunnyikiza obuweereza nga balabirira bulungi ebitongole ebigwa mu minisitule zaabweokuva omutanda lwe yadda okwaboobwe mu 1986 beene emirimu kumpi gyonna agiyisizza mu bannakyewabakoze omulimu gwa ttendo era kumpi buli ekirabwako kyatandikibwa ku musingi gwa bwannakyewatwebaza bonna abawaddeyo obudde bwabwe amagezi nebikola okuzzaawo ekitiibwa kya bugandansuubira nti okuba ne baminisita abakola obudde bwonna nga baweebwa ensako kijja kunyweza obuwanguzi obutuukiddwaako mu myaka 25 nga kabaka mutebi ii ali ku namulondo era kimpa essanyu okuba nti cuucu yasiima nkulemberemu enteekateeka enomu myaka omukaaga egyakayita tuliko bye namulondowetutuukidde wano tubadde twakayita mu nkuuka ssatu amatikkira ga 1993 embaga ya kabaka eya 1999 ate ne jubireewo ya 2018nafuna omukisa okwenyigira mu nteekateeka zemikolo ebiri egyasooka ku kitaawe omugenzi luswatannaabagereka yasinzidde mu lutikko e namirembe eggulo mu kusaba okwakulembedde okuziika kitaawe john mulumba luswata eyafudde obulwadde bwensigo nomutimannaabagereka mu kusaba kwonna eyabadde alabika ngamaziga asiba masibe yategeezezza abakungubazi nti yali yasemba okulaba ku maziga ga kitaawe bwe yalinnya ennyonyi omulundi gwe ogwasooka ngagenda mu amerika era bwe yali amusiibula kitaawe yatulika nakaaba wabula oluvannyuma namwagaliza olugendo olulungibwe nnagenze okumulaba ku kitanda nga takyasobola na kwogera yantunuulidde mu mmunye nakulukusa ezziga nange yategeezezza abakungubazi abajjuzza lutikko ye namirembe nti kitaabwe abadde musajja anyumirwa ennyo okusaaga era nga buli mboozi gyanyumya ateekamu okusaaga nga kwatadde okuseka ennyo ekintu ekibadde kinyumira abaana bemu kusaba kuno nnamwandu womugenzi luswata edith namirimu luswata yategeezezza nti mu bbanga lyamaze ngali ne bba tebayombyeko wadde oba okulwana nga bwe guli ku bufumbo obumu era amalalamondo kagonyera yagambye nti aliwo abayizi bangi abagenda mu matendekero aga waggulu kyokka ne bavaayo nga tebalina kye bayizeeyo olwokugulirira ebibuuzoabayizi bangi ensangi zino bafaayo baabadde 3352okusinziira ku kateregga abayizi 2017 kwabo abaatikiddwa babadde balenzi ate abawala nga bali 1335nga bavudde mu uganda tanzania kenya rwanda somalia south sudan nawalalaku bayizi ba rwanda abataasobodde kubaawo olwensalo ezaggalwa kateregga yagambye nti tekyabalobedde kutikkirwa kubanga baabadde baateekeddwa dda mu katabo kabalina okufuna diguli zaabwe ne dipulooma omwaka guno           nnaabagereka ngatuuse ku mukolo gwekisaakaate ku mmande bino yabyogedde bwe yabadde akyadde mu kisaakaate ekyomulundi ogwa 13 nga kitegekeddwa ku ssomero lya st joseph of nazareth e kavule  katende mu ssaza lye mawokota ku mmandekikulu ekisaakaate okubunyisibwa mu masomero kubanga kino ekibeerawo mu january buli mwaka tubeera nabo ekiseera kitonokino kyakuyamba okugunjulira eggwanga abatuuze abeegombesa era abobuvunaanyizibwa nnaabagereka bwe yategeezezzaomwaka oguwedde enkola yekisaakaate yatongozebwa mu masomero gekibuga kampala nga bwe kinaamala okunnyikira kirowoozebwa kigenda kutwalibwa ne mu masomero agebitundu ebiralannaabagereka yayongedde nasaba abazadde okulondoola abaana baabwe okulaba nga bateeka mu nkola ebyo ebibasomeseddwa nga yalagiddwa ebintu ebyenjawulo abaana bye bakola okuli okubumba okuluka okweyonja nebiralaoluvannyuma nnaabagereka yagguddewo ekizimbe ekipya ku ssomero lino abayizi mwe bagenda okuliirangaessomero lino likulirwa omulangira paul kyabagguabayizi baayimbidde nnaabagereka nokutontoma ebyo bye bazze basomesebwa okuva nga january 5 2019abalala battunse mu mizannyo okuli omweso nemiralaomweso gwe gumu ku mizannyo emizaaliranwa egireeteddwa mu kisaakaateomuzannyo guno gulina okwagazisa abaana okubala obutetenkanya nebirala kyokka nemizannyo emirala weegiri adrian mukiibi akulira emirimu mu nnaabagereka development foundation bwe yategeezezzaekisaakaate kino kikomekkerezebwa nga january 19 2019kyetabiddwaamu abaana abasukka mu 400 nga kitambulidde ku mulamwa obuntubulamu mu bikolwa byangeyabadde ku mukolo ogwokulamaga kwekika kye okwabadde ku lusozi munywa e bukesa buteesasira ku lwomukaaga december 82018 naatwala omukisa guno okunyonyola bazzukkulu be ebyali ku lyatomuteesasira keeya namuyimba yomu ku bantu abasimatuka eryato eryatirimbula abantu 32 nga november 242018 era emboozi ye yagiyumiza bwaatinebaza mukama olwekirabo kyobulamu kyatuwadde okusobola olunaku olwaleero nti tuli wano ngabazirango ngaboluganda abenda emunebaza katonda nti yansomosa embeera gyenalimu ne jjajja kiwedde ate kati mukwano gwange wanjawuloerinnya erya kawonaawo twaliganye kubanga litujjukiza bingi naye nga mu butuufu tuli ba kawonawotukyebaliza katonda eyatuwa omukisa ogwokubiri okuddamu okutuula namwe okunyumya namwe okulya nammwe nga tubakulembera nga abazirangongomwana wa kintu nga mukasa ku nnyanja kwaali nze ne kaddukirizi ennyanja yatuwandatusabira bannaffe mukama katonda beyayita mu ngeri eyo abawe ekiwummulo ekyemirembe ate twagala okuyimirira awamu ne famire zabantu abafiira mu njega eno kuba manyi bali mu kunyolwamukama katonda yamutegekera olunaku lwanaamutwaliranaye nneebaza mmmange kubanga wa njawulo nnyo yampa obulamu ate katonda ansaasidde nti akyali mulamu mmanyi buli lunaku ansabiraalaga nnyinaomuntu gwobeera naye mu nnyumba singa yali yakuvaamu mu mbeera gyetuyitamu ennaku zino naakuvaamu natandika okukusimasima ate osanga nandibadde ndi mu mbeera mbinaye jjajja mukyala ensonga yagikwata ngomukyala era nokuba nti nsobodde okubeera wano abadde musaaleomanyi oluusi ndogottana kubanga gwendi naye era yawulira okulogottana kwange kubanga embeera gyetwayitamu si nnungi naye byonna abigumidde era mwebaza olwensonga eyoabantu abamu bayinza okwebuuza jjajja yali anoonya ki ku lyato akutte ne kadduukirizi  eriab nanjibwaomutaka womutuba gwa kiwedde e mpongo gomba amututte ku lyatonaye bannange nange ndi muntunnina mukwano gwange omu mutaka mukulu wa kasolyabweyawulira amawulire gano yankubira essimu nambuuza nti omutwe gwo gukola bulunginemugamba nti nkubulira amazima omutwe gwange gwegukyasinze okukola obulungi naye entuuko bweeba etuuse ebintu bingi oyinza obutabirababagamba nti akanaafambabulira amazima waliwo omulangira ssimbwa arnold yatulabula oba emirundi emekanti tetulinya lyato lino eryato lino tetuligendakomukwano gwange freeman kiyimba ne mukwano gwange omulangira david kintu wasajja yangamba nti jjajja olwerinnya lya kintu nze neddira ngo wadde ndi mulangiratulina omukwano gwaffe ogwenjawulo ngoggyeko nti mulangira ate nze ndi mutakatwali tugenda okuggulawo biici ya jjajjawe embeera eno netuukawo bannaffe nebatufaakonalowooza nti nnina okukyusa obulamu bwange nga bwembadde mbutambuza naye mbadde sibutambuza bubi nnyossenabulya mukwano gwange ngomuntu tulina wetutuula buli lwaggulo  agenda okulaba nga takyandaba nagamba nti jjajja ogenda kufa bwogenda mu maaso nembeera eyo gyokolamu ebintu otandike nokutukyawa nga ffe abaali bakututte mu mazzikino kyatuwadde ekyokuyigatwasanyuse nnyo olwomukwano gwemwatulazeoluusi tubadde tetumanyi abantu batwagala okutuuka ku kinoabantu mwatwagadde essimu yange bweyaddako natuuka okulowooza nti lwaki siva ku mpewo kubanga buli sekendi evuganamanya nti bwembeera ntambula sitambula nzekka wabula nnina abantu abalala abandi mu mugongo gwangeawo wenebaliza katonda nti yampa omukisa abantu bano nembamanya era nemanya nti sirina kuddamu kubayiwa ngabasingira ddala be mwe abazirangonali sibayiye wabula enteekateeka za katonda bwezityo bwezaali nti nze nomuzirango kaddukirizi nti tuliggwa mu mazzi netuwonaezo zaali nteekateeka za katonda era tumwebaza nnyomu mbeera eno nebaza namwanje owa suredeal nti alina ebbanga ettono wafuukidde ensonga mu kika kyaffe ekyengo naddala ku nsonga eno eyokulamaga wadde tubadde tulina wetuli naye akoze omulimu gwa ttendookulamaga kwasooka na kitambiro kya mmisaokulamaga kwabazzukkulu ba muteesasira okwomulundi guno kwaali ku lusozi munywa e bukesa eno era kwakulemberwamu frachilles kalyango owe mityana ngono yebaza katonda olwokutaasa omutaka muteesasira ne banne ate naasabira nabafa ekiwummulo ekyemirembeomutaka muteesasira  nga naye mukatulikiti yasabiddwa abafaaza abalala okwadde frjohn baptist kintu ngono yavunanyizibwa ku byentendereza mu busumba bwe masaka wamu ne frremegius ssemujju owe kanyanya mu kyadondooluvanyuma abazzukkulu batonedde omutaka muteesasira ente bbiri okumukulisa eryato           kabaka nabeebitiibwa nga batudde mu lukiiko e mmengookusaba kuno kwakoleddwa mu lutuula olwokubiri olwolukiiko lwa buganda olwa 26 olwatudde e bulange mmengo olunaku lweggulo ku mmande era ne lusaasira famire zonna ezabantu 32 abaafiira mu lyato saako nabo abaasimattuka akabenje kano akagwaawo nga november 242018 gavumenti eteekewo etteeka erirambika okusaabalira ku mazzilino lyakuyamba mu ngeri mukaaga okulambika enkola yamaato abagoba bamaato ngoli avuga abantu abasukka 10 alina okubeera nebiwandiiko  okulaga ebiragiro omusaabaze byalina okugoberera ate nga bigendera ku buzito bwe okussaawo empuliziganya erambika abagoba bamaato abavuga abantu abasukka 10 nga bwekikolebwa ku nnyonyi naye weesanga ngoli akwata bukwasi lyato ngasindika ku nnyanja wateekwa okubeerawo okuwa amaato amakubo mwegatambulira okulambika embeera yemyalo katikkiro mayiga bwe yawadde amagezimayiga yayogedde ne ku mulimu gwokuzzaawo enju muzibu azaalampanga mu masiro e kasubi nga bwegutambula obulungi ngakasolya kanaatera okumalirizibwa okuwundibwa era okusereka kusuubirwa okutandika ku ntandikwa yomwaka ogujjaku nsonga zettaka mayiga yategeezezza ngobwakabaka bwe busaasira abantu abagobaganyizibwa ku ttaka mu bitundu ebyenjawulo mu buganda okuli abe lusanja nagamba nti gavumenti esaanye okuleka amateeka okulamula ensonga zettaka twagala abatudde ku ttaka lyobwakabaka balituuleko ntende era nkubiriza abantu okweyuna enkola ya kyapa mu ngalo kubanga nnali mbagamba wano nti owekyapa tajoogebwa nolwekyo mweyunire buganda land boardnabagamba ensonga mukaaga ezirina okukolwako okugonjoola endooliito zettaka ngemu ku zino kwe kukaddiwa kwettakanolwekyo wano  mu buganda  tulina okulunda ebisolo tufune ebigimusakino kyakutuyamba ku nsonga yokukaddiwa kwettaka mayiga bweyayogedde ku ttakaku kyokutulugunya abantu mu ggwanga pulezidenti museveni yasabiddwa okutwala abakuumaddembe abatulugunya bannansi wabeerewo obwenkanya saako okusaba gavumenti okulowooza ku kyokutereeza ku mbeera abakuumaddembe bano mwe bakoleraolukiiko luno olwakubiriziddwa omumyuka womukubiriza waalwo hajj ahmed lwasa lwebazizza omukiise waalwo era munnamateeka wa kabaka christopher bwanika olwokukulemberamu banne okuwangula emisango egiwabirwa kabaka ku ttakalwasabye omukulu wekika kyekkobe omutaka namwama augustine mutumba okutuuza muzzukulu waabwe male mabirizi eyatwala kabaka mu kkooti ku nsonga zino ezettakakatikkiro mayiga yategeezezza abakiise ku kukyala kwe mu ssaza lye kooki nagamba nti kwagotaanyizibwa abantu abali mu kitundu ekyo nga tebaagala nkulaakulana           katikkiro charles peter mayiga ngayogera ne kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omulamuzi irene mulyagonja mu ofiisi ye e bulange mmengo nga october 182018bino yabyogeredde mu ofiisi ye ku lwokuna october 18 2018 bwe yabadde akyazizza kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omulamuzi irene mulyagonja nagamba nti obwakabaka bulina enkola yobwerufu nga buli muweereza alina okugitambulirakoobwerufu yenkola yokukolera buli kintu mu musana nga tewali kyossa wansi wa mmeezaera mu bitongole byonna ebyobwakabaka tubategeza nti omuntu ekintu kyakola bwoba okulira ekitongoleakulira ekitongole ekyo alina obuvunaanyizibwa okulaba nga buli kyakola akikolera mu musana nange nga katikkiro byenkola nnina kubikolera lwatubwe wabaawo ensimbi nga ziyingidde twagala tutegeere bye zaakoze bwe wabaawo obuzibu kuba nabwo bubeerawo twagala  abakozi be tukola nabo bamanye lwaki waliwo obuzibu obwo mayiga bwe yategeezezzamayiga yayongeddeko nti omulimu gwa kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti mukulu ddala eri eggwanga bwatyo nasaba abakulembeze ku mitendera gyonna okukwatira awamu okulwanyisa enguzimulyagonja yategeezezza nti ekitongole kibeera ne wiiki yokulwanyisa enguzi nga buli mwaka bwe batyo bagenda bakyalira ebitongole bwe bakolagana mu ddimu lino bwatyo nayongera okusaba abantu beegatire wamu mu kuwa obujulizi obulumika abali benguzi kuba kye kimu ku bizibuwaza okubavunaanakabaka gye buvuddeko yavaayo nasaba abantu be okukwatira awamu okulwanyisa enguzi nga basooka nokwewala omululu era bayigirize abaana baabwe okuva buto ensonga zinoensonda zaategeezezza nti minisita ono kyasaliddwaawo abuulirizibweko ku nsonga ezeekuusa ku byettaka noolwekyo mu kiseera kyanaamala ngabuulirizibwako kabaka kwe kusiima addeko ebbali ensonga ze zimale okutunulwamuomukulu ono amawulire gokumuwummuza gaamuweebwa mu august womwaka guno era okuva olwo tali ku mulimu era okubuuliriza kugenda mu maaso mu kiseera kinoettaka erigambibwa okuleetera hajji ggaganga obuzibu kuliko erya mujaguzo e kabowa eryembuga yeggombolola ye ssisa mu busiro erye ggolomolo eribaddeko enkaayana ne minisita omubeezi owamazzi mu gavumenti eya wakati ronald kibuule nabatuuze bekitundu ekyoku nsonga ze ggolomolo kigambibwa yawandiikira omwami kateregga ebbaluwa emuwa olukusa ku ttaka lino naye lye yagenda mu maaso nakolagana ne kibuule namuguzaako yiika 80ebyapa ku ttaka lino kibuule byeyali afunye oluvanyuma buganda land board yabisazaamunga june 15 2018 abataka abakulu bebika mu buganda baalambula embuga ya mujaguzo e kabowa ne bafuna okwemulugunya okuva mu bakulira ekifo kino abaakulemberwamu kawuula frank magala ngembuga bwe yeeyongedde okutundibwa naye nga bagamba nti ebiragiro biva mmengoabataka baateesa okudda mu kifo kino ne katikkiro charles peter mayiga bamulage embeera mwekiri era basalire wamu amagezi kyokka ensisinkano eno teyabaayo olwensonga ezitaategeerekekaomu ku bataka ataayagadde kwatuukirizibwa mannya yatutegeezezza nti kabaka yeetaaga okuteekawo akakiiko okunoonyereza ku ttaka lyonna nokukuba ttooci mu bakungu ku ngeri gye bafunamu ettaka nga beesomye buli weriri okulitundaettaka lyaffe eryennono lyonna abavubuka abo aba buganda land board baliyingiriddebakolagana ne baminisita okutunda ettaka lino mu bukyamu omutaka omu bwe yategeezezzaye hajji ggaganga bwe yatuukiriddwa ku nsonga eno yategeezezza nti ensonga zino ziri wakati we ne mukama we ssaabasajja kabaka eyamuwa obuvunaanyizibwa bwokuweereza nga minisita noolwekyo tasobola kuzoogerako mu bulambulukufu mu mawulire kyokka nayongera nalambika nti emirimu gya kabaka azze agikola okuyitira mu bajjajjaabe ne gye buli eno akyagikolamu ngeri yemu omwogezi wobwakabaka noah kiyimba bwe yatuukiriddwa yategeezezza nti bagenda kufulumya ekiwandiiko ekitongole ku nsonga zino batangaaze eggwanga ku kiki ekigenda mu maaso           katikkiro mayiga ngayanjulira kabaka agamu ku makula agaamuweereddwa aba kyaggwe ensangi zino tufuna amawulire okuva mu bantu baffe ku mbeera nga bweyimiridde mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo naye nga beeraliikirivu olwebiriwo nebigenda mu maaso mu ggwanga nga muno mwe muli nokutulugunyizibwaensonga eno tugitegedde era tugitunuulira kabaka bwe yayogedde ku mbeera eri mu ggwangabino yabyogeredde ku mbuga yeggombolola ssaabaddu nanfumbambi ntenjeru e mukono mu ssaza lye kyaggwe ku mmande buganda bwe yabadde ekuza olunaku lwa bulungibwansi nolwa gavumenti ezebitundu mu ggwanga ngemikolo gino gyategekeddwa wansi womulamwa ogugamba nti abavubuka basaale mu kukulaakulanya bugandawiiki ewedde kabaka yasisinkana abataka abakulu bebika mu buganda ne bamutegeeza nga bwe bali abeeraliikirivu olwembeera yebyobufuzi nebyenfuna eri mu ggwangasi bebokka wabula ne bannaddiini nabantu abalala abazze mu lubiri nga bategeeza omutanda ku mbeera enokabaka yawadde essaza lye kyaggwe ensimbi obukadde musanvu nekitundu 75m olwokunywa mu ganne waalyo akeendo mu mwaka ngeno yensonga lwaki yasiimye emikolo gino ne gikwatirwa enoabe busiro abaakwata ekyokubiri nabo baaweereddwa 2500000 egombolola nanfumbambi ntenjeru ye yasinze amaggombolola gonna nga yaweereddwa1000000 mutuba iii makindye mu kyadondo eyaddako yafunye 500000olwo omulimi omuvubuka eyasinze okwerwanako ronald sseruyange okuva e bugerere nga yafuna obubonero 65 yaweereddwa ensimbi 1500000 ssaako nengule eyitibwa enkumbi ya kabakakabaka yawadde abavubuka amagezi bwe yagambye nti mu mwe mulimu abavubuka abalina ebitone ebya buli ngeri era mwe abakulembeze abenkyaawo nno mu maka ne mu massomero omulimu ogwandisinze obukulu kwe kuzuula ebitone byabaana era nokubikulaakulanyaolwo abavubuka basobole okukola ebyo bye balinamu ebitone era abaana nabo oluusi baalaga obubonero obwebitone nga bakyali bato ddala naye ngemirundi mingi tetubayamba okukulaakulanya ebitone ebyoemirundi mingi tetuwa mukisa baana baffe okukola ebyo bye balinamu obusobozi era bye baagala era ffe ababasalirawo ekyokukola ekintu ekitali kituufuyayongedde nategeeza nti  tukubira abavubuka omulanga okubeera abanyiikivu mu buli kye bakola kubanga tukimanyi bulungi nti mwe mujja okuddukanya ensi yaffe enookuba abomugaso mbakubirizza okwegatta olwo lwe munaasobola okukola emirimu egyamaanyi mugatte ensimbi zammwe mulyoke musobole okwewola okukuza emirimu gyammwe kabaka bwe yabuuliridde abavubukaoluvannyuma kabaka yatongozza ekitabo buganda eggumidde ekirooto kya kabaka kintu nga kino kirimu amasaza 18 amagombolola 174 emiruka 1199 nebyalo 8505 nebirala ebikwata ku buganda           wakati ngali ne supreme mufti sheikh ndirangwa ku ddyo eyamusisinkanye mu lubiri e mmengoku kkono ye sheikh hamidu kateregga akulira ebyeddiini e kibulikabaka yasiimye enkola ndirangwa gye yatandise ngagenda akunga abantu abenzikiriza zonna okukolagana obulungiensisinkano eno yabaddewo wiiki ewedde era ensonda zaategeezezza nti kabaka yagambye ndirangwa ayongere namaanyi mu kukunga abantu ku nsonga zokulwanyisa obwavu nokuwa obubaka obuyamba mu nkulaakulanaensisinkano eno eyabadde eyekyama kyategeerekese nti kabaka yategeezezza sheikh ndirangwa nti kikulu abantu abenzikiriza ezenjawulo okukolagana obulungi kubanga bonna bantu ba katondandirangwa yatandikawo enkola eno ngagenda alambula amakanisa ne klezia gyasisinkanira abakulembeze benzikiriza zino ne babaako bye bateesaakogye buvuddeko ndirangwa yasisinkanye dr yonna lwanga owa orthodox e namungoona noluvannyuma nakyalira ekkanisa ya st andrews e kasubissaabadinkoni eric kasule yasiimye enkola ya ndirangwa gye yayogeddeko ngegenda okuyamba okutandikawo essuula empya wakati wabasiraamu nabantu abenzikiriza endalaye ndirangwa yagambye nti abasiraamu nabakristu bonna bantu ba katonda noolwekyo tebasaanidde kwawukana lwa buntu butono era nabasaba okuba nga bannabbimu nteekateeka eno eyokutalaaga amasinzizo ne poliisi ndirangwa awerekerwako bannakyewa bobusiraamu abakulemberwa hajji badru sagalaolunaku luno tuluyita olwa bulungibwansi ngekyagendererwa mu kyo bwe butanyiiza bannaffe abaamawanga amalala nebitundu ebirala ebya uganda abaanyiiganga mu biseera ebiyise nga bawulidde nti buganda ye yasooka okwefuga nga october 81962 noluvannyuma nga october 9 1962 negenda mu uganda eya wamu eyeefuganga october 81962 duke of kent eyali omubaka wa kkwiini wa bungereza eyajja wano okuwa uganda obwetwaze yagenda e mmengo nayogera eri olukiiko lwa bugandamu kwogera kwe yalangirira nti endagaano eya 1900 ne 1955 bungereza ze yakola ne buganda okugikuuma kati zikomyeera kati buganda yeetwala yokka tekyali wansi wa bufuzi bwa bungerezaenkeera nga october 9 1962 uganda yafuna obwetwaze wali e kololo era duke of kent yakwasa dr milton obote eyali executive prime minister wa uganda ssemateeka yokwefuga kwa uganda eya 1962ssekabaka mutesa ii yayimirira ku mukono ogwa ddyo ogwa milton obote ku mukolo ogwomu wiiki eya bulungibwansi wabeerawo ebikolebwa bingi mu bitundu ebitali bimu ebya bugandakabaka alambula ebifo bingi ebitali bimu ngakubiriza abantu okukola ennyo nalaba ebikoleddwa era akubiriza abantu okusomesa abaana nabantu okwekuuma nokwerabirira obulungibuli kifo emikolo emikulu we gibeera wateekebwawo weema abantu we bajjanjabibwa nokufuna eddagalawabeerawo emisomo egikwata ku byamateekaabaganda kati basanyufu nnyo era bakola nnyo okukulaakulanya buganda mu bintu ebitali bimu era basanyuka nnyo bwe bawulira nti kabaka ajja kulabika abeeko ekitundu kyalambulabazimba ebiyitirirwa ku luguudo lwayitako okugenda mu kifo awabeera emikolo emikulu egya bulungibwansikabaka buli lwalabika eri abantu abeera musanyufu nnyo kubanga kati buli watuuka mu buganda alaba okugenda mu maaso nenkulaakulanaalaba amasomero amalungi ennyo agazimbiddwa amalwaliro agomulembe ebibuga ebizimbiddwa ebifo ebirungi abantu we bakolera ebyobusuubuzi ne wooteeri ezomulembe ezizimbiddwa eggombolola ya ssaabaddu e ntenjeru yatandikibwawo mu mwaka 1900 okusinziira ku byafaayo bajjajjange bye bampa nga nkyasoma mu mpumu primary school yatandikibwa omusajja eyali omulwanyi wa kabaka eri njiri nanfumbambi owenseeneneeri njiri nanfumbambi ye yazaala latima mpagi eyali omuwanika wa buganda mu biseera ssekabaka muteesa ii bwe yali mu buwaanguse ate nga katikkiro wa buganda mu biseero ebyo yali paul kavuma omulamuzi nga ye matayo mugwanya eggombolola eno etandikira ku mugga kasaala oguli ku luguudo oluva e mukono okugenda e katosi nokugenda e nkokonjeruekoma ku nnyanja awali omwalo gwa kibanga nekoma ne ku mwalo e katosiku ludda luno olwebugwanjuba eggombolola eno etuuka ku mwalo e bule ku nnyanja nalubaale era bwobeera e bule olengera omwalo gaba e kampala eggombolola eno erimu omugga zirimiti ogutandikira ku kyalo ntanzi era abaganda bagamba nti omugga ogwo guva mu lusozi mpumuolusozi mpumu olwo abaganda abedda baagambanga nti luliko oluzzi nga yendabirwamu ya buganda eraba mu ggulu eri katondaomugga zirimiti abaganda baguyita zirimiti bba wemigga wano mu buganda eggombolola eriko omwalo omukulu katosi eva ebyennyanja ebiriisa kampala nebitundu ebiralaku mwalo ogwo abakoome nabalwaje nabava e lulere we bagobera ku lukalu omukungu eri njiri nanfumbambi kabaka yamuwa sikweya mayiro 8 nga zikwata ekyalo kyonna mpumu kiganda kisoga ntanzi nokutuuka e ntenjeruku ludda olulala ettaka eryo lituuka e naggunga awali essamba yamajaani ennene ennyo eyateekebwawo omuzungu eyayitibwanga buchanan era oluvannyuma abaganda ekyalo kyonna baakituuma buchanana era nga waliwo nekkolero lyamajaani eddene eggombolola eno erimu essamba yamajaani ennene e kiwafu ku luguudo olugenda e bule era ngessamba eyo yateekebwawo omuzungu eyayitibwanga gordon nga yagiteekawo mu 1945 ngolutalo ssematalo owookubiri luwedde eggombolola eno erimu ekyalo ekiyitibwa kkoja nga ku kyalo kuno kwe kwabeeranga kojja wa kabaka wa buganda era kwabeerangako nomukungu wa kabaka omulala eyayitibwanga ssaabaganzi eggombolola eno erimu essamba yekibala cocoa kkooko ku kyalo kituuza era wano kkooko we yasooka okulimibwa mu uganda era erimu essamba yemmwaanyi ennene ku kyalo kipayo bino byonna nga biri ku ttaka lya kabaka mu muluka gwe saayikitenda era omwami owomulukaeggombolola eyo mulimu erimu ku masomero agasinga obukulu mu buganda erya mpumu primary school omwasomera omutaka we kyaggwe kavumakaggwa azaalibwa mu kiganda mwe yasomera okuva mu mwaka 1948 okutuuka mu 1952essomero lino lyazimbibwa omukungu eri njiri bwe yawaayo ettaka lye aba church missionary society kati church of uganda ne nac native anglican church bwe baali nga bazimba amasomero mu myaka egyonzijukira ngabaana abamu baavuganga bugaali okuva e kiyanja mugomba bunyama bugoye katosi kalengera bunakijja kiyoola ku luguudo olugenda e nkokonjeru ne bajja okusoma e mpumussaabasajja okusiima okubeera ggombolola eno kikulu nnyo wano mu kyaggweomuwandiisi ye kavuma kaggwa omutaka we kyaggwe essimu 0772584423kabaka wa buganda ronald muwenda mutebi alambudde essaza lye kyaggwe ngentandikwa yemikolo gyameefuga ga buganda agagenda okubeerawo enkya ku mbuga ya ssaabaddu e ntenjeru mu kyaggwekabaka atandikidde ku nnimiro yomuvubuka godfrey ssennabulya eyasinga mu kulima mu kyaggwe ngono alima butunda ku yiika 9ebifaananyi bya dickson kulumba ne henry nsubuga           muliika ku kkono ngayanirizibwa ku ddwaaliro lye mpigimuliika bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo gwokutongoza bulungibwansi mu mpigi ogwabadde ku kisaawe kya poliisiyakubirizza abazadde okuyigiriza abaana baabwe bulungibwansi kibayambeko okulumirirwa eggwanga lyabwe nga bagaba omusaayi okulongoosa amalwaliro okugogola enguudo zaabwe nebirala nga tebalinze gavumentimuliika yagugumbudde ne poliisi ya uganda okumenya amateeka ngate yerina okugateeka mu nkola nagamba nti bino byonna bivudde ku bantu butayagala ggwanga lyabweyatongozza okusimba emiti mu kibuga mpigi okwetoloola enguudo zonna nasimba omuti ku ddwaaliroomukolo guno gwetabiddwaako abakulembeze bekibuga mpigi nabaami ba kabaka abessaza lye mawokota           ssaabawolereza wa buganda daudi mpanga ngaliko byatangaaza bannamawulire oluvannyuma lwokubasisinkana ku nsonga zomusango gwettaka kabaka gwawangudde nga october 1 2018ssaabawolereza wa buganda daudi mpanga agambye nti enkola eyokutwalanga kabaka mu kkooti enzungu esaanye ekomezebwe kubanga obwakabaka bulina enteekateeka zennono eziyitibwamu okugonjoola obutakkaanya bwonna obubeera bubaluseewompanga yanokoddeyo kkooti ya kisekwa ekozesebwa okutawulula abalina enkaayana zebika nagamba nti tewali nsonga etwala muzzukkulu wa buganda mu kkooti enzungu ngeno weeri era yerina obumanyirivu ku nsonga zebikaenkola endala gye yanokoddeyo ye yokuyita mu bakulu mu bika amasaza ssaako ne baminisita okutuusa ensonga ezitali zimu ezibanyigabino yabyogedde oluvannyuma lwa kkooti ejulirwamu okugoba okusaba kkooti enkulu kwe yali ewadde munnamateeka mabiriizi kiwanuka nti aweebwe akawunti okuterekebwa ensimbi eziva mu ttaka lyobwakabakamabiriizi munnaffe nga yeddira kkobe atutte emisango mingi mu kkooti ngawawaabira kabaka ku nsonga ezenjawulo kyokka nga tulina engeri eziwerako omuntu okwemulugunya kwonna awatali kugenda mu kkooti nzungukino kityoboola ekitiibwa kya kabaka nobwakabaka okutwalira awamu era tusaba ekintu kyokulaba kabaka mu kamwa kikomeyenna alina ensonga emunyiga esaanye akozese emikutu gyennono gye tulina okutuusa ensonga ze mpanga bwe yategezezzaensala yabalamuzi egonda ntende hellen obura ne ezekiel muhanguzi gye baafulumizza ku mmande yalaze nti ebiwandiiko mabiriizi byasaba tebirina ngeri gye bikwataganamu nomusango gwe yawaaba kuba nomusango gwe yawaaba nti kabaka anyigiriza abantu bwabasaba ssente ku ttaka lyobwakabaka ngate akuuma likuume tegulimu kinyusi kubanga talaga baani banyigirizibwa ngera be bamutuma okubakiikiriraku kino mpanga we yasinzidde nategeeza nti ebiseera bingi ebyonooneddwa ssaako nensimbi mu kuwoza ensonga ennyingi mabiriizi ze yayingiza mu musango omukulu ogwettaka nga zino zisukka 20 ngate wandibaddewo ebirala bingi ebyandibadde bikolebwakkooti enkulu esuubirwa okuddamu okuwuliriza emisango emirala mabirizi gye yawaabira kabaka ku ttaka wakati wa october 22 ne 24 2018           katikkiro mayiga ngakwasa ebibiina ebirwanyisa sikoseero ettu lyebikozesebwa mu kukebera sikoseeroobubaka buno bwetikkiddwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga okubutuusa ku uganda national health laboratory services e butabika mu ggombolola ya mumyuka nakawa kyaddondo eggulonakubiriza abantu okwongera okwenyigira mu misinde kuba mwe muva ensimbi ezijjanjaba abalwaddeemisinde gyamazaalibwa ga kabaka tugikozesa okutumbula embeera zabantu ba buganda era kino kyakugenda mu maasoomwaka ogujja twagala abaddusi emitwalo mukaaga lwe tujja okufuna ensimbi eziwera okuyamba abantu baffe abatawaanyizibwa obulwadde bwa nnalubiri sikoseero mayiga bwe yagambyeguno mulundi gwakubiri nga kabaka awaayo ekitundu ku nsimbi eziva mu misinde gyamazaalibwa ge ngomwaka oguwedde yawaayo ebikozesebwa okukebera abalwadde bya 60000mayiga yakunze abantu okufaayo okufuna obumannyi ku nsonga zebyobulamu baleme kusiiba mu kusaba nti banaawona obulwaddeobutayagala kunaaba mu ngalo okweraguza ssaako nokukomya okwewa eddagala ebintu bye yagambye nti byongera okubakuumira mu bulwaddeabavujjirizi bemisinde gino baabaddewo nga nabalaladr ben mukwaya minisita webyobulamu mu buganda yategeezezza nti ebifo awajjanjabirwa 43 okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna baalabulwa ku bulwadde bwa sikoseero bwatyo ne yeebaza katikkiro wakati nga ye yakiikiridde minisita webyobulamu ruth achieng yeebazizza obwakabaka bwa buganda olwokubeera obusaale mu kulwanyisa obulwadde buno katikkiro mayiga ngakwasa ebibiina ebirwanyisa bulungibwansimu katono ye  ssekiboobo alex benjamin kigongoomwami wa kabaka atwala essaza lye kyaggwe ssekiboobo alex benjamin kigongo kikonyogo alambuludde enteekateeka egenda okugobererwa mu kukyala kwa ssaabasajja kabaka mwagenda okulambula amasaza agenjawulo mu kibuga mukonossekiboobo yagambye nti enteekateeka egenda okusookera ddala ye yokutongoza omukolo gwa bulungibwansi nga october 1 2018 nga gwakuggulwawo katikkiro charles peter mayiga ku kyalo kye kikoozatutadde amaanyi mu bulungibwansi nebigendererwa bibiri ngekisooka kyekyokulongoosa amakubo omutanda mwagenda okuyita nekyokutumbula obuyonjo mu masaza agenjawulo ssekiboobo bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti omutanda asuubirwa okujja e kyaggwe nga october 6 2018  wabula ngagenda kusooka kutalaaga amagombolola agenjawulo okuviira ddala e goma kyampisi namalala mangi ngera waakusisinkana omuvubuka asinga amanyiddwa nga ssebunnya oluvannyuma akomekkereze  olugendo lwe mu ggombolola ye ntenjeru mu disitulikiti ye mukono awagenda okubeera emikolo emitongole nga october 8 2018ssekiboobo ayongeddeko  nga bwe wagenda okubaawo enteekateeka  ya bannamateeka abagenda okusisinkana abatuuze mu disitulikiti ye mukono 2018 nategeeza nti omulimu guli ku bitundu 85 ku 100yategeezezza nti bwe yalangirira nga yaakajja ku bwakatikkiro emyaka etaano egiyise nti omulimu gulina okumalirizibwa mu mwaka gumu yakigenderera mu kkomera          abavubuka abavunaanibwa okukuba enkungaana mu bukyamu bwe baali bawakanya okukwatibwa kwa bobi wine nomubaka zaakebaabadde mu kkooti ya buganda roadabavubuka abaakwatibwa mu
