gulumebano bazziddwa mu kkomera oluvannyuma lwomulamuzi akola ku musango gwabwe obutabeerawo mu kkooti kuwulira kusaba kwabwe okwokweyimirirwaomulamuzi robert  mukanza owa kkooti ya buganda road  akola ku musango gwabwe yali yabasuubizza okuwulira okusaba kwabwe okwokweyimirira wabula teyalabiseeko mu kkooti olwo omulamuzi esther nahirya nalagira bazzibwe e luzira okutuusa nga september 18 lwe banaakomezebwawo mu kkootibano be bamu ku bavubuka abaakwatibwa nga august 13 mu kwekalakaasa okwali mu bitundu bya kampala ebyenjawulo ne baggulwako omusango gwokukuba enkungaana mu bukyamu ssaako okukuma mu bantu omuliroemisango gyonna baagyegaana bwe batyo ne basindikibwa e luzira ngoludda oluwaabi bwe lumaliriza okunoonyereza kwalwo           omuserikale sebaggala ngayogera mu lukiikomu katono ku kkono ye naggujja ate ku ddyo ye  namuyombapoliisi ye kasangati eyitiddwa bukubirire okutaasa nnyazaala ayiiridde muka mwana kaamulali mu mbugo ngamuteebereza okumwagalira musajja webino bibadde ku kyalo nkolempomye e kasozi mu ggombolola ye busukuma mu munisipaali ye nansana abatuuze bwe balumbye amaka ga babirye naggujja agambibwa okuyiwa tampeko ya kaamulali mu mbugo za moureen namuyomba gwateebereza okumwagalira bba shafik mukasa  ngono baamusangirizza waka nga baagala bamwekolereko kyokka bwalabye abatuuze ne yeesibira mu nnyumbakino kibanyiizizza be baagala okukoona ennyumba ye nga wano poliisi wetuukidde nebakkakkanyanamuyomba yagambye nti nagujja yamuyita bulungi awaka  kyokka bwe yagendayo namulwanyisa ne muwala we okukkakkana ngamuyiye tampeko ya kaamulali mu bitundu bye ebyekyama era na kati alumizibwa ngabatuuze bagala ave ku kyaloomukwanaganya wa poliisi nomuntu waabulijjo ku poliisi e kasangati sulayiman sebaggala yasabye abatuuze nti bwe baba baagala okumugoba ku kyalo balina kusooka kuwandiika bbaluwa ngeriko emikono gyabatuuze abeemulugunya           ebimu ku bintu ku mmotoka bisaso mu kafaananyi akatono wansi byagamba nti byabbiddwa lunkuse mu kafaananyi akatono waggulu omusajja atutte mukazi we owoolubuto ku poliisi ngamuvunaana kumubba bintu bya mu nju omukazi namulangira okumugattika ne ssenga wedeo bisaso 32 makanika wemmotoka e mayembegambogo mu kabuga ke mpigi yatutte mukazi we abadde yanobye joan lunkuse ku poliisi ye mpigi ngamuvunaana okumubba ebintu byomu nnyumba byonna gattako okumusiba olubuto lwagamba nti si lulwebisaso okukwata mukazi we ono gwabadde amaze naye emyaka mukaaga kiddiridde lunkuse okunoba nasiba ebintu byomu nnyumba okuli entebe ekitanda emifaliso ebiri firiigi nebirala nabikweka mu muzigo gwe yapangisizza wabula namulinnya akagere natwalayo poliisi ne babitikka ku mmotoka ne mukazi we owoolubuto olukuze namutwala ku poliisi namuggulako emisango gyokubba ebintu nakakadde kensimbiwabula wabaddewo katemba lunkuse bwatuuse ku poliisi nalangira bba bisaso okukukuta nomukazi gwayita ssenga we kumbe mukazi we nga kino kye kyabawalirizza okunobalunkuse ategeezezza poliisi nti bisaso abadde aleeta omukazi ono gwayita ssenga mu maka gaabwe ne bamujooga okutuusa lwe yabategedde nti muganzi we nasalawo okubaviira beeyagale bulungiayongerako nti omukazi ono yasooka kubeera nga muwabuzi wa bufumbo bwabwe nga bisaso amuyita ssenga kyokka oluvannyuma natandika okuwabya bisaso ngamugamba ngolubuto bwe lutali lulwe era bisaso natandika okuyomba nekigendererwa kyokumugoba mu makapoliisi ye mpigi etegeezezza nti bisaso yasooka kwekubira nduulu nti lunkuse yamubbye akakadde kensimbi kyokka nazimuddiza era ne bamuwa amagezi okutabagana bwe kiba kibalemye bagende mu kkooti           zauja namusisi nomwana we ku poliisiabafumbo zawuja namusisi ne richard ssejjombwe baayombedde ku poliisi ya cps ngentabwe eva ku mwana waabwe gideon kyeyune 9 okubula ngava ewa kitaawe e kalagala luweero kyokka nasuulibwa e mpereerwe ku luguudo lwe gayaza ngeno omuvuzi wa bodaboda gye yamuggye namuleeta ku poliisi ya cps mu kampalapoliisi yanoonyerezza nezuula bazadde bomwana nebayita mu ofiisi yamaka nabaana eno zauja gyalumiririzza bba okumusaba omwana we kyokka nga yabadde ayagala kumusaddaaka naye ne bimusala olwokwanguwa naloopa ku poliisi nga ssejjombwe we yatiiridde nalagira abantu abaaleese omwana we ne bamusuula e mpereerwezauja era alumiriza ssejjombwe okubeera namasabo ngera alina nabaana abalala be yasaddaakaomwana ye bwabuuziddwa agambye nti waliwo mukwano gwa kitaawe eyajja nemmotoka namugamba nti alinnye amutwale ewa kitaawe kyokka bwe baatuuka gyatamanyi naggula emmotoka olwo ye omwana namuyita mu nkwawa naddukakitaawe womwana ono yeegaanyi byonna ebimwogerwako mukyala we nti bino byonna byakumwonoonera linnya kubanga ye tasobola kusaddaaka mwana weomwogezi wa poliisi mu kampala nemiriraano luke owoyesigyire annyonnyodde engeri gye baafunyeemu omwana ono era nategeeza nti omwana addiziddwa nnyina nga nokunoonyereza ku ngeri omwana ono gye yatuuseemu e mpereerwe bwe kugenda mu maaso           minisita omubeezi okuva e mmengo joseph kawuki ngali nabakungu okuva e mmengo nga bali mu kifananyi ne bamulekwa bomugenzi vicent sseruganya e bukalagi gomba nga september 42018 e bukalagi gombabino biri mu bubaka obwokusaasira obwamuwandiikiddwa omuwandiisi we owekyama peter mpanga nga august 30 2018 okutuusibwa ku ba amire yomugenzi vicent sserungaya eyattibwa nga august 232018 e bukalagi gomba abantu bwe beekalakaasa olwa kye baayita okutyoboola eddembe lyomubaka wa kyadondo east robert kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga bobi wine ngera nzaalwa ye gombaeri abenju ya vicent sserungaya e bukalagigombabannaffe ssabasajja kabaka yanyolwa byansusso oluvannyuma lwokufuna amawulire gokuttibwa kwa vicent sserungaya atalina musango gwazzizzaekikolwa kino ekyobukambwe kyennyamiza era kivumirirwakisaanidde abakuumaddembe banoonyereze abaali mu bukambwe buno batwalibwe mu mbuga zamateeka okukolebwako nga bwe kisanidde obubaka obwasomeddwa minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu joseph kawuki bwe bwasomye nga bwatuusiddwa nga september 4 2018 ku lwokubiriku lulwe kawuki yagambye nti obwakabaka buli mu kunyolwa kubanga abangi ku bantu abafudde mu kwekalakasa kuno bali mu buganda wadde nga tebwagala bigende mu bitundu ebirala wabula busaba abali mu buyinza okukendeeza ku lyanyi erikozesebwa mu kukakkanya obwegugungombakubiriza okukuza abaana nga mubalaga ekifaananyi ekituufu bwe munaabakuza obulungi mwe bakolera           ekigere kyomubaka nambooze  mu kafaananyi akatono kye baalongoosezzaembeera yomubaka wa mukono munisipaali  betty nambooze bakireke eyongedde okusajjuka oluvannyuma lwekigere okubakulaakulanya nabawa amagezi okwenyigira mu bulimi nobulunzissempijja bino yabyogeredde mu lukungaana lwa bassentebe bebyalo bya disitulikiti ye mpigi olwokubabangula mu bulimi nobulunzi beekulakulanyeokulondebwa ku bwa ssentebe bwekyalo buweereza na buvunaanyizibwa temulina kukitwala nga kyangu era mulina okutandikawo ebyokukola bye muggyamu ssente ezibayimirizaawo okusinga mukoloomutaka wekika kyengo muteesaasira keeya tendo namuyimba ii yennyamidde olwabakuumaddembe abaatulugunya ababaka nga kwotadde ne bannamawulire kyokka nga ate omulimu gwabwe gumanyiddwa gwa kukuuma bantu nebintu byabwebino yabyogeredde ku mukolo gwokutuuza  nokusumika omukulu womutuba gwa kiwedde mu kika kyengo  oluvannyuma lwokumala emyaka 12 nga tegulina agukuliraomukolo gwabadde ku kyalo mpongo mu butambala ku lwomukaaga lwa wiiki eweddemuteesaasira yakubirizza abazadde okuyigiriza abaana baabwe ennimi enzaaliranwa beewale okubabuzaabuza nga kino kyakuyamba okuzza buganda ku ntikkoono era yabakubirizza okwagala ennyo obulamu bwabwe okwegemesa endwadde singa ebiragiro bibeera biweereddwa gavumenti nokusimbanga emiti egyekijjukizo           ssentebe wa fdc wasswa biriggwa kkono pulezidenti wekibiina patrick amuriat nomumyuka wa ssabawandiisi harold kaija nga bali mu lukungana lwa bannamawulire e najjanankumbifdc esabye pulezidenti museveni akkirize okuteeseganya nebibiina ebimuvuganya ku mbeera eriwo mu ggwanga  kiyambe uganda  obutaddamu kuyiwa musaayi olwokusika omuguwa kwebyobufuzi  nobusungu obweyongera mu bantu buli lukyafdc eyagala enteeseganya zino ziveemu okukolebwa kwa konsityusoni empya ekkiriziganyizibwako enjuyi zonna nempenda zitemebwe  okulaba ngeggwanga likyusa obukulembeze mu mirembe nerabula nti awatali kino nokulonda kwa 2021 abamu kwe batunuulidde temugenda kuva kalungissentebe wekibiina kino omulongo wasswa biriggwa eyabadde nabakungu baakyo okwabadde pulezidenti patrick amuriat nomumyuka wa ssaabawandiisi harold kaija bino baabitegeezezza bannamawulire e najjankumbi ku lwe ntebeamuriat mu ngeri yeemu yagambye nti okuteebwa kwa bobi wine ne banne abakwatibwa olwobuvuyo obwali mu arua tekigenda kuggya bannakibiina kino 72018bino yabyogedde awerekeddeko abatuuze mu ggombolola mutuba i mpigi abazze e bulange mmengo ku lwokuna june 72018 bwebabadde baleese amakula ga kabaka naagamba nti ekiseera kyabaserikale okukola nabekika kyengonge okuziika omutaka herbert muwanga ssebyoto kisolo eyalina okuziikibwa ku lwomukaaga oluwedde kyokka nataziikibwa olwobutakkaanya ku ani alina okudda mu ntebe yobwakisolomu lukiiko olwatuuziddwa akawungeezi ka mmande may 28 2018 nga lukubirizibwa omukubiriza waalwo omutaka kayiira gajuule fredrick kasibante iv lwakkiriziganyizza okuteeka ekiraamo kyomugenzi mu nkola owessiga lutaaya copriano kivumbi ne katikkiro wekika kyengonge joseph kitandwe ne kazinazina hassan musoke kaboggoza okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bwokukulemberamu anadda mu bigere bya kisolo okumwanjula eri katikkiro wa buganda ku lwokubiri leero nga may 292018 ku ssaawa mwenda ezolwegguloekirala ekyakkiriziganyiziddwako kwe kutereka omubiri gwomugenzi ku butaka e bwezza busujju ku lwokusatu may 302018 ku ssaawa 9kayiira gajuule ategeezezza bukedde nti basazeewo abamasiga wamu ne katikkiro wekika banyweze obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obwokulambika azze mu bwa kisoloolukiiko lusabye owessiga lutaaya okubeera omukuza omukulu eri omutaka mu kumulambika ku ntambuza yemirimu gyekika kayiira gajuule nga mu kiseera kye kimu ye mukulu wekika kyembogo bwe yategezezza ku byasaliddwawo           omubiri gwomutaka kisolo herbert muwanga nga guli mu luggya lwobutaka bwekika kyeonge e bwezzabusujjuomubiri gwe gwaggyiddwa ku butaka bwekika kyeonge ne guzzibwa e kampala gye gukuumirwaentabwe yavudde ku butakkaanya obwabaluseewo nga waliwo abekika abakalambidde ku kyokuteeka mu nkola ekiraamo kyomutaka ono nga mutabani we matayo kaboggoza yalina okumuddira mu bigere kyokka ate ngabamu ku bo baagala muganda womugenzi ayitibwa lutaaya yaba adda ku bukulu bwa kisolo omukulu wekika kyeongeensonga eno yagulumbizizza abataka abenjawulo abaabadde ku mukolo guno enkiiko ne zifuuka enkiiko ssaako nobukkukuulu okulaba ngensonga eno egonjoolwaessaawa zaweze 800 ezaabadde zirina okuziikirwako nga tewannaba kabonero kalaga nti okuziika kunaabaawooluvanyuma minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengo joseph kawuki nga ye yakiikiridde obwakabaka yatuuse nagenda mu lukiiko ne bakatikkiro bebika abalala abaabaddewo ssaako nobukulembeze bwekika okumulungula ensongaku ssaawa 825 omulabirizi wa central buganda micheal lubowa yatuuse nayingizibwa mu nju nategeezebwa ku mbeera eriwo kyokka ne balemererwa okukkaanya ku kyokuziika omutakabp lubowa yakulembeddemu okusaba nga mu kubuulira kwe yasabye abantu okukolanga ebiraamo kyokka nabo ababirekeddwa beewale okubikyusaabataka mwenna musse ekitiibwa mu kiraamonze abagamba nze mulabirizi wammwe abayamba okuluamya ensonga era ekkanisa nennono tolina wobyawulira kubanga ekkanisa eyo ne yesu kristo yalina ennono kye yava ayita mu bayudaaya naye obulombolombo obwali obukyamu nabudibya naleeta obupya bp lubowa bwe yategeezezzaebigambo era byavudde mu mbeera eyabaddewo ngabamu ku bawakanya bagamba nti omutaka yabadde alina kuziikibwa ngomuntu owaabulijjo kuba waliwo ababadde tebamulaba nga kisolo ngate oludda olulala lugamba nti ono abadde kisolo ngebbanga lyonna tewali avuddeyo kumuwakanyamu ngeri yemu omukubiriza wolukiiko lwabataka abakulu bobusolya kayiira gajuule fredrick kasibante yabadde asindikidde abeonge ebbaluwa ebalambika okuziika herbert muwanga mu bitiibwa ebituufu nga kisolo nga mu kino balina okumukolako obulombolombo okuli okukkiriza omusika we okumubikka akabugo nga kino kitegeeza nti yazze mu bukulu bwekikaekirala yabasabye bwe baba tebamuziikira mu mbeera eyo okuziika kuyimirizibwe okutuusa ensonga lwe zinaagonjoolwaoludda oluwakanya lukulemberwamu lutaaya kibandwaenkiiko nokwebuuza byabaddewo eggulo era nolunaku lwaleero mmande endala zisuubirwa okugenda mu maaso           minisita omubeezi owebyobuwangwa e mmengo yusuf wamala ggaganga ngakwasa abeggombolola mutuba ii mukuma katikamu abakulembeddwamu edmond sserunkuma ekifananyi kya kabaka oluvanyuma lwokusinga amagombolola amalala agaaleese e mmengo oluwaloomukolo gwabaddewo ku lwokubiri may 152018 e bulange mmengobino byanjuddwa minisita omubeezi owebyobuwangwa yusuf wamala ggaganga bweyabadde akkikiridde katikkiro charles peter mayiga ku mukolo abatuuze okuva mu maggombolola okuli ssabawaali kalagala mutuba ii katikamu zirobwe wamu ne bamunanika mu ssaza lye bulemeezi nga bakulembeddwamu omumyuka wa kangaawo charles ssegujja kwebaletedde embuga oluwalo lwaabwe e bulange mmengo ku lwokubiri may 15 2018obwakabaka bulina enteekateeka eyokukola pulani eyebitawulizi mu bwakabaka bwa buganda era nga bifanaganira ddala nga bwolaba embuga zamasazanjagala okwebaza eggombolola ye katikamu etulaze nti nayo erina kyetandiseewo ebitawulizi era mbasaba mukwatagane nekitongole kya gavumenti ezebitundu okulambikibwa ku nsonga eno minisita ggaganga bweyategezezzaggaganga yayongedde naasaba abaami ba kabaka ku mitendera gyonna okuwereeza nobwesimbu ate baleme kutunda bintu bya kabaka ngomumyuka woweggombolola ye zirobweronald ssenyonjo bweyakola neyekobaana nabaali mu gavumenti eyawakati okutwala ettaka lyeggombololassegujja yasabye mmengo ebayambe efune bannamateeka okugenda mu bitundu byebyalo okubangula abantu ku mateeka nokuwolereza abo abagagga bebatwalako ettaka lyaabwessabawaali kalagala george kaleebu yategezezza nti ensonga zettaka mu kitundu kye zetaaga obwakabaka okuyimukkiramu okujja okuzigonjoola naddala erisangibwa mu muluka gwe degeyaeggombolola lyaleese oluwalo lwa nsimbi 2117000abe katikamu nga bakulembeddwamu oweggombolola mukuma edmond sserunkuma baleese 2700000 bamunanika 2190000 ate zirobwe 1551000 ngabamu ku basinze okusonda kuliko sao zirobwe nga bawaddeyo 400000 nga bakikiriddwa fred kalyowa hajj sulaiman magala 100000 nabalala ngabyizi ba kayindu ss bebamu ku basanyusizza abantu          katikkiro charles peter mayigangakutte ddamulaobwakatikkiro bwa mayiga bwatandika nga may 12 2013 ngadda mu bigere bya yingjb walusimbi kyokka ssaabasajja kabaka yamukwasa ddamula mu butongole nga may 29 2013mu kwogera kwe okwasookera ddala mu lukiiko lwa buganda nga june 14 2013 yasengeka ensonga ssemansonga ezokutandikirako okukuuma nnamulondo okugabana obuyinza ne gavumenti eya wakati mu nkola eya federo okununula ettaka nensalo za buganda yonna gye ziyitira okukunga abantu okukola obutaweera nokuzzaawo obumumu ssemasonga zino mayiga mwe yaggya emirimu gye yeetuma okukolako mu bwangu okuli okuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi nage wamala okutereeza enzirukanya yemirimu okumaliriza ekizimbe ekiri mu luggya lwa bulange ensimbi buganda zebanja gavumenti eya wakati okukola ku bakulembeze abensikirano abekimpatiira nenteeseganya ku byaffe ngayita mu nkola ezenjawulo okuliettoffaali oluwalo okukiika embuga mayiga akumyekumye abantu ba buganda okwenyigira mu kuvujjirira emirimu gyobwakabaka nga batoola ssenteekimu ku bivudde mu kino zensimbi ezisukka mu buwumbi obutaano ze baasonda okumaliriza ekizimbe masengere kati ekikolebwa emirimu egyenjawulomayiga afudde ofiisi yobwakatikkiro bwa buganda essibwamu ekitiibwa mu buganda ne uganda yonnayenna aligiddamu alina okwesiba ebbiri kuba mu bintu bingi ajja kuba agerageranyizibwa ku mayigaebirala bingi abikoze kyokka mu kusoomoozebwa okutali kumu naddala bwe kituuka ku kumaliriza amasiro ge kasubi ngabamusojja bagamba nti yasanga omulimu guno gusondeddwaako ensimbi bwatyo nasuubiza okugumaliriza mu 2014abantu baasonda ensimbi zettofaali nga zino zaakozesebwa okuzimba bbugwe ku masiro enju muzibuazaalampanga omugalamidde bassekabaka we gwatuukira 2016 nga yeetaaga ensimbi obuwumbi bubiri nekitundu okumalirizagavumenti ye yalina okuwaayo ensimbi zino kyokka tezibawanga ngabakungu mu minisitule yebyobulambuzi beekwasa obusongasonga ne batuuka nokugamba mbu basooke babalage ensaasaanya yensimbi zettofaali ku mulimu guno bwe yalingayogerako ne bukedde gye buvuddeko omwogezi wobwakabaka noah kiyimba yagamba ntibannaffe abo beekwasa bwekwasa kubanga ensaasaanya twagibawa ate ekirala omulimu gwamasiro mu kusooka nsonga zabalangiraabolulyo olulangira balowooza nti tebalabiriddwa bulungi ensonga ebobbya katikkiro omutwe era abamu omusango ne bagussa ku mayiga kyokka ate abantu be bamu be bagamba nti katikkiro okusalawo ku bikolebwa okutwala buganda mu maasokyapa mu ngalo efuna okuwakanyizibwakyapa mu ngalo nkola mayiga gye yaleeta okutaasa ettaka lya buganda yafunamu okuwakanyizibwa ngabantu batya enkola ya liizi eyemyaka 49israel mayengo eyaliko minisita mu ofiisi ya katikkiro wa buganda agamba nti enkola yokutunda ettaka lya buganda mu nkola ya liizi yeetaaga okwongera okukubamu ttooci obutaleka bantu ba buganda nga momboozeebitongole okuli bucadef bicul nnamulondo investments ltd wamu nebirala bizziddwaamu amaanyi kyokka ate waliwo ebirala nga k2 kkampuni yobwakabaka eyamasimu ngeno mu ngono yagenyiwaddeko mu lubiri e mmengo ku lwokusatu april 252018mu kukulembera abantu baayo girimaani ekozesa enkola eya federo ngeno gye bettanira era ekulaakulanyizza eggwanga  nga bwe yali ekoze kwebufiiramu kwogera kwe dr albrecht yategezezza omutanda nti ekyamututte okugenyiwalako mu twekobe yayagadde okumanya ebyafaayo byobwakabaka ebingi nga bwe bumu ku bwakabaka obukyasigaddewo mu nsi yonna ate nga buganziomubaka yeewunyizza engeri obwakabaka gye buyinzizza okuyimirirawo nga tebulina nfuga ya federo nga kati bugenda na kujjaguza emyaka 25 bukya kabaka atuuzibwa ku nnamulondo embuga nga february 152018 okwongera okunyweza enkolagana yebitundu byombi          denis bugaya daniel ssenyomo bannamateeka ba buganda land board ne kiwalabye male agikulira mu lukiiko olwabadde e kigaya okwogera nabatuuze be golomoloaba buganda land board blb bagumizza abatuuze be golomolo minisita webyamazzi ronald kibuule bagobaganya ku ttaka okuba abakkakkamu kuba teri agenda kubaggyawoakulira blb kiwalabye male era asabye omuduumizi wa poliisi martin okoth ochola okuddamu okunoonyereza ku fayiro yomuntu eyattibwa nabaamutta bakwatibweeggulo kiwalabye male ngali ne ttiimu yabakozi mu blb kitongole kyebyettaka e mmengo okwabadde ne bannamateeka baatuuzizza olukiiko ku mwalo e golomolo mu ggombolola ye najja ssaabawaali mu disitulikiti ye buikwe okubannyonnyola ku nsonga ezikwata ku ttaka kwe baliabatuuze baasoose kusomesebwa ebikwatagana ku ttaka lyobwakabaka nengeri omuntu gyasobola okuligula oba okufunako ekibanjanabo baabuulidde aba blb ebizibu bye basangadaniel ssenyomo omu ku bannamateeka ba blb yategeezezza abatuuze nti ettaka kwe bali ligwa mu ofiisi ya namasole nagamba nti gavumenti ya obote bwe yaggyawo obwakabaka gavumenti ettaka yalyeddiza naye gavumenti ya museveni bwe yakomyawo obwakabaka ettaka lyonna lyaddayo mu mikono gya mmengo era kati ttaka lya bwakabakayagasseeko nti engeri gye liri nti ttaka lya bwakabaka ngate aba blb be bavunaanyizibwa ku ttaka lyobwakabaka lyonna mu buganda tebafunangako muntu yenna yali abatuukiridde ngayagala kuligulanga blb bakimanyi nti liriko baabibanjamargaret nandese yagambye nti minisita kibuule aludde ngabagobaganya ekyavaako ne munnaabwe dickson wasswa okuttibwa abaserikale abagambibwa nti bakuumi ba kibuuleyattibwa nga august 8 2017 ngagezaako okulwanirira ettaka lyeokusinziira ku kibuule ettaka lino yaligula ku musa kateregga era nebyapa byalyo abirina kyokka kiwalabye male yabategeezezza nti ebyapa kibuule byalina bifu kubanga ebituufu yabirina male mu ofiisi yeabatuuze baategeezezza nti waliwo emmotoka enjeru eyita mu kyalo ngerimu abantu be batategeera ekibaleetedde okubeera mu kutya nti bandiddamu okubatigomyaabali mu kutya kuliko ne ssentebe wekyalo james bbanda eyategeezezza nti atambulira ku kakalu ka kkootiagamba nti yaakakwatibwa enfunda bbiri ku ttaka linoogwasooka baamukwata july 31 2017 ne bamusiba mu kkomera e lugazi okumala kalambakiwalabye male yabagambye nti babeere bagumu emmotoka yaddembe okuyita mu kkubo wabula abagirimu tebalina lukusa ku ttaka lyabweono yabasomedde nekiwandiiko ekyava mu minisitule yebyettaka lyayoyayongedde nti ekizibu kyettaka si kuggyawo mayiro era bwe muba mulowooza mayiro yereese obuzibu kano mu kagudde kubanga tewali bujulizi ku kino nabantu bagyagala nnyoettaka lya mayiro lya njawulo era lyannyikira mu ngeri gye tutambuzaamu ensonga zettaka mu buganda lwaki ne amin bwe yawera obwakabaka mu 1975 ministule yebyettaka yasigala ekyagaba ebyapa bya mayiro era nga bikkirizibwa mu mateekakati bwogamba nti wasigalewo ttaka lya nsikirano customary erya liizi neryobwannannyini freehold naye erya mayiro liwerebwe oba ligattibwe mu nkola zino essatu mu kifo kya mayiro waakiri liyitibwe mayiro eyensikirano oba mayiro ya liizi ogenda kuba oleese enkola empya etemanyiddwa mu buganda ne mu mateeka era kiba kitegeeza nti namateeka galina okukyukamayiga yabuuzizza nti singa mayiro eggyibwawo kiki ekiddako eri abo abalina ebyapa bya mayiroyajjukizza nti bwotunuulira endagaano ya 1900 eyagabanya ettaka kabaka wa buganda ye yekka akyalina ebyapa mu mannya ge abalala baagenda babikyusanti kati bwoggyawo ebyapa bya mayiro kaba ngakakodyo kokuggyako buganda ettaka ate nga mu uganda yonna buganda yerina ettaka abantu lye basinga okwettanira olwebbeeyi yaalyoyalabudde nti nekiteeso kya gavumenti okuggyako abantu ettaka lyabwe ne basasulwa oluvannyuma buganda tekkiriziganya nakyo kubanga nako kakodyo okunyigiriza buganda erina ettaka eriri ku kataleyagambye ensonga enkulu erina okukolebwa yaakutumbula nkola ya kyapa mu ngalo ku buli muntu abeere ku ttaka nga mugumu nti alina ekiwandiiko ekikakasa obwannannyininaye ensonga yokuggyawo mayiro egenda kwongera kuleeta buzibu mu kifo kyokubumalawobwe muba mugamba nti ettaka lya mayiro lye liremesezza ebibuga okukulaakulana kino mbasekeredde kubanga ebizimbe ebyamaanyi omuli amalwaliro amasomero nenguudo byakolebwa wakati wa 1940 1970 nga mayiro weeri naye lwaki abakulembeze mu biseera ebyo baasobola okubikulaakulanyaebimu ku bizibu uganda bye tutubiddemu ku ttaka kwe kudibya etteeka lya buganda erya bbusuulu and nvujjo lawedda omuntu bwe yaweebwanga ekibanja ngawa obusuulu nenvujjookugeza bwaba ku kibanja alimirako mmwaanyi nga buli lwakungula alina okuwa omutongole emmwaanyi ezigya mu bunene bwekibanja era nga zino zituuka newa kabakanaye kati nnannyini ttaka talina ngeri gyafuna mu muntu alina yiika zemmwaanyi ku ttaka lye yensonga lwaki afuna omugagga alina emmundu namutunza ettaka ye nabeegoberakoyasabye gavumenti efube okutereeza enkwata ya ssente za land fund egende ngegula bannannyini ttaka abasenze bafune obuweerero era bawandiisibwe bafune ebyapa era efube okulaba ngamateeka ge yateekawo naddala ku ttaka gateekebwa mu nkola era gagonderwayasabye buli kitundu kiweebwe omukisa okwekolera ku nsonga zaakyo ezettaka kubanga be bamanyi obuwonvu nobukko bwazo           ssaabasajja kabaka mutebi atudde ngafukamidde naboolugandaokujaguza amazaalibwa ga kabaka obulamu bwe mu bifaananyiabantu baleese amakula mu bungi okuli ente embuzi enkoko amatooke ebyomu maduuka nebirala bingilaba ekiri e villa maria mu bifaananyi           ssaabasajja ne pulezidenti museveni mu kulambula ekkuumiro lyebisolo erya lake mburo national park mu 1994emabega wa kabaka ye wasswa birigwa ne rev dan kajumbaebbanga eryo kabaka yali alimaze bungereza gye yatwalibwa nga muto okusomaebbanga lye yamala e bungereza ngafuuwa lungereza era nga yeeyisa kizungu okutuukana nembeera gye yali abeeramuwabula obwangu bwe yakozesa okukyusa okuva mu mbeera yabazungu gye yali akuliddemu ate okudda mu ye buganda bwoleka engeri gye yatendekebwamu okwahhanga obulamu bwensi mu mbeera zonnaomulongo wasswa birigwa yagambye nti okubeera kwa kabaka e nairobi nga tannakomawo butereevu wano mu uganda kwamuyamba okumuteekateeka okugya mu mbeera ngakomyewo ku butakae nairobi waabeerangawo abantu bangi okuli nabakulembeze bennono okwali omugabe wa ankole john barigye owa tooro patrick olimi era abasatu bano wayinzanga okubasanga nga banyumya ku nsonga yokutebenkeza ensi yaabweokutuuka wano abaweereza be baasooka kunoonya wayinza okubeera ne bafuna amaka ga patrick kiwanuka omu ku bantu be abaawagira ennyo emirimu gyobugandakino kyawa ssaabataka yeewuunyisa omuntu amaze emyaka emingi e bungereza gye yagenda nga mwana mutongolungereza lwe lulimi lwayogera okuba nga yali amanyi olugandaobubaka bwe nga bubeera bumpimpi naye nga bujjudde amakuluekimu ku birina okusimbwako essira kati kwe kusaba abantu baffe bonna abali emitala wamayanja okukomyawo kuno abaana baabwe bakolere kuno emirimuabo abatakisobola babeere nga basobola okukomangawo buli kiseera kigereabamu baagenda mu myaka gya 1950 abalala 1960mpozzi mmengo nga gavumenti yaffe esobola okufunayo ebifo mweteeka emirimu egyenjawulo egisobola okukolebwa bannaffe abo okusimba emmere           kabaka ngabuuza ku kabushenga gye buvuddekookusiima kwa kabaka kuno akuyisizza mu katikkiro charles peter mayiga ngono obubaka abutuusizza okuyita mu lukiiko lwamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e bulange mmengo ku lwokusatu ku makya nagamba nti obungi bwabantu abeetabye mu misinde bwamusanyusizza nga kino kyavudde ku nteekateeka eyabadde ennungi ssaabasajja kabaka antumye nteekateeka eyabadde ennungi era andagidde nkusikeko mu mukono mayiga bwe yatuusizza obubaka bwa kabakamu balala kabaka beyebazizza era  katikkiro beyakuteko mu ngalo ye kkampuni ya airtel misinde gyamazalaibwa ga kabaka egyabaddewo ku ssande april 8 2018 nga bano babadde mu lubiri e mmengo mu kibuga masaka e jinja mu busoga s aako ne south africa ngomubaka wa kabaka e bungereza ronald yabyogeredde ku mukolo  kweyakwasiriddwa emmotoka nissan ubb 123n ngebalirirwamu obukadde obusukka 150 okuva mu kkampuni yemmotoka eya motorcare ngeno bagiwaddeyo yeyambisibwe abayizi ba yunivasite      omuzaana nankya ngabuuza ku nnaabagerekamu katono yomubejja sarah mazzi ndagire eyabattiziddwaomulangira wasajja ye muto wa kabaka ronald mutebi ii ate nankya muwala weyali omubaka wa bukoto south mu palamenti omugenzi mathias nsubugabaagattibwa ssaabasumba wa kampala dr cyprian kizito lwanga mu lutikko e lubaga mu january 2014 era okuva olwo katonda yaakabawa abaana babiri okuli omulangira edward mbogo nomumbejja sarah mazzi ndagireomukolo ogwokubatiza gwetabiddwaako nnaabagereka sylvia nagginda abalangira nabambejjajohn wynand katende mu lusirika foyer de charite kyoto e namugongo ku lwomukaagaolusirika luli wakati wekiggwa kyabakatoliki nabakrisitaayo ngabantu ne bannaddiini bagendayo okwezza obuggya mu byomwoyoomubejja mazzi omulangira wassajja nomuzaana nankya be baasoose okutuuka ku ssaawa 830 ezolweggulo oluvannyuma ne nnaabagereka sylvia nagginda naye natuuka nayanirizibwa msgrkatende akulira ekifo kino ate era ye mwogezi wessaza lya kampalammisa nga tennatandika nabagereka yasoose kusala kaguwa okutongoza oluguudo olwakubiddwa kkolaasi okuva ku kkubo okukkirira mu lusirika nga lwatuumiddwa kabaka ronald mutebi driveera nnaabagereka yasimbye omuti gwomuyembe oluvannyuma mmisa netandikaomukolo guno gwabadde gwa bantu ba munda nga gwetabiddwaako abambejja nabalangira abooluganda lwomuzaana nga ne nnyina jolly kawaya nsubuga naye yabatirizza mutabani we francis nsubugaomubejja maria sylvia kibaya ye yabadde omuyima womumbejjakatende yategeezezza nti omumbejja erinnya eryamuweebwa bajjajjaabe erya sarah likakasiddwa mu klezia mmengo era amagezi ge yatuwa gakyatugasamu lubiri e banda yassaayo ekigangoabadde nenjogera egamba nti buli kyokola kola mangu era wano abadde atusoomooza okukola buli kimu mu bwanguomwoyo gwe katonda aguwe ekiwummulo ekyemirembe ate makubuya ku lulwe yagambye twebaza maama ruth nkoyoyo ne famire nabantu abalala abatukwatiddeko okujjanjaba omugenziabadde musajja wa mugaso eri buganda ne ugandaku lwange nfiiriddwa mukwano gwange kuba tubadde nenkolagana eteri yaabulijjoomugenzi abadde ayagala nnyo katonda we kabaka we nekika kye           omutaka nsejjere mugwanya mugemaakulira ekika kyenkima akutte akazindaalo ngayogera eri bazzukkulu be abazze mu ttabamiruka 2017 owekika kino nga january 62018ate amuddiridde okuva ku ye micheal mugadya sserubidde katikkiro wekikaate ku kkono ye ssabaganzi ssalongo ssekitooleko era akolanga omumyuk asooka owa katikkiro wekika kinobino yabyogeredde mu ttabamiruka wekika kino eyabadde e kawaala mu ggombolola ye lubaga kyaddondo ku lwomukaaga january 6 2018 ngabeddira enkima bonna bawaddeyo akadde akokusirikirira okussa ekitiibwa mu mugenzi abadde ava mu ssiga lya mmande e kabembe kyaggwenkoyooyo okuggyako okubeera ne kkoola mu bulago naye abadde ayagala nnyo ekika kye era nga wonna womutuukirako nga nsonga yekika abadde afaayoabadde afaayo okulaba ngensonga zowessiga mmande mwava nga zitereeraffenna abasigaddewo tusabe tubeere nga tufuna ekyokulabirako naddala bannaddiini kubanga abamu ekika kibawunyira ziizi omutaka nsejjere mugema bwe yatendereza omugenzimugema yakunze abazzukulu okwongera okwewaayo okulaba nga bamaliriza ofiisi yaabwe ezimbibwa mu kifo kino nga yasalawo nawa ekika ekitundu ku ttaka lye e kawaala okuzimbamu ofiisiyalagidde nabaamasiga buli omu okuwandiika amannya agatuumibwa mu ssiga lye kiyambe abazzukulu okutuuma amannya ge gamu ekintu ekitta amannya agatatuumwamicheal mugadya sserubidde nga ye katikkiro wekika kino yasabye bazzukkulu banne okuwaayo ensimbi ezitambuza emirimu okutambuza emirimuekirala twagala mwenna mwenyigire mu bunaanyizibwa bwekika ku bukiiko obwenjawulo era abo abanaabeera bataweereza bulungi baakukyusibwa mugadya bwe yagambyeminisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengo joseph kawuki yayogedde eri abantu nabakubiriza okwenyigira mu mirimu gyekika okugula emigabo mu sacco yekika okuwagira ebyemizannyo mu kika saako nokutwalanga abaana ku mikolo bwegitiomukolo guno gwetabiddwako baminisita ba kabaka okuli christine mugerwa kasule ssabaganzi kojja wa kabaka omukulu ssalongo emmanuel ssekitooleko eyaliko omubaka we nakaseke mu palamenti mukolokabaka ronald muwenda mutebi asinzidde ku mukolo kwe yasisinkanidde abaganda ababeera ebweru wa buganda nagamba nti ekiseera kituuse abantu be bavuganye ku bifo byonna ebyobukulembeze mu ugandakabaka yagambye nti ekiseera kino buganda eri mu kusoomoozebwa mu byenfuna nebyobufuzi nga kyetaagisa okuba abanywevu era abavumuekimu ku bitukosa nokutuzza emabega kwe kulekera abalala ltd bicul ne buganda twezimbe biri mu kulaba engeri pulojekiti eno gyejja okukolebwamu pulojekiti ye kigo obwakabaka bwawaayo ettaka kkampuni yabachina eya gouji group u ltd ngekulirwa henan gouji group e china neteekamu ensimbi ezizimba enju zinoakulira bicul roland ssebuwufu yategeezezza nti enju zino ezizimbiddwa zitundibwa wakati wa ddoola 20000 ne 25000  eza uganda 72000000 nokusingawo natoolonatoolo 96 yategeezezza bannamawulire mu lubiri lwe e lukuli  lusaka mu munisipaali ye makindye nti lino ettaka lirye lya bwannannyini era lyamuweebwa evelyne kulabako maama wa ssekabaka daudi chwaettaka lino lisangibwa koko kigaya mu ggombolola ye najja mu disitulikiti ye buikwe nga liwezaako mayiro ezisukka mu ssatu nga baalimpa mu 1938 nga sinnafuuka namasolenolwekyo ettaka eryo lyange ngomuntu so ssi nga namasole natoolo bwe yannyonnyoddewabula yeesammudde ebigambibwa nti ye yaguza minisita kibuule yiika 85 zaagobako abantuyategeezezza nti lyatundibwa musa kateregga gwe yali alitaddeko okulikuuma oluvannyuma lwokukozesa olukujjukujju nalifunako ekyapa okuva mu ofiisi yebyettaka e mukonobuyaga ngali mu lukiiko lwabamawulire wiiki ewedde yategeezza ngekyapa kibuule kyalina ku ttaka lye kigaya bwe kiri ekifu ngettaka lino lya bwannalinnya era aba blb be balivunaanyizibwako nga tebamumanyi era tebamuwangako kyapasamuel muyanja avunaanyizibwa ku nzirukanya yebintu bya namasole natoolo e kyaggwe yagambye nti kateregga oluvannyuma lwokukuuma ettaka lino ebbanga eddene yakozesa olukujukujju nalifunako ekyapabwe twategeera nti kateregga afunye ekyapa mu bukyamu lino si lye lyogerwakoyagambye nti ettaka lino namasole takkirizibwa kulitunda okuggyako okulifunako obusuulu okuva mu basenze ababa baliriko obumuyamba okwebezaawo nabantu be kuba talina mpeera gempologomaomukolo gutandika ku ssaawa 500 ezokumakyaabeddira embogo be bakongojja kabakaobuvunaanyizibwa buno businga kweyoleka ku mikolo gyokujjukira amatikkira ga kabakaabembogo era be baakulembeddwaamu ssentebe waabwe johnson muyanja senyonga mukono south robert kyagulanyi ssentamu kyaddondo east eyatambudde ngavimba nakubya abantu enduulu sydah bumba nakaseke north nabalala ne bagobereraababaka bonna amatu baabadde bagatadde ku kalabaalaba nga buli omu yeesunga kuwulira linnya lyekyokka yabadde akyasoma nti mukama wange tulina honalebo wakayima musoke owa nansana munisipaali simeo nsubuga kassanda south we yeekangidde emikono gyomuntu nga gimugudde mu bulagoamangu ago omusajja ono eyategeerekese nti ye kyuma kya yesu namugamba nti ssebo teweeyongerayo saagala abaabadde beerijjira mu maaso ga kabakaembeera kalabaalaba yagikutte bulungi teyalaze bantu nti waliwo obuzibu bwonna kuba teyabwogeddekooluvannyuma omuvubuka eyakoze effujjo yakwatiddwa poliisi ne balonzi be omukolo guno baagubaddeko kuba kassanda south esangibwa mu disitulikiti ye mubende awaabadde omukoloababaka bonna baagendedde mu mmotoka emu kyokka abantu baakanze kugyetegereza ngeddayo e ezoku makya ebifaananyi nabaami ba kabaka e buweekula425 ezoku makya katikkiro atuuka ku mukolo430 kabaka atuuka ku mukolo era ayanirizibwa440 kabaka alamusa mujaguzo nehhoma ya buganda bumu           sipiika nelson kawalya  ku kkono minisita rita namyalo akulira bboodi yebyobulambuzi e mmengo jane nankabirwa kabugo nga bali ne nakaye miss tourism buganda anaatera okunnyuka obuvunaanyizibwa ne miss kyaggwesipiika wolukiiko lwa buganda nelson kawalya agambye nti buganda erimu ebyobulambuzi ntoko kyokka bikyabulamu okusiigibwako akazigo akasikkiriza abalambuzi okuva mu uganda ne wabweru abawala baffe abagenda okwetaba mu mpaka za nnalulungi webyobulambuzi musaanye okumanya ebifa ku byobulambuzi si mu bitundu eyo gye muva yokka wabula nebiri mu masaza amalala gye mutabeera musobole okufuna obumanyi kawalya bwe yannyonnyoddebino yabyogedde atongoza nnalulungi wa buganda ku mmande e bulange  mmengo nayongerako nti olwokuba ebyobulambuzi biyingiriza amawanga ssente saako nokuwa abavubuka emirimu ebifo byobulambuzi bisaana okukwatibwa obulungiye minisita omubeezi owebyobulambuzi rita namyalo yagambye nti amasaza agenjawulo gagenda kutandika okulonda nannalulungi baago nagamba nti nnalulungi webyobulambuzi  mu buganda waakulondebwa nga september 1 2017ssentebe wakabondo kababaka ba palamenti abava mu buganda muyanja ssenyonga yasabye  abaami bamasaza okussa amaanyi mu kunoonya basiponsa okusobola okutegeka obulungi abawala ababakiikirira mu mpaka za buganda yonna kimalewo entegeka zino okukaliza ensawo zabatonoempaka zino zivujjirirwa aba sure deal victory school of beauty e nateeteessaza lye kyaggwe lyamalirizza okulonda nnalulungi waalyo bulemeezi yamalirizza ssese ne buddu baakulonda nga 2972017 august 12 aba kyadondo ne mawokota lwe balonda ate nga august 13 2017 busiro nayo eronde owaayomu ngeri yemu akabonero kempaka zino akapya katongozeddwaomusango guno oguli mu maaso gomulamuzi patricia basaza waswa mabiriizi yasabye kkooti eragire blb eweeyo ebiwandiiko byayagala okusinziirako ngajulira okuli akawunti za bbanka nebyapa byettaka era kkooti yawadde ekiragiro gye buvuddeko kabaka abiweeyokabaka ngayita mu bannamateeka ba kalenge bwanika ssawa  coadvocates yajulidde ku nsonga eno ngayagala kkooti ejulirwamu esazeemu ekiragiro kyokuwaayo ebiwandiiko binowiiki ewedde omulamuzi basaza yakkirizza okujulira kwa kabaka nayimiriza ekiragiro kyokuwaayo ebyapa nalagira kabaka aliyirire mabiriizi ssente zasasaanyizza ku nsonga enomabiriizi yataddeyo empapula mu kkooti ngayala bamuliyirire 10966086094omuwendo gwe yasabye si gwankomeredde kkooti enkulu yawadde olwa august 31 2017 okuwulira okusaba kunobannamateeka ba kabaka be bagenda okunnyonnyolera kkooti omuwendo gwe baagala asasule era bagukkaanyeekoekiwandiiko kkooti kye yawadde eragira enjuyi zombi okubaawo ku lunaku olwo nga ssinga kabaka takiikirirwa kkooti yaakugenda mu maaso ewulire ensonga esalewo omuwendo gwalina okusasula           mayiga ngabuuza ku ssentebe wabaami bamasaza kayima david ssekyeru ngabalala bwe beetegereza           omumyuka wa sipiika wa buganda hajj ahmed lwasa owokusatu okuva ku ddyo era nga ye ssentebe wolukiiko olutegeka amatikkira ga kabaka agomulundi ogwa 24 ngali mu kifaananyi nabategesi abalalaokuva ku ddyo ye mariam mayanja avunaanyizibwa ku ntambula za kabaka minisita richard mulema mukasaate okuva ku kkono ye ronald kawaddwa owa majesctic brands omutaka kayiira gajuule ne remmy kisakye owa airtel abamu ku batadde ensimbi mu mikolo gyamatikkira ga kabakababadde bulange mmengo leero nga july 18 2017  oluvannyuma lwokwogera eri bannamawulireleero   dickson kulumba  alaze kabaka chwa i nabakka bye yagatta ku bugandachwa i nabakka ye kabaka wa buganda owookubiriono yakola kinene okulaba ngobwakabaka tebubulwa mulangira alya nnamulondo ekintu ekyazimba obuganda nokutuusa leeroebikwata ku mulembe gwe si bingi kyokka aboogezi bangi bamutendereza okukuuma ebyo kitaawe kintu bye yaleka alambise okutambulizaako obugandasir apollo kaggwa eyaliko katikkiro wa buganda mu kitabo kye bassekabaka ba buganda anyumya ku mulembe gwa nabakka bwati kintu ngamaze okubula chwa nabakka nalya obuganda kubanga abaami baalaba nga tewakyali  kabaka abalamulaera ebyo bwe byaggwa ne baddira omwana wa kisolo wamala namusikiraera okwo kwe kwava olugero nti  obusigire bwatta kisolo chwa yakuba ekibuga kye e bigo nazaala omwana we kalemeeraawo kalemeera bwe yakula ne bamubuulira nti jjajjaawo kintu ne muganda wa kitaawo mulanga baabula bubuzi tetwamanya  gye badda kalemeera kye yavanga akuuma kitaawe ngalowooza nti oba oli awo ne kitange nabula kamukuumenga bwalibula nga tuli wamu nayeawo chwa yalaba ngamukuuma nnyo namusalira amagezi  nayita walusimbi ssaabaddu we nti  kale waayiriza omwana ono omusango alekenga okunkuuma bwatyowalusimbi kye yava amuwaayiriza nti omwana ono yasuze ne mukazi wange kubanga tewaali nsonga ya mazimayamala gamuwaayiriza era ave ku kitaawe okumukuumaawo  bwe baayita abakulu bonna ne bakuaana ne bababuulira omusangoabaami  bonna ne basala amagezi omusango nti  omwana gumusinze walusimbi nasala olukoni edda ebintu ebingi ennyo nga biyitibwa lukonikitaawe nagamba abaami nti  kale mumulondere abantu bawerekere omwana agende eri muganda wange winyi kabaka we bunyoro agende yeetange ebintu abaami ne balonda bwoya yalonda mulegeyawakayiba yalonda mazige era wakayiba ye yalundanga ente za kintunabalala bangi abaalondebwanga abaami bonna nebika byonna byalonda abantu abaagenda nayeawo bwe bwakya enkya kalemeera nasitula nagenda e bunyoro e kibulalawinyi bwe yalaba omwana wa muganda we namwagala nnyokye yava amusuliza ddala omwomukyala kaddulubaale wanyanakalemeera bwe yalaba wanyana nga mulungi namwagalakaleemera bwe yalaba ngazzizza omusango ku wanyana nabuulirako mulegeya nti nzizizza omusango ku mukyala wanyanamulegeya nasala amagezi nagamba nti  kangende eri kabaka bwanjagala kantwaleyo ebigambo byenfumo bwe yajja eri kabaka winyi namugamba nti  nalaguddwa nti bwowuliranga omumwe nga mulimu omukyala azzizza omusango tamulabangako bamuzimbiranga bweru era tamukolanga bubiera bwazaalanga omwana bamumuggyangako ne bamussa mu kirombebwe balikola bwe batyo oliba mulamu era oliwangaala winyi bwatyo nakkiriza ebigambo bya mulegeyamulegeya bwe yaddayo ewuwe nabuulira kalemeera nga bwe yagamba kabakaamangu ago kalemeera nateesa ne mulegeya nti  nze kaende eri kabaka mmulage nti nzirayo ewaffe e buganda naagenda nalagakabaka winyi namugamba nti  kale ddayo ewammwe kalemeera nasitula okukomawo e bugandamulegeya nasigalayo e bunyoro era nabalalabano be basajja ba kitaawe be yali nabo lwabiriza kigu ne kalogokalemeera mu kkubo yali yaakamalamu ennaku bbiri nalwala nafabe yali nabo ne bamutemako omutwe ne bagusiba mu ddiba lyempisine baleeta omulambo gwe ne baguziika e kyasa mu busirobwe baatusa omutwe gwa kalemeera eri bannaabwe baasanga nga ne chwa abuze bubuzieno yensonga eyamubuza yali agenda e magonga okulaba oba kitaawe yabulira ddalanaye  bwe yatuuka mu kkubo ne wabaawo omuntu amulimba nti kitaawo yakomawo kabaka chwa i ensonyi bwe zaamukwata ngatidde kitaawe nabulira mu lusenyi ddavulakye baava bagera olugero nti amasuubisuubi gali e ddavula kuba abaali e bigo baalowooza nti kabaka yagenda magonga nabe magonga baalowoozanga nti ali wuwe e bigooluvannyuma ne bategeera nti yabula bubuzinaye ne batamanya nga kisolo kye kyamulyaokukulembera obuganda obulungi yalonda  bakatikkiro okwali walusimbi oweffumbe ne ssebwana owoolugave okumulamulirako ensi ye kyokka bwe yabula ssebwana nasigala ngakuuma nnamulondodaudi malagala katikkiro wekika kyembwa agamba nti kabaka kato kintu yazaala abaana bangi okwaali gguluddene nga ye mutabani  we omukulu wakayima ne chwa nabakkakyokka gguluddene ne wakayima yabazaala mu mukazi mulala atali nambi chwa nabakka we yalinnyira ku nnamulondo abalangira bonna baali beddira mbwalumu chwa yali anyumya ne mukulu we gguluddene embwa nejja erya empitambi mu maaso gaabwe nga bombi balabachwa nabakka yagamba muganda we nti  olabye embwa bweridde empitambi wano chwa we yalayirira nga bwatayinza kuddamu kweddira mbwachwa yasalawo kweddira muziro gwa nnyinagguluddene yakiwakanya nnyo era wano chwa we yagambira muganda we nti  wabula oli mutasingwampakaokuva olwo gguluddene erinnya lya mutasingwa ne limukalirako ddalaera okuva olwo kabaka yasigala yeddira muziro gwa nnyinakabaka chwa i yakuuma ebyo kintu bye yali alambise naddala ebika gye birina okutambuzibwa nokutuusa kati nga bituukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabyo mu lubiriyaleeta ennono ya kabaka okweddira omuziro gwa nnyinayeddira muziro gwa nnyina nakiwala kabejja oweongedr adam kimala ayogera ku nnono ya kabaka okweddira ekika kya nnyina nti kyagendererwamu okulaba nga tewabeera kika kyefuga bwakabakaayongerako nti  kino kyakolebwa mu ssaayansi wa waggulu naye ngamazima gali nti bakabaka baffe basigala nga balangira wabula nga bawa nnyo ekitiibwa oludda lwa bannyaabwekyova olaba mu bakojja ba kabaka eri amaanyi mangi agabaweebwa okuli kkojjawe omukulu ssaabaganziekikulu ekyakolebwa ku mulembe gwa chwa i nabakka kwe kulaba nti kabaka asigala ngava mu lulyo naffe abakopi tusigale mu bika byaffe era kino kye kyatebenkeza obugandaomulembe gwe gwaleetera abakopi okufuga ku buganda okumala akaseera kuba ssebwana owe gganda nga yakuuma nnamulondo okumala emyaka egisoba mu 10ebika bingi byaggwa amaanyi gaabyo ku mulembe gwe okuyingira ogwa kimera era okuva olwo bwe nga bajjajja ba buganda           omutaka yusuf mbirozankya walusimbi ayambadde olubugo ngatuuka ku mukolozino bazisondedde mu kijjulo ekyetegekeddwa mu luggya lwekizimbe masengere ku lwokuna wa buganda daudi mpangaomulamuzi patricia basaza wasswa akkiriza kabaka okujjulira mu musango gwettaka mweyasabibwa kkooti okuwa male mabirizi ebiwandiiko ebikwata ku nsimbi buganda land board zezze okuva mu kalenge bwanika ssawa  coadvocates nga ku mulundi ogusoose mu musango guno ssabawolereza wa buganda daudi mpanga abaddemu mu kkootiabalala ababaddemu ye barnabas ndawula nga yakulira ye mabiirizi ategeezezza nti ekisinze okumusanyusa yensalawo yomulamuzi okugaana okuggyawo ekiragiro kye ekisaba kabaka ebiwandiiko nga nsalesale waakyo aggwaako june 302017 era nategeeza kati kabaddeyo nga june 282017 alabe bwebinatambula           minisita omubeezi owebyensimbi e mmengo richard mulema mukasa owokubiri okuva ku ddyo ngakwasa ssabawaali abraham kaleebu ali mu kyambalo oweggombolola ye kalagala saitifikeeti eyaguliddwa mu luwaloamudiridde ye pookino vincent mayiga ate addako ye kangaawo freddie ntege ssekammere owe bulemeezi ali wakatiomwami weggombolola eno ssaabawaali abraham kaleebu yategeezezza nti abantu mu ggombolola eno balina endooliito zettaka okugeza erye bugabo nga lyaviirako okwokya ttulakita olwobutabaawo kuteeseganya naabo abaagala ku lwokubiri amaggombolola okuli mutuba vii bamunaanika abaaleese 1270000 ssaabawaali kalagala poliisi eggale ebifo ebitendeka abebikonde mu kawempe  1750000 ngobya mutuba v wabusaana 200000 okuva e bulemeezi mutuba xxii kitanda mutuba xi bigasa 2240000 okuva e buddu ate neye kakindu busujju 500000awamu baaleese 6897000 nga ku zino abe kikandwa busujju 500000 abe bulemeezi 3207000 ate abe buddu 3190000minisita omubeezi owebyensimbi richard mulema mukasa eyakiikiridde katikkiro charles peter mayiga yagambye nti  ensonga yettaka obwakabaka bugirowoozaako nga bubakubiriza okwettanira enkola ya kyapa mu ngalo kubayaakuwonya abantu ba kabaka endooliito zettakanadduli era asabye kabaka okuddamu okuzimba buganda eyamaanyi  ngakkiriza abantu okwerondera abakiise e mmengo nga bayita mu kalulu kuba abaliyo balondebwa muntu omu kabakaagamba nti gavumenti eya wakati eyisa mu buganda amaaso lwa kuba abakiise abali e mmengo ssi balonde era tebakiikirira bantu kyokka kino bwe kinaakyuka buganda ejja kuganyulwa nnyo era egejjehaji nadduli  nga minisita mu ofiisi ya katikkiro atalina mulimu gwa nkalakkalirira bino abitegeezezza bannamawulire mu ofiisi ye ngatangaaza ku nsonga ezitali zimu ezikwata ku ttaka nekiragiro kya kabaka ekyokugamba mmengo okusomesa abantu ebikwata ku nsonga zettaka beesalirewo ku nkola ya  kyapa mu ngalokabaka okwogera bino yabadde kyankanzi mu ssaza lye singonaddali yali asimbidde enkola ya kyapa mu ngalo ngagamba nti ye agenda na bantu kye bagamba era abaddenga awa ekyokulabirako nti mu tteeka lyettaka erya 1927 owekibanja bwe yawanga busuulu ngekibanja kifuuka kya nsikirano nga ne bwafa kiddira omwana obutafaanana bya liizi ya myaka 49 ebya kyapa mu ngalokyokka  oluvannyuma lwa kabaka okusinziira e kyankwanzi mu ssaza lye ssingo nalagira  mmengo okusomesa abantu ebikwata ku ttaka beesalirawo nadduli agambye nti abaali banyiize nokukimussaako nga bwe yeesammudde kabaka bakomewookukoogana ne gavumenti eya wakati kati kuweddewokabaka aggyewo entalo ezandizze nadduli bwayongeddekofamire ya ssekabaka daudi chwa ii basimbidde buganda land board ekkuuli ku ssente obuwumbi 300 ze bagenda okusasulwa mu ttaka lye masajjabaagala ssente zikwasibwe kkooti enkulu ssi aba buganda land boardekitongole kyenguudo unra kigenda okusasula abantu abali ku ttaka e masajja awagenda okuyita oluguudo lwa kampala jinja express highway kyokka abalangira ba ssekabaka daudi chwa ne buganda land board basika omuguwa ku nannyini omutuufunga may 16 2017 amyuka ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti yawandiikira aba unra nabagamba bakwase buganda land board ssente zinoekiragiro kino kyasaanudde abalangira ba chwa abakulembeddwaamu omulangira kalemeera kimera nti tebasobola kukkiriza ssente zino kugenda mu mikono gya buganda land board ku ttaka eritali lya kabaka oba bugandaomulangira kimera yagambye nti ekola ku nsonga zamaka nga october 23 2015 ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti naba famire ya chwa bakkiriziganya nti ettaka lye masajja lya chwakyakkaanyizibwako nti chwa alinayo mayiro zettaka 250 era okukkaanya kuno kwassibwa ne kitabo kya gavumenti ekitongole kya uganda gazette nga june 2 2016baggyeeyo nebbaluwa yomumyuka womuwandiisi wa kkooti yamaka justine atukwasa gye yawandiikira aba unra ne ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti nga may 8 2017 ngetegeeza nti ssente zonna ezigenda okusasulwa ku ttaka lye masajja ziteekebwa ku akawunti yekitongole ekiramuzi abantu abatuufu kwe bagenda okuziggyawano abalangira we baasinzidde okuddayo mu kkooti enkulu eyimirize aba buganda land board okukwata ku ssente zino nti kuno kuba butagondera biragiro bya kkootibagamba nti mu ndagaano ya 1900 ssekabaka chwa yaweebwa ettaka ngomuntu ate lye yafuna nga kabaka mu kiseera kino liri mmengo mu mikono gya buganda land boarderirye ngomuntu tebalirinaako buyinza nakatono           abasiraamu nga bafuna emmere kabaka gye yabagabuddekabaka asiibuludde abasiraamu ku kijjulo makekeabakunze okubeera obumu okwenyigira mu mirimu gyobwakabaka nokumalako obulungi ekisiibo nga tebamenye tteeka lya ddiini lyonnaomukolo gwabadde bulange mmengo nga ku luno jjaja wobusiramu kasiim nakibinge yagwetabyeko ate katikkiro charles peter mayiga nanekaanekana mu kkanzu yekisiraamu nentalabuusinakibinge yategeezezza nti yanyigirizza najja ku mukolo guno okumalawo oluvuuvuumo olusaasaanyizibwa nti alina obutakkanya ne mayigaolwaleero nnyigiriza okubeera ku mukolo guno era bulijjo bampitaabaamawulire bano ndowooza be batera okutambuza olugambo olulowoozesa abantu nti nze ne katikkiro tetukwataganatuyinza okuba nga twafunamu obutakkiriziganya ku nsonga naye tetubangako na butakkiriziganya ngabantuera tutambuza bulungi emirimu gyaffe nakibinge bwe yategeezezzayagambye nti batera mayiga atera okumukyalira era boogeraganya ne ku ssimuyavumiridde abasiraamu abakodo abasiba ggeeti zaabwe ngekiseera kyokusiibulukuka kituusemayiga yayanirizza nakibinge mu bulange nategeza nti yenna eyeenyumiriza mu busiraamu kitegeeza nti ebigendererwa byokukuhhaana kuno bituukirireomukolo gwetabiddwaako baminisita ba kabaka ababaka ba palamenti sheikh rajab kakooza nabakulembeze bobusiraamu abalalasheikh kibaate ye yasaazizza ate sheikh mohammad kigozi nabuulirakigozi yeebazizza obwakabaka olwenteekateeka enobaagabuddwa ebyokulya nokunywa era baavuddeyo nga bamatiddemartin kasekende ne hajj hamis kakomo be baakulidde enteekateeka zino           katikkiro ngayaniriza omukungu okuva mu unkatikkiro charles peter mayiga akyazizza akulira ekitongole kyamawanga amagatte ekirwanyisa mukenenya unaids nategeeza nti obwakabaka bumaliridde okulwanyisa obulwadde buno kuba kabaka ayagala abantu be okubeera abalamumichel sidibe yakulira ekitongole kino ategeezezza nti musanyufu olwokuba kabaka yasiima okuwoma omutwe mu kampeyini yokukunga abaami akakadde kamu okwekebeza obulwadde bwa mukenenya omwaka 2020 wegunatuukiraono katikkiro amulaze ebintu ebyenjawulo e bulange okuli ebifaananyi bya bassekabaka okuva ku muteesa i okutuusa ku muteesa ii wamu noluguudo kabakanjagala oluva e bulange okuyingira olubiri e mmengokatikkiro era atonedde omugenyi we ebirabo okuli ekikopo okuli ekifananyi kyamasiro ge kasubi wamu nekitabo kye kyeyawandiika ekiyitibwa uganda the 7 key transformation ideas          charles bwenvu minisita wa kabaka omubeezi owensonga za buganda ebweru ngayogera ku ssemwanga mu lutikko e namirembebano wadde tebaali baakusasula ssente yonna kyokka bangi baalemererwa olwokubulwa ebifo we basula nokubalabirira mu byokulyakuno yagattako nokuwaayo ensawo za seminti 800 ze yatikka ku lukululana katikkiro bwe yali akyadde e bugerere mu kukungaanya ettoffaalimu kuwaayo teyaliiwo wabula yawulira buwulizi nasindika ssente ne bagula seminti gwe yawaayoaidah nantaba minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bya tekinologiya nga ye yakiikiridde gavumenti eya wakati yagambye nti omugenzi omwaka oguwedde yatumira abakulembeze be kayunga nabasaba bamuwe pulaani azimbe amasomero mu disitulikiti gyazaalwakyokka olwokuba baali mu kalulu tebaasobola kumuddamu okutuusa lwafudde           akulira kacita everest kayondo ngakwasibwa ekyapa kye mu nkola empya eyekyapa mu ngaloabantu bajjumbidde okufuna ebyapa bya liizi mu nkola ya kyapa mu ngalo ku matabi ga buganda land board agenjawuloku ntandikwa ya wiiki ewedde abantu abasukka 150 baweebwa ebyapa byabwe oluvannyuma lwokutuukiriza emisoso egyenjawulo era omwogezi wekitongole kino denis bugaya nategeeza nti mu buli kiseera kigere bagenda kubeera bakwasa abantu ebyapa byabwe bagende bakole emirimubugaya yagambye nti  abantu baffe tubakubiriza okukozesa omukisa guno ogwabaweebwa okwewandiisa bafunye ebyapa ngekiseera kyemyezi omukaaga ekyatekebwawo okuwa abantu ba kabaka ebyapa ku nsimbi entono nga tekinaggwakoenkola eno yatongozebwa nga april 182017 okumala emyezi mukaaga ngera abantu nga ssentebe wa kacitaevaristo kayondo margaret bukenya nabasuubuzi abalala mu kampala bamalirizza okufuna ebyapa binoku lwokuna bukedde yayiseeko ku kizimbe masengere awali ettabi ekkulu erya blb nasanga ngabantu bangi bazze okubalirirwa ensimbi zebalina okusasula okusonjola ebyapa byabwebugaya yategeezezza nti mu nteekateeka eno omuntu ajja nebyogera ku kibanja kye kyeyawandiisa oluvannyuma lwokubalirirwa ngasasula ensimbi ezasalwako ebitundu 200 era nategeza ngenkola eno bwetambudde obulungi wadde ngerumbiddwa nebigambo bingi okuva mu bantu abenjawulo           omugenzi bisase nga bwabadde afaananatemplar michael bisase kisosonkole 73 owe kajjansi mu kigagga zooni mu wakiso yaziikiddwa ku biggya bya bajjajja be e kyaliwajjalabisase ye yasikira cms kisosonkole taata wa namasole maama wa kabaka sarah kisosonkoleowooluganda lwomugenzi ayitibwa kagere yagambye nti bisase abadde amaze nendwadde zino emyaka 35bisase yafiiridde mu maka ge agasangibwa e kajjansi nga may 15 2017 ku ssaawa 10 ezoku makya era alese abaana babiri okuli damalie ne templar bisasemukyala we joanita bisase yafa kkansa mu 2011           katikkiro ngayogerera mu lukiiko lwa buganda e bulange mmengoolukiiko lwa buganda lusabye mmengo esseewo akakiiko akeekikugu  kekenneenye ennongoosereza gavumenti ya wakati zeeyagala okuleeta nokugoberera ebyo ebigenda mu maaso ku kakiiko akanoonyereza ku nsonga zettaka mu ggwangabino bibaddewo mu  lukiiko lwa buganda olwa 24 olutudde mu bulange mmengo enkya ya leero abakiise mwe basiimidde enkola yekyapa mu ngalo oluvannyuma lwa munnamateeka christopher bwanika okusoma alipoota esoma nti  ku nsonga ya kyapa mu ngalo akakiiko kawagira ne ssekuwagira enkola eno egendereddwaamu okunywereza abantu ku ttaka lya ssaabasajja kabaka nokulaba nga tebagobaganyizibwamu ngeri yeemu balabudde abo abayita ku mikutu gyamawulire egyenjawulo omu negya yintaneti okuvvoola kabaka ne gavumenti ye nti begendereze kubanga abaganda bamalirivu okukuuma kabaka waabwe era sibeetegefu kukkiriza muntu yenna avvoola kabakaomukiise damas mulagwe asabye gavumenti ya kabaka eddemu okuteesa namaanyi ne gavumenti eyawakati ku ttaka eryaterekerwa abaganda abalijja mu maaso mayiro 9000 kubanga kati gavumanri yatandika okuligabako ebyapa ebyobwannannyinni nga kitegeeza nti essaawa yonna liyinza okuba nga liggwaawobwabadde ayogerako eri abakiise katikkiro wa buganda munnamateeka charles peter mayiga azzeemu okukiggumiza nti obwakabaka tebugenda kukkiriza bbago erireetebwa gavumenti okutwala ettaka lyabantu nga tesoose kubaliyirira era nategeeza nti ensonga mukaaga zeezirina okwekennenyezebwa kiyambeko  okugonjoola ensonga zettaka mu ggwangaayongeddeko nti  obunafu bwa poliisi okuleeta obujulizi mu misango gyettaka kkooti okulemwa okulamula  mu budde ensonga zettaka ate oluusi nokulemwa okuziramula mu ngeri ennambulukufu obungi bwabantu obweyongedde so ngate ettaka teryeyongedde ettaka okukaddiwa ne libeera nga telikyasobola kuvaamu mmere esobola kuliisa abantu abangi mu ggwanga obunafu mu ofiisi zebyettaka wonna mu ggwanga ssaako ne bannabyabufuzi  okweyingiza mu nsonga zettaka nga beefula abayamba abantunolwekyo ffe nga bannayuganda bwetutasalire magezi nsonga ezo obuvuyo ku ttaka bwakweyongerabwatyo katikkiro bwategeezezzaye apollo makubuya nga ye mumyuka owokusatu owa katikkiro ategeezezza nga minisitule ye bwekola ku nsonga zobugulumbo obuli mu masaza okuli bugerere buluuli ne kooki okulaba nga buggwaawonnaalinnya wamasiro ge kasubi beatrice namikka ayimbuddwa okuva mu kkomera e luzira oluvannyuma lwokumusasulira ebbanja lyonna eryobukadde 27 ezaabadde zimusibisizzaabambejja nabalangira baakedde kweyiwa ku kkooti enkulu mu kampala ku lwokutaano nga balinda namikka era bwe zaaweze essaawa 300 ezoku makya namikka naleetebwa mu bbaasi yamakomera nabasibe abalalaye nabantu be baagenze ewomulamuzi flavia nassuuna matovu ne basasula ssente zonna obukadde 27 ezibadde zimubanjibwa nateebwa era obwedda abambejja bagamba nti ekikolwa kyokusiba namikka tekyakoleddwa mu mutima mulungi wabula kyagendereddwaamu kumuweebuulaensonda zaategeezezza nti kabaka yasiimye nawaayo ssente zonna okusobozesa namikka okuyimbulwa obunnambiroku lwokuna nnaalinnya namikka yakwatiddwa bawannyondo ba kkooti oluvannyuma lwokuggya ssente obukadde 24 ku bakyala babiri juliet namiiro ne faridah kinene abe matugga bwe yabaguza ettaka eryempewo eriweza yiika nnamba eriri ku kyalo katadde mu wakiso ku plot 17 block 94 kyaddondobaasoose kufuna kiragiro kya kkooti oluvannyuma lwokugitegeeza nti baawa namikka ssente obukadde 24 ngabaguza ettaka eryo ze baamusasulira mu masiro e kasubi nga waaliwo nomulangira namugala mawanda nti kyokka oluvannyuma ne bakizuula nti ettaka lino teryali lya namikka lyali lya ssenga weokuva olwo babadde bamubanja ssente zaabwe nga takkiriza na kubasisinkana bbo kwe kwekubira enduulu mu kkooti enkuluamyuka omuwandiisi wa kkooti enkulu kwe kuyisa ekiragiro ekimukwata olwokulemererwa okusasula juilet namiiro ne faridah kinene ssente ze yabatwalakoekiragiro kyayita mu april wa 2017 kyokka ne batamufuna kwe kuyisa ekirala ekyafulumiziddwa nga may 11 2017 ekyayisiddwa omulamuzi flavia nassuuna matovubawannyondo ba kkampuni ya waka associates baakutte namikka ne bamutwala mu maaso gomulamuzi nassuuna namusindika e luzira oluvannyuma lwokulemererwa okusasula ssente 27154200 ezimubanjibwa kyokkanayimbulwa ku lwokutaanowabula bawannyondo ba waka associates baagambye nti bakyamubanja ssente ze baakozesezza okumunoonya nokumukwata kyokka baabadde tebannazibalirira           omumbejja beatrice namikka ngatwalibwa mu kkomera e luziranamikka natwalibwaettaka erisibizza namikka lisangibwa matugga           katikkiro ngatongoza oluguudo neebalamye mayanja olugenda e naggalabikatikkiro charles peter mayiga atongozza oluguudo nnebalamye mayanja oluva e seguku okudda e naggalabi nalagira disitulikiti zonna mu buganda okukuuma nokukulaakulanya ebifo byobuwangwa mu bitundu byabweoluguudo luno lwa byafaayo mu buganda ngomulangira agenda okufuuka kabaka lyayitamu okugenda e naggalabi okutikkirwassentebe wa disitulikiti ye wakiso matia lwanga bwanika ategeezezza nti bwerunaamalirizibwa obulungi lwakuwemmenta obuwumbi 152 bwatyo neyebaza abantu mu kitundu kino olwa kaweefube gwe bataddemu okulaba nti oluggudo luno lukolebwaomukolo gwetabiddwako baminisita ba kabakaomubaka ssempala kigozi ssentebe wa divizoni ye ndejje sulaiman ssejjengo kaggo patrick mugumbule nabalalakizibu okwogera ku liizi eya kyapa mu ngalo kubanga nagenze mu kakiiko kebyettaka e mmengo bampe ku ffoomu ya liizi ndabe bwejjuzibwamu oba nange kigendererwa liizi eyinza okubeera ennungi oba embi okusinziira ku ngeri gyebagiddwaamu ate nnannyini liizi waddembe okugizza obuggya oba okugaanazibeeramu obukwakkulizo obwetaagisa okumala okutegeera liizi enokyandibadde kirungi oweekibanja agenda okufuna liizi eno okusooka okumanya ebiri emabega waayookwewala entalo mmengo liizi egisse mu lujjudde bagirage abantu bwefaanana bagisomese abantu bagitegeereliizi eno tegoberedde nnono nobulombolombo bwa bugandayandibadde esooka mu lukiiko nekubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo kubanga lutuulibwamu abantu abenjawulo abakiikirira buganda oluvannyuma kabinenti nekyogerako abaleese enkola eno tebeebuuzizza ku bantu baabulijjo bannanyini ttaka ku nsonga eno ekitegeeza nti nabo basigala mu bbanga nsaba katikkiro aleme kugoberera nkola ya gavumenti ya wakati egaana abantu baabulijjo okwogera ku nsonga zinoabantu bano buli lwe boogera ku bukyamu nobulungi obuli mu nkola ya kyapa mu ngalo kibeera kikendeeza obuzibu katikkiro bwatuddekokatikkiro mmwebaza kubanga afubye okuwandiisa ebibanja byaffe twewale enkaayana ezibaddewo naye tekitegeeza nti omuntu bwawandiisibwa ayingira butereevu mu nkola ya liiziebireese obuzibu ku ttaka mu uganda biwerako naye ekisooka bwe butabeerawo nteekateeka nnuamu ekwata ku byettaka mu gavumenti eya wakati ate ngerabika yabuutikira gavumenti ezeebitundu ezaali zimanyi ku nkola yettakabangi okwogera ku ttaka balyogerako lwa bugandangabazungu tebannajja mu buganda ettaka lyakulemberwanga kabaka nga ye muyimamu buganda bwe twogera ku kabaka tetutegeeza muntu alimu nga mutebi wabula tutegeeza obwakabakamu lulimi olutuufu kabaka yabeeranga omuyima wa byonna kubanga nabantu tuli ba kabaka ettaka nebintu byonnaettaka erisinga lyateekebwanga mu bika wabula nga mulimu eryennono nga bwowulira nti obuganda bwaliwanga amasiro abakungu abalabirira obwakabaka nebiralaomuzungu bwe yajja natuyigiriza okupima ettaka tusobole okulibala mu sikweya mayiroera mu ndagaano ya 1900 ekyo kyakolebwasikweya mayiro 8000 lyagabanyizibwa abakungu nga bakatikkiro sikweya mayiro 350 za lusuku lwa kabaka nga mwalimu eza bannaalinnyawabula sikweya mayiro 9000 zaakwasibwa gavana azikuume ku lwabantuettaka bwe lyagabibwa mu 1900 lyaleetawo endooliito kubanga abantu bonna tebaafuna ttakakino kye kyavaako okuteekawo etteeka lyettaka mu 1928kye kyavaako okuleeta ekintu kye bayita ekibanjaekibanja kyava mu mbeera ya bantu abamu abataafuna ttaka era bannyini ttaka be baabawaayo ebibanja wabula nga basigala babanjibwa obusuulu nenvujjoebiseera ebyo twabipimisanga luwaanyi oba omulamula era ebibanja twabikuuma era ngomutongole amanyi bulungi omuntu wayita nga tetunnaba kufuna bano ababbi bettaka aba lcokuva mu 1928 tewaddayo kubeerawo nkaayana era abamu ku bannannyini ttaka be baayitanga abasenze okutuula ku ttaka lyabweomuzungu bwe yali ava wano 1961 ngateekateeka okutuddiza obuyinza okutuggya mu bufuge yakomyawo ebintu byaffe byonna nettaka lye baali bakuuma era wano we wasibuka ekya buganda land boardabazungu baddira abakumpanya ne babateera obukulembeze okuva ku obote okutuuka katiolwokuba gavumenti ya wakati yalemererwa okuteekawo enteekateeka ennungi eyokulabirira ettaka lyaffe amawanga mangi geetabise nga tebalina nteekateeka nga mu buganda bwe bakolaera bano be baagendanga beesenza ku ttaka lyomuntu erisangiddwaawo sso ngomuganda nnakabala yali asooka kunoonya nnyini ttaka namweyanjuliraabantu bano balina emmundu tebagambibwako kyokka nga gwe batiisa tolina mmundukino kimu ku byongedde okutabula ebyettaka abali mu gavumenti eya wakati baateeka amateeka ku ttaka nga nagamu gawagira okubba ettaka lyabantuokugeza mu 1998 bassaawo etteeka nti ssinga omuntu asenga ku ttaka lyo okumala emyaka 12 nga tomugobyewo wabeera wafuuse wawekino kiringa agamba nti ssinga omuntu atwala kkooti yange namala nayo emyezi mukaaga nga simukutte nayo efuuka yiyekyannaku nti amateeka gano baagayisa mu palamenti erina okuteeseza abantu okubaggya mu buzibuemitendera egyayitibwamu okukola etteeka lino mikyamu bakola amateeka nga tebamaze kunoonyerezaamateeka gandibadde gakolebwa bannannyini ttaka mu bitundugavumenti ya wakati yatandika mu 1962 kyokka ettaka lyaliwo okuva mu butondeekitaataaganya ebyettaka be bantu abatali bannayuganda okuyingizibwa mu ggwanga nga bakikola mu biti bya mirundi ebiri ate ne baweebwa ettakabano edda buganda yali emanyi ekyokubakolera ffe wano bwe twawoomerwa ssukaali wa mehta ettaka yalipangisa emyaka egyalagaanwaomuyindi oba omuzungu nga takkirizibwa kufuna ttakaennaku zino yinvesita akyayinza okusinga nnannyini ttaka obuyinzaekiti ekyokubiri nga kizibu nokumanya nti weekiri be bayittibwa abalaalo abava mu nsi ezituliraanye ne bayiika bangi awatali abakugirabava e rwanda dr congo tanzania ne burundibeewandiisa ne bafuna endagamuntu bawambye ettaka nokwesenza ku bibanja byabantuokugeza e busunju nnamwandu weyaliko minisita webyemizannyo owekssemugabi alwanagana nekibinja bwe kityo ekyagala okutwala ettaka lyabwe era ensonga ziri mu kkootigavumenti ya wakati bwe yandyagadde okuteekawo akakiiko kagiyambe okutereeza ebyettaka kandibadde kava mu bannanyini ttaka okuva mu bitundu 15 ebyeggwanga amawanga gano 15 era galambikibwa ku mulyango gwa palamenti okuli nobubonero bwagokuliko buganda bunyoro busoga kigezi ankole toro west nile madi lango acholi teso karlamoja sebei bugishu ne bukedi nga be bakola eggwangabano be bandibadde bavaamu akakiiko nga bannannyini kitundu era nga be beebuuzibwakokati gavumenti eya wakati etaddewo akakiiko akakulirwa omulamuzi bamugemereirwe ku byettakagwe nalabyeyo ngayinza okukiikirira buganda ye robert sebunya kyokka oyo muwi wa magezi owa pulezidenti ate nga be bantu abawubisa pulezidenti buli kiseerabuli ggwanga lyandibadde liweereza omuntu waalyo mu kakiiko kanokamya yagambye nti mmengo nga tennaba kuleeta nkola eno yandibadde esooka okusomesa bantu nebalaga ettaka lye boogerako lye baagala okugabako liizi eyemyaka 49yalambuludde ebyafaayo byettaka mu buganda nagamba nti mu ndagaano ya 1900 ssekabaka chwa yaweebwa mayiro 350 bwe yakisa omukono abaana be ne bagabana ettaka era mutabani we omukulu george mawanda natwalako ekitundu ekisinga obuneneedward muteesa natwalako kyokka muteesa bwe yazaama abaana be ne bagabana ettaka ne kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi natwalakokamya yagambye nti nga bamaze okugaba ettaka mu baana okuva ku chwa okutuuka ku kabaka mutebi ettaka liba terikyawera mayiro 350 libeera ttono ddala nagattako nti mmengo esaanye okulaga ettaka lye boogerako erinaagabwako liizikituufu waliwo ettaka lya kabaka era waddembe okuligabako liizi okulitunda oba okugabirako omuntu kyokka bwe kituuka ku ttaka lya buganda abaganda balina okuwulirizibwa kamya bwe yagambyeyagambye nti waliwo ettaka eddala gavumenti lye yaddizza mmengo okuli mayiro 8 eryamasaza yiika 45 ezamagombolola ettaka lya bannamasole owe kanyanya ne makindye ne mayiro 9000 ezitakyawera olwamasaza agaakutulwa ku bugandakamya yagambye nti mmengo bweba eyogera ku ttaka lyabaganda lirina kugenda mu lukiiko ne liteesebwako so si kulwanjulira bwanjulizi byasaliddwaawoabaganda bwe baba tebamatidde bituukiddwaako mu lukiiko kuba olukiiko lulondebwa kabaka wateekebwewo akalulu akekikungoyagaseeko nti kikyamu kabaka ne katikkiro wakisikiramabiriizi yagambye nti endagaano ya liizi erimu obukwakkulizo bungi bwe batabuulira bantu so nga bangi tebalina ssente zaakusasula bannamateeka basobole okubataputirasteven ssenkeezi owa ssenkeezi and ssali company advocates yagambye nti liizi eyamba oweekibanja okumuwa obwannannyini mu myaka egiba gimuweereddwa           katikkiro charles peter mayiga ku ddyo ne kiwalabye male akulira buganda land boardmmengo etongozza enkola yokuwa ebyapa abantu bonna abalina ebibanja ku ttaka lya kabakaebyapa bino ebya liizi eyemyaka 49 byakuweebwa abantu ku bibanja byabwe kwe babeera ne kwe bakolera nga tebayise mu nkola ya kwegulaabagenda okusooka okuganyulwa mu nteekateeka eno etuumiddwa ekyapa mu ngalo be bantu emitwalo 13 abasangiddwa nga beewandiisa ngabasenze abatuufu ku ttaka lya kabaka wabula nabatannaba kwewandiisa baweereddwa omukisa okwewandiisa baganyulwe mu ntegeka yokuwa abantu ebyapa ku bwereerekatikkiro charles peter mayiga yatongozza enkola eno eggulo ku bulange  mmengo nategeeza nti etandikiddewo okukola era yaakumala emyezi mukaaga ngebyapa bya liizi biweebwa abo abaasooka okwewandiisamayiga yagambye nti ssaabasajja kabaka yasiimye abantu bonna abeewandiisa ku ttaka lye okuweebwa ebyapa ku bibanja byabwe nga bya liizi ya myaka 49kino kikoleddwa okusobozesa abantu okunyweza obusenze bwabwe nokukomya okusengula nokutaataaganya abasenzeyalambuludde ku birungi ebikirimu nagamba nti abantu baakufuna omukisa okukulaakulanya ebifo byabwe nga bakola emirimu egyenjawulo awatali kutya kwonna nokubanguyiza mu kusasula ensimbi ezigendera ku liizi mu nkola eyobwerufuokufuna ekyapa kino omuntu waakusasulayo ensimbi entonotono okusobozesa obuweereeza buno okutambuzibwa obulungi nga kinaasinziira ku kitundu oli gyabeeradennis bugaya omwogezi wa bugand land board yagambye nti alina ekibanja ku ttaka lya kabaka e nansana mu wakiso kibadde kimwetaagisa ensimbi ezitakka wansi wa 3500000 okwegula afune ekyapa kya liizi wabula mu nteekateeka eno emisoso egyetaagisa gya kumumalako 800000 okukwasibwa ekyapaakulira buganda land board blb david kyewalabye male yagambye nti okuwandiisa okwekikungo eri abali ku ttaka lya kabaka kwatandika mu 2015 era abantu 130000 abagenda okusooka okulowoozebwako mwe baavayagasseeko nti nabatannaba kwewandiisa oluggi luggule bagende mu ofiisi za buganda land board ezibaliraanye beewandiise nabo bafune ekyapaokwewandiisa okwekikungo nokupunta kwali kwa 600000 mu bibuga ate mu byalo 100000 kyokka oluvannyuma lwokwewandiisa okwekikungo okuggwaako bugaya yagambye nti abatanneewandiisa baakusasula ebisale ebyali byagerekebwa edda nga mu kibuga busiro ne kyaddondo baakusasula 1200000 ate mu byalo basasule 250000 ku buli kibanjamu kwanjula enteekateeka eno mayiga yabadde wamu ne minisita webyettaka obulimi nobutonde bwensi e mmengo yingmartin kasekende omumyuka we hajj hamis kakomo nabakozi ba blb1 fayiro nnamba yo singa ekibanja oba wakiwandiisa mu blbfayiro eno yeeraga amannya ga nannyini ekitundu ettaka we liri nobunene2 okubalirira kwa ssente ezeetaagisa okuva mu ttabi lya blb era ngosasuddeko ensimbi mu bbanka kwezo ezibaliriddwa mu kufuna ekyapa3 lisiiti ezikakasa nti wasasula mu kuwandiisa ekibanja nemisoso ku kyapaku nsonga ezigenda mu maaso ku ttaka lyobwakabaka okuli okusenda abantu mayiga yagambye nti obwannannyinni ku kibanja tebukuwa bbeetu kutwalira amateeka mu ngalo ne bagyokyamayiga yagambye nti  ettaka eryo lya bwakabaka nga bwawaawo omuntu liizi nga byonna ebyagenze mu maaso bivunaanyizibwa ku muntu oyo yinvesita eyaweebwa 272017deborah kaddu serwadda nga yakulira emirimu mu nnabagereka development foundation ndf ategezezza nti abaana 108 be bagenda okwetaba mu kisaakaate kino ekisookedde ddala ku lukalu lwa africa wabweru wa ugandaku bano abasaakaate 12 si bannayuganda wabula bannansi be south africa era tuli basanyufu nti balabye omugaso mu nteekateeka ya maama nnabagereka ne bagyeyungakobino abyogeredde mulukungaana lwa bannamawulire e bulange mmengo ku mmande march 27 2017 nalangirira nga south african airways saa bwewadde nnabagereka tikiti nnya 4 ezigenda okutwala abagunjuzi mu kisaakaate kino e south afrikassentebe wolukiiko olufuga ndf dr jeff ssebuyiira ategeezezza nti omukago gwe bakoze ne saa gwakuyamba ekitongole okutambuza zonna bwatyo nasaba ne kkampuni endala okujja okukolagana ne nnabagerekaye yewagnesh biriggwa akulira saa uganda agambye nti basazeewo okukolagana ne nnabagereka olwokwagala okutumbula ebigendererwa okuli okukuza abaana mu mpisa era baakugenda mu maaso nagwo obuntubulamu           katikkiro mayiga lwe yalambula amasiro nga 162014omulimu gwokugaddaabiriza mu butongole gwatandika nga january 14 2013 era okuva olwo gubadde gutambulira mu mitendera egyenjawulomu kiseera kino omulimu gugenda mu maaso ngabakozi bakola butaweera okulaba nga gaggyibwako engalo mu buddebukedde gaalobye mu kifo kino galaga nti ebisenge ebiriraanye ekibira byakendeezeddwa okukoonebwa okusobozesa okuluka akasolya ceiling okutambula obulungi kubanga bibadde biwanvu nga tebisobozesa kasolya kwewunzika bulungiwiiki ewedde minisita webyobuwangwa ennono nobulambuzi e mmengo  walusimbi ssengendo yategeezezza nti omulimu gutambula okusinzira ku nteekateeka eyabagibwa bayinginiya omulimu gutambula bulungi twateekawo enteekateeka egobererwa mu kukola omulimu guno era olwokuba tewakyali kutataaganyizibwa gwa kuggwa mu budde bwetusuubira  walusimbi bwe yategeezezzaomwaka oguwedde mu mwezi gwa march 2016 kabaka yasiima nakomya ekyabantu okulambuzibwa omulimu gwokuddaabiriza amasiro buli mwezi okutuusa lwe galimalirizibwa           dan muliika ngayogerera mu lukiiko lwa buganda gye buvuddeko muliika agamba nti  ebirooozo ebinaava  mu nteeseganya zino bisaanide okweyambisibwa okukola konsityusoni ya uganda empya gyasuubira nti egenda kuyamba okutwala  ensi mu maaso kuba eyakolebwa mu 1995 eremeddwa okutereeza ensiyalumiriza nti obote yawamba obuyinza nemmundu era gye yabuleka gye bukyali na kati nga kyetaagisa budde mu bantuera nasaba bannayuganda okubuulira gavumenti ya pulezidenti museveni ensobi zaayo mu kifo kyokubikkirira nokuwaanawaana nga bawoza kasita twebaka ku tuloyabadde mu mukutu gwempuliziganya ogumu ngawa  amagezi ku byasuubira okuyamba uganda okutereeraokwo kwe yasinzidde nokulumba gavumenti olwokumala gaggala amasomero gobwannannyini ngerumiriza nti tegalina bisaanizomuliika yagambye nti nga bwe gwali ku ntandikwa nga uganda etondebwawo mu 1962 kyetaaga amawanga agaatuula okukola uganda okugeza buganda bunyoro toro ankole  namalala gatuule geekenneenye engeri ensi gyeddukanyizibwa noluvannyuma googere kye gaagala nokulaba engeri yokutwala ensi mu maaso era wakolebwewo konsityusoni empyamuliika yasabye buganda nebitundu ebirala okutandika kaweefube wokusomesa abantu baayo ku nnonda yabakulembeze abalungi kyasuubira nti kijja kuyamba okutereeza obukulembezenagamba nti kati abantu bamala galonda buli abaayo akantu kabawa okugeza ssente nobulabo obulala ekyonoonedde ddala ebyobufuzi bya ugandayasabye ababaka ba palamenti bakkirizibwe okuteesa mu nnimi zaabwe ezekinnansi ngagamba nti okwesiba ku luzungu nobuyigirize bwa ssiniya eyomukaaga ssi bye bitegeeza nti omuntu alina ebirowoozo ebitwala ensi mu maasoyalumirizza ebibiina byobufuzi nti tebitambulira ku birowoozo byabantu wabula abakulembeze baabyo bye balowooza bye bakakaatika ku bantuyeemulugunyizza nti amateeka agakolebwa ku kufuga ettaka ga kibbi nawa ekyokulabirako kyakawayiro akagamba nti omuntu bwamala ku ttaka lya munne emyaka 12 mu bukyamu nga tamugobyeko nga lifuuka liryekwe kwebuuza   olwo abali ku ppaaka enkadde mu kampala abamazeewo emyaka egyo lwaki tebabaawo           kabaka lwe yagabula mayanja nkangi keeki namukuba akaamaddamula gwe muggo kabaka gwakwasa katikkiro okumulamulirako obugandaobote bwe yamala okulumba obwakabaka ne kabaka muteesa 11 adduse natandika okunoonya omuggo guno ddamula agubbebaamugamba nti bwe guba gukyaliwo obwakabaka ajja kuba asannyalazza busannyalaze nga bujja kuba bukyaliwo anti ne kabaka yali amulemye okumuttira mu lubiriyatandika ekiwendo kyokunoonya ddamula neyali amukwese nkangi wabula yakooterakootera mu ga lumondeabadde mukwano gwa nkangi muwonge cwmagembe agamba nti nga nkangi tannafa yamuyise namusaba abuulire obuganda ekyama kino kyasirikidde emyaka 54kwe kugamba giri 29 emyakagye yatereka era ddamula okuva mu 1963 gattako ne gino 24 okuva mu 1993 lwe yamuzzaayo nakwasibwa mulwanyammuli semwogereremuwonge magembe munoonyereza era muwandiisi wa byafaayo yadde nga mukugu mu byanfuna nokubala ebitabo abadde ku lusegere ne nkangi era abadde ategeka okumuwandiikira kitaboannyonnyola bwati omwaka oguwedde nga nkangi atandise okunafuwa yampita mu ofiisi ye esangibwa mu kibangirizi kya bannamakolero e nakawa ku luguudo lwa port bell naamba nti muwonge njagala okwate ekitabo nekkalaamu owandiike ebintu bino sikulwa nga nfa nabyo ensi netabimanyamu ofiisi twatuula okuva ku ssaawa 700 eyakawungeezi era yanfalaasira nti byahhamba tabibuulirangako muntu mulala yenna era abihhamba kuba akizudde nti nnettanidde okunoonyereza nokuwandiika ebyafaayowano we yambuulirira ekyama ekimaze emyaka 53 nga takibuulirangako muntu mulalakyekifo we yakweka ddamula nengeri gye yagikwekayobwe yalaba empalana obote gye yalina ku kabaka nasalawo okuyiiya ekifo wanaakweka ddamulaokukakasa nti enkolagana tekyali nnungi eyali minisita wa obote ku nsonga zamateeka grace ibingira ne william kalema baamukyalira ne bamutegeeza nga obote bwatali musannyufu ku ngeri abaganda gye baali baanirizaamu kabaka nemizira ngate ye eyali katikkiro yali tafuna mizira gye gimubaamuwa nekyokulabirako kyomupiira ogwali mu kisaawe e nakivubo nga kabaka bwe yatuuka abantu bamwaniriza nenduulu eyoluleekereeke wabula ngate ye obote bwe yatuuka engalo ze baamukubira zaali tezimmukakino kyaluma obote ate bwe yabuulirako munne ibingira eyali mukwano gwa kabaka muteesa yamwanuka nti tofaayo oba abaganda tebakwaniriza mu kitiibwa bwonaagenda ewamme akokolo abalango banaakukubira enduulu zayagala nga bakwanirizabino byaleetera nkangi okumanya nti obote afunye akasajja ku mutima  ffitina era ekkonda obote lye yalina ku buganda lyajjula ne lufuuka ngekikoomi ekimaze ebbanga nga kinyookankangi yategeeza muwonge nti olukiiko lwa buganda bwe lwatuula nga may 22 1966 ngamasaza ga buganda gazaaye lwasalawo okugoba gavumenti ya obote okuva ku ttaka lya buganda ekiteeso ekyawa obote omwagaanya nekyekwaso okulumba obwakabakaku lunaku olwo nkangi ddamula yagirina mu ofiisi yeomubaka george kaggwa kooki bwamala okuleeta ekiteeso ekigoba gavumenti ya obote ku ttaka lya buganda katikkiro nkangi yaggya nakuba sipiika wolukiiko eliphaz kalule nomumyuka we shiekh islam kulumba akaamayabasaba olukiiko luyimiriremu ayogereko nomubaka eyaleese ekiteesoyayambuka mu ofiisi nawabula kaggwa nti ekiteeso kye kya bulabe era kuba kuzannyira mu ngalo za obote kwe kumusaba ekiteeso bakirongooseemu bagambe nti singa obote tazzaawo konsitityusoni gye yali amenye buganda yali egenda kumuloopakaggwa yakikkiriza olukiiko ne luddamusipiika kalule yaddamu okubuuza kaggwa oba alina kyakyusa mu kiteeso ssaako nokwanjula ekiteeso ekirala kaggwa nagamba nti akyalemedde ku kiteeso ekyasoosewakati mu kusaakaanya akapapula okuli amannya gabamasaza abasatu namutegeeza nti bano be babadde bakolera effujjo mu lukiikobwamala okulaba effujjo lye baamukolako ne bye baamwogerera mu lukiiko yeetoloolamu nakubira mukulu we essimu grace lumala kalemba namugamba ajje mangu e bulangeolwatuuka namukwasa ddamula namulagira alinnye emmotoka agitwalire mwannyina yozefina balintisa nassaka agiterekeolwokuba akavuyo yali agifulumizzankangi agamba nti olugendo olutuusa ddamula terwalimu kizibu kyonna era yatuukira mu maka ga mwannyina nassaka ku kyalo kalama mu muluka gwe kasambya e kyamuliibwa mu disitulikiti ye kalungunassaka eyatereka ddamula yafa emyaka 12 egiyisengoggyeeko okuba nga mwanyina nasakka gwe yali yeesiga yali nensonga endala ekwata ku buwangwa eyamukozesa ekyoensonga yali nti nassaka yali gwayinza kubuulira kyama ekyonga amaze okumatira nti ddamula eri mu mikono mituufu yadduka nagenda mu maka gomutaka kabazzi e mmengoeno gye yasula ekiro kya may 24yavaayo nagenda e kawempe nawulira charles peter mayiga ngayogerera mu lukiiko lwa buganda olwenjawulo olutuuziddwa okusiima emirimu gyeyali katikkiro kati omugenzi jehoash mayanja nkangimu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e bulange  mmengo eggulo mayiga yalangiridde akakiiko kobwakabaka nga kakulirwa omumyuka asooka owa katikkiro ambemmanuel ssendaula apollo nelson makubuya christine mugerwa kasule ambwilliam matovu noah kiyimba walusimbi ssengendo ne william nagaggamayanja nkangi yakwasibwa ddamula mu 1964 era nagikuuma nakola emirimu ssekabaka muteesa ii gye yamukwasa okutuusizza ddala mu 1966 ebiseera ebyobusambattuko obwakabaka bwe bwalumbibwayagenda mu buwanganguse e bungereza era ssekabaka muteesa ii yagenda okukisa omukono mu 1969 katikkiro mayanja nkangi yali naye e bungereza era ye yakola emikolo egyokubikisa omulangira mutebi akabugo omukolo ogwasooka okukolebwa mu buwahhunguse gye yali e bungerezayakomawo mu 1971 ne yeetaba mu nteekateeka ezokutereka ssekabaka muteesa ii mu masiro e kasubiyakuuma ddamula mu biseera byonna ebyobutabanguko okuva mu 1966 okutuusizza ddala lwe yazza ddamula ewa kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii ngamaze okutuuzibwa ku nnamulondo mu 1993mayanja nkangi buganda eya katikkiro          abakungu ba unaids dr sheila tlou ku ddyo ne amakobe sande nga bakwasa kabaka enguleekitongole kyekibiina kyamawanga amagatte ekirwanyisa obulwadde buno unaids kye
