bayimiriddekabaka yaweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa buno kubanga awulirizibwa mu bantu be wano mu uganda ate ngasobola okutuuka mu mawanga amalala okubunyisa obubaka bunoemipiira gyamasaza gigenda lwebyobulamu mu bugandaekigendererwa kya unaids kwe kukolagana ne kabaka okukendeeza siriimu olwo mu 2020 wassibwewo olunaku lwokwekebeza akawuka ka siriimu mu bugandabuli lwe tusisinkana abantu baffeokusoomooza okunene kwe tulina kwe kulwanyisa okusaasaana kwakawuka aka siriimu nokuyamba kwabo abakalina babeere mu bulamu obulungi nga bafuna eddagala ate ne balikozesa mu butuufu mu kukunga abantu ngayita mu lupapula lwe olwa ngabowano jjuuzi mu myaka gya 1980 ye nabataka banne beetaba mu nteeseganya nnyingi ne gavumenti eya wakati okuzzaawo obwakabakamu nkiiko ezasooka ngobwakabaka buzzeewo yali muteesa mulungi era ngaluhhamya nokuwa amagezi amalungi ku buli nsongaebbanga lino lyonna abadde muwulize abadde mukozi nnyo ate nga muntu wa mmizimu kwogera kwe bwe galina okufaananakasana yagambye nti  ebintu ebyo byetwakanunulako twabitaddeko abayima okwewala ensobi ezakolebwa emabega okutumbula ebyobulambuzi tugenda kusimba emiti okukuuma obutonde bwensi asomozezza abateekateeka okugattibwa obutakikola olwokuba baagala kusamba ku kadaali oba okugendako mu lutikko wabula bakimanye nti ako kabonero akalaga omuntu akuze era owobuvunanyizibwabino yabyogeredde ku lutikko e namirembe ku ssande february 262017 ku mukolo omukungu wa buganda twezimbe atwala bulemeezi ne buluulidavid lule muzzanganda mu nsonga zettofaali bwe yabadde agattibwa ne munne allen nazimulimayiga eyawerekeddwako minisita omubeezi owebyenjigiriza dr prosperous nankindu kavuma yagambye nti  atannaba kufuna bufumbo tewabeera amwesiga oba amuzza mu kyama kyokka nobwaami evaristo seguya ne vicent kagamboomukolo guno gwakulembeddwamu omulabirizi we mityana george ssinnabulya nasaba abafumbo bonna okwekwata empisa yokusonyiwagana kubanga kikola kinene mu kubeerawo kwobufumbobp ssinnabulya yagambye nti  obufumbo obutukuvu kirabo ekiva eri katonda era yekka yakirinako obuyinza nolwekyo mulina okumwekwata mu byonna bye mukola okusobola okutambuza obufumbo bwamwe ngabantu abatya katondalule muzzanganda mutabani wa muzeeyi mutyaba e wobulenzi mpagi luwagga mu mirimu gyessaza lye bulemeezi ate munnakibiina kya dp nga yavuganya ku bubaka bwa palamenti ntege ssekamere           abantu nga batwala omulambo gwa mugerwa mu katono e magombekatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti wateekwa okubeerawo okufungiza okulwanyisa ettemu mu ggwanga kubanga liremesa enkulaakulanabino byabadde mu bubaka bwe yatisse minisita wabavubuka emizannyo nokwewummuza mu bwakabaka henry ssekabembe kiberu mu kuziika omugenzi godfrey mugerwa maliba  hassan ku kyalo lunene mu muluka gwe nkoma e mpenja gomba ku ssande february 5 2017mayiga yayogedde ku mugenzi nti abadde nekiruubirirwa ekyokuzzaawo ekitiibwa kya pikipiki eziwerekera kabaka ngezaaliwo ku mulembe gwa ssekabaka muteesa iiobuwereeza buno abadde abukola awatali kusasulwassekabembe mu bigambo bye yagasse eddoboozi lye ku bakungubazi abalala okusaba poliisi okwongera amaanyi mu kunoonyereza baani abatta abavuzi ba bodaboda era natendereza maliba okutandika ekibiina ekiwerekera kabaka kyokka mu 2015 nawaayo obuyinza nga kati musa lubega ye ssentebe kyokka ngabadde atambulira bulungi nobukulembeze obuggyaminisita ssekabembe yagambye nti  ffena abantu ba kabaka tulina okweyongera okubeera obumu kubanga yatugattaallan waligo nakirembeka yasabye bannakibiina abasigaddewo okugenda mu maaso nomulimu gwokukuuma kabaka era nakulemberamu abakungubazi ne bayimba ekitiibwa kya buganda nti gwe mudaali gwe bamuwaddeabaserikale abakuuma kabaka nga baakulembeddwamu captstanley musaazi bassizza ekitiibwa mu mugenzi nga bamukubira saluti ate ye kaggo patrick mugumbule ku lwabaami bamasaza banne yasabye e mmengo wateekebweyo ejjinja okuwandiikibwa amannya gabantu abazira abatatiiririra kabaka waabwemugwerwa yazaalibwa mu 1985 nga yaleese omwana omu joseph lukwago  gwe yazaala mu peruth naddibya kyokka ngebiseera bino abadde abeera ne agnes nakivumbi           kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii ngawuubira obugandaennyimba esooka ebitundu byoluyimba luno ebitaano byakumalibwangayo ku mikolo okuli okujjukira amatikkira ga kabaka okuggulawo olukiiko lwa buganda nokukuza amazaalibwa ga kabakabino byayanjuddwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga bwe yabadde alambulira obuganda ebigenda mu maaso nga yasinzidde mu lukiiko lwa buganda olwatudde ku mmande ya wiiki eno january 30 2017 e bulange  mmengomayiga yagambye nti ennyimba eyookubiri mwe muli emikolo okuyimbirwa ebitundu bisatu ekisooka ekyokuna nekyokutaano nga gyegyo kabaka gyalabikako ngoggyeeko egimenyeddwa wagguluate ennyimba eyookusatu yenaaberanga ku mikolo emirala gyonna egya buganda nga gya kuyimbirwangako ebitundu bibiri nga gitandika ekisooka okuva edda nedda nekyokuna nze nnaayimba ntya ne sitendaate mu kuggalawo ekitundu ekisembayo  katonda omulungi owekisa kiyimbibwengamu ngeri yemu mayiga yagambye nti omwaka guno obwakabaka bugenda kuteeka amaanyi mu bulimu bwemmwanyi mu ombo etuumiddwa  emmwanyi terimba omwaka guno tuluubirira okusimba endokwa obukadde butaanotugenda kwenyigira mu kulondoola emmwanyi okuva ku kutegeka ennimiro ate emisiri gyemmwanyi egiriwo twagala okugizza obuggya mayiga bwe yannyonnyoddeku nkola yemirimu mayiga yagambye nti ayagala ebitongole byonna okugoberera enkola yobweruufu kubanga ekizibu kyobwakabaka si zensimbi entono ezifunibwa naweebwa ekirabo katikkiro mayiga era asiimye ettendekero lino okuteekawo amasomo gabaana abaliko obulemu nategeeza nti obwakabaka bwakugenda mu maaso nokutumbula ebyenjigirizaye minisita christine kabuyemayiga yatenderezza omulimu ogukolebwa ekibiina kyolulimi oluganda olwamaanyi ge kitadde mu kutumbula olulimi luno era nabasaba okugenda mu maaso nomulimu gunoye minisita omubeezi ekisaakaatebino yabyogeredde ku janan ss e bombokalule mu ssaza lye bulemeezi ku lwokutaano january 132017 bweyabadde akyalidde abaana abali mu kisaakaate nga kino kabaka agenda ku kiggalawo leero ku ssandemayiga yagambye nti  uganda ne buganda biri mu kusomoozebwa nti abantu bakola ebikolobero lwa butabeera na obuntubulamu nokuba nti tebafuna mukisa kugunjulwaenteekateeka eno eyekisaakaate foundation nabalala           nnaabagereka ngasomesa abaana mu kisaakaate ku ssomero lya janan ss e bbombonnaabagereka sylivia nagginda agambye nti ekisaakaate kirimu ebintu bingi ebirungi ebisaanye eggulonnaabagereka yagambye nti ekisaakaate kimaze ebbanga kati lya myaka 11 era kikyagenda mu maaso namaanyiebisomesebwa abaana bano babikwata bulungi era tubakubiriza okuddayo okubiyigiriza abalalanolwekyo kirungi ne biyingizibwa mu bisomesebwa mu masomero nga kyakutwala mu maaso eggwanga linoekisaakaate kino kyategekeddwa wansi womulamwa tusoosoowaze obuntubulamunnaabagereka eyatuuse nnaalinnya yafulumizza ekiwandiiko ekiraga ensonga zattakkaanya ne katikkiro nobukulembeze bwe mmengo era kyayanjuddwa mu lukiiko ekigango lwabalangira olwatudde e namirembeekiwandiiko kya nnaalinnya mu bujjuvu1 amannya gange nze ruth kyamulabi taata anzaala ye yusuf ssuuna lulambulankoolandi muzzukulu wa ssekabaka daudi chwa ii2 omusingi obuganda kwe bwazimbirwa byebika nolulyo olulangiranaye olulyo olulangira mwe muva kabaka afuga obuganda3 mu bika mwe muva nnamasole azaala kabaka era ono abeera muntu mukulu nnyo mu bwakabaka era ono yasooka okuwa kabaka amageziera aweebwa ekitiibwa kyamaanyi nnyo kuba bwova ku kabaka ono gwoddako4 ssaabalangira yakulembererako kabaka olulyo olulangira ngakumaakuma era yayogerera abalangira nabambejja5 abataka abakulu bebika bakulemberwa ssaabataka era nga ye kabakaera be bavunaanyizibwako ebyobuwangwa nennono ebyobwakabakaava mu bika era alondebwa okufugirako kabaka obugandakaakati ogwo gwe musingi buganda kwe yazimbirwa era oguteekeddwa okugobererwa mu byonna ebikolebwa mu bugandaomulembe omutebi kabaka yaguwa bavubuka naye nga bwe tumanyi nti emiti emito gye giggumiza ekibira naye tegisobola kukula nga tewali kisiikirizeebisiikirize be bantu abakulu abeebuzibwako ensonga ekintu ekitakyaliwo ku mulembe guno omutebiabakulembeze abali e mmengo kye baagala kye bakola so si kukola ngebintu bwe biteekeddwa okukolebwaolwokuba kati ebintu bikolebwa ngabe mmengo bwe baagala kyovudde olaba nga kati waliwo obutassa kitiibwa mu bataka abakulu bobusolya abalangira nabambejja nabantu abakulu mu bugandaera kyova olaba nga ne kabaka bamussaako olukomera aleme kumanya bifa wabweru wa mmengokabaka byamanya byebyo bye baagala amanye ebibasanyusa ngabe mmengo  ekintu ekyobulabe eri obwabaka bwaffekyova olaba nga ne namasole wa buganda taweebwa kitiibwa kye ekijjuvu nga nebintu byateekwa okuweebwa mmengo tebimuwaokugeza talina lubiri lutongole talina ntambula ntongole nebirala ebigenderakoebyabadde mu lubiri ku mukolo gwenkuuka biragira ddala nti abe mmengo ebibasayusa bye bakola okugeza amazina agaaziniddwa mu maaso ga kabaka nennyambala yabazinyi bifeebya empisa ennungi ezo mu lubiri nga kabaka ali ku nnamulondo alamulanoolwekyo nze nnaalinnya ruth kyamulabi owamasiro ge bugembegembe njagadde obuganda butegeere era buzibuke amaaso nti obukulembeze obuli e mmengo bukutte bubi ensonga za buganda naddala bwe bufeebezza nnyo ekitiibwa kyolulyo olulangira nokulussaamu obukulembeze obutali bwa balangira ba wanoera kyova olaba akacankalano akaabaddewo mu lubiri nga enze okubuuza ku kabaka nga mwannyinaze katikkiro nagezaako okuntangira kyanneewuunyisizza nange kwe kumwambalira bukanzunga mmaliriza mpa amagezi abo bonna ssaabasajja baba asiimye okuwa obukulu e mmengo nga nokufa kkooti ekola ku misango gyobulyake nobukenuzi ku misango gyettaka lya bugandamu mpaaba ye mabiriizi agamba nti okusinziira ku ssemateeka wa uganda netteeka erifuga abafuzi bensikirano institution of traditional or cultural leaders act 2011 kabaka talina buyinza kutunda oba okugaba liizi ku ttaka lya mayiro erya baganda nga kino okuva mu 1993 abadde akikolera bweru wamateekaagamba olwobukulu bwa kabaka mu buganda yakwasibwa okutereka ebyapa ebiwezako square mayiro 650 kyokka nga zino zizze zikutulwako ne zitundibwa nokugabako liizi abasangiddwa ku ttaka ne basengulwamabiriizi mu mpaaba ye agamba nti ettaka lino lya baganda bonna era kabaka mutebi ii yaweebwa buvunaanyizibwa kulibakuumira si kulitunda oba okuligabako liiziwabula mabiriizi mu kuggulawo omusango guno tasoose kuyita wa muwaabi wa gavumenti omukulu dpp oba ewa kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti igg okufaananako ngemisango gyonna egiri mu kkooti eno ngagamba nti akikoze bwatyo kubanga yagezaako enfunda eziwera okugenda ku poliisi ya cps okubategeeza ensonga ze kyokka ne bagaana okumuyamba kwe kusalawo omusango agwetwalire mu kkooti butereevuasabye omulamuzi ayise ekiragiro ekiyita kabaka mu kkooti kwebyo byamuwaabidde kubanga alina abajulizi 25 abeetegefu okuwa obujulizi mu musango gunomabiriizi yasooka kuggulawo musango mu kkooti enkulu ngagamba nti kabaka ngayita mu buganda land board asolooza ssente mu bantu abali ku ttaka lya buganda nga babalagira okutereeza obutuuze bwabwe nga beewandiisamu musango guno mabiriizi awakanya ssente 600000 ezaagerekebwa ku buli ali ku ttaka lya buganda zalina okusasula mu buganda land board okutereeza obutuuze mabiriizi kyagamba nti kikontana namateekawiiki ewedde yatwala nokwemulugunya ewa yorokamu bamwine akulira abalamuzi principle judge ngagamba nti omulamuzi lydia mugambe alaze kyekubiira mu musango mabiriizi gwe yawaaba ku kabakassaabasajja ronald muwenda mutebi ii asiimye olwaleero lwakutaano okulabikako eri obuganda ku nnyimba zamazaalibwa ga yezu agomwaka gunoomukolo guno gugenda kubeera  mu bimmuli bya bulangemmengo nga gwakutandika ku ssaawa munaana ezemisanaokusinzira ku mwogezi wobwakabaka noah kiyimba agambye  nti kkwaya nnyingi abagabule           ongom ku kkono mu bimu ku bikwekweto byeabatuuze mu bitundu ebitwalibwa poliisi yoku kaleerwe bagirumirizza okukola ebikwekweto nekigendererwa kyokujja ssente mu bakwatiddwakino kiddiridde ebikwekweto ebizze bikolebwa kyokka ngabavubuka abakwatibwa abasinga basangibwa ku mirimu gyabwe abatuuze kye bagamba nti akulira poliisi yoku kaleerwe isaac ongom ekigendererwa kye si kukwata bamenyi bamateeka wabula akwata bantu balaba nti basobola okuvaamu ssente ne bayimbulwa ate abavubuka abomutawaana abamanyikiddwa mu kitundu tebakwatibwapoliisi yoku kaleerwe etwala zooni okuli min triangle kibe kiggundu ssebina  mayinja kyebando ngeno etwalako kitundu dobi ne good hopeabatuuze mu bitundu ebyo bagamba nti kituufu obumenyi bwamateeka bungi naye poliisi tekyali ku mulamwa gukwata bamenyi bamateeka ekwata beeteberezza nti bajja kuvaamu ssentehassan mubiru omutuuze we kyebando yategeezezza nti teri agaana poliisi okukola bikwekweto naye singa ekwata bamenyi bamateeka abomutawaana okusinga okujja abantu ku mirimu ne mu mayumbayagasseeko nti okujjako nga dpc we wandegeya oba kayihura basitukiddemu ne bataasa abatuuze poliisi ku kaleerwe tekyali ku mulamwaronald ssempijja ngalina galagi e kyebando mu nsooba yategeezezza nti ku lwokusatu poliisi yakutte abakozi be julius tumwine joseph kajoba tonny mulindwa ne brian ssemanda abaasangibwa ku galagi essaawa 300 nga bateekateeka kudda wakayagasseeko nti bamakanika bano olwalaba abaserikale ne baddukira mu mmotoka ne beekweka ekyawaliriza poliisi okukkakkana ku mmotoka za bakasitoma ne bazoonona endabirwamu nokumenya eminyolotom kiwanuka omutuuze womu kaleerwe zooni yategeezezza nti nekitongole kya psu ekyatekebwawo okulondoola enneeyisa yabaseikale tekirina kye kikozewo kuba bwoloopayo omuserikale mu kifo kyokumukangavvula bakyusa mukyuse ne bamutwala mu kitundu ekiralajoseph nsabimana akulira poliisi eziri mu divizoni ye wandegeya yategeezezza nti ensonga ya oc okuggya ku bantu ssente abakwatiddwa abadde tagimanyiiko naye kati agenda kuginoonyerezaakomeeya emmanuel sserunjogi yategeezezza nti azze afuna okwemulugunya mu bantu abenjawulo ku nkola yemirimu ya oc woku kaleerwe ngabamu bagamba nti ebikwekweto akola bya kunoonya ssente nasaba bwe kiba kituufu akyuseemurdc we kawempe deborah nabukenya omubaka wa pulezidenti e kawempe yategeezezza nti atandise okusuula enkessi ku nsonga ya oc ono era nasaba abatuuze obutanyigirizibwa poliisi era bwe wabaawo ensonga bagende mu ofiisi bayambibweisaac ongom akulira poliisi yoku kaleerwe abatuuze gwe balumirizza okulya enguzi ku bakwatibwa nga kigambibwa bamenyi bamateeka yategeezezza nti kituufu ebikwekweto bikolebwa naye mu bakwatibwa basunsulwamu abazuulibwa nti bakyamu batwalibwa mu kkooti abalala ne bayimbulwa ku kakalu ka poliisi  yagasseeko nti abantu abamulumiriza baagala kutaataaganya bikwekweto bya poliisiobwakabaka bwa buganda buleese pulaani empya eyokuddaabiriza olubiri lwe mmengo mwe bagenda okuzimba ebintu ebyenjawulomu pulaani eno olubiri lwakuzimbibwamu eddwaaliro amasomero nga lubiri high ne lubiri nabagereka primary school zaakubeera mu kizimbe kimu lwakuzimbibwamu twekobe empya eri ku mulembe ekifo omuteeserezebwa twekobe enkadde yaakusigalawo naye essibwemu ekifo ekyobulambuzi nebirala bingissentebe wolukiiko olwassibwawo okunoonya ebirowoozo engeri olubiri gye lunaakulaakulanyizibwamu francis kamulegeya yawadde ensonga lwaki lulina okulukulaakulanya yagambye nti enteekateeka ebaddewo okumala ebbanga eyokuzza obuggya olubiri naye nga pulaani tezimalirizibwayagambye nti pulaani gye baleese ejja kusigala ngekuuma ennono nobuwangwa byabaganda wamu nokuweesa olubiri ekitiibwa nga bwe kibaddeenteekateeka zokuzza obuggya olubiri zaawedde tetwetaaga birowoozo birala kye twetaaga kyokka kati bamusigansimbi bagisseemu sssente bwe yagambyewabula abataka bavuddeyo ku kyokukulaakulanya olubiri ne bagamba nti okuluteekamu eddwaaliro nebintu ebirala ebyekizungu katikkiro charles peter mayiga abeera agudde mu katego kabazungu wamu nabafuzi ba uganda abanaddawo okusaanyaawo obwakabaka nga baggyawo olubiringa november 29 2016 katikkiro yayanjudde enteekateeka yokukulaakulanya olubiri lwe mmengo ne kireka ebibuuzo bingi abataka bye basigadde nga beebuuza era mmengo byerina okuddamuebimu ku bibuuzo bye beebuuza kuliko lwaki enteekateeka eno teyayanjulirwa lukiiko lwa buganda bwebeera yayanjulirwa abataka ne bagiteesaako bataka ki aboebyagala okukolebwa mu lubiri birungi naye ettaka wabweru wolubiri we biteekebwa lye libuuzeemiryango egiri ku lubiri buli gumu gulina ennono naye olubiri bwe luteekebwamu ebintu ebirala kino kinaasigala kigobererwaabalala babuuza nti nga bwe wagenda okuzimbibwa twekobe empya egya mu mulembe guno ne bulange wanaazimbibwayo empyaekirala yengeri ensimbi ezigenda okukola omulimu guno gye zigenda okufunikamubino byonna byawalirizza abekibiina kyolulimi oluganda eko okuwandiikira omukubiriza wolukiiko lwabataka kayiira gajuule frederick kasibante nga november 30 nga bamulaga obulabe obwakabaka bwe bwolekedde ssinga pulaani yokukulaakulanya olubiri eteekebwa mu nkolaekiwandiiko bukedde kye yalabyeko kigamba nti  okusalako olubiri balekewo ekitundu bazimbeko twekobe egya mu mirembe gino ebitundu ebirala bazimbemu ebikola ensimbi kiba kityoboola entegeka nemirembe egyabaasookawo kigamba bye baagala okuzimba mu lubiri birungi era abaganda babyagala naye twagala buyinza na kitiibwa kya bwakabaka okusinga ssenteebyo tubizimbe ku ttaka eringi lye tulina wonna okusinga okubizimba mu lubiri okutta ekitiibwa kya buganda ekyava eddaettaka omwalizimbiddwa ebyo ate batunda ttunde nga baliguza abo abalina ssente ne bwe bataba bagandabaalaze okunyolwa kuba ensi ezikulaakulanye zikuuma ebifo ebikadde ne zifuna omudidi gwensimbi okuva mu balambuzi ne bawa ekyokulabirako ekyembiri zonna e bungereza nkadde nga tebazimbanga mpya nti baagala okutuukana nomulembe kyokka ngobusobozi babulinabongera ne bagamba nti  ensi ezaggyawo obwakabaka zikyakuuma embiri ezo era zaafuuka byabulambuziolaba neryato vasco da gama lye yakozesa likyaliwo nga bwe lyali luli olubiri luliko yiika 216yiika 70 zigenda kuteekebwako twekobe empya 50 za kizimbe omunaabeera amasomero yiika 60 zigenda kuteekebwako eddwaaliro nga lino lyakutendekanga nabasawo ate yiika 36 zaakusigalamu ekibangirizi omukolerwa emikolowabula ekipya kyokka ekigenda okussibwa mu lubiri lyeddwaaliro kubanga okuva edda essomero libaddemu           hasegawa junichi mu maaso nabakungu ba unesco abalala nga bali mu masiro e kasubiensimbi kye kimu ku bizibu ebitambuzza omulimu gwamasiro akasoobo era abagazimba basabye mmengo obukadde 400 ze babanjammengo esangiddwa nga yategeeza dda gavumenti nti obuwumbi obubiri ezaasooka okuweebwayo nga yingjb walusimbi ye katikkiro wa buganda zaakozesebwa ne ziggwaawommengo yawaayo okusaba eri gavumenti bagyongereyo obuwumbi obulala bubiri okwongera mu maaso omulimu gwokuzimbaabamu ku baakola omulimu ku muzibwazaalampanga babanja nga kuno kuliko omuzimbi pius mugaalasi owa omega construction obukadde 400 ze yasabye zimusasulwe okutambuza emirimu gye emiralaomulala mmengo gwerina okusalira amagezi ye erias sserumpanise ngono mugiriinya abagiriinya be bawunda ebizizzi ebisatu ebisooka okuteekebwa mu kasolya ka muzibwazaalampanga nga tekannaserekebwasserumpanise yagambye nti nakola omulimu guno ne bannange abbas mwanje siraje kavuma nabalala era bammanja ssente zaabwe ngawamu twakolera obukadde 34twatandika omulimu guno nga february 1 2015 ne tugumaliriza nga march 1 2015 era katikkiro charles peter mayiga nagusiimassinga tebaatuyingirira mu mulimu okutuuka okuwanulayo ebizizzi ebyateekebwayo nga july 2015 okuwunda akasolya ssinga kwaggwa ddawabula minisita webyobuwangwa ennono nobulambuzi dennis walusimbi ssengendo yategeezezza nti sserumpanise yajja ku mulimu guno ngomusiigemu buganda omusiige alabirirwa kika kye kyokka kabaka asobola okusiima emirimu gye nabeerako kyamuwa wabula si kumuteeka ku nninga nti alina okukusasulanoolwekyo alina okudda mu kika kye kikole ku nsonga ye eyoekitongole kya unesco kiweerezza abakungu baakyo okwetegereza nokunoonyereza ku kitambuza omulimu gwamasiro akasoobobaamaze ennaku bbiri mu masiro e kasubi gye baasisinkanidde abakwatibwako bababuulire entambula yomulimudaniel kaweesi omukungu mu unesco yategeezezza nti bano bazze nokwekenneenya ensonga yobweyamo bwensimbi ze baateeka mu pulojekiti yokuzzaawo amasiro eya ddoola 650000 mu 2012 okulaba ngekola ku bigwa tebiraze nga nokutuusa leero entegeka eno temalirizibwangakaweesi yagambye nti abakalu bano enzaalwa za japan baawa obweyamo buno mu 2012 endagaano ne bagizza buggya mu 2014 era enteekateeka netetambula nga bwe baali baagala endagaano neddamu nezzibwa obuggya okutuusa 2016 kyokka nagwo gugenda kuggwaakomu kwekenneenya ebitambuza omulimu akasoobo bagenda kulaba oba ddala obweyamo buno basobola okubwongerayo okutuuka 2018baasisinkanye kaminsona wetterekero lyebyedda mu minisitule yobulambuzi mu ggwanga rose mwanja ne boogerezeganya ku ntambuza ya pulogulamu okuzimbirwa amasiro ganokaweesi yategeezezza nti  omutendera kwe tuli gwe gusinga obuzibu mu mulimu guno  okuluka akasolya nobwegenderezawadde olina abakozi bangi tosobola kugamba nti bano kabakwate wano abalala bave ku ludda luli neddamulina kutandikira ku luuyi lumu ne mulutereezabino ebirukibwa abantu bye bagenda okusigala nga balaba emirembe nemirembe noolwekyo bwopapirira okyusa omulamwa gwekifo kino ogwakirondesa unescoera kaweesi agamba nti omutendera guno si gwa buli muntu kuba batono abagutegeera ate gulina abantu abagukola okusinziira ku nnono ekigufuula ogwenjawuloabali ku mulimu guno baategeezezza abakugu bano nti ebbanga abantu lye baamala nga buli ayagala agenda mu kifo kino kyabasumbuwa kuba buli omu yawanga amagezi kyokka okuva amasiro lwe gaggalwa mu march wa 2016 kati abazimbi bakola bulungi emirimu gyabwe awatali kutataganyizibwaakulira pulojekiti yokuzimba amasiro jonathan nsubuga bwe yabuuziddwa ku bya sserumpanise yagambye nti oyo talina ssente yonna gyabanja yeenoonyeza bibyekatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti ku mulembe guno tosobola kusaba busabi mukisa ogukutuusa ku buwanguzi bwoyagala ne bujja nga tokozebino eyekijjukizo mwe baazaalira ssekabaka muteesa iiwabaluseewo okusika omuguwa okwamaanyi wakati wa mmengo ne yunivasite ye makerere ngobuzibu buva ku kcca okuwa makerere ensimbi obuwumbi mukaaga bbiriliizi yaalyo yaggwaako mu 1975 nga lyagiweebwa mu 1922 nga lya ofiisi ya katikkiro wa bugandakwe kutudde ettendekero lyamateeka ku yunivaiste eno era nokutuusa kati ebadde tezzanga liizi yaalyo buggyaekizuukusa ensonga eno makerere yamaliriza enteekateeka zokuwa yinvesita okukulaakulanya ettaka lyayo eriwerako yiika ezisukka 15 e kizungu makindye ekisangibwa mu divizoni ye makindye mu kampalamu kifo kino ekye makindye we wali enju mwe baazaalira ssekabaka muteesa ii nga ge gaali amaka ga dr albert cook waamuweebwa kabaka kyokka olwemirimu gye yali akola e makerere bwe yali ava kuno ekifo kino nakiwa yunivasite eyongere okukolerako emirimuobwakabaka bwa buganda mu kaweefube gwe buliko okukuuma ennono obuwangwa nebyafaayo bwasinzidde ku kino ne buwandiikira makerere nga bugitegeeza nti nga tennawaayo ttaka eri bamusigansimbi be balowooza nti tebajja kussa kitiibwa mu nju eno eyebyafaayo ettaka lino balikwase mmengo okudda mu kifo kyeryo erye makerere awali law school mmengo lyegamba nti lyayo kyokka nga makerere yalifunyeeko dda ssentedennis bugaya nga ye mwogezi wa buganda land board yategeezezza bukedde nti oluvannyuma lwa makerere okubulwa ensimbi ezizza obuggya liizi yettaka lye makerere twagisaba tutegeeragane tubalirire ensimbi ezigya mu ttaka eriri e makerere tuzigeraageranye ne yiika eziri wakati wessatu nettaano ze twagala ku ttaka lye makindye we baazaalira ssekabaka edward luwangula muteesa ii bugaya yayongeddeko nti baafuna ebbaluwa nga april 20 2016 okuva ewomuwandiisi wa yunivasite eno charles barugahare ngabategeeza nga bwe batalina buyinza kuwaanyisa ttaka lino kuba amateeka agakola ku byokugula nokutunda ebintu mu bitongole bya gavumenti tegalina nkola eno ate nekirala baamaliriza dda okukola entegeka zokukulaakulanya ettaka lye makindyeokusinziira ku biwandiiko bukedde bye yalabyeko oluvanyuma lwenteeseganya makerere yasalawo ezze buggya liizi neweereza ku akawunti ya blb nnamba 9030005607948 eri mu stanbic bank ssente mwenda biri mu buganda           abamu ku batongole ba kabaka abeetabye mu musomo lumaama francis mugumya ntambaazi yennyamidde ku batongole ba ssabasajja e kabula abasiiba mu birabo byomwenge ne beesiwa amagengere okutuuka embwa okugiyita wabino yabyogeredde mu musomo gwabatongole okuva mu magombolola musanvu agakola disitulikiti ye lyantonde mu musomo ogwatuuziddwa ku kitebe kyeggombolola ye kaliirookuleeta omusomo guno kiddiridde lumaama okwekubira omulanga eri ssabasajja ku ngeri abatongole be gye beeyisamu mu ssazza lye kabula ekyamuwalirizza okubaletera omusomesa okuva e mmengo abasomese ku bulombolombo obubafuga saako emirimo gye bateekeddwa okukolaekyasinze okwewuunyisa abantu be bamu ku batogole abazze mu musomo guno nga batamidde gattako okwambala engoye enjulifu nga zikubiddwaakonebirakalumaama yagambye nti teyakeera kwesimbawo okufuuka kyali wabula ssabasajja yamugondomolako ekitiibwa kya  lumaama lwa nneeyisa ye obuyivu nempisaye omusomesa okuva e mengo haris lubega yakubirizza abatongole obutaba nga miti egitambuza amasannyalaze olwo gyo ne gisula mu nzikiza nabakuutira okubeera ekyokulabirako eri           katikkiro charles peter mayiga ngakwasa omulangira kitayimbwa emmotoka mu makaage e ndaiga lwebitakulikabaka mutebi ii asiimye natonera omulangira kitayimbwa mumiransanafu emmotoka ekika kya noah voxy okumuyambako ku mirimu gyeemmotoka eno yamukwasiddwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga ku lwokubiri lwa wiiki eno ngamusiima okukuuma okutaasa nokutolosa ssekabaka muteesa ii mu 1966 bwe yali alumbiddwa amagye ga gavumenti ya obotemayiga yategeezezza nti  ssaabasajja yategeezebwa nti omulangira ono atawaanyizibwa nentambula ngagenda okujjanjabwa kye yavudde asiima namugulira emmotoka emuyambeko okumutuusa mu ddwaaliromu kiseera ssekabaka muteesa ii we yawahhaangukira kitayimbwa ye yali omwami wessaza lye mawogolo era yamuyisa mu kitundu kino okumutuusa e burundi ngeno gye yava okugenda e bungerezaku mukolo guno kitayimbwa yanyumizza bye baayitamu okutaasa obulamu bwa ssekabaka muteesa ii okuli nokusimattuka ebikemo okuva mu basajja ba obote abaali baagala okumuwa omusimbi abababuulire wa muteesa ii gye yalikitayimbwa yanyumiza nti  baali baagala okumpa 2000 mu kiseera ekyo naye katonda yamponya kuba singa kati ndi omu ku mbuyaga ezikunta kubanga bangi ku bannange baava dda mu bulamu bwensi ate nze obwesigwa bannyabye katonda ampangaaza okutuuka leeroomulangira kitayimbwa yabadde nabenju ye okwabadde omuzaana omubaka wa mawogola south mu palamenti joseph ssekabiitowabaluseewo obutakkaanya wakati wekitongole kya mmengo ekyebyettaka ekya buganda land board blb nobulabirizi bwe namirembe olwettaka eragambibwa nti blb yaligabye emirundi ebiripoloti ekaayanirwa eri ku kkanisa ya katwe martyrsekkanisa yafuna ebbaluwa okuva mu blb nga march 10 2015 ngeriko omukono gwa kizito bashir juma ngewa ekkanisa liizi ewerako decimal 4kizito yategeeza ekkanisa nti ejja kusasula obukadde 115 gattako 950000 ezabapunta ne busuulu wa buli mwaka 1150000poloti yemu blb negiguza omusuubuzi mubarakabudullah londaekkanisa yeekubidde enduulu mu kcca eyimirize omugagga okukozesa ekifo ekyoomukungu wa kabaka era avunaanyizibwa ku kukulaakulanya ekkanisa ye katwe gaster lule ntake yawandiikidde dayirekita wa kampala jeniffer musisi nti singa omugagga agenda mu maaso nokuzimba mu poloti eyo ekkanisa ejja kuba tekyasobola kukozesa kifo kyayopoloti ekaayanirwa ntono eringa lukuuboeva ku lwe masaka nga waakayita ku nkulungo e kibuye okutuuka ku wansanso road olugatta ku ring road okumpi nekkanisa ye katweomwogezi wa blb denis bugaya yagambye nti liizi yaweereddwa mubarakabdullah kubanga yali yagula dda poloti eriraanyewo naweebwa ekyapaakawugiro akaasigalawo kwaliko abatundirawo embaawo kyokka omwaka oguwedde yabagula ne bavaawo asobole okutwalawobwe yasaba liizi blb yali tesobola kugimumma kubanga abaaliwo yali amaze okubasasulanagamba nti ekkanisa emanyi ekituufuettaka lyayo lyagiweebwa mu 1920 era liizi yaakazzibwa obuggyaakawugiro tekali ku ttaka lya kkanisaekkanisa eba tekozesezza bwenkanya okukaayanira akawugiro akobwe yabuuziddwa lwaki poloti yagabibwa emirundi ebiriera lwaki ekkanisa eyasooka okusaba newandiikirwa nebbaluwa egiwa ekifo ekyo ate baagyefuulirayagambye nti ebbaluwa yali ewa ekkanisa olukusa okusasula naye ekyo tekitegeeza nti ekkanisa yali efunye liiziekkanisa yalina kusooka kusasula nokumaliriza emitendera emirala gyonnakyokka ekkanisa terina kye yakolawonagamba nti mubarak bwe yaweebwa omukisa yatuukiriza ebisaanyizo byonna era ne bamuwa liizikyokka omwogezi wekkanisa ye katwe daudi lukwago yagambye nti blb teyalaga bwenkanyanagamba nti okubawa liizi ku ttaka lya yiika nnamba baasasula obukadde 70kyokka bwe baasabye akawugiro ka decimolo nnya4 baabasabye obukadde 115ekirala bwe bwangu obwakozeseddwa mu kugabira mubarak liizinagamba nti ebbaluwa eyabawa liizi teyaliiko kiseera kigere mwe balina kusasuliraogumu ku mitendera gye baalina okuyitamu kwali kugenda mu kcca kyokka abakugu ne babategeeza nti akawugiro ke basaba kitundu kya luguudooluvannyuma lwa ntake okuwandiikira kcca nga yeemulugunya akola ku byettaka mu kcca yawandiikidde buganda land board nga october 10 nga bayimiriza enteekateeka zonna ku kugaba ettaka eryo okutuusa ngokwemulugunya okuliwo kugonjoddwaebbaluwa yagambye nti aba blb tebaawa kcca kifaananyi kituufu kubanga ebiwandiiko byabwe tebyalaga nti waliwo enkaayana ku ttaka eryoebbaluwa yabuuzizza kijja kitya okuwa ekkanisa ettaka ate ne muliwa ne mubarakebbaluwa yaweereddwaako omulabirizi we namirembe jeniffer musisi nabakulira ebitongole byettaka nabapunta ba kccalukwago yagambye nti ekkanisa eyagala bwenkanya kye yavudde yeekubira enduulu mu kccaekirungi gaster lule ntake naye mukungu e mmengo ate nga akulira buganda land board kiwalabye male naye ali munda mu kkanisawabula balooya ba mubarak aba ssengooba  coadvocates bawandiikidde chris tembo eyayimirizza blb okuwa mubarak olukusa ngagamba nti oluvannyuma lwa blb okusalawo nkyabadde tekyetaagisa kwongewra kunonooza bantu balalakwe kwebuuza mukkiriza mutya ebbaluwa ya ntake atamanyiddwa ngomuyima wettaka lyekkanisaebbaluwa ya ntake terina makulu kubanga bannannyini ttaka aba blb baamaze okuwa mubarak olukusalukwago yagambye enkaayana zaatandika mu 2014 mubarak ekkanisa egamba nti nnanyini kifo omutuufu ye semakula nnanyini kizimbe ekiri emmanga wessomero lya katwe martyrs ps bwe yamanya nga liizi yekkanisa eneetera okuggwaako yassaawo ekizimbe neyingira ku ttaka lyekkanisaensonga zaagenda mu blb era agikulira kiwalabye male nalagira mubarak ateese nekkanisaensonga zaagenda e namirembe ne kisalibwawo mubarak akozese ekifo kye yatwala era aleme kusasula ssente yonnaekkanisa yali emaze okukola pulaani okuzimba amaduuka nessomero eryomulembe nga litunudde mu luguudo lwa masaka road kino kyatuwaliriza okukyusa pulaani kuba kati waali wazimbiddwawo ekizimbe ekirala mu maasotwakola pulaani endala ngetunudde mu wansaso roadbwe twamala okukola pulaani empya ekkanisa yaasalawo esabe liizi ku kataka ka road reserve aka tuli mu maaso akatukaayanya okuva mu blb nga tetwagala ate omuntu mulala kukatwala ate okusiikiriza amaduuka ge tugenda okuzimbawoakawugiro kano ze decimolo 4 ezikaayanirwaomu ku bakrisitaayo norah ssettimba yagambye mmaze e katwe ebbanga ddene era nasomesaako mu ssomero lyekkanisa emyaka musanvu nga tetulina nkaayana era nga buli omu amanyi bulungi nti ettaka lya kkanisa omugagga ono ebintu bye bya kweyongeza yazimba kalina ye nayingira mu ttaka lyessomero ngagenda agaziyira mu bbanga era awali ekizimbe lwali luggya lwa ssomero mubarak tetwasobodde kumufuna okwogera ku nsonga eno           eyali kaggo tofiri maloweza ngakutte ekibbo omwali musoolozebwa ettoffaali mu biseera nga lyakatandikibwako mu masiroyabadde ebulayo ennaku ssatu zokka katikkiro ne ttiimu esolooza ettoffaali okugenda e kyaggwe nga september 26 ekirango ne kiyita nti katikkiro takyagenzekyokka nga october 5 2016 abe kyaggwe beesitudde ne bajja ku bulange ne bakwasa katikkiro ettoffaali lya bukadde 17ensonda enneekusifu mu lubiri lwa ssaabasajja zaategeezezza bukedde nti katikkiro okusazaamu okugenda e kyaggwe kyaddiridde kabaka okumulagira ayimirize mbagirawo okusolooza ettoffaali enteekateeka eyo esooke emale okwongera okwetegerezebwaebyo okubaawo kabaka yabadde atuukiriddwa abantu abenjawulo ne boogerako naye ku nsonga zettoffaaliabamu baamusabye azitunulemu nga bagamba nti enkola eno wadde yatandika nebbugumu era nesiimibwa wetuuse ebadde etandise okulabisa obubi bugandaabamu ku bantu bano okwabadde abataka baategeezezza kabaka nti ebitundu abakungaanya ettoffaali gye baava ate gye baddaekivuddeko abantu abamu okutandika okusondera mu kwekaka nga batya okulabika obubibaamugattiddeko nti abantu ba buganda kye basinga okwetaaga kati zenteekateeka ezibaggya mu bwavu wabula wano ettoffaali terikwatawoabantu abaggyibwamu ettoffaali baavu ate nga tewali nteekateeka zibaweereddwa okubaggya mu bwavuabamu baagasseeko nekya ssente zettoffaali ne bategeeza kabaka nti yandisiimye natunula mu nsaasaanya yaazo kubanga mu kusooka abaazisondanga baafulumyanga enkalala zabantu abasonze nomuwendo ogusondeddwa ne bwe zikozeseddwa kyokka ekiseera kyatuuka ne bayimiriza okufulumya ensasaanyakati abantu basonda kyokka tebakyafuna nkozesa accountabilitykigambibwa nti kabaka era yaweereddwa amagezi nti si kirungi okusonda ettoffaali ngabantu beemulugunya naddala ku biriwo ebya buganda land board okubasasuza ssente ku ttaka lya kabakaomukungu omu yagambye nti wadde enkola eno nnungi kyokka yeetaaga okuwaayo obudde abantu bagitegeereensonda zaategeezezza bukedde nti omu ku bataka yalaze obutali bumativu mu maaso ga kabaka namutegeeza nti wadde ettoffaali lizimbye masengere wabula mu kutandika okulisonda essira lyali ku masiro ge kasubi kyokka gakyalemyebukedde yayogedde nomutaka ono nategeeza nti okugenda ewa kabaka yasooka kufuna kwemulugunya ku kukwataganya ebintu ebingi ebimu ne bibuutikirwanawa ekyokulabirako nti katikkiro yalangirira enteekateeka yokukola ennyanja ya kabaka mu ndeeba kyokka tewakyali ayogera ku mulimu ogwo wadde okutwalayo abantu okugulambula ngentegeka bwe yaliensonda zaategeezezza nti kino kabaka yakikoze mwezi guwedde nga tannasitula kugenda london nga september 7kyokka abasolooza ettoffaali baasoose kwegeyaamu ku ngeri esinga obulungi okuyimiriza okugenda e kyaggwe mu kiseera ngabantu baabadde bamaze okukungibwakwe kusalawo abe kyaggwe ne bamaliriza okusonda ettoffaali ne babategeeza balitwale mu bulangeku nkomerero yomwezi oguwedde katikkiro yategeezezza olukiiko lwa baminisita nti okukuhhaanya ettoffaali kugenda kuyimiriramu kubanga awulira omubiri gunafuyeemu nga yeetaaga ekiseera ekiwummulamuokusolooza ettoffaali kwatandika september 20 2013 e mityanakatikkiro akoze omulimu munene okukunga obuganda ngayita mu ttoffaali erizimbye masengere okuddaabiriza amasiro nokutandika ku nnyanja ya kabakalyakavaamu ssente ezikunukkiriza obuwumbi 11akulira akakiiko kettoffaali kiyimba freeman yategeezezza bukedde eggulo nti okuyimiriza mu ttoffaali kyakoleddwa olwemirimu egyamangu kabaka gye yawadde katikkiro nga tasobola kutalaaga bitundu bye babadde bazzaako ngalina kwemalira ku mirimu egyofreeman yagasseeko nti baayimirizza mwaka guno era basuubira okuddamu okutalaaga buganda mu kusonda ettoffaali mu february 2017 nagattako nti ebitundu bye twayimirizza bibadde bisigaddeyo bitono bina byokka okuli mukono ssese kira ne mawokota northera byebimu ku bye bagenda okutandikirako ngettoffaali lizzeemu okusondebwakyokka yagambye nti abantu ssente zettoffaali bazitwale ku bulange mu ofiisi ya katikkiroyagambye nti ebyekiragiro kya kabaka tabimanyiiko wabula kyamanyi waliwo abantu abomutima omukotoggezi abaludde nga balyogerera amafuukuule naye abantu abo baalubatu tebasobola kubaggya ku mulamwaomu ku bawerekera katikkiro mu kusolooza ettoffaali yategeezezza bukedde nti awagira okuyimiriza ku ttoffaali basooke beetegerezenagamba nti babadde bakaluubirirwa olwebifo ebingi bye balina okutuukamu olunakunagamba nti katikkiro abaserikale be bamusaggulira wayita era olwobwangu aba yaakatuuka mu kifo abakungu be bagenda okumaliriza okusimba emmotoka zaabwe bajje bamwegatteko basanga katikkiro amaze okukwata ettoffaali ngagenda mu kifo ekiddakkonagamba nti kino kibaluma kubanga beerekereza ebintu bingi okuwerekera ku katikkiro kyokka ne batafuna mukisa wadde okwanjulwa eri abantu ba ssaabasajja           ekizimbe ekigambibwa okuba ekya katikkiro mayiga mu katono ekyamenyeddwakatikkiro charles peter mayiga olwategeezeddwa nti abeebibanja ku ttaka eriri e nakaseke basitudde olutalo ne yeesitula nabalumbayayitidde ku poliisi ye nakaseke nassa omukono mu kitabo kya poliisi era naweebwa nabapoliisi abeegasse ku baserikale abamukuuma ne boolekera ettaka eririko enkaayana ku kyalo nabbiika mu ggombolola ye nakaseke mu disitulikiti ye nakasekeettaka lino liri ku block 1029 plot 6 ne 7 bulemeezi era kuliko yiika 100 ezaasibiddwaako ssengenge mu nteekateeka eyakoleddwa ofiisi ya katikkiro ngekolaganira ne buganda land board nekigendererwa ekyokulikulaakulanya basseeko ffaamu ya katikkirowadde abatuuze bakissa ku katikkiro nti yabagoba ku ttaka era abadde agendayo ntakera okulambula emirimu egirikolerwako mmengo yatangaazizza nti ettaka lino ssi lya mayiga ngomuntu wabula lya bwakatikkiro era alirambula mu buvunaanyizibwa obwamukwasibwa kabaka okulondoola emirimu gyobwakabakaakanyoolagano ku ttaka lino kaatandika 2014 era abeebibanja balumiriza abantu ba katikkiro okukozesa eryaanyi ne babakoonera amayumbamu kwesasuza abatuuze baalumbye ennyumba ebadde yaakazimbibwa ku ttaka lino ne bagikoona ne bagiyiwa ku ttakabaatwaliddemu ne kaabuyonjo ne ssengenge eyasibwa okwetoloola ettaka ne bamusalaennyumba eyakooneddwa yazimbibwa ofiisi ya katikkiro okusuza abakozi abanaddukanya ffaamuabatuuze baagikoonye matumbibudde era kino kyekyanyiizizza katikkiro mayiga ne yeesitula nabalumba ku mmandeafricano tebeesigwa omu ku beebibanja abali ku ttaka lino yagambye nti okusika omuguwa kwatandika mwaka guwedde katikkiro bwe yagendayo nabasaveya ne bapunta ettaka linoakakuubagano akamaanyi keeyongera ku nkomerero yomwaka oguwedde nga batandise okulisibako ssengenge ne batwaliramu ebibanja byabantu abagambibwa nti beesenzaawo mu bukyamutebeesigwa yagambye nti tewali kuliyirira kwonna kwakolebwa okuggyako okubatiisatiisa okubasiba nti beesenza ku ttaka mu bumenyi bwamateeka era ne babalagira okulyamukatebeesigwa yannyonnyodde ebyabaddewo nga katikkiro abatuuseeko ku mmande nga october 10 2016 ku ssaawa nga 700 ezemisana era yatandikidde mu kubabuuza kana nakataanotebeesigwa yategeezezza nti katikkiro yantunudde mu maaso nga mukambwe nnyo nambuuza ani yabasenza wano nabadde sinnayanukula basajja be ne bayiika ku nnyumba yange ne bagikoona era nabadde ngezaako okubakomako ne bampisaamu empibwe baavudde ku yange ne balumba eya munnange cosma kyombe nayo ne bagikoona nga batugamba nti twesenza ku ttaka lya katikkiro mu bukyamubaavuddewo batukomekkereza okwamuka ettaka bwe tuba twagala emirembetebeesigwa yagambye nti mu kusooka baakoona ennyumba zabatuuze ssatu ate lwe bazzeeyo ku mmande ne bakoona endala bbirikigambibwa nti abatuuze be baasooka okukoonera ennyumba be bamu ku baakulembeddemu okumenya ennyumba ku ffaamu yobwakatikkiroveronica nalubowa omu ku batuuze yagambye nti ye ne bba omugenzi boniface mugerwa baasenga ku ttaka eryo mu 1970 era balinako ekibanja kya yiika 7 wabula mu kusiba ssengenge baazitwaliddemuyagambye nti balina obulumi kubanga be bagobwa ku ttaka ate nga mu kiseera kye kimu ne poliisi ebayigga ngebavunaana okumenya ennyumba ku ffaamu ya katikkiro nokusala ssengenge era abatuuze abawerako baliira ku nsiko nga batya poliisi okubaggalirakatikkiro mayiga yategeezezza bukedde nti yagenze e nakaseke ku ttaka lino mu buvunaanyizibwa obwamukwasibwa kabaka okulondoola emirimu nebintu byobwakabakayagambye nti ettaka lino liri wansi wa bwakabaka era kimukakatako nga katikkiro okulitaasa naddala nga waliwo bannakigwanyizi abaagala okulitwala nga bakozesa olukujjukujjuyajulizza buganda land board ku bisingawo ku ttaka linoomwogezi wa buganda land board denis bugaya yategezezza nti ettaka lino lya bwakabaka nga liri kwebyo ebintu byobwakabaka ebyawambibwa mu 1966 ngera limu kweryo eryazzibwa e mmengo mu 2013kyokka yagasseeko nti liri ku mayiro ya bwakatikkiro wabula lirabirirwa buganda land board era yevunaanyizibwa ku nteekateeka ezirikulaakulanyabugaya yagambye nti olwokuba ettaka lino lyamala ebbanga nga teriri mu mikono gya bwakabaka lyasengebwako abantu mu bitundu ebimu kyokka enteekateeka weeziri okulaba nga beetegereza buli omu engeri gye yajjamu wano balabe ekyokumukolera kuba balina emirimu gyenkulaakulana gye baagala okukolerawobugaya yanyonyodde nti  ngenkola yobwakabaka bweeri twagala buli alina ensonga yonna engumu ajje twogere naye kyokka abo abaagala okutwala ebyobwereere tetugenda kutunula mu nsonga zaabwe kuba lino ttaka ttalize obwakabaka lye buteeseteese okukolerako emirimu gyenkulakulanabugaya yagambye nti katikkiro okugendayo tekitegeeza nti ettaka lirye ngomuntu ngabatuuze bwe balowooza wabula yagenzeeyo ngakulira emirimu gyobwakabaka era ateekeddwa okulaba ebifo ebyo byonna ebiyinza okukolerwako enkulaakulana asobole bulungi okuginnyonyola ne bannamikagoate ku kyokumenyebwa kwebintu bugaya yagambye nti mu kusooka abatuuze baakola omusango gwokumenya ebintu bya nnannyinni ttaka bye yateekawo okukugira ettaka lino kyokka nagamba nti tewali kintu kya batuuze kye baayonoonyeyagambye nti obwakabaka tebulina muntu yenna gwebugenderera kulumya mu nsonga eno wabula abantu basaanye okukimanya nti obwakabaka nabwo bubeera nebyabwo era ebirina okukuumibwa ku lwobulungi bwabantu baabwosam ssebalamu amyuka omwami wa ssaabasajja atwala ggombolola ye nakaseke yagambye nti ettaka lino lyadda mu ofiisi ya katikkiro mu 2014 era ne lipuntibwa mu 2015 ne lisibwako ssengengekyokka ssentebe wakakiiko kebyettaka mu disitulikiti ye nakaseke geoffrey mukiibi yagambye nti ettaka eryo disitulikiti ye nakasekeokusinziira ku kyapa ssentebe wa ggombolola ye nakaseke john mugerwa kye yalaze bannamawulire ettaka erikaayanirwa lye limu ku ttaka eriwerako yiika 800 eisangibwa ku block 1029 nabbiika estate mu bulemeezimugerwa yagambye nti ettaka lino lyerimu ku lyali limanyiddwa ngettaka lya kkwiini  crown land oluvannyuma eryafuulibwa public land nga uganda efunye obwetwaze mu 1962mugerwa yanenyezza abamu ku baami ba ssaabasajja mu nakaseke be yagambye nti beenyigidde mu kubuzaabuza abantu nga babalimba nti ettaka lya eryo lya mayiro ya katikkirobino byonna birese abeebibanja batabuddwa ku kiddakoomuduumizi wa poliisi mu disitulikiti ye nakaseke justus asiimwe yagambye nti enkaayana ku ttaka eryo zirudde okuva katikkiro lwe yasiba ssengenge omwaka oguwedde kyokka nga wakyaliwo okubuzaabuzibwa ani mutuufu ku njuuyi zonnaasiimwe yagambye nti poliisi eriko abatuuze babiri benoonya beteebereza okuba nga balina kye bamanyi ku kumenyebwa kwennyumba yoku ffaamu           abomu katale e nakawa bakolera mu kasasiro naye tebakitwala ngekikulu balinda gavumenti ebayambewiiki ya bulungibwansi mu buganda ekomekkerezebwa leero ku lwomukaaga era ssaabasajja ronald muwenda mutebi ii ali mu ssaza lya busujju okugiwumbawumbamu mboozi esembayo ku bulungibwansi alice namutebi alaga ebiyinza okukolebwa okumuzza ku mutindoku kyalo kyammwe gyobeera maka ameka agakaaba ebikuye bwoba otambula mu kkubo oyita ku kasasiro wa mirundi emekaobuuka emyala emeka egijjudde kasasiro nga tonnatuuka ku luguudoggwe akolera mu katale kasasiro gwe mukungaanya abawunyirira kumala nnaku mmeka nga mulinda ekimotoka kijje kimutwaleeno yembeera abasinga gye tuyitamu mu uganda etuuse nokutwekwesa bannaffe kyokka buli omu omulanga agukubira gavumenti ejje etuyambe ku bizibu byomu kitunduowulira bameka abawoza gavumenti eriwo kutukolera kubanga nomusolo tugiwa munginaye weebuuze nti ssinga gavumenti erwawo oba egaanira ddala okufuuyira ebiku nensiri ebibaluma onoobigumira kutuusa ddiye ssinga emmotoka eyoola kasasiro efa okumala omwezi oba gavumenti nesalawo nti tegenda kuddamu kwera na kuyonja nguudo za mu kibuga ne mu kitundu kyo olwo kasasiro oba waakumusambya bigere oba onoomuleka atuuke mu ddiirobino byonna bye bikulaga obulungi bwa bulungibwansi enkola abantu bomu kitundu mwe beegattira okwekolera ku bizibu byabweeno yenkola eyayawulanga buganda ku bitundu ebirala nga bulungibwansi tataliza bakulu nabato abagagga nabaavukiki ekyatta omwoyo gwa bulungibwansi ekivuddeko abantu bomu katale ke kireka okulekanga kasasiro nabuna oluguudo ne ku mwala kwe bakolera nga bali awo batunulaebyatta bulungibwansi eyali kaggo tofiri malokweza agamba nti edda abantu baakolanga bulungibwansi awatali kukakibwa nga buli omu akimanyi nti ku lunaku bwe luti tukeera kukolera kitundunga mugogola enzizi okuzimbira abakadde amayumba nokubalimirako buli omu nalima ekkubo erimutuusa ewuwe nokukola ebintu ebyenjawulo ebiyamba obulamu bwo nekitundu mwobeera naye kati otya nokuyita awantu nga wonna wasaakaatidde tewali gwe kikwatakobwabanga buvunaanyizibwa bwa mutongole okukunga abantu okukola bulungibwansi naye okuva obwakabaka bwe bwawerebwa enkyukakyuka ezajja na kati abantu tebamanyi ani ateekeddwa okubakunga bakole bulungibwansiosanga kati obuvunaanyizibwa bwandibadde bwa ssentebe wa kyalo naye abasinga bakeera kugenda mu kibuga kwenoonyeza ssente tebamanyi na batuuze bali ku kitundu yadde ebikifaakokati ssentebe bwati asobola atya okukunga abantu nabateekamu omwoyo gwokukola bulungibwansi malokweza bwabuuzamalokweza alowooza nti olwokuba buli kyalo kirina akakiiko kandibadde keerondamu omuntu avunaanyizibwa ku bulungibwansi ssentebe bwaba tabeerawo oyo nga yakunga abantu okukolerera ekitundu era ngayiiya nebintu ebyetaaga amaanyi agawamu nabimanyisa ekyalokati abantu oluwulira nti kabaka waakulabikako mu kitundu kyabwe olwo lwe bajjukira okulima ekkubo ne bagogola enzizi nokutereeza ebisobye olwokuba abaamawulire bagenda kubaayo balage byonna sso nga bwandibadde buvunaanyizibwa bwa buli kiseeramalokweza agamba ebyobufuzi nabyo byakola kinene okumalawo omwoyo gwa bulungibwansi era bangi bwe bamussaako amaanyi ngabalala bamulemesa nebyobufuzibannabyabufuzi abamu bajja kulya bakola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba nga tebanyiiza bantu babayambye okwenywereza mu buyinzabwoleeta ekirowoozo kyokukola bulungibwansi nabandibadde baagala okukwegattako babeera batya abalala okubalowoozesa nti baasala eddiiro ne badda mu kibiina kyoengeri endala eyokuzza bulungibwansi ku mutindo kwe kussaawo ekibonerezo ngoli bwatamukola ngayinza okulagirwa okumaala essomero oba okusasulayo omutemwa ogusaliddwaawo ne ziyamba ekitunduabantu abatalina mwoyo gwa ggwanga lyabwe babireetamu ebyamawanga nti ebyo bya baganda era bulungibwansi bwatuuka waliwo abakyewalira ddala nga bagamba nti bya bagandaekintu ekiyamba ekyalo kwobeera okuli abantu abamawanga agenjawulo okugeza okulima ekkubo mwe muyita kiyinza kitya okuyamba abaganda bokka okuggyako nga naawe teweeyagalizamalokweza bwe yabuuzizzamunnamawulire drake ssekeba agamba nti obote bwe yawera obwakabaka emisingi gyonna egyaleeteranga abantu okolagananira awamu nokwagala eggwanga lyabwe yagiggyawo ate natazzaawo miralaokuva olwo omwoyo gwokukolera awamu gwaggwaawo olwentiisa obote gye yabateekamu ngabamu batya nokukola ebintu ebyali bibagatta nga bulungibwansi olwokutya okubayita abayeekeraobwakabaka bwe bwazzibwawo oluvannyuma lwemyaka emingi kaweefube wokuddamu okwagazizza abantu eggwanga lyabwe yali mutono kyekyo lwaki ne bulungibwansi tebakyamujjumbirakati nensi yayonooneka abantu buli kimu baagala kusasulwa nekintu ekigenda okubayamba basooka kulowooleza kwani agenda okubasasulaomwoyo ogweggwanga lyaffe mutono ssekeba bwe yawunziseatwala eggombolola ye nakawa ahmed matovu agamba nti abamu ku bantu abali mu buyinza tebakyalina mugongobatya okugamba ku bantu okukola bulungibwansi olwokutya okufiirwa akaluluabagagga babatiisa amaaso era nabandibadde bakola babireetamu entondo olwokuba abagagga tebagambibwakoendowooza enkyamu nti gavumenti ejje etuyambe yerina okulwanyisibwa olwo bulungibwansi adde ku mutindomatovu agamba nti abantu beeyingizaamu omutima omunafu ogwagala okubakolera buli kimubuli akagwawo nga basaba gavumenti ejje ebayambe natalina kaabuyonjo waka tekimuswaza kusaba gavumenti emuyambe ssinga twali tukwatira wamu ngabantu tebeeyagaliza bokka olunaku lwa bulungibwansi lwandibadde namakulu mangi ddalaku kyalo bwe mwegatta ne mugula eddagala lyebiku ne mufuuyira amayumba gonna gavumenti muba mutawaanya yaakiabaana bammwe bwe baba tebalya mmere ku ssomero naye ngessomero lirina ettaka awokulimira lwaki abazadde tebeegatta ne balima emmere yabaana baabwe nga nabo bwe babayambakoeddwaaliro lyammwe mu kitundu bwe liba jjama lwaki temwegatta ne mulirongoosa mu kifo kyokulinda gavumenti ekyo nakyo ekibakolerer so nga mmwe mulikozesa bwabuuzaomwogezi wekitongole ekiramuzi erias kisawuzi yagambye nti kati kkooti yateekawo enkola ya bulungibwansi mu bibonerezo omuntu asingisiddwa omusango ogutali gwa naggomola mu kifo kyokumusiba omulamuzi asobola okulamugira okukola bulungibwansi ku kyalo okumala           kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii ngakola dduyiroabantu ba ssaabasajja mu ssaza lye busujju ne ssingo bali mu kwebuga olw omutanda eyasiimye okukuliza olunaku lwa bulungibwansi mu ssaza lye busujjuebiyitirirwa byazimbiddwa mu bubuga obuwerako era bangi baasuze bakuba embuutu nokutyabula amazina gokulaba ku kabakakasujju mark kaberenge jingo 11 mayanja avunaanyizibwa ku bulungibwansihajji sulaiman magala amyuka katambala yakubirizza bannabutambula okujjumbira okusaala juma olwaleero ku muzikiti gwomu kabuga ke kakinduabazinyi obwedda nabo bakola ogwaabwe okubugumya embuga           omutaka kayiira gajuule omutaka mbuga kasirye kyadondo mawesano ne nakigoye owookubiri okuva ku ddyo nga baakamaliriza olukiiko lwabwe e bulange mmengo ku lwokunaabataka abebika mu buganda balaze obwetaavu bwokwongera okusomesa abantu ku nsonga zettaka naddala eryobwakabaka okwewala okwekalakaasa nokutwala kabaka mu kkooti ebikolebwa abavubuka mu kiseera kinobino byabadde mu lukiiko lwabwe olwatudde e bulange ku lwokuna bwe baabadde boogera ku bigenda mu maaso mu bwakabakaabataka okwogera bino kiddiridde omuvubuka agamba nti wa kibiina kya nkobazambogo okugenda e bulange ku lwokusatu lwa wiiki eno nga balaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri katikkiro charles peter mayiga nekitongole kya buganda land board gye bakuttemu ensonga zettaka zettakaomutaka mbuga kasirye kyaddondo yategeezezza nti  ensonga zino zeetaaga okwogerwako naye eddagala tulizudde nti tulina okuddayo okutambuza buli nsonga ya buganda mu nnono yaayo nga bwerina okutambuzibwabuli ekikolebwa mu buganda kya nnono okuli ettaka ate nobukulembeze mu mitendera gyonna bwa nnono baagasseeko nti ensonga zettaka zirina okutunulwamu nokukakasa nti buli nsonga esooka kukkaanyizibwako nga wetuukira ewa kabaka nga yeekenneenyezeddwa okwewala okuleka amaloboozi agalaga obutali bumativuku byettaka bakkaatirizza nti wateekeddwa okubaawo okusomesa okwomuggundu abantu mu buganda bakenkuke ensonga zettaka kubanga kye kyobugagga ekisinga amaanyi buganda kyerinamu birala bye baakoonyeeko gwe musomo gwe baategese nga november 11 2016 ku hotel africana okusomesa bazzukkulu baabwe ku bikwata ku nnono nobuwangwa bwa buganda nga bwe birina okutambuzibwa nga guli wansi womulamwa  ennono ya buganda gyevudde weeri ne ggyeragaomutaka muteesasira keeya ttendo namuyimba akulira ekika kyengo yagambye nti buli kika kyasabiddwa abantu 20 nga buli omu wakusasula 50000 ne 100000 ngera bano be bagenda okuddayo mu bika byabwe basomese bannaabwemu lukiiko luno mwe baasisinkanidde abekibiina kyolulimi oluganda nga bano baabasabye okwongera amaanyi okulusomesa abantu nokulambika empandiika yaalwo eri abantu           katikkiro charles peter mayiga ngatoza wiiki bulungibwansimayiga yagambye nti  ekintu ekyakuyitimusa kyoddihhana era olaba nabasubuuzi ekintu kye basinga okwettanira katikkiro yayongedde nagamba nti  mu buganda okuva ssekabaka ttembo aleegesa hhoma ssaagalagalamidde mu kyasa ekya 15 abantu be ne batandika okukola bulungibwansi kyafuula buganda eyegombebwassi bazungu be baafula buganda eyamaanyi wabula bulungibwansi  ekitegeza okwerwanako ngova mu mbeera embi okudda mweyo eyeeyagazabino mayiga yabyogeredde atongozza wiiki ya bulungibwansi ku lwokutaano ngomukolo gwabadde mu katale e mengominisita wekikula kyabantu bulungibwansi 6 2016ebya muteesa i royal university byeyongedde okwonooneka abagikulira bwe batudde ne balagira omumyuka wa cansala waayo polofarthur sserwanga ku ddyo okugenda ku luwummula olukake nga bwe si mwangukigambibwa mu nsisinkano eyabaddemu ssebutinde nolukiiko olufuga yunivasite e masaka kwabadde kuzuula ezimu ku nsonga ezisoomooza yunivasite eno kyokka beekanze okulaba ngabayizi bava mu ssabanyalaabanyala bawambye embuga yeggombolola yomwami wa kabaka e bbaale bugererebategeezezza nti bagenda kukolerawo emikolo gyokujjukira bwe giweze emyaka 8 bukya balonda ssabanyalammengo egenda nabanyalaeggulo ku ssande baakedde ku mbuga ne bagyefuga nomwami wa kabaka atwala ekifo ne bamufuumuulaennyumba yomumyuka baagyeddizza mwe basula abamu bakira bakutte emiggo nga bakuuma abalala kawalyaeyali minisita wa kabaka owebyobulimi nobulunzi lutaaya mukomazi agwiriiddwa ekirwadde ne kimuziba emimwa ekisattiza bakungu banne e mmengolutaaya mu kiseera kino takyasobola kwogera kigambo yemirimuemizannyo kye kimu ku bintu ebyongera okutugatta nga tukolera wamu nga ttiimuate ngoggyeeko ekyo gituyambala okubeera abalamu obulungi okusobola okukola emirimunolwekyo kiyise nti buli bantubino yabyogedde atongoza empaka zemizannyo gyebitongole byobwakabaka e bulangemmengo ku lwokuna nga september 152016emizannyo gino gyatandikibwa omwaka oguwedde nga giwomeddwaamu ekitongole kyemizannyo era buganda land board ye yatwala ekikopo oluvannyuma lwokusinga ebitongole byonnaminisita wemizannyo e mmengo henry ssekabembe yasabye ebitongole okutwala empaka zino ngekikulu era bazeetegekere kuba ziteereddwamu emizannyo 17 era zitandika wiikendi enoabatuuze be nanga mu ggombolola ye kimmenyedde e mukono baddukidde ewomwami we ssaza lye kyaggwe ssekiboobo alex benjamin kigongo oluvannyuma lwomugagga okuvaayo nabategeeza ngettaka kwe bali bwe liri eriryebagamba nti baali beewandiisizza ngabeebibanja nga abekitongole kya kabaka ekya buganda land board be babawandiika kyokka basobeddwa omugagga bwabatuukiridde nabategeeza nga bwe balina okwamuka ettaka kuba liryeembeera eno yawalirizza abatuuze okulumba ssekiboobo nettabi lya buganda land board erye mukono okubatangaaza ku nsonga zomugagga paul mugambwa agamba nti ye nnannyini ttaka kwe balibagamba nti babadde bamanyi bulijjo nti ettaka kwe bali lya kabaka nga bwe baabadde beewandiisa buli omu yawaddeyo 100000 okusobola okunyweza obwannannyini ku bibanja byabwe mu lukiiko olwetabiddwaamu ssekiboobo kigongo omugagga mugambwa agamba nti ye nnannyini ttakateopista nanyonga atwala ettabi lya buganda land board e mukono yategeezezza abatuuze nti mugambwa ku kyalo alinako ettaka eriweza yiika 127 nga ekyapa kyalyo kya liizi gye yafuna mu 1981 nalikyusa nafuna ekyapa mu mannya ge mu 1998 ngaligula ku muntu eyalifuna oluvannyuma lwa kabaka okuwahhangusibwa nga balina kukirizza ettaka likubwe empenda okumanya walina okuyitakino kyatabudde abatuuze ne beewuunya engeri aba buganda land board gye baddiramu ettaka lya ssaabasajja eryabbibwa gavumenti ya bamusibiramubbwa ate ne baliguza abalala kyokka abatuuze abaliriko nga tebalina kye bamanyi ku ttaka kwe bamazze emyaka emingimuvumaganya kabaka mugabira mutya omuntu ekyapa nga mumanyi bulungi ettaka lyali lyabbibwa gavumenti ya obote nga kuliko abantu ne mutabafaako ate ne mugenda mu maaso nokubaggyako ssente nga abeebibanja bwe beecwacwanyessekiboobo yategeezezza abatuuze nti mugambwa babadde tebamumanyi naye okuva bwaggyeeyo ebiwandiiko nga bituufu bagenda kupima ettaka lye we liyita kuba erisinga obunene lya kabaka ngabantu abaliriko bajja kuweebwa ebiwandiika ngabeebibanja abatuufu bwe balina okubeerayabasabye okubeera abakkakkamu kuba embeera ejja kudda mu nteekowabula abatuuze beewuunyizza abagobebwa bangi ngabasinga bamaze ku ttaka ebbanga ddene          minisita avunaanyizibwa ku byamaulire e mmengo noah kiyimbaminisita avunaanyizibwa ku byamaulire e mmengo noah kiyimba bwe obuliko nebyapa ku bibanja kwe baliyagambye nti ssi kituufu nti buganda land board ekaka abantu okwewandiisa wabula ekoma ku kubakubiriza nokubannyonnyola ebirungi ebiri mu kwewandiisa nokufuna liizi era abaagadde okunyweza obusenze bwabwe ne beewandiisa awatali kukakibwayagambye nti mu nkola eno temuli kya kusala ku bibanja byabantu nti basobole okufuna liizi era ne yeewuunya engeri omuntu nokunafuya buganda land boardbarnabus ndawula akulira byamateeka mu blb yategeezezza nti bo tebagabanya mu kibanja kya muntu wabula bamunnyonnyola emitendera gyalina okuyitamu okuwandiisa ekibanja blb tekikkirizibwa           ssaabasajja ngakwasa omulabirizi wa west buganda omuggya ekirabokabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ngakwasa bphenry katumba tamale ekirabookumyozaayoza okutuuzibwa ku ntebe lukiiko lwa bugandakabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii agguddewo olukiiko lwa buganda olwomulundi 24 bukya bwakabaka buzzibwawo mu 1993 era nasabuukulula eoma mujaguzo eyitibwa kawulugumo oluvannyuma lwenkadde okwetuga gye buvuddekoomukolo guno kabaka gwe yasoose okukola nga yaakatuuka e bulange  mmengo ku ssaawa 515 ngomulimu guno ogwakoleddwa abagirinya gwamulagiddwa omutaka keeya namuyimba muteesasira oluvannyuma nalamusa mujjaguzooluvannyuma yayingidde olukiiko era mu bubaka bwe eri obuganda yasabye gavumenti eya wakati okuvaayo namaanyi  ku bantu abagufudde omugano okusaddaaka nokutulugunyanga abaanatuzzeemu okuwulira ebikolwa byokusaddaaka wamu nokutulugunya abaanawano we tusabira gavumenti eya wakati okukangavvula abasaddaaka nokutulugunya abaana tusaba abazadde okufaayo ku ntambula zabaana baabwe ate nabo be babalekera kabaka bwe yagambyemu ngeri yemu kabaka yakulidde omukolo gwokuwera nokulayira kwa baminisita be ababeezi basatu be yalonda nga october 10 2015 okwabadde hajj amisi kakomo byabulimi mulema mukasa  byansimbi ne dr prosperous nankindu kavuma byanjigiriza nga bonna beeyamye okukozesa obukugu bwabwe okuzza buganda ku ntikkoabalala misomo kubanga obutasoma buluma bukulubannabyabufuzi abagobwa mu palamenti batuswaza olwobutabeera na biwandiikonolwekyo tetwagala gye bujja ate okuwulira nti mu bantu ba kabaka be yasomesa ku nsawo nti okuzimbibwa kwa bbugwe wamasiro ge kasubi okuyooyoota enju zabazaana mu masiro ate nokuteekamu amasannyalaze genjuba byonna bivudde mu ttoffaali ebirala kuliko okumalirizibwa kwekizimbe masengere ndagaano ya 1955 siyinza kukyerabiranali muyizi mu namilyango collegebino byonna buli lwe mbiraba nzijukira pulezidenti museveni eyazzaawo obwakabaka nga july 31 1993 e naggalabi buddoyakola kinene byettakampagira nnyo ekyokuzimba ekijjukizo kya museveninalaba ku ssekabaka chwa ii ne muteesa ii ate kati ne kabaka mutebi mmulabyeko ate ne mbeera muliraanwa weekisinga okunsanyusa ku mutima ekimulimusimanyi ngeri gye nnyinza kulojja ssanyu lye nnina okubeera muliraanwa wa kabaka kubanga mmulabira ddala ngayingira olubiri ssaako ne maama nnaabagerekateopista bahemula kabaka twamutwalira dduyiro era tasobola kukuyitako nga takulamusizza           kitunzi wa pepsi nasser muteesasira owokubiri okuva ku kkono ngakwasa omumyuka wa ssentebe wemikolo gyamatikkira ga kabaka dr prosperous nankindu kavuma ceeke ya 137 okuteekebwa mu mikolo ginoku ddyo ye joseph kawuki minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengommengo etegese omusomo omugenda okulambululirwa ebyafaayo nobukulu bwobwakabaka bwa buganda eri abantu baabwoomumyuka wa ssentebe wemikolo gyamatikkira gomwaka guno dr prosperous nankindu kavuma yategezezza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire nti omusomo guno gutegekeddwa ku kizimbe muganzirwazza e katwe olweggulo lwa leero lwakusatu okutandika nessaawa mwendatukubiriza abantu bonna okujja mu bungi okumanya ebyafaayo byobwakabaka gyebuvudde ate era negyebulaga dr nankindu bwe yagambyemu ngeri yemu kkampuni yebyokunywa eya pepsi ewaddeyo ettu lya bukadde 137 eri enteekateeka yomukolo gwamatikkira ga kabaka nga zino zaaleeteddwa abaklungu baayo nasser muteesasira ne tracy kakuruemikolo gyamatikkira gomwaka guno gya kubeerawo ku ssande eno july 31 2016 ku mbuga yessaza lye butambala e kabasandaate ku lwomukaaga wategekeddwawo omupiira gwekikopo kyamatikkira wakati wa butambala ne ssingo so nga nolusiisira lwebyobulamu lutegekebwa okutandika ku lwokutaano july 29 2016           abakutte endagaano ye dr mukwaya ne joyce tamaleowookubiri okuva ku kkono ye dr kaawaaseku kkono ye minisita walusimbi nabalala oluvannyuma lwokukola endagaanoabantu 100000 baakufuna obujjanjabi obwenjawulo mu bbanga lya myaka esatu mu kaweefube wobwakabaka ne kkampuni ya uhmg okutumbula embeera zabantubino biri mu ndagaano eyakoleddwa enjuyi zombi ku bulange mmengo ku lwokuna ngabakyala nabaana abali wakati wemyaka 12 okutuka ku 45 be bagenda okubuganyulwamuomumyuka owookubiri owa katikkiro dr twaha kaawaase era nga ye ssentebe wolukiiko olukulira uganda health marketing group uhmg yategeezezza nti endagaano eno ejjidde mu kiseera obuweereza obuli ku mutindo era obusobokamu ntegeeragana eno uhmg egenda kuba ewa obumanyi obuyambi nobukugu mu nsonga zobujjanjabi eri abantu ate obwakabaka okuyita mu minisitule yebyobulamu yagubakwasaokusabira nokuwonga kabaka eri omutonzi kwatandika ku lwokutaano july 22 2016 mu mizikiti ngokusaba okukulu kwali kibuli ne kampalamukadde ate ku lwomukaaga kwali mu kkanisa zabadiventiomukolo omukulu olwokujjukira amatikkira gwakubeera mu ssaza lye butambala e kabasanda ku ssande july 31 2016           abatuuze bomuluka gwe ddegeya nga bakutte ebipande kwe baawandiise obutali bumativu bwabweabatuuze abasoba 300 okuva mu muluka gwe ddegeya mu ggombolola ye kalagala mu luweero baazinze ekitebe kya disitulikiti e luweero nga bawakanya aba buganda land board nga bali naba nkuluze okusala ku bibanja byabwe ne babiguza abagaggaabatuuze okuva ku byalo bugabo kyampisi kibajjwe kireka nawalala baakutte ebipande ebivumirira abantu abeeyita aba buganda land board ne balaajanira ssaabasajja abataase ku bantu banobaagambye nti abantu abajjira mu mmotoka za buganda land board bajja nenkoba ne babategeeza nga ssaabasajja bwasiimye ekitundu kyabwe okuguzibwa ba yinvesita era bwe baabaako bye bababuuza nga babaanukula nga ssaabasajja bwatalabwa mu kamwabaagambye nti abasinze okukosebwa be bali ku nsozi okusimwa amayinja nomusenyu ngabagagga baatandika boardamyuka rdc wa luweero hussein katende kibazo yalagidde abasala mu bibanja byabantu okukikomya nagamba bagenda kunoonyereza ku bakola emivuyo gino nabanyigiriza abantu bavunaanibwemoses kizito bbaliayongeddeko nti ebika bibadde ku mwanjo mu kuzzaawo obwakabaka mu kiseera nga buli ku kalebwerebwe kokusaanyizibwawo okuviira ddala ku mulembe gwa chwa nabakkane ku mulembe obwakabaka bwe bwaggyibwawo mu 1966 abataka baalwana okulaba nga buddawo mu 1993wabula twetaaga okubeera abeegendereza ku nsonga zebika katikkiro mayiga bwe yategeezezza nagamba nti obwakabaka tebwagala kuddamu kukola nsobi yonna ngensonga zebika zigonjoolwakwe kusaba abalina ensonga zebika mu kkooti ya kisekwa nabo abajulira ewa kabaka okubeera abagumiikirizabino yabyogeredde bulange  mmengo ku lwokusatu gukyagenda mu maasoabakozi abali ku mulimu gwokuddaabiriza amasiro e batadde ebikola wansi ngentabwe eva ku butabawa nsimbi ne basaba basasulweabamu ku bakozi bano abataayagadde kubaatuukiriza mannya baategeezezza nti baasaba abakulira omulimu guno babasasule 40000 kyokka ne bagaana nga baagala kubawa 30000 buli lunaku ekyabawalirizza okussa ebikola wansi nga kati ziweze wiiki bbiri nga tewali mulimu gukolebwa mu masiroomu ku bantu abennono abayitibwa abagiriinya abavunaanyizibwa ku kusereka amasiro erias sserumpanise naye yavuddeyo nagamba nti ye yasooka okuweebwa omulimu maaso ne kikkiriziganyizibwako bonna be kikwatako batuule ku lwokutaano nga july 8 2016 bateese ku mbeera eriwoensonga endala ekyavuddeko obuzibu ke kasolya kennyumba muzibwazaalampanga omugalamidde uk ronald lutaaya nomumyuka we atwala manchester enock kiyaga be baayanirizza katikkiro era ne bamwebaza olwokutumbula buganda           katikkiro nolukiiko olugenda okunoonya ssenteku ddyo ye jennifer musisiowookusatu ku kkono ye maria kiwanukabuli kika kisaliddwa obukadde 13 okuzimba ebibumbe ebigenda okuteekebwa ku luguudo kabakanjagala ngomu ku kaweefube wobwakabaka bwa buganda okutumbula obulambuzi nokunyweza ebikaku lwokutaano katikkiro charles peter mayiga yatongozza omulimu gwokunoonya ssente zino nga mu buli kika mwalondeddwaayo omuntu agenda okukulemberamu ensonga eno abaaweereddwa nsalesale wa july 2016 okuba nga bafunye ensimbi zinooluguudo kabakanjagala lwa byafaayo mu buganda wamu noluva e seguku okutuuka e naggalabi omulangira wayita ngagenda okufuuka kabakaebyafaayo bwe biti biteekwa okukuumibwa era twebaza kcca okulukolaminisita omubeezi owebyobulambuzi e mmengo yategeezezza nti buli kibumbe kigenda kuteekebwa ku kibanja kyekika ekyo kye kirina ku luguudo lunoabamu ku bagenda okukulemberamu omulimu mu buli kika kuliko maria nabasirye kiwanuka  nvuma jennifer nakku musisi ssemakula  ffumbe john kitenda  mpindi kiwalabye male  kkobe hajji musa ssemambo  njovu matia kanyerezi  nseenene gaster lule ntakke  ngonge kasozi mutebi mmamba ne katikkiro wakasimba lwangammengo eronze ssabawolereza wa buganda owekitiibwa daud mpanga okukulemberamu olukiiko olugenda okutegeka amatikkira ga kabaka agomulundi ogwa 23 agokubeera mu ssazza e butambala nga 31 jully 2016ngayanjula olukiiko luno katikkiro charles peter mayiga yalusabye okulaba nga bategeka omukolo ogunaweesa obwakabaka ekitiibwa ngessira balina okulissa ennyo ku bintu omuli emizindaalo obutebe entuula yabantu ssaako nobuddemayiga yagambye nti  tugenda kujjaguza matikkira agomulundi ogwa 23 era olukiiko kabaka lweyasiimye tululinamu obwesige okuteekateeka omukolo omulungimpanga ku lwabanne yategeezezza nga bwebali abetegefu okuweereza mu bwami buno obubawereddwa okutuuka ku bigendererwa ebyabalonzezza omuli nokuwa ebirowoozo ebirungi ebinaweesa omukolo ekitiibwaminisita dr prosperous nankindu kavuma ye mumyuka wa ssentebeabalala kuliko omumyuka womuwanika mulema mukasa hajjat mariam mayanjakatambala twaha lwanyaga nga bano bawereddwa obuvunanyizibwa okugattako abalala abanakola emirimuamatikkira gomulundi guno kabaka yasiimye gabeere mu ssaza lye butambala nga july 312016bannayuganda abali e manchester beesunze katikkiro mayiga bya musasi waffe   abantu mwenna ababeera mu ssaza lya ssaabasajja erye bungereza ne republic of ireland muyitibwa okwetaba ku mukolo ogwebyafaayo ogwokukyaza katikkiro charles peter mayiga e manchester ku lwokubiri nga 17th may 2016omukolo guno gugenda kubeera ku parrs wood high school hall one wilmslow road manchester m20 5pg okutandika ku ssaawa kkumi nemu ezakawungeezi 5pmkatikkiro mayiga agenda kuwerekerwako omwana wengoma ba minisita ba kabaka charles bwenvu ne david sekyeruabakungu ba buganda land board abakulembeddwa agikulira  kyewalabye male david nga bano bagenda kusomesa ku nkuuma yettaka eyomulembe abasuubuzi abeegattira mu buganda twezimbe nga bakulembeddwa omukungu john fred kiyimba freeman bannamawulire ba buganda broadcasting services bbs terefayina eyaffe ne radio yobujajja cbs nabalala bangi nga bonna balina obubaka obwenjawulo bwe beetikidde abantu ba ssaabasajja mu bungereza naddala abe manchester nebitundu ebiriraanyeewookusinziira ku mukungu wa ssaabasajja atwala manchester nebitundu ebiriranyeewo enock mayanja kiyaga omukolo guno gugenda kutambulira ku mulamwa ogugamba nti emiti emito buganda eyenkya era ngabaana nabavubuka bateekateeka okwolesa ebitone omuli amazina amaganda amasoga namalala ebitontome okulanya awamu nempaka zokuyimba ekitiibwa kya bugandaomukungu kiyaga yakubirizza  abantu ba ssaabasajja bonna mu bungereza okuleeta abaana bonna basobole okulaba katikkiro waabwe awamu nokuwulira obutereevu obubaka bwanaaba abeetikiddeomukolo guno gusuubirwa okugatta bannayuganda bangi ddala okuva mu bitundu ebyenjawulo omuli greater manchester liverpool sheffield birmingham coventry leeds derby london nebitundu ebirala byonna mu bungereza republic of ireland ne bulaayae manchester awagenda okubeera emikolo abatuuze mu kiseera kino bali mu keetalo nga beetegekera okukyaza kamalabyonna era bamwesunze nnyokwo okutendekebwa mu mazina amaganda namasoga katemba nebitontome kugenda mu maaso era  nga kubeerayo buli weekendi ku kitebe kyekibiina ekigatta bannayuganda mu manchester ucomm ku surcon house copson street m20 3he withington manchester era ngenteekateeka zino zikulirwa mwedward kayondokayemba ate nga ye mwmartin pande yatendeka abazinyi bamazina amasogaomukungu kiyaga yagambye nti watekeddwawo akakiiko akateesiteesi komukolo guno nga kaliko omuwandiisi isaac jakira omuwanika allan ssemanda ssabakunzi joel kasagga nyanzi ebyentambula mustafa ahmed kawooya welfare yahya kakembo ne nnalongo ritah mugabo ebyokwerinda ronald kamugisha ebyendya nokunywa rajab bbosa ne ivan ssonkolutaaya ebyokusanyusa abagenyi james bateeze ne dennis jjembaabalala kuliko rehema nnabukeera kawooya sylvia bateeze christopher boma cliffe ndahiro kyobe fredrick mubiru maggwa paul kale khalid ayub jaffer gava abdukarim kabanda mzee mustafa ntambi ne ronald wampambakiyaga yagambye abe leeds nabo beekozeemu omulimu nga bakulemberwa dr william bukulu nabe liverpool nabo bali mu keetalo nga bakulemberwa pastor daniel kavuma ngamyukibwa hajj swaib ssemakula           empuku idi amin gye yazimba mu lubiri e mmengo mwe battiranga abantuobote okulumba olubiri lwe mmengo nga may 24 1966 kye kimu ku bintu ebyakosa obuganda nokutuusa katinga wayise emyaka 50 bukya kikangabwa kino kigwawo bukedde leero atandise okukutuusaako emboozi eziraga engeri buganda gye yakosebwamu mu mbeera zabantu ebyenfuna ebyobuwangwa nebyobufuzi ne tulaga nengeri abantu ba buganda gye beegasse okuzimba buganda empyawiiki eno tulaze engeri embeera zabantu mu buganda gye zaakyukamu era lawrence kitatta atandise na nkuza ya baanaekitikkiro kya buganda ye kabaka yakuuma empisa obulombolombo nobuwangwa bwabagandayensonga lwaki mu 1966 nga obote amaze okulumba olubiri ssekabaka sir edward muteesa ii nawaangusibwa e bungereza obulamu nembeera zabaganda zaakyuka nnyoku bantu abangi abaafi ira mu lubiri nabaana baalimu abalala abaalimu obulamu bwabwe bwakyuka nnyo olwo ne kikosa enkuza yabaana wonna mu bugandaaugustine musiwuufu magala ssaabadinkoni we kazo agamba nti okulumba olubiri kyakosa nnyo obuwangwa bwabaganda era bingi ebyali bikolebwa ebyatandika okulabibwa ngebitakyalina makulu mu bugandabuganda yali eyaniriza buli muntu ajjamu ngomugenyi bwakyala awaka omwaniriza bulungi naye obote kye yalaga abaganda twatandika okwekengera abantuate abazadde baayogeranga nabaana bawulira nti kale omuntu gwe twayaniriza obulungi kati yatukaabya amazigakabaka yentabiro era ke kasolya ka buli kimubwe yava mu nsi ye abaganda ne baggwaamu amaanyi nengeri gye baalambikangamu abaana baabwe nenafuwabuli omu yadda mu kwekubagizakuba buli omu yali omwana amukuza amugamba omuganda byalina okukola ne byatalina kukola kyokka bino byonna olwaggwawo ne baggwaamu amaanyi cansamuel kigumba lubowa 78 owe mpumu mu kyaggwe agamba nti okukuza omwana omuganda omulimu ogusooka gwakolebwanga bazaddeabalenzi nga basinga kubeera ne bakitaabwe ate abawala na bannyaabweoluvannyuma lwokulumba olubiri ebintu bingi mu nkuza yomwana omuganda byaggwaawoluli ngabaana tubatwalako mu bakitaabwe oba bassenga ne babakuza mu ngeri endala eteri ya maka we bazaalibwakati bino byaggwaawo ate kyatandika na kulumba lubiri kubanga kyaleetawo akasattiro mu buganda abaana abamu ne batakula na bazadde baabwe abalala ne baggwaamu omwoyo ogulumirwa ekika noluganda bwagambalubowa agamba nti mu maka agedda mwasobolanga okubaamu abaana nga 30 naye ngabamu bava mu baaluganda abemikwano nabalalakati okusindika omwana ewomuntu omala kusiba mutimaomusajja ngayinza okuwasa omukazi namuwa abaana abatali babe nabakuza notomanya nti si babe naye kati buli muntu yafuna ogutimatima byonna byatandika mu 1966 bwagambaomutaka we kyaggwe kavuma kaggwa agamba nti wadde okusiiga abaana mu lubiri teryali kkatala naye obote bwe yalumba olubiri nalukuba omutendera tamuva ku lusegeremu nkola eno omwana yayiganga ebintu bingi naye olubiri bwe lwalumbibwa ensi netabanguka nga kizibu okutambula nabaana sikulwa mufa mwenna bwagamba olaba nokulonda omwana wa muganda wo okukusikira ennaku zino kizibu olwobukumpanya obucaasegeraldine nalumansi kalyango owe bweyogerere agamba nti omwana eyakuliranga mu maka amaganda nga tayita ku bantu nga tababuuzizza nga bwe guli mu kiseera kinoedda ngekyalo kye kikuza omwana nga nomuyise ssinga amulaba ngakola ebitali ku mulabwa amugunjulakati bwokikola bakutwala ku poliisi naye nga bino byatandika na kulumba lubiri bwagambaluli omwana tayingira mu mboozi zabakulungomwana ne bwasajjakula nga tanneezimba nga tayogerera mu bantu bakuluabaana abobuwala tebasobola kufumba tebayonsa baanaebintu byakyuka lwa bantu abangi abaayiika mu buganda ne bajoonyesa abaganda ne batuuka nokuswalira empisa zaabwe lubowa kigumba agamba nti luli ngabazadde bakuza abaana abalenzi kubeera bakulembeze kati abazadde bangi tebafaayo oba babakuzizza batyaluli nga tukuza abaana basobole okukwatagana nokunyweza ekika kati omwana alowooza ekika be bantu ababeera mu maka gaabwe bwagambaomwana omuwala victoria kisalale akulira gayaza high school agamba nti mu bulamu bwomwana omuwala maama wa nsonganze nzaalibwa sseguku era we nakulira ngamaka naddala maama nga lyessomero erisooka mu bulamu bwomwanabingi bye nkozesa kati nnabiggya mu maka gye nnakuliranaye embeera ekyuse nnyo abantu babeera ku mizigo abazadde bakola nnyo ne beerabira okukuza abaana baawebwagambaminisita avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga ekizibu kikyali kya maanyi gye tuli bwagambakabaka awabudde abataka obutaddamu kutuuza nkiiko mu masiro kubanga yagaggala okutuusa nga gamaze okuggwakino kiddiridde abataka aboobusoloya okugenda mu lwabwe omutaka kayiira gauule abalala kuliko omutaka muteesasira omutaka walusimbi omutaka mukalo nga bali wamu nakulira omulimu gwokuzimba amasiro joathan nsubuga nabantu abalalaabataka okugenda mu masiro baamaze kufuna bubaka kuva wa mukongozzi wa ssekabaka kintu sharifa kirimuttu eyareese obubaka bwe ku bintu ebiteekeddwa okukolebwa ebika ebyenjawulo nengeri gye birina okukolebwamuoluvannyuma omutaka gajuule yagenze nasisinkana omuwandiisi wa kabaka owekyama peter mpanga namutegeeza ebibadde mu masiro wabula mwmpanga mamutegeeza nti kabaka yabadde amaze okuwa ekiragiro eri abataka bano obutaddamu kutuusa nkiiko mu masiro kubanga yagaggalakabaka era yayongedde okulungamya nti nabantu ngabakongozzi nabagwa mu biti ebirala abaliko emirimu gyebyobuwngwa gye balina okukola mu masiro
