baabaddeyo baakakasizza ebyabaddewo nekiragiro kya kabaka ekyaweereddwamu kusooka abataka nga batudde mu lukiiko omukongozzi kirimuttu yasabye omutaka mukalo okuleeta essanga lye njovu ate ne mugema wembiri addemu okugema olubiri luno amasiroabataka abalala baaweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa obubakwatako nga muteerasira yalagiddwa okuddamu okuluka ebizizi kuba mugema teyakola mikolo gyali giteekeddwa kubikolwako nga tebinnawanikibwayobwe batuuse ku mpagi sserugattika eyateekebwa mu masiro omukongozzi yategeezezza nti yasoba kubanga nayo mugema teyagikolako mikolobino byonna biddiridde kabaka okuyimiriza katikkiro okuddamu okulambuza abantu amasiro buli ntandikwa ya mwezi nagamba nti kino kiriddamu ngamasiro gamaze okuggweera ddala obulungi           katikkiro mayiga mu ssuuti ngali nabayizi ba buganda road nabakulembeze baabwekatikkiro charles peter mayiga akubirizza abazadde okussa ekiragiro kya kabaka ekyokulabirira nokugunjula abaana baabwe mu nkola baleme kwesuulirayo gwa nnaggamba nti buvunaanyizibwa bwa gavumentiyagambye nti abaana musaanye okubambaza okubaliisa okubagunjula nokubalabirira wadde basoma mu masomero ga bonnabasome nga wano kabaka we yagambidde nti nkwatirako tebufuuka bumbowa bino yabyogeredde ku ssomero buganda road ps ku lwokutaano gye yayitibwa abakulu bessomero nabazadde okulaba bye bakola ate nokumutikka ettoffaalimayiga yabadde nomumyuka we owokubiri dr twaha kaawaase minisita joseph kawuki ne john fred kiyimba freemannga bakulembeddwaamu omukulu wessomero david ssengendo abayizi nabazadde baawaddeyo ensimbi ezisoba obukadde butaanossengendo yategeezezza katikkiro nti abazadde nabaana babadde tebayinza kusigalira mabega mu kuwagira emirimu gya buganda ate ye kaggo patrick mugumbule ne yeebaza katikkiro olwokugatta abantu ba bugandaprosper lwamasaka nga ye mumyuka watwala ebyenjigiriza mu kcca yagambye nti essomero lino eririna abayizi 2600 liyambye okusomesa abaana abatandifunye mukisa kusomera mu kibuga            ssabasajja ngali ne nnaabagereka sylvia nagginda e naggalabiabaana behhoma edda kyabanga kizibu okubasanga nga bakola ne basasulwa emisaalawabula ebintu bizze bikyuka nga kati beenyigira mu mirimu egivaamu ensimbi nga bwobasanga bagikakkalabya toyinza kumanya nti baana bahhoma okuggyaako nga waliwo okubuuliddenewankubadde nga kabaka ye ssaabataka alina ettaka erisinga obunene mu buganda nga mayiro zobwakabaka ziri 350 kyokka kino tekibayinudde ne basalawo okukola nga kano kabonero kalungi eri abantu abatafa ku mirimu ne bwe babeera nga bafunye omukisa okugifunaabambejja nabalangira abazaalibwa kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi beenyigidde mu kukola emirimu egibasasuza bagiwa ekitiibwa ate nga bakola bannaabwe bwe bali mu mulimuomulangira crispin jjunju omwana wa kabaka omukulu aludde ngaweereza ku leediyo ya cbsono ye muteesiteesi wa pulogulaamu mulengera ne pulogulaamu yabavubuka eyitibwa kalasamayanzibwomusanga ngatudde ne abbey mukiibi mu ofiisi toyinza kumanya nti mwana wa hhoma kubanga abeera mukkakkamu era teyeegulumizzaomumbejja joan nassolo akolera mu kitongole kya kabaka ekya buganda land board nga owebyamawulirenassolo yeegatta ku kitongole kino amangu ddala nga yaakamaliriza emisomo gye mu mawanga gebweruabakola nomumbejja nassolo bagamba nti ye muntu akolaganika nayebongerako nti nassolo mulungi okukola naye kuba teyeewulira ate ayagala okubeera ne bakozi banne nga ne byaba tamanyi abuuza asobole okubikola mu butuufu bwabyonnaalinnya nkinzi akola mu ofiisi evunaanyizibwa ku nsonga zabakozi nono akolera mu kitongole kya kabaka ekya buganda land baoard era nga naye afuna omusaalanaye bamwogerako ngomwetoowaze ra oweggonjebwaomumbejja katrina ssaangalyambogo mu kiseera kino akyali muyizi mu ssomero lya aga khan e nairobi mu kenyamuzannyi wa mizannyo ngokusinga yeenyigira mu kuwugassemakookiro yaakatandika okusoma okusoma kwe nnaku zino nga bwe kuli bwe nkugamba nti ssaangalyambogo ne ssemakookiro bali ku mulimu           mwannyina wa kabaka ngamutereeza ekkanzunnali sirabanga muntu akungubagira mbwa okutuusa lwe nnalaba ssaabataka kabaka ngakungubagira embwa ye ssemagimbi eyafa nemusaala nnyo bwatyo omulangira bamweyana eyaliko omuserikale wa kabaka bwanyumya omukwano gwa kabaka nembwaabantu bangi ku nsi kuno balina omukwano nebisoloabamu bafiira ku kkapa ente endiga nebirala naye ogwa kabaka guli ku mbwabamweyana anyumya kabaka mutebi kuva buto ngalina omukwano nembwa era zino yazituumanga namannya okwawula emu ku ndalakabaka ne mu kiseera kino alina embwa ezimuwummuza ebirowoozo sso ngate nedda ngakyali mu myaka gye emito yali mwagazi waazooluusi yagaananga nokulya nga ziguddeko omutawaanajjuuzi kabaka we yakomerawo kuno nga ssaabataka we yabeerera e kololo waliwo abaakola ekikolwa kyoyinza okugamba nti tekirimuva ku mwoyokabaka yalina embwa ze bbiri okwali ssemagimbi ne ssenkungussenkungu yagyagala nnyo ate nga nayo emwagala era ngemanyi nokumububira nga teyagala muntu asembera gyalinga kabaka bwaba tabadde waka okumala omwezi nga bwakomawo era emusanyukira ate temwerabirangemukonga olusu negenda ku luggi bwe lutaabanga lunywevu ngerusindika nemugwirane ssaabataka nga naye agyagalayabanga nkambwe naye nga ku ye egonda ngeba nsanyufussenkungu ne ssemagimbi nga bwe guli ku mbwa endala nga zaagala okweyiggira ekyokulyalumu kabaka aba agenze e bulaaya ku hhendo ze abekitongole kya kcc  nga bwe kyali kiyitibwa mu kiseera ekyo ne bayisa ekiragiro okutta embwa zonna mu kibugabwe baatega obutwa mu kololo nakasero nebitundu ebiriraayeewo abantu bangi baafiirwa embwa zaabwe era nembwa za ssaabataka mutebi mwe zaagenderaomulangira omulala yangambgye nti ssaabataka yanyiiga nnyo olwembwa ze nti olumu yabuuza nti bannange ssemagimbi yafiira ddalakabaka yaddamu nafuna embwa endala era zonna azituuma amannya ge gamune mu buto yalina embwa ye ssenkungu gye yatuulanga nayo mu ntebe ngagigabirira buli kalyakoera olumu baamukubako ekifaananyi ne kitaawe ssekabaka muteesa ii ngalya emmere nembwa ye enoomukwano guno yagusiiga nabaana be gye buvuddeko abalangira nabambejja bazaala beekubisa ekifaananyi nga basitudde embwa yaabwejjajjaawe ssekabaka daudi chwa ii naye we yabeerera kabaka yalina omukwano nembwa era nga yeekubya nazo ebifaananyileero ssaabasajja kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii lwawezezza emyaka 61kabaka mutebi yazaalibwa april 13 1955 nga kitaawe ye ssekabaka edward muteesa ii ate nnyina ye sarah nalule kisosonkoleemikolo gyokukuza amazaalibwa gomutanda gigenda mu maaso e naggalabitukuleetedde ebifaananyi bya kabaka mu butokabaka ronald mutebi ii mu bubaka bwe obwamazuukira yategeeza nga bwe wakyaliwo ebintu bya buganda bingi ebikyabanjibwa ebisaana okwegayirira omutonzi nabyo buganda ebifuneku ntandikwa ya august wa 2013 kabaka ne pulezidenti museveni bassa omukono ku ndagaano yokuzza ebintu bya bugandamuno mwalimu embuga zamasaza namagombololammengo yassaawo akakiiko okulondoola ebintu buganda byebanja ne kazuula ebintu omuli ettaka ebibalirirwa mu buwumbi bwensimbi ebiri mu kampala kyokka nga byonna kumpi byagabanwa gavumenti eya wakati era ngekolerako emirimu gyayoakakiiko kano kaakulirwa munnamateeka apollo makubuya nga katuulako omulangira david wassajja ben matovu omuwanika wa nkuluze ne william naggaggaakulira akakiiko kabaka ke yalonda okulondoola ettaka lya buganda apollo makubuya asabye gavumenti eteeke mu nkola ekisuubizo kyayo ekyokuddiza buganda ebintu byayo ngagamba nti olukalala lwebintu buganda byebanja baaluwaayo ddaakakiiko akakola ku byettaka akakulirwa baguma isoke ke kaaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa okunoonya ebyapa byonna ebya buganda we biri bizzibwe e mmengo ngendagaano pulezidenti museveni gye yakola ne mmengo bwegambamakubuya yagambye nti talina kutya kwonna nti gavumenti eneegaana okuzza ebintu bya buganda naye asuubira nti ekirwisizzaawo okussa mu nkola ebintu bino gyemitendera egiri mu kakiiko kebyettakaettaka lya katikkiro yiika 1431 ettaka lya namasole wa buganda yiika 50 ettaka lyeggombolola mutuba 1 kyaddondo yiika 49 ssaabagabo makindye yiika 49 mumyuka nakawa yiika 49 eryomulamuzi wa buganda yiika 22 owessaza mawogola 322 lubaga hill owessaza mawogola yiika 032 kyaddondoettaka eddala mulimu erikozesebwa ekitongole kya kcca lino buganda yaliwa gavumenti enkuumi ku nkola ya liizi eyemyaka 99ettaka erya poloti 52 ku kampala road awaali ekyapa kyamawulire ga buganda aga akiika embugaettaka lya poliisi ye nateete ettaka lyamagombolola mu kibuga erya mumyuka nakawa kati awali kkooti ye nakawa ettaka okutudde enkambi yamagye e mbuya nettaka okuli akatale ke nakawaettaka okuli akatale ke nakulabye ssaako akatale ke wandegeya ne bbakuliettaka erisangibwa mu kibangirizi kya bannamakolero awali amapipa gamafuta aga shell wano waaliwo nsuku za katikkiro era nga ne katikkiro paul kavuma wano we yasoloozanga busuulu okuyimirizaawo ofiisi yobwakatikkiroettaka okutudde enkambi yamagye e makindye ettaka okuli kkooti e makindye nekitebe kyeggombolola ye makindyeettaka lya kisenyi ku mbuzi eryali eryomuwanika awaali ekkomera lya njabuleettaka awali ekitawuluzi mu kisenyi okutuukira ddala ku lubiri lya muwanikaettaka lyomulamuzi e lubaga awali ofiisi za city council awaali ggombolola yomukulu wekibuga e lubagayagambye nti ngoggyeeko ettaka buganda era yalina emigabo mu bitongole bya gavumenti omuli nekya ueb kati umemeeyaliko meeya wa kampala john ssebaana kizito agamba nti ettaka lya buganda lingi mu kampala era bwe yali akyali meeya wa kampala baayisa ekiteeso mu 2003 okuzza ebintu bya kabaka byonna kcc bye yali ekozesabino bye bintu bya buganda ebyategekebwa okuzzibwayopoloti 52 ku kampala road obote lye yatwala era mu kifo kino kati waazimbibwawo ekizimbe kya king fahad plaza ekya yunivasite yobusiraamu mu ugandamu lubaga mulimu ettaka lyomulamuzi awali ofiisi za kcca nawali ggombolola yomukulu wekibuga basiima house erya presidential lodge e makindye nenkambi yamagye e makindye nawalalamu april wa 2014 gavumenti yaddiza buganda ebyapa byettaka 213 nga bino byaweebwayo pulezidenti museveniomwogezi wekitongole kya kcca peter kauju yagambye nti balina enkolagana ennungi nobwakabaka bwa buganda era enkolagana ejja kugenda mu maasotwakwatagana nabakulu e mmengo ngera mubaddemu nokuyooyoota oluguudo lwa kabakanjagala okuva ku bulange nti era enkolagana ejja kugenda mu maaso kauju bwagambanga january 05 2015 gavumenti yayimiriza entegeka zokuddiza mmengo ebyapa byettaka nebintu bya buganda ebirala ebyagiwambibwako olwobutakkaanya obupya obwabalukawoeyali ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti peter nnyombi yategeeza nti mmengo ebakaluubirizzaamu mu nteeseganya ze baliko kubanga ebbaluwa ze bagiwandiikira teziddibwamu ne mu nteeseganya mwe bayitibwa tebalinnyayoono yagamba nti mmengo yava ne ku bimu ku byakkaanyizibwako mu ndagaano ya kabaka ne pulezidenti omuli obutasengula bantu ku ttaka eryabaddizibwanyombi agamba nti abantu mu disitulikiti nga mubende mukono ne mityana ngabantu beemulugunya nti mmengo etandise okubasengula nabamu babinikibwa obusuulu bwe batasobolaera nti wakyaliwo enkalu ku nsonga zobukulembeze obwennono e kayunga buruuli ne kookikyokka eyaliko omwogezi wobwakabaka bwa buganda dennis walusimbi ssengendo agamba nti waliwo ebintu bya buganda gavumenti byetennazza nga ennyumba ya muteesa house esangibwa mu kibuga london bungereza poloti 52 awali ekizimbe king fahad mu kampala emmotoka ekika kya rolls royce ezaali eza ssekabaka muteesa ii nga zino zibalirirwamu obuwumbi mwenda ebisigalira bya kibuuka amazaalibwa ga kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii aga 61obulamu bwa kabaka naffe butukwatakonga tujaguza amazaalibwa ga kabaka naffe tusaanye okugenderera obulamu bwaffebuganda eyagala okudda ku ntikko mu kiseera kino yeetaaga abantu abalamuokuba nemmere eyomugaso emala katikkiro mayiga kye yavudde atandika pulojeketi yokwaza emmere mu buganda eyatuumiddwa awolottala nga muno mugenda kugabirwamu abantu amalagala ga lumonde endokwa zemmwaanyi wamu nendu zebitooke buli gyagenda okukuhhaanya ettoffaali ngayita mu bucadefomulamwa gwamazaalibwa gomulundi guno gugamba nti abavubuka tuzze bukulaguno gulaga obukulu obwakabaka bwe butadde mu bavubuka ku kuddukanya emirimu egyenjawulo mu bwakabakakabaka yazaalibwa nga april 13 1955 mu ddwaaliro e mulago bwatyo natuuzibwa ku ntebe ya bajjajjaabe nga july 311993 nga myaka 38obwakabaka bwali bumaze emyaka 27 nga buggyiddwaawo katikkiro mayiga ayongera nategeeza nti kabaka mutebi ii amanyi okukulembera abantu be nga kino kyeyolekera mu ngeri abavubuka gye baagalamu obwakabakaabavubuka be basinga okwagala obwakabaka ate nga waalibadde olowooza nti oboolyawo engeri gye bataaliwo ngobwakabaka buggyibwawo baalibadde tebakifaako nnyokino kitegeeza nti kabaka mu ngeri gyakolamu ebintu nokwagazisa abantu obwakabaka alina obumanyirivu bwa maanyikabaka mutebi ii yasinziira ku nnamulondo mu 2002 omulembe gwe nagukwasa abavubaka era okuva lwe yatuuzibwa ku nnamulondo azze asoosowaza abavubuka okutuusa lwe yabalondamu ne katikkiro kati alikoera okulonda kwa katikkiro omuvubuka kizze kiraga bulungi nti abaganda okuyita kabaka maasomoogi baba bakitegeeza era nti kati kabaka mutebi ii ayagala ebintu bitambulire ku misinde gya waggulumayiga agamba nti  abavubuka lyeggye lya kabaka erisookerwako noolwekyo balina okuwoma omutwe mu kaweefube wokuzza buganda ku ntikkokyokka wadde baaweebwa omulembe guno balina okukolera awamu nabakulu kubanga beetaaga okuwabula nokuluhhamya kwabweyagasseeko mu uganda bye basinga okwettaniramu katabo ka bukedde akenkya tosubwa akatabo akenjawulo bukedde kakuleetedde ku mazaalibwa ga kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii agemyaka 61 nga kakulaga byonna byazze ayitamuomukunganya wakatabo kano john weeraga yategeezezza nti kalimu ebifaananyi ebyenkizo ebiraga obulamu bwa kabakaweeraga yagambye nti  mugenda kubeeramu omukazi eyatuulanga ne kabaka mu abasajja be babbaabwe nalabula nti maama lian okumusanga ngologootana bbaffe nga tayita muzaata ajja kumugwakoomwaka oguwedde muzaata yasinziira butambala nalumba mayiga okugenda ngasolooza ssente mikonoomulanira kassim nakibinge bwe yatandika okwogera nategeeza nti waliwo ebyali biyitingana nti waliwo obuzibu wakati wa kibuli ne mmengo nagamba nti tebuliiwo newankubadde nga wayinza okubeerawo omukulu wekika kino mu bwangu ddalaekiragiro kino kabaka yakiweeredde mu nsala yomusango ogwenkaayana mu kika kino gye yawadde nga march 22 2016empaaba yasomeddwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga ebintu byaffe ebya buganda ebikyabanjibwa twegayirira omutonzi nabyo tubifune kabaka bwe yagumizzamu bubaka bwe obwamazuukira yagabye nti ebintu bingi ebizze biwulirwa nokulabibwa okuva ku mazuukira gomwaka 2015 okuli nokulonda abakulembeze ku mitendera egyenjawulo mu ggwanga kyokka yeebaza katonda nti tebiwugudde bantu kuva ku bigendererwannyinimu akuutidde abantu okunyweza empisa ze boolesezza kabaka efulumyessentebe wenteekateeka zemikolo gyamazaalibwa ga kabaka apollo nelson makubuya ategeezezza nti emisinde gino ssabasajja yasiimye okugisimbula ku ssaawa 12 ezokumakya ga april 10 2016bonna abaneetaba mu misinde gino tubasaba mutandike okweteekateeka kubanga twagala mutuuke ku lunaku luli nga muli fiitiekirala emisinde gino mwe tuyitira okudduukirira abakyala abalumizibwa bypass ewa mukwano kibuye lubiri ring road bayingire olubiriaba kiromita 10 bafulumira mu mulyango oguli ku lubiri hs bakwate ku lwa kabakanjagala bagwe ku nabunnya road nga bwe beetooloola ennyanja ya kabaka kibuye queens way ku yaadi nasser clock tower mengo hill road balyoke bayingire olubiriate aba kiromita ettaano baakuyita ku kabakanjagala oluguudo nabunnya beetooloole ennyanja ya kabaka wuuyo ku lubiri oluvannyuma bakomewo we baatandikiddeye minisita wemizannyo e mmengo henry ssekabembe kiberu asoomoozezza abantu okukomya okulinda okwewandiisa ngobudde buweddeyo kubanga kitataaganya enteekateeka zemisinde era nategeza nga bwe bongeddemu akanyomero kisobozese abakulanye mu myaka abakadde nabo okwetaba mu misinde gya kabakaokwewandiisa okwetaba mu misinde gino omuntu asasula 10000 nga kuno afunirako omujoozi ogwokuddukiramu namazzi aganaamuweebwa ngaddukaebifo aweewandisizibwa kuliko amadduka ga airtel okuli erya jinja road ku gameshoprite e lugogoebirala kuliko bulange mmengo ne ku ofiisi za vision group efulumya ne bukedde akutuusaako emisinde ginomu ngeri yemu olukiiko lutegeezezza ngabavuzi bobugaali okuva e rwanda bwe bamalirizza okukakasa nga bwe bagenda okwetaba mu mpaka zino ezinaabeerawo nga april 9 2016 okutandikira mu lubiri lwa kabaka e mengokatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga olwaleero azzeemu okutalaaga amasaza ga buganda agenjawulo ngatikkula abantu ba ssaabasajja ettoffaali eryokuzimba obwakabaka bwa buganda okubuzza ku ntikkokinajjukirwa nti katikkiro yali yayimirizaamu mu ttofaali olwe biseera byo kuyigga akalulu ebibadde mu ggwangaolwaleero okusonga ettoffaali akutandikidde mu ggombolola ye nabweruminisita webyamawulire mu bwakabaka bwa buganda noah kiyimba ategeezezza nti katikkiro agenda kutandikira ku masomero agenjawulo era mu ggombolola ye nabweru  agenda kumalayo ennaku bbirikiyimba agambye nti ettoffaali okuyimiriramu kyali kigendereddwaamu okwewala abantu okuyingizaamu ebyobufuzi kubanga kaali kaseera ka kulonda nakubiriza abantu okuddamu okuwagira enteekateeka yettoffaali nga bwe gubadde emabega          katikkiro ngayogera ku bulamu bwa muganda we mukasa james eyafiiridde mu kabenjekatikkiro charles peter mayiga yawaliriziddwa okusazaamu olugendo lwe yabadde agendako e south africa okukomawo okukola ku nsonga zokuziika mukulu we era omusika wa kitaawe eyafudde ku lwomukaaga akawungeeziamawulire gokufa kwamusanze mu kibuga kigali bwatyo nasalawo okukomawo e uganda okulaba enteekateeka zokuziika muganda we bwe zinatambulajames kato mukasa 70 yatomeddwa  emmotoka ekika kya premio nnamba uaq 459r ku kyalo kyamuyimbwa mu ggombolola ye kabonera masaka nga yabadde atambulira ku pikipiki ye ekika kya suzuki bwe yabadde ava mu lukiiko lweggombolola ye kabonerangakomyewo ku ssande mayiga yasabye  gavumenti  okuyita mu kitongole kya poliisi eyokunguudo okunyweza amateeka agafuga enguudo kubanga gatyooboddwa ekisusse ensangi zino okukakkana nga mufiriddemu abantu ntokomayiga yagambye nti  poliisi yokunguudo esaanye okulaba ngabavuzi bebidduka tebavuga ndiima ebidduka nga biri mu mbeera nnungi abatambulira ku nguudo nga bakwata amateeka nga nebibonerezo ebibeera bigabiddwa okuteekebwa mu nkola mayiga yayogedde ku mugenzi ngekyokulabirako kyomusika bwalina okweyisa kubanga afudde tatunze bintu bya kitaawe byeyasikira ate famire bwebeeramu ensonga enkulu nga tasalawo yekka wabula ayita banne ne zigonjoolerwa wamu era nagamba nti amujjukirako olwokubalabirira obulungi ngabaana beyasikira okuva kitaabwe lweyafa mu 1986omwami wessaza lya kabaka erye buddu vincent ssebowa mayiga yakulembeddemu bannabuddu nga batuuse  mu maka gomugenzi e kasanje kabonera ku lwomukaaga ku makya ne bakwatagana ne famire  ku nteekateeka zawakamu kwogera ku mugenzi pokino yamutendereza ngabadde ayagala enkulakulana yobwakabaka nga waafiiridde abadde muwandiisi wolukiiko lweggombolola ssabawaali kabonera ngokugwa ku kabenje yabadde ava mu lukiikopokino yagambye nti kitalo nnyo  omugenzi kato nasoose kwogera naye mu ssawa ngemu emabega nga tanaffa ku nsonga zemirimu gya kabaka gyabadde akola mu ggombolola ye eno kyokka kyaneewuunyisiza mu ddakiika ate okunkubira essimu nti kato yafiiridde mu kabenje ate nange kenasanze nga ngenda e masaka kyokka nga simanyi nti omuntu waange yaafuddeomwogezi wa poliisi mu greater masaka idi ibin senkumbi yategeezezza nti poliisi enoonyereza ku kabenje kano era nga nomugoba wa mmotokka eyakoze akabenje oluvannyuma naddukaakyanoonyezebwayazaalibwa 1946 nga bakadde be bagenzi ssalongo cyprian mukasa ne nnalongo rebecca kyese ku kyalo kasanje nga bazaala 15 nga katikkiro mayiga yasembayoyasomera ku st george butale mixed primary school st bernards college kiswera st henrys college kitovu st peters tororo college nakawa college of business studiesemirimo gye yakolera ekitongole ekya tumpeco bweyavaayo nafuuka omukulu we ggombolola ye kalangalamu 2005 yawummula nadda ewuwe e kasanje natandika okulimaalese bamulekwa okuli solomon mayiga davis mayanja jackie namata jim sseremba helen nanziri henry kakeeto ne kizito namayengoomugenzi  aziikibwa leero ku biggya bya bajjajabe e kasanje ngemikolo gya kutandika nekitambiro kya mmisa ekinakulemberwa            minisita wagwa ku kkono ne badagawa ku ddyo nga bawaanyisiganya endagaano zinobuganda ekoze endagaano ya myaka etaano nekitongole kya private sector foundation psfu okutumbula embeera zabantu nga babafunira emirimu amagezi nensimbi okwekulaakulanyaendagaano yateekeddwako emikono eggulo ku bulange e mmengo katikkiro charles peter mayiga nagamba nti uganda tesobola kukula nga temuteekeddwamu binti ebyenyigirwamu bannayuganda obutereevuyagambye nti awulira nnyo nga boogera ku kutandikawo amakolero amanene kyokka ye kyalaba ekyandisoose okukolebwa kwe kuyamba abantu ne beenyigira mu kulima okugeza ngemmwanyi ate ne baweebwa obusobozi okuzongerako omutindo ne batandika nokwesiikira kaawa gwe banywa olwo abavubuka ne basobola okufuna emirimubuganda yakiikiriddwa minisita webyensimbi wagwa nsibirwa eyataddeko omukono mu maaso ga katikkiro ate psfu yakiikiriddwa agikulira gedion badagawa eyagambye nti basazeewo okukwatagana ne buganda ne bakola endagaano empandiike kubanga bizinensi ezisinga eziwa abantu emirimu ziri wano mu masekkati ga ugandabadagawa yagambye nti psfu efuna ssente ezisobola okuyamba abantu okutandikawo emirimu nga si za kwewola wabula nga bazifunye okuva mu bitongole nga bbanka yensi yonna zisobole okuyamba abantu okutandikawo emirimuobukwakkulizo obuli mu ndagaano bwe buno wammangabuganda enteekateeka yaakuziyisa mu bitongole byayo ngeyitira mu buganda investments and commercial undertaking bicul           katikkiro bwe yabadde alambuza omulimu ogukolebwa ku masiro ge kasubimmengo etangazizza ku kya katikkiro charles peter mayiga okugaanibwa okugenda mu masiro ge kasubi okulaba emirimu bwe gitambuzibwa netegeeza nti waakusigala alambula ekifo kino buli lusooka mu mwezi wadde nga si waakubeeranga na bantu nga bwabadde akikola emirundi egiyisemayiga yasinzidde ku mukutu gwe ogumu ogwempuliziganya nategeeza nti  katikkiro ajja kusigala ngalambula amasiro ge kasubi buli lumu mu mwezi naye mu kasiriseminisita owebyamawulire era omwogezi wobwakabaka noah kiyimba yategeezezza nti katikkiro avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga ezenjawulo mu buganda ngalina okugoberera entambula yonna ngera olwokugenda mu maaso okwomulimu gwamasiro waakusigala agendayo okulaba bwe gutambuzibwakiyimba yategeezezza ku lwokuna nti  abantu baafunye endowooza eyenjawulo nga balowooza nti katikkiro mayiga tagenda kudda mu masiro kyokka kirina okumanyibwa nti avunaanyizibwa butereevu okulaba ngomulimu guno gumalirizibwanolwekyo buli lusooka mu mwezi we lunaatuuka nga bwabadde akola waakugendangayoekyakyuseeko kwe kubeera nti tagenda kulambuzanga bantu ba buganda nga bwe gubaddekabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii yafulumizza ekiwandiiko ku mmande march 7 2016 ekirambika engeri okumaliriza amasiro ge kasubi gye kunaakolebwamu bwatyo nayimiriza mayiga okulambuzaayo obuganda okulaba omulimu bwe gutambuzibwa era nayimiriza ne nnaalinnya namikka katikkiro kaggo ne mugema wamasiro gano okuddamu okugaamuka okutuusa ngabakugu bagaggyeko engalomu ngeri yemu olukiiko oluvunaanyizibwa ku kuzzaawo amasiro gano lulindirira okuddibwamu okuva mu kitongole kya unesco ku alipoota eraga kalonda wemirimu egikolebwa ku masiro e kasubi gye baabasaba okuwerezaayo mu kitongole kino e bufalansa obutasukka february 1 2016omukungu wa unesco mu uganda daniel kaweesi ku kiragiro kya kabaka yategeezezza nti  ekiragiro ekyaweereddwa kabaka twakyanirizza nessuubi nti omulimu gwokumaliriza muzibu azaalampanga gugenda kutambula awatali kusibibwa nsonga yonnadagadaku kkono nabamu ku bakansalawakati ye sipiika kizito ntegeabakulira disitulikiti ye kayunga bawaddeyo ebizimbe byobwakabaka ebisangibwa ku mbuga ya mugererebakansala ku lukiiko lwa disitulikiti bino baabisazeewo mu lutuula lwa kkanso olwabaddemu nokwanjula bajeti ya disitulikiti eyomwaka 20162017stephen dagada yagambye nti baasazeewo ofi isi za disitulikiti zonna bazisengule zidde mu kizimbe kyabwe ekipya kye bakyazimba kisobozese emirimu gya kabaka okugenda mu maasodagada yagambye nti baafunye obukadde 600 okumaliriza ofi isi za disitulikitibajeti eyayanjuddwa jamil lutalo ya buwumbi bobuyambi           katikkiro mayiga ne nnaalinnya namikkaekiragiro kya kabaka ku masiro ge kasubi kyatandikiddewo okukola era eggulo gaasiibye maggale nga teri mmotoka eyingirayo ate nga nabeebigere abayingirayo bakozesa omulyango omutono ogutunudde mu nnyumba ya nnaalinnyamu kiragiro kino abalambuzi bonna tebakkirizibwa okutuusa ngomulimu guwedde ate bbo abazaana abalekeddwa mu masiro gano tebakkirizibwa kukyaza bagenyi okuyingira olina kusooka kufuna lukusa okuva e mmengo oluvannyuma lwokulambika ensonga gyogenda okukolayoku lwokubiri kabaka yawadde ebiragiro ku masiro nalagira gaggalwe era nabakungu okuli nnaalinnya beatrice namikka katikkiro wamasiro ssaalongo george mulumba kaggo wamasiro ne mugema wamasiro nabalagira okugavaamu omulimu gukolebwe abakugu nabennono okuli wabulaakayole ne sserumpanise abakwatibwako emirimu gyokusereka egisigaddekabaka ronald mutebi era yayimirizza enkola ya katikkiro charles peter mayiga eyokulambuzanga obuganda minisita webyobuwangwa ennono nobulambuzi dennis walusimbi ssengendo era waakuwanga katikkiro mayiga lipoota buli lunaku ku bigenda mu maaso mu masirominisita walusimbi yategeezezza nti ebyokwerinda byamasiro bigenda kusigala nga biggumivu okusobozesa abakugu abali ku mulimu gwokuzzaawo amasiro okukola emirimu gyabwe awatali kutaataaganyizibwa ngokwo okubaddewo kabaka kwe yayogeddeko mu bbaluwa yewalusimbi yategeezezza nti agenda kuddamu atuule nolukiiko oluzimbi wiiki ejja okulaba nga bategeka pulogulaamu empya okunaatambuzibwa enteekateeka yokumaliriza muzibwazaalampangayagambye nti zamasiroomu ku beetabye mu lukiiko luno ataayagadde kwatuukirizibwa yategeezezza bukedde nti baalaze essanyu ku kyasaliddwaawo kabaka kubanga okulwawo okumaliriza amasiro kibadde tekikoma ku kuswaza buganda wabula kibadde kiweebuula ne bassekabaka abaagalamizibwa mu masiro ago agebyafaayobaalaze ezimu ku nsonga ezibadde ziremesezza amasiro okuggwa omulikkampuni ya omega constructions eyaweebwa kontulakiti yokuzimba muzibwazaalampanga yamaliriza omutendera ogusooka mu march 2015 olwo obuvunaanyizibwa subcontract nabugabanyizaako wabulakayole avunaanyizibwa ku kusereka kyokka ne wajjawo okusika omuguwa ku nsimbi za wabulakayole nga namikka agamba nti zirina kuyita mu ofiisi ye kyokka nga wabulakayole akiwakanya ngagamba nti zirina kujja butereevuomulimu gwatabuka nga bagugasseemu iiekiwandiiko ekiva mu ofiisi ya ssaabasajja kabakaokulambika ebyokuzimba nokumaliriza amasiro ge kasubi twebaza katikkiro nolukiiko olwakwassibwa okuzimba amasiro ge kasubi olukulemberwa gyaggwa bulungiemirimu gyokuzimba gitambudde kasoobo era gitaataaganyizibwa nnyo olwokubanga abantu si bangi ababadde bamanyi ekiteekeddwa okukolebwa era ddi lwe kikolebwaemirimu egisigadde gya galina okumalirizibwa mu mwaka 2016 era okukambuwala kyaddiridde okumuyitiramu ebigenda mu maaso nga biraga nti omwaka guno gusobola okuggwaako ngamasiro tegaweddeensonda e mmengo zaategeezezza nti okubasisinkana kabaka nasalawo ekiddakoyasazeewo okuyimiriza enkola yokulambuzanga abantu omulimu gwamasiro we gutuuse eyatandikibwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga ebadde ebeerawo ku ntandikwa ya buli mwezi ngennaku zomwezi 1 nalambika nti omulimu katikkiro aligulambuza abantu omulundi gumu nga guweddekuno kabaka yagasseeko okuyimiriza abaami bomu masiro katikkiro wamasiro ssaalongo george abaakwasibwa emirimu egyowabulaakayole nabagirinnya bajja kugikwanaganya era bakole ekyetaagisamu kiseera kino amasiro gajja kuba maggale olwokusobozesa abakugu okukola ekyetaagisaolutalo lwa katikkiro ne nnaalinnya lwakambuwazza kabakaolwokusatu oluwedde lwe lwabadde olulambula olwomulundi ogwa 28 bukya mayiga atandika nkola yokulambuza abantu buli ntandikwa ya mwezimu kusooka ennambuza zino zaakozesebwanga okusonda ettoffaali kyokka ennambula ezisembyeyo zibadde zifuuse za mbirigo nga nnaalinnya namikka ne ttiimu ye balaga obutali bumativu eri mayiga ne ttiimu ya bayinginiya abavunaanyizibwa ku mirimu egyekikugu ku nnyumba enkulu mu masiro  muzibwazaalampangaokusika omuguwa kwatandika mwaka guwedde era abazaana abalabirira amasiro baatuuka nokwekalakaasa ne baggyawo emikeeka katikkiro gye yalina okufukamirako mu muzibwazaalampanga nafukamira mu ttaka mu lulambuza olwaliwo nga september 1 2015ennambuza ezaddako nazo zibadde za kaweereege era mu kulambula kwa february 1 2016 nnaalinnya namikka yayimirira mu maaso ga katikkiro namutegeeza nti abakugu mbawadde ennaku ttaano bwe baba tebalina kye batandiseeko nga nze omulimu ngwekwatiramuwabula ennaku zaggwaako era talina kye yakolawo nga kigambibwa nti yali amaze okufuna okuwabulwa nti enkola yokwekalakaasa kabaka tagyagalakyokka okulaga obutali bumativu kwagenda bugenzi mu maaso era entikko yaabwo yabaddewo ku lwokubiri lwa wiiki ewedde march 1 2016katikkiro olwabadde okutuuka mu masiro yagenze butereevu mu nnyumba muzibwazaalampanga era wadde eno tewakkiriziddwaayo bannamawulire bukedde yafunye akatambi akalaga namikka ngatadde katikkiro ku nninga ku nkola yemirimu eyakasoobo eremesezza okumaliriza amasironamikka yasoose kulaga butali bumativu ku ngeri ebizizi ebyali bikoleddwa abagirinnya sserumpanise ne wabulaakayole abakkirizibwa mu nnono ate gye byawanulwayo akulira ttiimu yabakugu jonathan nsubuga nga tagoberedde bulombolomboyagasseeko okubuuza amaanyi nsubuga gyagaggya okufutyanka emirimu egikolebwa abennono ne watabeerawo amukomako yayogedde ne ku butaagaliza neffubitizi lye yayogeddeko ngerigootaanyizza omulimu kubanga mu kuggyayo ebizizi okutambulizibwa essubi nga bagamba nti ssi be baali bateekeddwa okukola omulimu kyokka ebika bwe byasabibwa okuweereza abantu abatuufu ate ne biweerereza ddala abo abaali bakoze omulimu ogwayonoonebwakatikkiro bwe yaweereddwa omukisa okwogera talina kye yayanukula ku bigambo bya namikka wabula yawadde buwi bweyamu nti omulimu guno gwakuggwassaabasajja kabaka awangaale olwo nassa ekigali mu bibbo nagenda mu kidaala abantu abalala we baabadde balindiddenamikka bwe yagenze mu kidaala yamazeewo akaseera katono ne yeekandagga nagenda mu nnyumba zabazaana naleka katikkiro mu kidaalanti bino byonna kabaka babadde babimunnyonnyola era okumalawo okusika omuguwa okubaddewo kwe kusalawo okussa ebbali ababadde mu kusika omuguwa omulimu gukwasibwe minisita dennis walusimbi abakugu nabagirinnya gusobole okutambulaabamu ku bali mu masiro baategeezezza bukedde nti ngoggyeeko omulimu okutambula akasoobo olutalo wakati wa namikka ne mayiga lweyongeramu amaanyi nga namikka agamba nti emirimu gyateekeddwa okukola ate katikkiro agiwa bantu balala naddala abavunaanyizibwa ku mirimu egyekikugu abakulirwa nsubugaobukuubagano buno bubadde buzingiramu nolukiiko olwakwasibwa zabazaana wabula muzibwazaalampanga eyatandikibwa okuzimbibwa nga january 2013 ku mulembe gwa yingmayiga bwe yakwata ddamula mu may 2013 yalaalika nti atandikira ku masiro era okusonda ettoffaali ne kutandika era bbuggwe wamasiro bwe yaggwa ku kudda ku kizimbe masengerebino we bijjidde ngabakola omulimu ogwennono mu kuzimba amasiro abamanyiddwa nga abagirinnya balina obutali bumativu era baagaanye okuwaayo omulimu gwebizizi ebiwanikibwa mu kasolya ka muzibwazaalampanga nga bagamba nti babanja obukadde 80 ezirina okubasasulwaerias sserumpanise nga yeyakulemberamu abagirinnya okukola ebizizi bino yategezezza nti amaze ebbanga nga yeetawula e mmengo okufuna ensimbi ezobukozi bwabwe kyokka nga teri kavaayokabaka nga tannawa kiragiro kipya ku masiro sserumpanise yabadde amaze okusisinkana mayiga nti bakiraba ngabakungu abatassa kitiibwa mu mulimu ogukolebwa abennono yensonga lwaki nensimbi ze baba beetaaga bamala kuzisimbira kaggo ate nga ssente zabakugu bazibaweerawo nga baakazisabaabazaana mu masiro nabo baludde nga beemulugunya ku ngeri gye bayisibwamu omuli okubulwa ebyokulya nokunywa nga bagamba nti kiva ku kuba ngensimbi zonna ezikungaanyibwa mu masiro okuva mu balambuzi abagendayo zitwalibwa mmengo ne basigala nga beerya nkutaabataka abamu beemulugunya ne ku ngeri sharifah kirimuttu omukongozi wa kabaka kintu okusindiikirizibwa ku nkomerero yomwaka 2015 bwe yagenda mu masiro okulambika abakozi ku bikulu bye balina okukola kyokka abakungu okuva e mmengo nga bali wamu nabaserikale ne bamukanyuga ebweru nga bagamba nti bye yali akola byali bya sitaanikirimuttu yategeezezza bukedde nti ensonga ezo zonna zibadde zeetaagisa kabaka okusitukiramu kubanga nnyinimu bwatakwata mu kisibo embuzi zifa nnaganga           omutaka mbazzi kiggye ayimiridde ku kkono ngabuuza ku kisawuzi bbwaddene eyamuwawaabiraomutaka akulira ekika kyempeewo paul mbazzi kiggye enkya ku lwokusatu lwaddayo mu kkooti ya kisekwa e mmengo ku musango nomutaka kiggye omuwawaabirwa ba kukubira mu bujulizi bwe baawa mu musango guno olwo kkooti yeekenneenye nga tennawa nsala yaayoku ssande bazzukulu ba kalyankolo nga bakulembeddwaamu omutaka nanziri nadduli kibaale e bbunga baategeezezza nti kati kimala abantu bonna abakwatibwako ensonga zino okulaba nti omutaka mbazzi ababoola era tabeetaaga mu kika kino nga nabo kwe basinziira okusaba kabaka nnyo mu butonde bwaffekalyankolo ngomutadde ebbali ba kibaale bangi abaakola omulimu omunene ku kabaka waffe atali omu nabo batwaliddwa mu kitimba kino daniel nanziri nadduli zaakayo nadduli kibaale nga yali mukuza wa mwanga iikuno kwossa kantinti lule eyali kibaale wa kamaanya nadduli kibaale i eyali owa ssemakookiro ne jjunju wamu nabalala nanziri ssenkubuge nabalala okutuukira ddala ku jjajja neggwanganolwekyo okusinga okubeera mu masahhanzira omutaka kiggye kyekiseera asigale gyali nabo basigale e kkungu era beekulembereempeewo si kye kika ekinaaba kisoose okwekutulamu kubanga nebika abali mu masironamikka ngali ne mulumba baakwataganye nabantu abalala ne basooka okwevumba akafubo ku nnyumba kajjaga nga bali ne minisita wobuwangwa denis walusimbi sengendomayiga yayingidde lye busujjuluno lutegekebwa minisitule ya gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengo ngensonda zaategezezza nti lwanditaputibwa ngolwebyobufuzi abaluli mu mitambo kwe kusalawo okulwongezaayominisita omubeezi owa 2016olusirika abaami bamasaza bano abaggya lwe basooka okwetabamu lwaliwo nga december 1113 2014 nga luno lwe lugenda okukola ngolwomwaka oguwedde 2015           omumyuka owookusatu owa katikkiro wa buganda apollo makubuyammengo ezzizza enfuga ya federo mu ddiiro nga kati kaweefube gweriko wa kulaba ngessibwa mu ssemateeka wa ugandaomumyuka owookusatu owa katikkiro wa buganda apollo makubuya nga ye ssentebe wakakiiko ka mmengo akapya akakola ku nsonga eno yagambye nti baagala abeesimbyewo boogere we bayimiridde ku nsonga enomakubuya era minisita webyamateeka e mmengo yagambye nti kino kitegeeza ssemateeka alina okukyusibwa enfuga ya federo eteekebwemu nayongerako nti yokka yegenda okwongera okutumbula obuweereza eri bannayugandaku mmande katikkiro charles peter mayiga yalangiridde akakiiko akagenda okulaba nga buganda efuna federo nakalagira okukola namaanyimu nnongoosereza ya ssemateeka mu 2005 abantu ba buganda baatwala ebirowoozo mu kakiiko akaali kakulemberwa munnamateeka ssemateekawe tuzze tuyimirira era we tukyayimiriddenolwekyo tusaba bannabyabufuzi ku mitendera gyonna okwegatta ku nsonga eno eggukemmengo eyaniriza buli kitundu kya uganda ekyettanira federo mu lukiiko e mmengokatikkiro charles peter mayiga alabudde abasajja nti bwe baba baagala abaana abawala bakomye okwambala enkunamyo nabo basooke beggyemu obukuusa obubeevu ate bwe badda ebbali nga mayanja ntate atambulira ku miggongafuluma e bulange  mmengoku kkono ye robert kasule jingo bazannye ku ddyo ne yakobo kityokabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii asaze omusango gwekika kyengeye naggya kyanjudde kasujja owennono okuyita mu mutuba gwa kalutenzikiriziganya nensala ya kkooti ya kisekwa nti olumbe lwomutaka alikadi zibukuyimbwa eyali omukulu wekika kyengeye owennono eyazaama mu 1927 terwabizibwanga era tasikirwanga nga kasujja omukulu wekika kyengeyenolwekyo bonna ababaddewo nga bakasujja babadde bakuumi ba ntebe yobwakasujjanzikiriza ensala ya kkooti ya kisekwa era nnaku 30 okuva leero omusango lwe gusaliddwa           kabaka ngasala keeki mu kuggalawo ekisaakaatekabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii agambye nti nnyingi ku mpisa ennono nobuwangwa bwa buganda tebinnadda okuva gye byazaayiranasiima nnaabagereka nabalala abavuddeyo okubizaawulatukimanyi bulungi nti embeera yeggwanga yayonoona nnyo ennono nobuwangwa bwaffeembeera eyo yaleeta eddibu ddene ssomero lya st juliana high e jolwe gayazayasiimye nnaabagereka olwomulimu ekisaakaate gwe kikoze mu baana nti emyaka 10 gye kimaze kiwa essuubi mu biseera bya buganda ebyomu maasoyeebazizza abantu lwessaawa emu nalagira omukolo gutandikeweema eyabadde erina okubaamu keeki yagudde ate endala kabaka mwe yabadde alina okutuula bakira bakwatiridde nkwatirire obutagwawano bangi baanenyezza aba fotogenix nti baalemeddwa okuzisiba okunywerakatikkiro charles peter mayiga yagambye nti okubeerawo kwekisaakaate okumala emyaka 10 kabonero akalaga nti mu nsi ezikyakula waliwo ebintu ebisobola okukolebwa nebiwangaala kubanga ekizibu ekisinga kwekubeera nti bingi ebikolebwa mu nsi ezikyakula tebiwangaala kusussa myaka etaanoku mukolo gwe gumu ssaabasumba wa kampala dr cyprian kizito lwanga ba disitulikiti okugenda okwekenneenya ekiwandiiko kyensimbi obwakabaka ze bwagala zisasule nokusalawo ku bintu bina nga bakolako kimuku bintu ebina okulondako kuliko okusasula obupangisa bwebizimbe agenze bungereza ku lugendo olwokuwummulako nga bwakola nemirimu gyobwakabaka emiralamutebi ii yafulumye ku mmande nga yagendedde mu nnyonyi  ya emirates nga yalese awadde obuganda essanyu bweyabulaze omulangira ssemakookiroolunaku lweggulo lwezaweze wiiki bbiri ebbanga abataka abakulu bebika mu buganda mwebali basabidde okumusisinkana okumutegeeza ensonga ezenjawulo ezigenda mu maaso mu bwakabakaokufuluma kwomutanda kwalese bangi ku bataka nga bennyamivu nti ensonga zaabwe tezakolebwako nokwenyamira nti ddala tebakyabalibwa ngabalina obuvunanyizibwa mu bugandawabula olupapula luno lwakitegeddeko nti kabaka nga tannasitula ku mmande yasoose kukubira mukubiriza waabwe omutaka kayiira gajuule fredrick kasibante namutegeza nti wakusisinkana abataka bano amangu ddala ngakomyeewo mu ggwangakabaka yayongedde nategeeza kayiira nti  nsubira okukomawo mu wiiki ssatu oluvannyuma mbasisinkane kyokka si bonnatugenda kusooka kwogera nolukiiko olufuziolukiiko olufuzi ddirokabaka nga yakakomawo mu ggwanga asuubirwa okukuliramu entikko yemikolo gyabavubuka mu buganda egigenda okubeera ku mbuga yessaza elye kyadondo e kasangati nga november 72015          kabaka agenze mu luwummula naleka abataka nga bennyamivuenkyukakyuka kabaka ze yakoze nga tezinnalangirirwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga yasoose kuweereza bubaka ku ssimu za baminisita obubalaalika zaaweredde essaawa 10 ezolweggulo obubaka buno bwabadde butuuse ku ssimu zaabwe nekyaddiridde lyessanyu mwabo abaagudde mu bifo kyokka mulimu nabaanakuwadde olwokulekebwa ebbali nabaakyusiddwa ne bulungi bwansiomulimu gwokukulaakulanya ennyanja ya kabaka guyingidde enteekateeka ezisembayo nga kabineti yobwakabaka yerindiriddwa okulangirira olunaku okunaatemebwa evvuunike mu kifo kinowiiki abaliko balinako ebyapaku ntandikwa yomwezi guno september 22015 minisita omubeezi owebyobulambuzi e mmengo rita namyalo kisitu yayanjula pulaani nga bwegenda okubeera kyokka nayongerako nti pulojekiti eno egenda kutwala ensimbi nnyingi bwatyo nayita bamusigansimbi okujja okukwatagana nobwakabakanamyalo agamba nti pulojekiti eno yeetaaga ensimbi nnyingi ddala era kabineti yasazeewo okukolagana ne bamusigansimbi abenjawulo mu uganda tulabe engeri gye tuyinza okugimaliriza nolwekyo tubaaniriza bajje tulabe bwe tuyinza okugitambuzangomulimu guno gugenda mu maaso obutonde bwensi bugenda kussibwako essira naddala okulaba ngekifo kino kiteekebwamu essengejjero lyamazzi agava mu nnyanja okugeza mukoka galeme kukosa ebiramu ebiri mu nnyanjaku nnyanja kuno kuliko ebinyonyi mulimu ebyennyanjaku lukiiko lwokukulaakulanya ennyanja eno kuliko omukugu mu butonde bwensi okulaba nga bino tebitataaganyizibwa dr keneth ssemwogerere nga ye mukubi wa pulaani yekifo kino era maneja wa pulojekiti eno bwe yategeezezzaokwogera nabantu abali ku ttaka lyennyanjanamyalo yategeeza bukedde nti baagala omulimu gutandike mu bwangu era kabineti yobwakabaka yalagira ekitongole kyettaka ekya buganda land board blb okwekenneenya obusenze bwabantu bonna abali mu kifo kino ngabo abatalinako bwannannyini bwonna baakusabibwa okuvaako ate abalina obuwandiike blb bejja okwogera nabo okulaba ekinaakolebwa          enteekateeka zokuddaabiriza ennyanja ya kabaka ziweddeabambejja nabalangira ababadde babeera mu masiro e kasubi bagobeddwaamu ne basigala nga bakukkulumaokusinziirab ku mukembuga mukyala wa ssekabaka kintu sharifah kirimuttu ekiro ekyakeesezza ssande nnaalinnya beatrice namikka ngali wamu nabaserkale yabagambye nti katikkiro charles peter mayega yazze natandika okukola emikolo mu masiro ye kennyini gye yali yagaana era nagobamu abambejja nabalangiraate ye omulangira walugembe bamweyana agamba nti bo bwe bagezaako okwogerako batiisibwa ne bawaayirizibwa nga bwe beegeza mu kuggyako kabakabagamba nti ssente ezisoloozebwa mu masiro kati tewali amanyi gye ziddabasaba olukiiko lwa masengere lutuule mu nsonga eno kubanga bwetekolebwakwo bunnambiro yandireeta ebizibu          abalangira nabambejja bagobeddwa mu masiro e kasubiababalira mbabazi akalulu baateesa nti kikulu nnyo omuntu waabwe alabike ngali ne kabakaekyo kijja kwanguyiza mbabazi okuwangula akalulu mu bugandafayinolo yomupiira gwamasaza bwe yalangirirwa okubeera e namboole ku lwomukaaga ne bagulaba ngomukisa mbabazi okulaba ne kabaka era akubwe ebifaananyi wakati mu bantu abangi ekijja okulaga nti mmengo ewagira mbabazi okwesimbawobakakuyege ba mbabazi nga bakolaganira wamu nabakungu abamu e mmengo baabadde bategese mbabazi abeera omu ku bakungu kabaka balamusaako e nambooleensonda zaategeezezza nti mbabazi waliwo ne be yawaayo ku ssente nga bamutegeezezza nti zijja kuyambako mu kutegeka nokukunga abantu babeereyo mu bungi nga ssingo ettunka ne buddu ku fayinolottiimu ya mbabazi yalina ekirowoozo ekyokugulira abantu tikiti naye abategesi ne bakityamu kubanga kyali kitegeeza nti baalina okuziranga nga boogera omuntu aziguze ekiyinza okuvaako aba nrm ate nabo okwagala okugula tikiti kireetewookuvuganya kwebyobufuzi ku mukolo gwa kabaka atakkirizibwa kwenyigira mu byabufuzimbabazi yajjidde mu kkanzu e namboole kyokka yatuuse kabaka yazze dda ngate entegeka yali ya mbabazi kutuuka mangu olwo kabaka amulamuse nga yaakatuukakino kyakalubizza entegeka yokumulanga ku mizindaalomu nkola yemikolo gya buganda kabaka bwatuuka teri muntu mulala gwe baddamu kulanga nti atuuse kubanga ssaabasajja abeera amaze okubuutikiraokusika omuguwa e mmengo ku bya mbabaziwazzeewo okusika omuguwa mu lukiiko oluvunaanyizibwa ku kutegeka emikolo e mmengo ngabamu bagamba nti mbabazi yayitibwa mu butongole abeewo ku mukoloate abalala nti yazze buzzi ngabantu abalala nasasula ssente zokuyingira okutuula mu kifo ekyekikungukyokka mbabazi bwe yatuuse omukungu we mmengo yagenze namwaniriza namulinnyisa waggulu namutuuza mu layini ya baminisita ba kabaka naba gavumenti eya wakati ate nga talina kifo kyonna kigwa mu kkowe eryoeno ye layini okwabadde ne kabaka era nga kiteeberezebwa nti abategesi kino baabadde bakimanyi nti ajjaadam ssematiko avunaanyizibwa ku nzirukanya yebyemizannyo e mmengo yagambye nti mbabazi baamwekanze bwekanzi ngatuuse era yazze nomupiira gwatandise ddayagambye nti wadde waliwo abagamba nti yayitibwa ekituufu teyayitibwa era yazze ngabantu abalalaomu ku bayambi ba mbabazi yategeezezza bukedde nti abaatuukirira mbabazi tebajja mu ngeri ntongole wabula baamukakasa nti bajja kumuwa ekifo ekyoku mwanjo nokumutemera ekkubo alamuse ku kabakaengeri mayiga gye yalemesezza mbabazi okutuuka ku kabakambabazi olwatuuse yasoose kulamusa omumyuka wa pulezidenti edward ssekandi olwo natambula okugenda ewa kabakakino katikkiro charles peter mayiga yakirabye mangu nasituka namukoonako ngamutegeeza nti aveeyo adde mu kifo wabadde ateekeddwa okutuulaawo avunaanyizibwa ku ntuula yabagenyi protocol e mmengo david ntege yakulembedde mbabazi namutwala mu kifo ekyabadde kiriraanye minisita omubeezi owebyobulimi vincent ssempijjamu kasattiro akaabaddewo minisita wa gavumenti owebyemizannyo charles bakkabulindi yavuddewo mpolampola nalekawo akatebe olwo ssempijja ne yeeseeseetula nadda mu ka bakkabulindi mbabazi ne bamuwa watuulaensonda zaategeezezza nti oluvannyuma lwebintu obutatambula nga bwe byabadde bisuubirwa waliwo enteekateeka okutwala mbabazi mu bulange asisinkane katikkiroomumyuka owookubiri owa katikkiro haji muhamood ssekimpi yagambye nti naffe twabadde mbabazi tetumusuubira era nakatebe kwe yatudde kaabadde ka kunoonya bunoonyawabula enkola yaffe e mmengo ya kwaniriza buli muntu kubanga mu bulange tetulina langi za bibiinaekirala kabaka jjajjaffe buli ali mu buganda muzzukuluwe ate talina mpalanirakoomutawaana tugulina ku oyo yekka atassa kitiibwa mu kabaka nolwekyo mbabazi yakolagana nabategesi bomukolo okumupangira asisinkane kabaka era yabawa ssente okutuukiriza misoni eyossentebe wa nrm mu buganda  alhaji abdul nadduli alabudde mmengo  ku mbabazi nabategeeza nti ebbanga lyamulabidde yomu ku bantu abatayagalira ddala buganda era azze akotoggera enteekateeka zokuzza ebintu bya bugandayajjukizza mmengo nti ne sebaana yatwala nobert mao e mmengo mu 2010 namufukamiza mu maaso ga kabaka kati baddidde mbabazi  bamuleese mu maaso ga ssaabasajjayagambye nti mbabazi yomu ku baalemesa enteeseganya za federo nesikizibwa regional tieryagambye nti mmengo ne bweneeyaniriza mbabazi abantu mu buganda bamumanyi nti tayagalangako nsonga za buganda era tebajja kumuwa kaluluowebyamawulire  mu ofiisi ya ssaabawandisi wa nrm rogers mulindwa yayongeddeko nti emyaka  egiwerako okukyusa emitima gyabantu so si mu kiseera kya kampeyiniyeebuuzizza oba emipiira gyamasaza gyatandise ku lwamukaaga mbabazi alyoke alabikeko          engeri katikkiro mayiga baasuubira okutuukako  bingi tubituuseeko mu masaza gye baakagendangoggyeeko kyaddondo ne busiro awali enkulaakulana eyomuggundu amasaza agasigadde twagasalira emitwalo 10 buli wa kibanja lya myezi ebiri gyokka tusobodde okuwandiika abantu abasoba mu mitwalo 6kino kitegeeza nti we tunaamalirayo okuwadiika nga nomuwendo gwe twasuubira ogwa bannannyini bibanja abali ku ttaka lya kabaka tugusussizzabye twasinziirako okubasalira ssente ezo twatunuulira nnyo ebyenfuna byabantu abo nenkulaakulana eri mu kitundu kuba omuntu ali e busujju kiba kizibu okumusaba ssente ze zimu nomuntu ali mu kyaddondo oba busiro okuggyako ebitundu bya busiro ebimu nga namayumba ne masuuliita ebyo enkulaakulana yaabyo ekyali wansi ddala era twabitwala nga bya kyalolwaki twasaba emitwalo 60 okuwandiisa ekibanja mu kyaddondo ne busirommengo yatuula nabakulembeze okuva mu kcca ne disitulikiti ye wakiso nabamu ku bakulembeze okuva mu kanso ezenjawulo okuli nansana kira  makindye ndejje makindye saabagabo nebitundu ebiralaemitwalo 60 ze twagereka twabala ebintu ebiwerako era twagenda okukizuula nga tosobola kufuna mupunta akwerulira mpenda za kibanja kyo ku ssente entono bwe zityo sso nga kuno kwe kuli nokukukolera ku biwandiiko byekibanja nokukiwa nnamba ya polotiempenda zino tuziggula okusinziira ku pulaani nengeri gye bateekerateekera ekibuga  nga tusinziira ku pulaani ya kcca oba kanso zebitundu ebibanja gye biri  nga bwe baali baateekerateekera ekitundubino byonna abapunta babissa mu nkola kuba kye kimu ku ntegeeragana gye twatuukako nga tusisinkanye abakulembeze bebitundu byonna nga birina kukolebwa ku mitwalo 60biki omuntu byafuna mu kuwandiisa ekibanja kyeekibanja kyo kijja kuba kimanyiddwa okuva e mmengo era mu bitabo byaffe oba ojja kubaamukino kijja kuba lwokubiri bwe yayisa ebizindaalo okugaana abantu mu tawuni ye rakai okwetaba mu ttofaaliyagasseeko nti ku lwokusatu katikkiro nganaatera okutuuka ku mbuga yessaza e rakai kamuswaga kennyini okugobaganya abategeka weema okutuusa bwe baasibidde mu bimuli bya ofiisi ya disitulikitiomwogezi wa kooki stanley ndawula yakakasizza okulekulira kwabakungu ba kamuswaga bano era nti bagenda kubakolera akabaga akabasiibulaku butakkaanya obuliwo haji idd ahmed kiwanuka akola nga katikkiro wa kaamuswaga yategeezezza bukedde nti rdc bwaba nga yasabye katikkiro mayiga okusisinkana obukulembeze bwe kooki tukyaniriza kuba tuludde nga tukiyaayaanira era tuwandiikidde katikkiro ebbaluwa nnyingi okumusisinkana nga tetuddibwamutumusaba okusaba okwo akuteeke mu nkolakatikkiro yatandika ku lwokubiri okutikkula abantu be rakai omuli ebitundu byamasaza kooki ne buddu ettofaali namaliriza ku lwokusatumu ssaza lye kooki yatikkudde obukadde 31 ate mu bitundu bya buddu omuli kaliisizo ne kakuuto obukadde 34mayiga yakubirizza abe kooki okukolagana obulungi namasazaga buganda amalala kuba ayagala okutuuka amangu atambula bwomu naye ayagala okutuuka ewala atambula ne banne          baminisita 5 aba kamuswaga balekuliddebya john bosco mulyowa ne dickson kulumbapoliisi efubutudde abaserikale ba kamuswaga abaasindikiddwa okulemesa katikkiro charles peter mayiga okwogera eri abantu bomu kabuga ke rakaieno yabadde ntikko ya butakkaanya obuliwo wakati wa mmengo ne kamuswaga alumiriza nti ayisibwaamu amaaso era nga gye buvuddeko abamu ku bantu be yatiisatiisa nokwekutula ku bugandaokuva katikkiro lwe yalangirira enteekateeka zokugenda e kkooki aggyeyo ettoffaali mu kaweefube wokuzimba buganda abakungu ba kamuswaga abatali bamu baavaayo ne bakunga abakooki okulemesa katikkiro okugenda mu kitundu kyabwe okuggyako nga mmengo emaze okukkiriza okutuula ku mmeeza ne bateesaabategesi baakedde ku makya okuteekateeka ekifo katikkiro we yabadde agenda okwogerera mu rakai town council kyokka baabadde bassaawo weema nokuteekamu obutebe abaserikale ba kamuswaga ne bayingirawo nebayimiriza buli kimu era ne balagira buli kintu okuggyibwawoabategesi baagondedde ekiragiro ne baggyawo weema ne bazissa awalala kyokka nawo ne balagirwa okuziggyawo mu bwangu kwe kuzitwala awaddako baziteeke awo era nawo abaserikale ne babalumbawo ne babalagira baziggyewo mangumu kiseera kino ekibinja kyabaserikale ba poliisi abaabadde baduumirwa dpc wa rakai moses bakwana ne rdc wa rakai charles mubiru baatuuse ne batwala abaserikale ba kamuswaga entyagi era ne balagira ekifo kitegekebwe omukolo gugende mu maasokatikkiro mayiga yatuuse mu kifo kino ku ssaawa 500 ezoku makya era aboogezi abamwanirizza baasoose kumuloopera mbeera yabaddewo nti kyokka baalwanye masajja abalumbaganyi ne babasinza amaanyi ne baddukakatikkiro mayiga mu kwogerakwe yasoose kusiima poliisi ne rdc abaakoze ekinene okuzza embeera mu nteeko nasiima abakooki obutawubisibwa bantu batono nagattako nti omulembe omutebi tegwetaaga bantu batiitiiziyasabye abakooki okunywerera ku kabaka nabakubiriza obutawuliriza maloboozi gaagala kwekutula ku bugandakatikkiro yasoose mu nalambuzibwa ekifo kino nasiima emirimu egikolerwamuakulira ekifo kino dr nalugoda yawaddeyo ettoffaali lya bukadde 9katikkiro oluvannyuma yeeyongeddeyo mu bitundu bingi gye yagenze asolooza nkolaomwoleso guno gwagguddwawo ku ssande nenteekateeka yabazadde okutwala abaana baabwe okubalaga obulamu obubeera ebweru wamaka gaabwe ssaako empaka zamaato ku nnyanja ya kabaka e ndeebaabaana ba yamaka bwalabulangayita mu misomo egikwata ku nteekateeka yamaka ayongedde okuzuula ebiruma abafumbo  ebivaako abamu okwawukana ate nabalala ne babeera awaka ngempuliziganya tewalinga maama wa buganda nneenyumiriza nnyo mu kulaba nga abakyala bongera okumanya obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe mu maka okulabirira abaana okuyonja amaka nokutema empenda ezokuyingizaamu ensimbi mu maka gaabwe awatali kulinda baami kubawa nnaabagereka bwalabula abakyalaokutunda buganda mu mawanga amalala nakyo akitwala nga kyanjawulokino abantu ba buganda basobola bulungi okukituukako nga bayita mu kwenyigira mu misomo egitali gimu egitegekebwa wano ewaffe ate nebweru wa buganda ne ugandannaabagereka akikkaatiriza nti ssinga tufuba okwenyigira mu misomo egyetabwamu amawanga amalala ku miramwa egyenjawulo amawanga agaba geetabyemu neyo amawulire gye gatuuka baba basobola bulungi okumanya nti waliyo eggwanga eryokino era kyongera okutuganyula mu ngeri yokusaka emikwano egiyamba okutukwatirako mu nkulaakulanabangi ku batuwa obuyambi okugeza nga mu kitongole kya ndf nebirala tubafuna nga tuyita mu makubo nga agomu kaweefube wa  kabaka mutebi okubangawo enkolagana nobwakabaka obulala nnaabagereka akikoze ngasinziira ku mirimu emingi gyakolaakyalidde bakabakulembeze abennono mu bitundu byabwe gye baliera mu ngeri yemu kimuwa amaanyi okwongera okumanya enzirukanya yemirimu nenneeyisa yaabwe era nga bino byonna bimwongera okunnyikiza ebyo byaba akola kuno olwokutwala buganda mu maasonnaabagereka anywwezezza enkolagana ye ne bannamasoleawaayo ekiseera nabakyalira ne kimuyamba okwongera okumanya ebyaliwo ku mirembe gya bassekabakaokuyamba abakadde nabaana abatalina mwasirizikino kibayamba nabo okumanya nti newankubadde balinga abaasigala bokka awatali banganda naye balina ababaagalaateekateeka okuzimba amaka gekisaakaate amatongole ku ttaka eryamuweebwa omutanda e ssisa mu busiro okwongera okubangawo enkolagana nabantu abatwetoolodde mu buganda ne uganda okutwaliza awamu okutumbula ebyobulamu mu maka gye tuva ne mu bifo ebitwetooloddessaabasajja ngajaguza okuweza emyaaka abirimu ebiri ku nnamulondo nga tusinziira kwebyo nnaabagereka byakoze namakubo gatemye okutuukiriza ebyo byaasuubira okukola nti waggya kubaawo okutebenkera nokuwanirira omumuli gwa buganda naddala mu nkulaakulanaabantu ba buganda nnaabagereka bulijjo abakubiriza okwongera kyembogokwatandikira ku mulembe gwa ssekabaka kimera eyalagira nabaana be nabazzukulu bakongojjebwengakabaka kimera bwe yali ajja kuno okumerusa obuganda ngali ne mukyala we namagembe eyamuweebwa abembogo baatuuka mu kkubo oluvannyuma lwokutambulira ebbanga eddene mukyalawe ono namagembe nakoowakimera yali ava bunyoro ngajja okulya obwakabakanamagembe ye yali muwala wa kayiira mu kiseera ekyo eyali ayitibwa makumbiono yali yazaalibwa ne bannyina bana okuli kaddu nga ye mutabani wa makumbi omukulu walakira ye wookubiri ssemitego waakusatu ne kasamba kati ayitibwa wavvuuvuumiranamagembe bwe yatendewalirwa nolugendo mwannyina kasamba namusitulamu kiseera ekyo nomulangira kimera yali akooye era olwalaba namagembe nga bamusitudde naye nasaba bamusitulekomakumbi yalaba biri bityo nalagira mutabaniwe omukulu naye asitule omulangira nga bwe yali asabye era naye nakikolakimera bwe yatuuka kuno namala nokutuuzibwa ku nnamulondo yalagira abembogo bamukongojjenga era nabaana be nabazzukulu nabo bwe batyo babakongojjenga   omutaka kayiira agamba nti enkola eno olwokuba nga yali ya dda omulembe bwe gugenze gukyuka ne batandika okukola omulimu gwokutambuza kussa mu nkola okunnyikiza emirimu gyabyo egibimanyiddwaako mu nnono yaffekabaka bwaba akongojjebwa atuuzibwa ku bibegabega era ngamukongojja amala ennaku nga yeetegeka okukola kino omuli nokulya obulungiokukongojja kabaka kikolwa ekyoleka ekitiibwa kyoyo aba akikoleddwakowano mu buganda tumanyi nti okukongojja kukolebwa ku kabaka yekka wadde nga waliwo nabagenze bakikoppa naddala gwaba atuddeko ku bibegabega ate wabeerawo abalala ababeera ku njuyi zombi olwa ddyo ne kkonobano mu kiseera ekyo babeera bakuumi abasookerwako ababeerawo okwahhanga omulabe yennaeyali katikkiro bwatinagaana enkola ya regional tieroluvannyuma lwokukwasibwa ddamula kye natandikirako kulaba ngetteeka lya regional tier buganda lye yali emaze okugaana terigenda mu nkolapalamenti yali masirokabaka mutebi ii yatuuza olukiiko mu masiro e kasubi ku lwokutaano lwa wiiki ewedde nawa ebiragiro okwali okuddamu okukyusa akasolya kenju muzibwazaalampanga oluvannyuma lwabakugu abali ku ssaabasajja bye yalagira birina okugobererwawano waliwo abantu bangi saagala kwogera kinnadirira eri oyo atagoberere ssaabasajja kabaka kye yayogerakabaka bwajja awantu nagamba nti ensonga etambule ddamulassemasonga ya buganda esooka egamba okunyweza okutaasanokukuuma nnamulondo kabaka bwayogera ekintu ate oli addamu atya katikkiro yayongeddeko nti omulimu guno gulina okutambuzibwa mu nnono ne tebamanyi nkola bwegenda kubabwe yatuukiriddwa hajji mutaasa kafeero yagambye nti abantu bano bamazeewo ebbanga ddene nga bategeezebwa ngennyanja bwegenda okuddaabirizibwa nayongerako nti ekyokubasisinkana baakukyogerakoabagenda okuyamba ku pulojekiti enookukulaakulanya ennyanja eno kusuubirwa okuwemmenta ensimbi ezisukka mu buwumbi obutaano ngerimu ku makubo gokuzifuna kwe kuyita mu nkola yettofaaliritah namyalo minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa ku bulambuzi mu buganda pulojekiti eno mwegwa agamba nti bafunye emikago egigenda okubayambako okuli kcca okulaba ngenguudo mu kitundu kino zizimbibwa nokunyweza ebyokwerinda abalala abokuyambako kuliko gavumenti ye misiri ekitongole kyobutonde bwensi mu ggwanga  nema ate nabalala babasuubira okujjakatikkiro charles peter mayiga yalangirira nga may 11 2015 nti okukulaakulanya ennyanja eno kwe kuddako mu pulojekiti zobwakabaka ezigenda okukolebwa mu nkola yettofaali          empenda zennyanja ya kabaka zeerulwa wiiki enonnaabagereka sylvia nagginda agguddewo ettabi lyedduuka eritunda ebitabo erya aristoc nawa abazadde amagezi okuyigiriza abaana baabwe nokubaagazisa okusoma ebitabo basobole okufuna enkizo mu kumanya ebifa mu nsinnaabageraka yagambye nti omuntu bwasoma ebitabo ebyenjawulo ayiga engeri eyokubeeramu nabantu aba buli ngeri asanyusibwa ayiga afuna okunoonyereza afuna ebirowoozo ebipya nebintu ebirala bingiyawadde ekyokulabirako mu bulamu bwe ngakyasoma bwe yagambye nti yali asoma ebitabo era nganyumirwa nnyo omuwandiisi james hadley chase abawandiisi abalala ekyamuviirako noluusi okugwa mu mitawaana bwe yayagalanga banne okusoma ku bye yabanga asomyeko nabibaazika ngabiggya mu tterekero lya kitaawe kyokka ne batabizzankubiriza abaana muzuule obulungi obuli mu bitabo nokubisoma ate nammwe abazadde mugulire abaana ebitabo babisomenkimanyi waliwo abayinza okuba nga tebalina bwagazi bwa kusoma nnyo bitabo nga bannaabwe abamu kyokka kyamugaso nnyo naabagereka bwe yagambyebino yabyogeredde ku mukolo gwokuggulawo ettundiro lyebitabo erya aristoc ettabi eryassiddwa ku kizimbe kya acacia mall e kamwokya kiseminti ku lwokusatuminisita webyensimbi eyawummula maria kiwanuka okwagazisa abaana okusoma ebitabokatikkiro charles peter mayiga alabudde omulangira henry bbemba okukomya okweyingiza mu nsonga zolusozi jinja mawuuno nti kubanga kabaka yamala dda okulukwasa abantu abatuufu era abaluvunaanyizibwako mu kiseera kinookusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa ofiisi ya katikkiro nabantu bonna ababadde bakolagananomulangira bbemba ku byettaka lyolusozi luno ekifundikwakatikkiro yategeezezza nti okuva kabaka bwe yalonda ssaabalangira omuggya godfrey musanje kikulwe nga february 18 2015 nolukiiko lwe owomutuba gwa kaweesa omulangira joseph ssuuna kaweesa yavunaanyizibwa ku ttaka lya jinja mawuunoyategeezezza nti bamaze nokutuukirira abebyokwerinda nga mu kiseera kino balondoolaekifo okulaba nga tekisaalimbirwako bantu batali batuufuensonda zaategeezezza nti katikkiro okuvaayo bwati bamaze kufuna okwemulugunya okumala ngomulangira bbemba agenda mu maaso nokutunda ettaka lyembuga eno ekitakkirizibwanti kubanga ttaka lya bwakabaka eritatundibwaabadde akuuma ebyekika ebyannyagibwa ku ddyo ngakwasa ebimu ku bintu bino omulangira kateregga mulyante wakati abalangira ababiito be kkooki bawandiikidde kabaka ne bamuloopera nga bwe waliwo bannaabwe abeefunyiridde okukutula kkooki ku buganda kyokka bbo ssibaakubeegattakobano abakulembeddwaamu eyabadde ssentebe wenteekateeka zokusonda ensimbi ezokuyambako mu kuddukanya emirimu nti basanyufu olwa kabaka okubalondera abaami bamagombolola be bamanyi nti baggya kuweereza bulungi mu kitundu kyabwe era ne beeyama okubawagira newankubadde nga ne kaamuswaga ssansa kabumbuli yalonze ababe          ababiito baloopye abaagala okukutula kkooki ku bugandakabaka mutebi ii aguze ettaka nazimbira omulangira jjuma katebe olubiri olwamazeewo obukadde bwa ssentekabaka ennyumba eno yagimuzimbidde ku kyalo bugema mu kyaddondo era ku lwomukaaga nalagira eyakuliddemu okugizimba omulangira eddie ttebandeke kaganda agimukwase atandike okugisulamuomukolo gwokukwasa katebe ennyumba eno gwakoleddwa kyokka nekwasibwa ssaabalangira godfrey musanje kikulwe nabalangira nabambejja abava mu katebe oluvannyuma lwokunona katebe e kakeeka gyabadde asula nasangibwa nga teyeetegese ate ii era eno yensonga lwaki yasazeewo namuzimbira olubiri olugwanidde ekitiibwa kyeolubiri luno kabaka yalumuwadde era nekyapa kiri mu mannyagelwassiddwamu ebisenge ebiwerera ddala nga kuliko nawasula centre okuva mu butikkirokino kyawalirizza ekitongole kino okutandika okusengula ebintu byakyo byonna ebibadde byasigala mu kifo kino nga kibitwala e lubowa mu maka gaakyo amapyaensonda mu kitongole kino zaategeezezza nti bali mu kaweefube wokunoonya obukaddebwensimbi 250 mu bwangu bagule firiigi ezinassibwamu omusaayi gwabalwadde ba siriimuoguzze gukungaanyizibwa okumala ekiseera nga guyamba mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka kanoomusaayi oguli mu firiigi zino gweyambisibwa ebitongole mu nsi yonna ebiri ku mulimu gwokunoonyereza ku kawuka ka siriimu okuzuula eddagala erikattaekizimbe kya jcrc ekipya e lubowabutikkiro ge maka amatongole aga katikkiro wa bugandayemu ku bintu ebyaddizibwa bugandamu 1993 ngobwakabaka bugenda okuddizibwawo mu mateeka nga yadda wamu ne bulange olubiri lwe mmengo mu tteeka eryazza ebintu bino liyitibwa traditional rulers restitution of asserts and properties statute erya july 23 1993ensonda ze zimu mu kitongole kino zaategeezezza bukedde nti ebintu ebisoba mu bitundu 80 ku100 bisenguddwa omuli ezimu ku firiigi ezirimu omusaayi nebyuma ebikeberae lubowa jcrc erina ettaka lya yiika 20 nga kyatongozebwa pulezidenti yoweri musevenimu 2011omukungu mu jcrc ataayagadde kwatuukiriza mannya yagambye nti tuli basanyufuolwobwakabaka okutubudamya okumala ebbanga erisukka emyaka 20 era oluvannyumalwokuzimba amaka gaffe agenkalakkalira okusaba kwabwe okukozesa ekizimbe kino tukulabaebintu ebisinga bivuddemu naye firiigi ennene zigenda kusigala zikuumirwayo kubanga kigenda kutwetaagisa emyezi esatu okuviiramu ddala kuba okuzimba kusuubirwa bwa buganda eziriwomayiga wamu nekibinja kye baatonnye ku kisaawe kyennyonyi e ntebe ku ssaawa 630 ezenkya ya leero lwakubiri ngajjidde mu nnyonyi ya british airwayskatikkiro atenderezza obujjumbize okukkaanyakabaka mutebi ii ngayogerera ku mbuga yessaza e mukono nasaba abakulembeze okwagala okukkiriza enkyukakyuka ate nokuwabulwa okuva mu bantu be bakulemberaomukolo gwetabiddwako omumyuka owokubiri owa katikkiro hajj mohamood ssekimpi namasole margaret nagawa siwoza baminisita nabakulembeze abalala okuva mu masaza ga buganda yonna omuli naba gavumenti eya wakati          kabaka asabye abakulembeze okukkiriza enkyukakyuka nokuwabulwaleero nga may 30 buganda lwekuza olunaku lwa gavumenti ezebitundu era ssaabasajja ronald muwenda mutebi ii waakulambula essaza lye erye kyaggweessaza kyaggwe lye lyasinga mu buganda yonna okukola ebintu ebikulaakulanya buganda nokugaggawaza abantu mu ngeri ezitali zimu omwaka oguweddeakulira essaza kyaggwe ye ssekiboobo alex kigongo kikonyogoazaalibwa mu ggombolola ye nakifumaakoze kinene okukulaakulanya essaza omuli okugatta abantu aba buli ngeribwe nnayogeddeko naye ennaku ntono eziyise yangambye nti  ye ne ttiimu ye  bakoze kinene okusomesa abantu mu byalo engeri gye bayinza okwekulaakulanya nokweggya mu bwavuyangambye nti kaweefube gwe baliko wa kukubiriza bantu okuddamu okulima emmwaanyi nga bwe kyali mu myaka egyedda nangamba nti buganda yagaggawala lwa mmwaanyi na ppambawaliwo ekitongole ekisomesa abantu okubeera namaka amayonjo agalabika obulungi ageeyagazaekirala kigenda mu byalo ne kisomesa abantu okuteekawo emirimu egivaamu ensimbibataddewo ebifo  mwe balundira enkoko ezennyama nezamagienkola eno eyamba omuntu okubaako kyatunda buli lunaku nafuna sentessekiboobo yantegeezezza nti balina ofiisi ekola ku byobulambuzi mu kyaggweessaza lino lirimu ebifo bingi abagenyi bye bagendamu okulaba ebyobutonde nokusingira ddala abo abava mu nsi endala nabaana bamasomeroessaza lirina ekyuma ekikuba ebitabo printing press kati tekyetaagisa kugenda kampala kubikubirayossekiboobo yantegeezezza nti kati ekyuma kyabwe kikuba ebibuuzo byamasomero nebiwandiikossekiboobo yagambye nti balina enteekateeka okuzimba akatale akanene e nakifuma kiyambe abalimi mu magombolola agali mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo okuleetanga awo ebirime byabwe babigule babitwale mu butale e kampala ne jinjamukonoekibuga ekikulu ye mukono era we wali nembuga ya ssekiboobokiyitibwa mukono kubanga ssekabaka kyabaggu we yakisiza omukono ngava mu ntalo ze busoga bwe yali ayagala okugatta busoga ku bugandakyabaggu ye kabaka wa buganda owa 25 yafuga wakati wa 1750 ne 1780olwokubanga abaganda abomulembe ogwo baayagala okujjukira kabaka kyabaggu we yakisiza omukono kwe kutuumawo mukonoessaza kyaggwe lyenkanankana ne kyaddondo mu kuvaamu ensimbi eziyimirizaawo gavumenti ya uganda nga kin o kiva ku makolero amangi agalimuennimiro yebikajjo esinga obunene mu uganda ne east afrika eri mu kyaggwe okwo gattako amakolero ga bbiya ne soodaebiseera bino abachina bazimbye amakolero e mbalala agakola emitayimbwa neddagalaomwalo gwe katosi ne kiyindi ne nansagazi yeva ebyennyanja ebiriisa kampala nebitundu ebirala gisangibwa mu kyaggwemu kyaggwe mwe muli ekifo kyobulambuzi ekinene ekiri ebule ku nnyanja mu ggombolola ya ssaabaddu ntenjeruessaza kyaggwe mwe muli olwazi olunene oluyitibwa ggwagalo ekiri e kawunakiyanja mu ggombolola ya ssaabadduwano kabaka mawanda ssebanaakitta kabaka wa buganda owa 22 eyafuga wakati wa 1738 ne 1740 we yawagalira amafumu ngalwana ne muganda we kabaka kaguluwano yayambibwako owengo lubowa era ekifo ekyo nekyalo kyonna kya ba ngo abessiga lya lubowamu kyaggwe mwe muli omugga ssezibwa omunene oguyiwa ku nnyanja kyoga era mwe muli omugga zirimiti ayitibwa bba wemiggaekibi nti abantu abatandise okumalawo ekibira zirimitiebyenjigirizakyaggwe ssaza liri mu kifo kya waggulu nnyo mu byenjigiriza neddiini mu buganda ne ugandakyaggwe yalimu amasomero agamu amakulu agaasooka mu buganda namilyango college eryatandika mu 1902 bishop school mukono era kati waliwo ne uganda christian universitymu kyaggwe mwe muli mtst marys college namagunga erimu ku masomero gabawala amakulu mu ugandaabaminsane abakatuliki ba mill hill missionaries bwe bajja mu buganda mu 1895 maama kevina eyayatiikirira ennyo mu buganda nakuba ekigo e nkokonjeru nazimba eklezia amasomero amalwaliro era wano we yasinziira okuzimba nyenga naggalama nebifo bingi mu busoga teso ne kenyaabaminsane aba cms ne nac bo baazimba ngogwe baskerville school ne mpumu primary schoolkati amasomero mangi nnyo agali mu kyaggwe nga seeta high school e seeta ne mbalalawaliwo namilyango secondary school e naabuta hilton high school ne seroma e kyetume st balikuddembe e kisoga namilyango high school e gulama our lady of africa gulama mtst henry high school namalalaensalo za kyaggwe zirambikiddwaessaza kyaggwe lye limu ku masaza amanene ennyo mu bugandalyawukana ne kyaddondo wali ku mugga namanve kati we bazimba amakolero ne lituuka ku owen falls dam e jinjalyawukana era ne kyaddondo ku mugga nakiyanja ngogenda e namugongo era ensalo endala eri ku mugga lwajjali bwoba oyise e gayaaza ngogenda mu kalagiessaza kyaggwe lyawukana ne bugerere ngensalo gwe mugga ssezibwa awali olutindo olwebyuumalyawukana ne bulemezi era ne busiro ku nnyanja ngogenda e ntebenamanve yenna wamu nomugga ogukola ensalo ya kyaggwe ne kyaddondo waliwo ebyafaayo ebikulumu myaka gya 1600 awo wonna yali nnyanja nalubaale okutuukira ddala eno omugga gye guva mu byalo kiwanga ne kazingaabaganda mu myaka egyo nga basomokerawo mu bwato obutono obwayitibwanga emmanvuabaganda nga bagamba nti ekikono kyennyanja okisomoka na mmanvuennyanja bwe yeesika wonna ne  wafuuka lusenyi olwo abaganda omugga ne baguyita namanve nga bajjukira bwe baasomokanga ekikono kyennyanja nga bakozesa emmanvuendagaano ya 1900 bwe yakolebwa nettaka mu buganda ne ligabanyizibwa kabaka yafuna erirye nabaganda ne bafuna eryabweensalo zamasaza namagombolola mu buganda zaakakasibwaobwakabaka bwa buganda nolukiiko lwa buganda byakakasa era ne bitongoza omugga namanve nga yensalo yessaza kyaggwe ne kyaddondomagombolola gonna ensalo zaago zaakakasibwanamanve nga yensalo yeggombolola ya namutwe e goma neggombolola ye kira kati eyitibwa kira town councilabakulira kira town council naba disitulikiti ye mukono bwe baba  baagala okukakasa bino bagende e mmengo mu bulange mu ofiisi ekola ku buganda eyedda bajja kulaba obuwandiike ne maapu zonna eziraga ensalo zamasaza nagombolola mu bugandabayinza era okugenda mu ofiisi zebyettaka e ntebe ne mukono ne balaba maapu ezo ezeddamu myaka egyedda nga obote tannafutyanka bintu nga buli nsalo zamasaza namagombolola kuliko ekisaakaate nnyanja ya kabaka e mengo yazaalibwa zziba mu kyaggwealfonse ntale omu ku baatandika democratic party dp yazaalibwa nansagazi mu kyaggwekimanyiddwa nti buganda eyaniriza abantu abamawanga amalala abomu amerikakigenda kwetaagisa bapunta okuddamu okwerula ensalo yamasaza kyaggwe ne kyaddondo esangibwa e namanve okuva buli ludda bwe lutakkiriza kifo kirulagibwa ngensalo entuufu era nga kino namanve nga kino kigenda kukolebwa kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi iiwabula wazeewo okusika omuguwa ku kifo ekituufu ensalo yamasaza gombi wesangibwa ngabakulembeze be kyadondo naddala eggombolola ya
