ngekuumibwaensimbi obukadde 182 ze zaakasondebwa mu nkola amagombolola mu buganda mwe gakiikira e mmengo okugula satifikeeti ezekikungo mu nkola yokutuukiriza oluwalo lwagwo mu kuwagira emirimu gyobwakabakaminisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengo joseph kawuki agamba nti  enkola ya luwalo lwaffe yagendererwamu kwongera kuyingiza bantu ba kabaka mu kuyimirizaawo emirimu gy obwakabaka nga bajjajjaffe bwe baakolanga enkola eno yatongozebwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga nga january 13 2015 neggombolola ye makindye era ngamagombolola agasukka 15 ge gaakakiika ngabaddukanya enkola eno eyokuwagira eggwanika lya bugandabuli ggombolola mu buganda ligenda kuweebwa olunaku kwe linaakiikiranga e mmengo olwenkalakkalira okutandika nomwaka ogujjaku mulundi gwenkola eno ogusembyeyo nga april 28 2015 amagombolola okuli masuulita wakiso kakiri ne namayumba okuva e busiro be bakiika nomugatte gwensimbi 11333000 omukungu mu kitongole kya satifikeeti e mmengo lawrence muganga yategeezezza nti abantu balaze obujjumbize mu kugula satifikeeti era bagenda kwongeramu kaweefube wokukunga buli muntu wa buganda okugula waakiri satifikeeti buli mwakaku nkomerero yomwaka ensimbi ebitundu 10 ku 100 zigenda kuzzibwa ku magombolola okutambuza ku mirimu gyayo wamu nokuyooyoota ebizimbe byobwakabaka nga bulangebino we bijjidde nga mmengo eri mu kutegeka lunaku lwa gavumenti ezebitundu olugenda okubeerawo nga may 302015 ku mbuga yessaza lye kyaggwe e mukonoku lunaku luno abaami bamasaza lwe bagenda okweyanza obwami mu maaso ga kabaka era nga kawuki yagambye nti olunaku luno lugenda kwongera okulaga abaami nti ebyalo emiruka amagombolola namasaza bye birina okulabirira enzirukanya yemirimu gyobwakabaka          obukadde 182 ze zaakasondebwa mu nkola yoluwalobya anthony ssempereza ne kizito musokeenkulaakulana ku nnyanja ya kabaka katikkiro charles peter mayinga gye yalangiridde wiiki eno etandise okusattiza abagiriraanyekatikkiro yategeezezza olukiiko mu lutuula olwa may 11 2015 nti ennyanja eno bagenda kugissaako bbugwe okusimba omuddo okutangira mukoka okuzimba enguudo zonna eziyita ku nnyanja nga bali wamu ne kcca okukugira kazambi ayiibwa mu nnyanja eno okuzimbako wooteeri ennene nga kuliko nekirabo kyemmere ennansi okugifuula ekyobulambuzi okussaako obukubo obugyetooloola nokuzimbako ekifo awakuumirwa ebyennyanja ebya buli ngeriennyanja ya kabaka yeetooloddwa  zooni  nnya eziriko abasenze kayanja zooni sipaaya aggrey ne trianglekayanja zooni eriko abasenze era kwe kuli pope paul memorial community hotel ndeeba  ggalagi yomugagga  sam kyalema ne bakanaabe abooza emmotokasipaaya zooni  eriko amayumba loogi namasomeroaggrey zooni egatta awaabanga  essomero lya aggrey memorial  ate triangle zooni eriko amayumba amanene ne wooteeri ezamaanyiabasenze ku nnyanja ya kabaka abamu batulaze ebyapa bye baafuna okuva  e mmengo abalala bawa obusuulu era ne tikiti bazirinaklezia eyogedde ku busenze bwayo ku nnyanya ya kabakaaddukanya emirimu mu lukiiko lwettaka lya klezia e lubaga paul zziwa agambye nti waliwo akatundu ku pope paul akayingira mu ttaka lya kabaka eryennyanja era tuli mu nteeseganya nabo basobole okutuwaawo liizienkulaakulana gye baleeta ne klezia gyeyagala era ffe tulinze batuwe buwi pulaani tuyingire mu nkulaakulana ejjaate sam kyalema 70 omu ku balina ettundutundu ku ttaka lyennyanja agambye ntiku ttaka lya kabaka nninako obugazi bwa yiika nnamba era nabo bajja dda ne bakuba ettaka lino kale mengo emmanyiokusooka ettaka lino lyali lya bambogo nga be bakuuma ekifojjajjange kayiira ye yali mu kifo kino kyokka yafa mu 1968yaleka ampadde ekifo kino ngansiima okumujjanjabane tikiti zobusuulu nazisikira yatulaze tikiti za busuulu bwa siringi 10oluvannyuma obusuulu bweyongera ne ntandika okusasula mengo 2000ennyanja eno mbadde omu ku bagikuumye era ne amin bwe yayiwangako emirambo nga ffe tugiyoolako okugiziikakuno nassaako ggalagi yange namaduuka ga sipeeya wemmotoka ne wooterinsaba mengo ereme kunsindiikiriza kubanga wano nduddewo kyokka nange enkulaakulana ngyagalammengo bweba enoonya yinvesita ngisaba ereme kugenda bweru wa uganda nze yinvesita asookansaba bampe pulaani yekifo wendi kubanga ndi mwetegefu  okuzimba bye baagala ate nobusobozi mbulinaavunaanyizibwa ku nzirukanya yemirimu mu buganda land board bashir kizito agambye nti wadde buganda land board yevunaanyizibwa ku ttaka lyonna eryobwakabaka waliwo akakiiko akassiddwaawo okukulaakulanya ennyanja ya kabaka aka buganda twezimbe akakulirwa kiyimba freemanbano be bagenda okukola enteekateeka yonnakituufu ku ttaka lino kuliko abalina ebyapa ne liizi nabatalinankakasa akakiiko kano kagenda  kwekenneenya ensonga zino era buli muntu ajja kuwulirizibwaakakiiko kagenda kutuuka mu bantu abaasenga ku nnyanja ya kabaka bawulirizibwenaye enkulaakulana ezze eringa yaakukola luguudo abalina ebyapa  baliyirirwa ate abatalina nabo wabaawo engeri yokubajjawo entuufu okutwalibwa awalalaffe tulinze lipoota yakakiiko katikkiro ke yataddewo ku nnyanja gye tujja okugoberera          okukulaakulanya ennyanja ya kabaka kusattiza abagiriraanyeleero giweze emyaka ebiri bukya charles peter mayiga alangirirwa ku kifo kya katikkiro wa buganda nakwasibwa ddamula nga may 13 2013 ngadda mu bigere bya yingbukedde amusisinkanye mu mboozi eyenjawulo ku bibadde mu myaka ebiri egyobukulembeze bwebiki byotwala ngobuwanguzi mu myaka gino ebbiri bukya okwasibwa ofiisiekisookera ddala okulaba nga kabaka atuuse mu masaza ga buganda agabaddeko ensonga ndaba nga buwanguzi bunene kubanga mu january 2014 yalambula bugerere ate ku ntandikwa yomwezi guno yabadde buluuli buganda eringa maka ngomutwe omukulu mu maka bwe gubeera nga tegusobola kutuuka mu buli nsonda ngomanya akabi kaguddeokunyweza nnamulondo kabaka alina okutuuka buli wamu era alamulira buli wamuabantu ba buganda okwettanira okukolera awamu awatali kwoleka njawukana mu ddiini era ne basigala nga batambulira mu buufu bwa kabaka kya muwendoekirala yenkolagana nebitundu bya uganda ebirala eyeeyongedde nga tutuuse mu bitundu ebiwerako okugeza busoga ankole bugisu japadhola nebiralabbugwe ku masiro ge kasubi yaggwa nga mu kiseera kino tuli mu kusereka muzibwazaalampanga enju zabazaana zizziddwa buggya nebintu ebirala bye tutaddemuamasiro ge wamala kumpi gamaliriziddwaekizimbe masengere kyamala ebbanga ddene nga kiri mu mbeera mbi naye kikyo kyamalirizibwatwazza obuggya empereeza yabakozi mu bwakabakaokutuukiriza kino twabaga ebbago eriraga oyingira otya ku mulimu era ofuluma otya nensonga endala ezibateeka ku kipimomu ngeri yemu ebitongole byobwakabaka byonna byaweebwa obukulembeze obuggya era nga bikola emirimu egyo egigwa mu mulembe omutebi era ne kkooti ya kisekwa yazzibwa buggyatwataddewo ekitongole kya kalondoozi wemirimu okulaba ngensimbi ze tuyingiza wadde ntono zituuka ku bintu ebyo kwe zisindikiddwaokukunga abantu nabwo mbutwala ngobuwanguzikusoomoozebwa ki kwosanze mu kaweefube gwoliko okuzza buganda ku ntikkookukkirizisa  abantu okukwata ekkubo erimu ekintu ekyo si kyanguomuntu omu akugamba otandika otya okuzimba  masengere nga tonnaleeta federo omulala nagamba nti ogaba otya emmwaanyi nga tonnaleeta federoabantu bangi balina endowooza zaabwe era tosobola kuzibaggyakoabantu abamu tebamanyi bibala biva mu kukunga bantu nga balowooza nti nnina  kubeera mu ofiisi nninde abajja e bulange ngate si buli muntu nti agenda kusobola okutuuka e mmengo sso  nga  bwe mbeera wabweru eyo mbeera nsakira bantu ba kabaka nolwekyo ebintu bwe bityo bisoomoozaensonga za kkooki ziyimiridde zityawaliwo ebigambibwa nti obukulembeze bwa kkooki tebutambulira wamu na mmengo ate ngensonga ssemasonga eyookusatu eya buganda eyogera ku bumuabantu be kooki baayingira mu buganda emyaka egisoba mu 100 egiyise era nendagaano weeziri eziraga ebyo byonna nolwekyo tulina okunywerera ku magezi gabedda kubanga ensonga ezaabeegassa ku buganda zikyaliwo tetuggyawo kigamba nti kkooki ssaza erifugibwa mu nsikirano kyokka bwe wabeerawo ensonga obukulembeze e kkooki bwe zaagala okwogerako zisobola okwogerwako tewali buzibu  naye sirowooza nti za maanyi nnyo ezituusa nomuntu okukirowoozaako nti yeekutule ku buganda okuggyako nga waliwo ekiri emabegaabakooki bangi bajja wano era nsisinkana bangi ngendowooza yaabwe esibidde ku kubeera bumuabakooki abaabulijjo bonna bamanyi  kabaka nti  ye kabaka waabwebwe baba baweebwa nsako eri etyaomuntu lwaki yandyetaaze okumanya ebyemisaala gyabaweereza ba kabakakyokka ekikulu kiri nti tetunnatuuka ku ssa lya kusasula baminisita omusaala gwennyinibasobola okutumibwa ne babeerako akasente ke baweebwa kyokka tekamala ate bakomekkereza nga be bataddemu ekinene mu buweereza obwo nolwekyo bakyakola bwannakyewaokubasasula kyekirubirirwa kyaffe era tujja kutuukayo nga katonda ye mubeezi waffebyogerwa eyo nti olubiri mwakoze ddiiru ne aga khan alukulaakulanyeekikulu mu byonna tulina okukulaakulanya olubiri lwe mmengo tetuyinza kukuuma yiika ezisukka 264 nga tekuli kikolebwakomu kiseera kino tulina abantu be tuteesa nabo kyokka byonna bwe binaggwa tujja kutegeeza obugandanze sikukuta era bwe wanaabeerawo gwe tusazeewo nti ono gwe tugenda okukolagana naye tujja kumwanjula naye bantu baleme kujjula bitannaggya nokutambulira ku bya ngalabi ya nyanzi balinde ebituufu tujja kubibabuuliraekirala tulina olukiiko lwe twateekawo olukungaanya ebirowoozo ku ngeri olubiri gye lulina okukulaakulanyizibwamu era bwe lunaleeta lipoota nabyo tujja kubyanjulira obugandaakakiiko kano koogedde nabantu abakulu bangi okuli abalangira abambejja abataka nabalala abamanyi ensonga era kajja kukola lipootanjagala obuganda butegeere nti tugenda kukulaakulanya olubiri luno mu ngeri eteesittaza era eyamba bannannyini lubiri luno  abagandalwaki mmengo teyawaayo nsonga zeyagala mu nnoongoosereza mu ssemateeka weggwangaensonga ezo ssaabawolereza wa buganda ne minisita wa ssemateeka bazikolako naye buganda emaze ebbanga ddene ngerina ensonga kweyimiridde okuviira ddala kwezo ezaatwalibwa mu kakiiko komulamuzi benjamin odoki naako aka polofokugeza ekifo kya kabaka tetwagala kutaataaganyizibwa ettaka wamu nensalo zobwakabaka federo tugyagala nendala nga bwe zimanyiddwa era tujja kugenda tugoba emu kwemutwakuzizza olunaku lwa bamaama era abantu bangi batendereza omugaso nobukulu bwa bannakazadde beggwangaolowooza  ekiseera tekituuse buganda okubeera ne katikkiro omukazikabaka alina abaami bangi abakyala mu masaza ebitongole nolwekyo abakyala basobola okukola emirimu gyonnamu nsi yonna eriyo abakulembeze abakyala abaamaanyi okugeza e girimaaniate omulembe guno omutebi guyimusizza nnyo abakyala nga kwe tulabidde baminisita abaami bamasaza ne mu bifo ebirala abakyala mwe baweererezandowooza olaba nenkyukakyuka ezireeteddwa nnaabagerekakyokka ekirina okukolebwa kwe kugunjula abaana kyenkanyi kuba siyinza kukugamba nti omukyala agenda kubeera katikkiro wabula kye tulina okukola kwe kulaba ngabakyala tebalekebwa bbali bayigirizibwa ennonoekirala ensonga eyo ejja kusinziira ku mbeera yensi mwe tutambulira bwenebeera nokusiima kwa mukama waffe kabakaebizibu mu bufuzi bwensikirano obulala okugeza ngebibadde e busoga mmengo ebiyigiddeko kimu buganda tebiyinza kutuukawo kubanga e busoga bagamba bannabyabufuzi be babatabula kyokka ne wano bannabyabufuzi weebalimu kulaba kwange ensonga ze busoga za njawulo ku zaffekyabazinga e busoga alondebwa okuva mu balangira 11 abali mu masaza agenjawuloffe tulina ennono egobererwa nga kabaka akisizza omukono wadde si mpandiike wadde emaze emyaka egisukka 1000 era tewali ngeri bannabyabufuzi gye bayinza kugootaanya nnono enowaliwo abalowooza nti ekiseera kituuse abantu ba buganda okwerondera abakiise mu lukiiko lwa bugandaendowooza yo ku kino eri etyaokulonda olukiiko kijja kubeerawo nga tufunye federo egenda okwetaagisa buli kintu okukolebwa mu mateeka naye mu mbeera eno mwe tuli tekisobokatwali tulonzeeko olukiiko luno mu myaka gya 1950 kyokka enkola ya federo bwe yaggyibwawo embeera yensi nekyukane katikkiro okulondebwa si kipya wano kubanga mayanja nkangi yalondebwa lukiiko era nga tukyali mu nkola ya federo ekitaliiwo mu kiseera kino ngate tulina okusala amagezi gonna agatambuza obwakabakaekirala saagala bantu beerimbike mu demokulaasi okutabangula ennono yobukulembeze gye tubadde nayo emyaka nebisiibokumpi buli kika kirimu enkaayana ngate buganda ezimbirwa ku bikanteekateeka ki eziriwo okulaba ngebika bitereezebwa mu kifo kyokukaayana byemalire ku nkulaakulana nobumuenkaayana mu bika kuva dda mu buganda weeziri era neddiiro lya katikkiro kati eriyitibwa kkooti ya kisekwa tetandise mirembe ginoyateekebwawo okugonjoola enkaanyana era ensowole tezitandise biseera bino nolwekyo kkooti ya kisekwa ekola wabula kye twewala kwe kupapirira kubanga tuyinza okukoleramu ensobitwagala nokuyita mu kulambika abantu baffe ku nnono nentambula yebika kwongerwemu amaanyi kikendeeza ku nkaayana zinoabantu abasinga balowooza nti mmengo okubeera namakampuni agali mu bintu mwesinga okubeera nenkizo okugeza obulimi ebyobulamu ebyenjigiriza kyekiyinza okugibbululaebintu ebikwata ku muntu waabulijjo tujja kubikolako naye toyinza kuba ngozzaawo amasiro ngate ozimba ddwaaliro masakanozimba masengere nga bwozimba amasomero mu bitundu ebiralaenkola eyo ebeera nzibu nnyo okutuukiriza bwogeraageranya ensimbi ze tukungaanya mu ttoffaali ziwulikika ngennyingi naye tezisobola kukola pulojekiti mu buli kitundu nolwekyo ebirowoozo byonna birungi kyokka tulina kugenda mpolampola nga tukwata kimu ku kimuabalina akakunkuna nenkola yettofaali bagamba nti ofudde nnyo ku kyokulaba nga buganda waggulu efuna ebintu omuva obugagga kyokka ngabantu wansi tewali ntegeka zibaggya mu bwavubyonna ebikoleddwa byabantu ba buganda era bigasiza wamu abantu era tukoze amasiro ge kasubi ne wamala kubanga bikwata ku mitima gyabantu ba bugandanga tuweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa buno tulina bye twasoosowaza era obulokofu tubusanze nga buli mu kusoosowaza ebirala bijja kujja mu maaso abantu tebasaanye kutyaekiseera kino enkulaakulana yeyogerwako buli gyogenda naye waliwo ekizibu kyettaka nga buganda land board esikiriza bayinvesita okukolera ku ttaka lya kabaka naye nga bangi ku baggyibwa ku ttaka eryo bantu ba kabakamagezi ki agaliwo okulaba ngabantu tebanyigirizibwa ku ttaka nga nabamu tebalina ssente za liizibuganda land board kitongole ekitambuza emirimu awatali kuvujjirirwa nsimbi ya muwi wa musolo ngensimbi ezisabibwa abantu baziyita nnyingi okugeraageranya ne zaasabibwanga obukiiko bwa disitulikiti obuvujjirirwa ensimbi zomuwi womusolo mu buli kimusinga ageraageranya ensimbi ezo nekibanja kwatudde bwe kyenkana nensimbi ezikiggyamu yandikirabye nti si nnyingi kubanga zizingiramu okukola ku misoso gyonnanaye kirabika twetaaga okwongera okusomesa abantu ku nsonga eno naye nga tetunnatandika buli alina ensonga gye yeemulugunya ku ttaka lya kabaka agitwale ku ttabi lyekitongole kino erimuliraanyeabavubuka baagala nnyo obwakabaka naye bangi basomye kyokka tebalina mirimuemabegako e mmengo wateekebwayo ekitongole ekinoonyeza abavubuka emirimu naye tekikyawulikikanteekateeka ki eziriwo eri abavubukaensonga eno tugikutte namaanyi nga tuyita mu kuteekawo amakampuni nebitongole ebyenjawulo era okusinziira ku busobozi bwaffe tulina bangi be tuwadde emirimu era tugenda kwongera okusala amagezi okuteekawo ebintu ebisobozesa abantu baffe okufuna emirimu kyokka tukyagenda mu maaso wonna gye tugenda nga tukubiriza abantu okukola ennyo nga kino nakyo kisobola okuvaamu emirimu nokusomesa abavubuka engeri yokwetandikirawo emirimuebbanga ddene e mmengo wabaddewo entegeka ezenjawulo ennungi ezigenderera okukulaakulanya obwakabaka kyokka ne zikoma ku bakatikkiro abazireeseotaddewo nkola ki okulaba ngentegeka zino zisigalawo ebbanga lyonnaani akulimba ebintu ebirungi ebigasiza awamu abantu tebidiba era sisuubira nti bulikeera enkya nga waliwo abagamba nti obwerufu tubukooye obuyiiya tetukyabwagala nolwekyo ensonga ennungi ziyimirirawo era abantu batambula nazo mulembe ku mulembeekizimbe kino kigenda kubeeramu ebitongole okuli cbs buganda land board nebirala ngabanaapangisaako bagenda kutuwa busuuluensimbi ezinaava mu bupangisa buno zigenda kweyambisibwa okukola emirimu kabaka gyakolera abantu be okugeza okuweerera abaana obujjanjabi okuwagira obulimi nebirala nolwekyo buli muntu wa buganda waakuganyulwa kyenkanyi mu kizimbe kino era tewabeerawo abeera nekirowoozo nti waliwo agenda okukibeerako nobwannannyiniekyo nkirangirira mu lukiiko lwa buganda leero mwe ngenda okulambikira enteekateeka zomwaka ogwokusatu mu buweereza ssaabasajja bwe yatukwasa          katikkiro mayiga alaze byatuuseeko mu myaka ebiri bukya akwata ddamulaabakulu bebika mu bukulembeze bwennono nobuwangwa bwabajapadhola basiimye enkolagana ennungi abaganda gye balina ku mawanga amalala ne basaba nabalala okubalabirako okusobola okuzimba uganda ennungi          abakulembeze babadaama basiimye  obuwangwa nenkolagana yomu bugandaolutuula lwolukiiko lwa buganda olwomulundi ogwokuna lugenda mu maaso e bulange mmengokatikkiro charles peter mayiga mu kiseera ali mu kuyitaayita mwebyo ebituukiddwako mu myaka ebiri bukya akwasibwa ofiisi mu 2013mayiga alambuludde ku bikolebwa mu minisitule yobulambuzi amasiro nobuwangwa nagamba nti ne bwekiraba ki amasiro ge kasubi gaakuggwa nategeeza nti ekifo kyamasannyalaze genjuba kigenda kumukwasibwa ku lwokusatukatikkiro agambye nti nga may 192015 agenda mu amerika mu masaza ga los angeles ne boston okusisinkana bannayuganda abakakkalabizaayo emirimu bamukwase eddwaaliro eritambulaolukiiko lukyagenda mu maaso nga katikkiro asuubiza okulangirira ekigenda okuddamu okusonderwa ettoffaalissabasajja kabaka asiimye nalonda basajja be emmanuel sempaka kigozi ssajjalyabeene ne hajji jamiru sebalu okubeera abaami be abeggomboloola ya lufuka mu disitulikiti ye wakisoemmanuel sempala kigozi ssajjalyabeene ye yatuuziddwa okukulira eggomboloola lya ssabagabo lufuka ate hajji jamiru sebalu nalondebwa okubeera omumyuka weggomboloola lino nga baatuuziddwa patrick luwagga kaggo eyawerekeddwaako omumyuka we agnes nakibirigeomukolo gwokutuuza abaami bano gwakoleddwa ku kitebe kyeggomboloolo lino ekisangibwa mu lufukanga tebannatuuzibwa kaggo yasabye abakulira obusolya okumwanjulira abaami banowilliam mivule kattikiro wessiga lya magunda e lwanga ye yayanjulidde kaggo sempala kigozi ate musa sebalu eyakiikiridde gabunga nayanjula hajji jamiru sebalu nga bano baakubiriza abaami ba kabaka okubeera obumu okutambulira ku nnono nobuwangwa bwa buganda nokukolera obugandakaggo patrick luwagga yasoose kukwasa sempala kigozi engabo neffumu ebyokulwanyisa nokukuuma abantu ba kabaka oluvannyuma namwambaza ekyambalo nga akabonero akamwawula so nga omumyuka we hajji sebalu baamwambazza ekyambalo kyomwami weggombololoolakaggo yakuutidde yabakuutidde okugatta abantu ba kabaka okubakugaanya nokutabaganya          kaggo atuuzizza abaami ba kabakapookino atuuzizza abaami bamagombolola agenjawulo mu buddu ku mukolo ogumaze wiiki nnambapookino vincent mayiga ssebbowa ye yalonze abaami bano ngakozesa obuyinza obumuweebwa katikkirokyokka ku ggombolola ya ssaabawaali kabonera omuva kattikiro charles peter mayiga pookino yagaanyi okulonderayo omuntu okutuuza ssaabawaali francis kiyimba nasaba katikkiro alonde omuntu ono okutuusa katikkiro lwe yatumye kisuubirwa ntiku lwokutaano march 27 2015 olukiiko luno lwerugenda okukwasa katikkiro lipoota omuli ebirowoozo munaana omuggyibwa ebyo ebinaateekebwa mu nkola          abazimbye okumpi nenyanja ya kabaka tebagiremese enkulaakulanakatikkiro charles peter mayiga alambuzza obuganda omulimu ogukoleddwa ku kizimbe masengere omulundi ogusembyeyo nga tekinakwasibwa kabaka ngekirabo kyamazaalibwa nga april 132015 nagamba nti akyayagala okukolera pulojekiti endala okwegatta ku kizimbe kinomayiga yagambye nti  okumaliriza masengere kakyali katuuso tukyakola ebintu ebirala bingileero lwe lunaku olusembyeyo okulambula masengere kyokka ettofaali ligenda kusigala ligenda mu maasobuganda erina eddwaliro bbanka ttivi embeera ennyanja ya kabaka mweeri ebasanyusa ate olubiri lwa kabaka mwali mutuseeyo ebiseera bino lulina yiika 264 kyokka tukozesaako nga 20 nolwekyo tukyakungaanya ettofaali pakalasitiguno gwabadde mulundi gwa 11 buli nnaku zamwezi 17 buli mwezi nga mayiga alambuza abantu omulimu ogukolebwa ku kizimbe kino ngemu kun kola yokulaga obweruufu nokwongera okuzzaamu abantu amaanyi okutoola ettofaali nga balaba ensimbi zebatoola kyezikolaolukiiko lwa buganda twezimbe lwatongozebwa nga april 172014 okukungaanya ettofaali lyokuzimba ekizimbe kino era omulimu negutandika mu nnaku ezaddirira era werutuukidde olwaleero ngebulayo ennaku 25 okutuukiriza nsalesale wa mwaka gumu okumalirizaakulira akakiiko akazimba masengere evaristo sseguya yategezezza nti olunaku lwamazaalibwa werunaatukira omulimu gugya kuba guwedde bulungi era obuganda bubeere bugumui ddalaye akulira akakiiko akagula ebintu ku masengere fred kasozi mamba nagamba nti mu nsawo musigaddemu obukadde 29 ate amabanja nga gali mu bukadde 519omuwanika wa buganda twezimbe gaster lule ntakke yategezezza nti omulimu gwabalirirwa okumalawo obuwumbi musanvu nga mu kiseera kino bakakozesaako obuwumbi buna nekitundu nasaba abantu okwongera okusonda ensimbi era nalangirira nti ensimbi 16779050 zezaleteddwa olwaleeroomukolo gwetabiddwako baminisita bangi abalangira nabambejja abakungu era oluvanyuma katikkiro yabakulembeddemu okulambula ekizimbe wekituuse          amazaalibwa ga kabaka gali mu ggiya katikkiro alambuza masengere omulundi ogusembyeyokabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii  alagidde ssaabalangira omuggya godfrey musanje kikulwe addemu okuwandiika emituba gyonna egikola olulyo olulangira okusobola okuggyamu ababeerimbikamuolulyo lwabalangira lulimu emituba 35 kyokka mu kiseera kino bwino aliwo alaga nti giri emituba 52 kabaka gye yeebuuza  gye giva nga mu kwewandiisa kuno buli mutuba gwakulaga obuvo bwagwo nowoomutuba gye yajjamu okugukulemberamu kino kabaka yawadde nsalessale wa myezi ena ngomulimu guno gutereezeddwakaweefube agendereddwaamu okugogola olulyo okutumbula obumu nenkulaakulana era nga waakuteekebwawo olunaku buli mutuba lwe gunajjanga nabantu baagwo okusisinkana ssaabalangiranga february 19 2015 kabaka yalonda omulangira musanje nga ssaabalangira omuggya ngadda mu bigere bya yingmoses kayima abaddewo okumala kumpi emyaka mwendaomulangira musanje yannyonnyodde ebirala byagenda okutandikirako naddala okulaba ngakumaakuma abalangira bonna nokulongoosa enkolagana ne gavumenti ya kabaka e mmengo kubanga enkola yokuwakanya buli kimu tesobola kutwala mu maaso nkulaakulanamusanje agamba nti enkola egenda kubeera ya kusembeza buli omu okumuwuliriza okuwa ekitiibwa buli omu mu bukulu bwe bwalimu kubanga ffenna tuli bawereeza eri eggwanga lyaffe bugandanolwekyo nsuubiza enkolagana ennungi ne katikkiro charles peter mayiga kuba naye yakisuubiza bwe nnali naye e kyaggwe ku mikolo gyettoffaaliokusobola okutambuza emirimu agenda kutondawo ofiisi eyenkalakkalira okuddukanya obuvunaanyizibwa nokuwuliriza buli nsongayateesseewo olwokusatu ngolunaku lwokubeeranga ku kigango awakungaanirwa abalangira ekisangibwa ku luguudo balintuma e mengowano we bagenda okukolera ku nsonga eziruma abalangirassaabalangira musanje ayongerako nti omulimu gwayolekedde munene kyokka waakuleetera buli mulangira okugwenyigiramu nga mu kino agenda kulaba nga watondebwawo obukiiko obwenjawulo okuli akebyensimbi obuwangwa empisa nobulala okusobola okulambika obulungi bakulemberamu birala musanje byateekateeka okusookerako nolukiiko lwe kwe kulaba  nga balambula amasiro gonna nebifo byobuwangwa mu lulyo olulangira embeera mwe biri  nokukwatagana nekitongole kyettaka e mmengo okukuuma ebifo byobuwangwa kubanga ebimu bisengeddwaakoebifaananyi ekisiige ekiraga ekigango nga bwe kigenda okuzimbibwa kirabikemu kaweefube wokunyweza obukulembeze bwolulyo olulangira kabaka yadibya enkola yokulondera akakiiko akafuzi mu kika kino mu kigango bwatyo nalonda abantu abalala bataano nga march 4 2015 okukwatiza ku ssaabalangiraabaalondeddwa kuliko omumyuka asooka owa ssaabalangira nga ye walugembe njobe kazawula omumyuka owookubiri fred kateregga omuwandiisi margaret namaalwa nnaalinya maria kyasooka nalondebwa okukiikirira bannaalinnya mu masiro wamu ne kalemeera nakikulu kabangala ngono akiikirira bavubukamu kiseera kino pulaani yokuzimba ekigango ekiri ku mulembe yaggwa okukubwa emyaka esatu emabega era nga musanje yeeyamye okulaba nga kitandikibwa okuzimbibwa ngomu ku kaweefube wokubaweesa ekitiibwa nokusenda oluggya lwekigango okukolawo ekifo ekisanyukirwamu kibeere nga kiyingiriza abalangira ensimbissaabalangira agamba nti nneetegereza nga tulina oluggya lwaffe wano nga lugazi era kye ngenda okutandikirako kwe kulusenda wafaanane bulungi kibeere ekifo ekiyinza okukozesebwa abalina emikolo tufunemu ssente kubanga kiri walungi ngomuntu asobola okuva e namirembe lubaga nebifo ebirala ne bakolera wano emikolo gyabwekino ngenda kukitandikirawo mu myezi gino egisookaensawo yabalangira erina okubeeramu ssente          kabaka alambise emirimu ssaabalangira omuggya gyaba asookerakoomulimu gwokusereka enju muzibu azaalampanga omuggalamidde bassekabaka ba buganda mu masiro e kasubi gwakumala emyaka ebbiri nga kino kivudde ku nnono nobulombolombo ssaako emitendera egyobwegendereza egirina okuyitibwamuensonda zategeezezza nti okusereka kulimu emisoso ntoko ate ngenju eno yakussibwako essubi eriri mu njole emitwalo 80 okumalirizibwa obulungi okutuuka ku mutindo ate akasolya kawanvuyibwa okudda kwako akaliko nga tennaddibwamu mu mwaka gwa 1938katikkiro wamasiro gano ssaalongo edward mulumba yategeezezza nti omulimu gwokuteekayo essubi ku kasolya kenju gutandika leero ku mmande oluvannyuma lwabagirinnya okumaliriza okusiba ebizizi ebisatu ebiteekebwa mu kasolya waggulu kubanga byebirina okusookayomuzibu azaalampanga yakwata omuliro nga march 16 2010 era okuva olwo obwakabaka bwa buganda gavumenti eyawakati  nekitongole kya unesco bali ku ddimu lyokuzzaawo ekyafaayo kino era ngokutandikibwa kwokusereka amasiro kabonero ka buwanguzimulumba yagambye nti enteekateeka zonna ziwedde okulaba ngomulimu gwokusereka gutandika leeroessubi emmuli nebirala ebyetaagisa okutandika weebiri kyokka tukyetaaga ebirala bingi okusobozesa omulimu guno okwanguwaabo abalina essubi eryokutunda mulumba yagambye nti balina okutuukirira olukiiko lwamasiro ne bayungula ttimu yaabwe negenda erambula essubi emmuli nebintu omuntu byalina bwe bibeera nga bituukana nomutindo nga balyoka babigulakatikkiro charles peter mayiga owookusatu ku kkono lwe yalambuza abakulu bebika omulimu ogukolebwa ku masiro e kasubi  ku nkomerero yomwezi oguweddeaba kkampuni ya omega construction bakoze endagaanoku lwokusatu lwa wiiki eweddekkampuni ya omega construction eyaweebwa omulimu gwokuzzaawo muzibu azaalampanga yakoze endagano nekitongole kya wabulakayole  ekisereka enju za kabaka eneekisobozesa okutuukiriza omulimu gwokuserekapius mugalasi owa omega costruction yategeezezza nti endagaano gye twatandise nayo yakuwa wabulakayole christopher kawooya nabantu be ebbanga lya myezi mwenda okubeera nga bamaliriza omulimu gwokusereka kubanga guno gwe mulimu omunene ogusigaliddebwe yabadde alambuza obuganda omulimu ogukolebwa e kasubi nga march 12015 katikkiro charles peter mayiga yagambye nti akyalumwa okubeera nga muzibu azaalampanga tennamalirizibwa nagamba nti ekirungi ekiriwo essaawa eno bassekabaka okuli muteesa i mwanga ii daudi chwa ii ne muteesa iiomulimu guno gusuubirwa okuwemmenta ensimbi nnyingi  bwobalirira enjole yessubi eyinza okufunibwa ku nsimbi eziri wakati wa 500 ne 1000essubi mu bitundu bya buganda ebisinga obungi lyakendeera ate emmuli nazo ntono ngeno yemu ku nsonga ezitambuza empola omulimu ku masiro e wamala ngessubi aba kabaka foudation abali ku mulimu gwokuddaabiriza wamala babadde baliggya mu bitundu nga  kibale nebirala ebisangibwa mu bugwanjuba bwa ugandaedward ndagala addukanya emirimu mu kabaka foundation agamba nti omulimu gwessubi si mwangu era abali ku mulimu gwokusereka muzibu azaalampanga balina okunoonya ebifo bingi mwe baggya essubi kubanga bweritemwa kitwala emyezi mukaaga okuddamu okukula          okusereka amasiro ge kasubi kutandika leerokatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti obuganda bulina okunywerera ku nnono nebika byabwe era nakunga abataka abakulu bebika okuddamu okuttukiza nokusomesa bazzukulu baabwe emirimu buli kika gwe kikola mu bwakabakamayiga yagambye nti ebika yentabiro yobwakabaka era okuzza buganda ku ntikko kirimu ennyingo yokunyweza ebikaebika bya buganda bwe weetegereza ebyafaayo byabyo nemirimu gyabyo obeera olambulula ebyafaayo bya bugandatetwagala bika byaffe bife olwenkyukakyuka eziriwotetwagala bantu beekwase kubanga baalokoka naye okusigala nga tutambula nennono zebika byaffe nga bwe zaategekebwa katikkiro bwe yagambyeyabadde atongoza satifikeeti okuli ebika bya buganda wamu nokutikkula abekika kyendiga abazze okugula satifikeeti za buganda ezekikungo mu bulange ku lwokutaano oluweddekatikkiro mayiga yagambye nti enkola eyatongozeddwa ebika okujjanga mu bulange okugula satifikeeti ezekikungo wamu ne satifikeeti okuli ebika byakuyamba okujjukiza abantu obukulu bwebika byabwe ngagenda okuwasa atwala ekifaananyi kyekika kyomukyala ku buko ate abazadde bomukyala ne bakwasa omusajja ekifaananyi kyekika kyeedward ssemukutu katikkiro wekika kyendiga yagambye nti ekika kyakugenda mu maaso nokukola emirimu gyobuwangwa egibukakatakoyakwasizza mayiga ceeke ya bukadde butaano ekika mwe kyaguze satifikeeti za buganda          katikkiro atongozza satifikeeti zebika bya bugandabya moses kawalya ne dickson kulumbaabali ku gwokuzzaawo amasiro e kasubi bategeezezza nti ngekifo kyamasannyalaze genjuba bwe kinaatera okuggyibwako engalokino kyakuwonya amasiro ekizikiza okuva umeme lwe yagasalako amasannyalazegeoffrey sserunjogi owakakiiko akayooyoota kasubi yategeezezza katikkiro charles peter mayiga nti ebintu ebisinga ku kifo kino biwedde nga nembaati ezigenda okusika amasannyalaze zaatuusebino byabadde mu masiro e kasubi ku ssande katikkiro bwe yabadde alambuza obuganda omulimu ogukolebwa ku masiro era mayiga nagamba nti omulimu gwokuzza buganda ku ntikko gukyalibaalambudde muzibwazaalampanga ekifo kyamasannyalaze genjuba namazzi byonna ssentebe wolukiiko oluvunaanyizibwa ku kuzzaawo amasiro haji kaddu kiberu bye yagambye nti bigendereddwaamu kufuula masiro agomulembeomugagga gaster lule ntakke yawaddeyo ebinywa byemmuli 500 ate simon ssekankya owa hardware world nawaayo 200000 wamu nobusawo bwa seminti 150 ate aba steel mills nebeyama okuwaayo emitayimbwa egigenda okukola ku kuzimba ekifo awagenda okuteekebwa amasanyalazeettofaali lyonna eryakunganyiziddwa lyabadde lya 1729000 nnalinya beatrice namikka nagamba nti omulimu ogukolebwa mu kiseera kino gwa nnoono era abagirinya abeddira engo bamaliriza okusunsula essubi erigenda okukozesebwa abengeye bakulembeddwamu omumyuka wa ssentebe julius sempala          okuyunga amasannyalaze genjuba mu  masiro kuweddekatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti obukulembeze bwennono bulina okusoomoozebwa okulaba nga buyamba abantu  be bukulembera mu bizibu entoko bye balimu okuli ebyobulamu ebibi ebyenjigiriza ebiserebye  nokusala amagezi gokufunira abantu baabwo ngabasinga balimi obutale kubanga kye kimu ku bibakuumidde mu bwavumayiga yagambye nti abantu bonna be tukulembera batutunulidde neriiso jjogi okulaba nga tulina kyetukolawo ku bizibu entoko bye balimu okuli ebyobulamu ebiri wansi kubanga buganda busoga tesobola kukula ngabantu si balamu obwavu bungi ebyenjigiriza byetaagibwa okusalira amagezi naddala okukubiriza abazadde okutwala abaana ku masomero abantu baffe abasinga balimi nolwekyo tulina okusala amagezi okubafunira obutale bwebyamaguzi byabwekatikkiro yayongeddeko nti ebizibu ebiruma abasoga bye biruma nabaganda era tewali njawulo wakati wabantu bano bonna nolwekyo okukolaganira awamu nokwegatta bye bigenda okutumbula enkulaakulanayakulisizza abasoga okufuna kyabazinga kye yagambye nti kigenda kutumbula enkulaakulana yobwakyabazinga nobumu mu bantu be busogamu kwogera kwe katuukiro wa busoga dr joseph muvawala yategeezezza nga bwe basazeewo okujja okukyalira obwakabaka bwa buganda okulaba nga babeerako ebirungi bye bayiga naddala mu ntambuza yemirimu era nasaba katikkiro akulemberemu ttiimu ye bagende basomese abali mu mirimu gyobwakyabazinga enkola yemirimu kubanga bakyali bubidr muwawala yannyonnyodde nti   ffe twegomba buganda era tukkiriza nti akusinga okkiriza nomuyigirakonolwekyo kye tuvudde tusalawo okujja okulaba bwe tuyinza okukwatagana ebikolebwa e buganda bibeere nga bye bikolebwa e busogaate tusaba okkirize obuvunaanyizibwa obwokulambikanga abantu bebitundu byombi nga kyoyogera e buganda kibeera kiragiro e busogakatuukiro yagumizza mayiga nti olwenkolagana ennungi wakati wenjuyi zombi e busoga teyeetaaga kusaba lukusa ajja buzzi ne bwa babuulira ngatuuse olwo ne bamwegattako nobukuumi ne bamuwadr muvawala yalambuludde ebimu ku bintu bye baagala okutendekebwamu okuli enkola yokufunamu ensimbi eziddukanya obwakabaka enkunga yabantu okutumbula ebyobulambuzi enkolagana ne gavumenti eya wakati ensonga zettaka kubanga tebamanyi wakutandikira ngebyapa bye bimu ku bintu byabwe babyekangira ku nguudomu ngeri yemu dr muvawala yatuusizza okusaba kwa kyabazinga william gabula nadiope ngasaba bwanaabeera akomyewo okuva ku misomo mu june 2015 asisinkaneko kabaka ate ye sipiika wolukiiko lwa busoga george mutyabule nagamba nti abakulembeze ku njuyi zombi basaanye okukunga abantu baabwe okwenyigira mu mulimu ogukolebwa mu kuzimba ebbibiro lyamasannyalaze erya isimba nga liri ku nsalo ya kayunga bugerere ne busoga bafunemu ensimbi          ebiruma abasoga bye biruma abaganda  katikkiro mayigakatikkiro charles peter mayiga akunze obuganda okugenda mu bungi mu musomo gwa yiiya ssente ogutegekeddwa bukedde ku lwomukaaga mu kisaawe e kololomayiga yagambye abantu baffe balina okumanya nti bwofuna akukaabirako nga naawe oyongeramubwoba oweereddwa omukisa okusomesebwa nokulagibwa obutale we buyinza okusangibwa mukisa munene ogwetaaga okukozesebwaobwavu mpologoma abantu basaanye okugenda mu musomo guno ogugendereddwamu okubayamba okulwanyisa obwavu obususse naddala wano mu bugandaensonga yobutale nnagirambulula nga nnaakakwasibwa ddamula emu ku nsonga eziremesezza abantu mu bwavubukedde okutegeka omusomo e kololo kimuyambyeko okuggumiza eddoboozi lyokufunira abantu obutale          yiiya ssente nalyo ttoffaali erinaggya abantu mu bwavu katikkiro mayigaabataka abakulu bebika basiimye omulimu katikkiro charles peter mayiga gwakoze ku masiro e wamala ne kasubi wamu nekizimbe masengere nebakubiriza bazzukkulu baabwe bonna obutalekerawo kuwa ttoffaali kuba enkola eno yegenda okutumbula enkulakulana eyomugundu mu bugandaomukubiriza wolukiiko lwabataka kayiira gajuule fredrick kasibante yagambye nti  tukubira bazzukkulu baffe omulanga obutakoowa nkola ya kukungaanya ttofaali kubanga tulabye ngerina ebirungi bingi ddala bwotunulira omulimu oguli e wamala kasubi ate ne masengere ngate tetwagala kukoma ku kino kyokka wabula nokuzimba amalwaliro amasomero byonna ebyetaaga amaanyi agawamuabo abalaga nti bakooye ettoffaali mbasaba basirikire muli munda abakyasobola okutambuza ensonga eno bo bagende mu maasobano mayiga yabakulembedde ku lwokusatu nabalambuza omulimu ogukolebwa mu bifo bino ebisatu nga baatandikidde ku masiro e wamala ekisangibwa mu ggombolola ye nabweru kyadondo mu disitulikiti ye wakiso nebaddako e kasubi olwo nebakomekkereza nokulambula masengeremayiga yanyonyodde nti  ekitulesezza abataka abakulu bebika okulaba emirimu gino buganda etambulira ku bika nolwekyo tubadde tulina okubalaga omulimu bazzukkulu baabwe gwebetabyeemu era nga twagala bongere okubakunga okukola ebirala ku mulembe gunoembeera ku masiro e wamalamicheal ssenyimba nga yakulira okuddabiriza amasiro ge wamala yategeezezza katikkiro nabataka abasusse 20 nti omulimu ogusigadde okukolebwa gwetaaga obukadde 300 okuli okuggula essubiobukeedoebinsambweabakozi ekifo kyamazzi ekineyambisibwa mu kutangira omuliro nokuteekawo enteekateeka zokukuuma essubi obutakutukakutukamu kiseera kino enjole zessubi ezisukka 200000 zezakakozesebwa bbugwe yateekebwa ku masiro gano era katikkiro nagamba nti enju batandabezaala omuli ssekabaka ssuuna ii kati temukubisa nkuba ababeera mu kifo kino bayigirizibwa obukodyo bwokutaasa omuliroeno katikkiro nekibinja kye bayaniriziddwa katikkiro wamasiro gano ssalongo edward mulumba eyagambye nti abataka okusituka okugenda okulambula amasiro kabonero akalaga nti omulimu ogukolebwa bagusiima era betegefu okuguwagira mu ngeri yonnaye bannalinya beatrice namikka ne getrude tebattagwabwe babaddeyo era namikka yawanjagira abataka abalina emirimu egyokukola ku masiro gano okwanguya okutukkiriza obuvunanyizibwa bwabwe era nabasaba okulambika abazzukkulu baabwe mu nnono okusobola okukuuma empisa nennono za buganda nga bakwatiza ku kabaka okukitukirizaku kizimbe masengere ekisangibwa e bulange mmengo abataka nga bayaniriziddwa evaristo seguya ne bammemba abalala aba buganda twezimbebalaze essanyu olwomulimu ogukoleddwa era nebakakasa nti ekirabo ekigenda okuweebwa kabaka april 132015 kigenda kubeera makulakayemba kalema nga ye wa tripple k investments emu ku kkampuni ezikulembeddemu okuzimba masengere yagambye ekisigadde ku kizimbe kino kwekuteeka ebyomunda okuyoyoota oluggya nekikomera wamu nokumaliriza ekizimbe ekitono          abataka basiimye emirimu gya katikkirommengo etegeezezza nti enkola yokutuukirira amakampuni okuweebwa obuyambi okutegeka emikolo gyobwakabaka egyenjawulo bwakomye nga mu kiseera kino yaakutambula nenkolagana namakampuni ameetegefu okubawa nabo babawe omwagaanya okulanga ebyamaguzi byabwe ku mikolo ginobino byayogeddwa omumyuka owookubiri owa katikkiro hajj mohamood ssemambo ssekimpi ku mukolo gwokuteeka emikono ku ndagano eyemyaka esatu kkampuni yamasimu eya airtel mwegendera okuteeka ensimbi obukadde 510 mu mikolo gyobwakabaka nga buli mwaka yakuwaayo obukadde 170hajji ssekimpi yagambye nti  mu kiseera kino tubakanye neddimu lyokutumbula enkulaakulana mu buganda nokuyimusa embeera ngomulimu guno ogwokudda ku ntikko si mutene nga gwetaaga ezekikungo kwava ku ggombolola ye nsangi okukyalanga e mmengo okugula satifikeeti ezekikungo buli mwaka bwatyo katikkiro nasalawo kigaziwe buli ggombolola mu buganda ebeere ngekiika          katikkiro mayiga atongozza engoma luwalo lwaffeabalamuzi ba kkooti ya kisekwa bazzeemu okuwulira omusango gwokuboola abazzukulu oguvunaanibwa omukulu wekika kyempeewo omutaka kiggye eyalumirizza bazzukulu ba kalyankolo nomutaka nadduli kibaale nti tebeddiranga ku mpeewoomutaka paul kiggye mbazzi yategeezezza nga kabaka bwe yamala edda okusalawo nti teri kika kya mpeewo ye kkungu era nti ne nadduli kibaale si ye mukulu wekika kyempeewokkooti ngekubirizibwa ssentebe john kateregga yasabye kiggye annyonnyole lwaki okusalawo kwa kabaka mwasinziira okulumiriza kibaale ne bazzukulu be nti tebalina mpeewo ya njawulo gye beddira ate abukozesaabalamuzi baamutangaazizza nti oba kabaka yategeeza nti empeewo ye kkungu nadduli gyagamba nti gyakulira teriiyo ngempeewo eri emu eye bubiro kiggye gyakulira ate kijja kitya okuba nga takkiriza nti ensala yemu eraga nti abe kkungu nabo beddira mpeewowano kiggye kwe kujulizza ebitabo omuli ne busujju buladde nti biraga nga kayimbyobutega jjajja womuwaabi omutaka kisawuzi bbwaddene ne banne bwali owessiga mu njaza era obutaka bwe buli busujjuye bbwaddene kisawuzi yakitadde ku kiggye okulimba mu bujulizi kubanga bajjajjaabe bangi abaamulemye okulaga obuzaale bwabwe ekintu ekyandibadde kikakasa nga ddala nabo beddira njazabuli lwe nkubuuza ku buzaale bwabantu abakulu abalina okwogerwako mu musango guno ogamba nti tobamanyi kisawuzi bwe yagambye kiggye mu kkooti omwabadde nomutaka nadduli kibaaleomusango guno gwali gwakoma okuwulirwa ku ntandikwa ya december 2014 ngoludda oluwaabi lwamala dda okuwa obujulizi bwalwo nga kati kiggye yasigadde nabajulizi be ababiri gufundikirwe          kiggye ajulizza ekitabo mu musango gwekika kyempeewoabataka bobusolya banjizza enteekateeka zokusituula embeera nokutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe nekigendererwa kyokutambulira awamu okuzza buganda ku ntikkoavunaanyizibwa ku mbeera zabataka abavubuka nemizannyo ku lukiiko lwabataka bobusolya omutaka muteesaasira keeya tendo namuyimba ii agamba nti embeera abataka mwe bali mbi kuba tebayambiddwaako bazzukkulu baabwe kyokka nga ne mmengo eringa etebategekeramuteesaasira yagambye nti olwembeera eyo twasazeewo okutandika okutema empenda zokukyusa embeera zaffe nga kye tutandikiddeko kwe kufulumya kalenda yomwaka 2015 eriko abataka bonna era egula 10000kino we kijjidde ngabataka abamu embeera gye balimu teweesa kitiibwa olwobwavu ekituusizza nabamu okutunda ettaka lyebika bafune ku ssentekalenda eno tetunuulidde kuvaamu nsimbi zokka wabula nokukulaakulanya oluganda obuwangwa nennono muteesaasira bwe yagambyeomutaka wooyo david muyanja akulira ekika kyamazzi gekisasi yategeezezza nti bagenda kufulumya nebiwandiiko ebirala ebikwata ku bika nga bino bya kusangibwa ku ofiisi yaabwe ku bulange edduuka lyebyedda ku bulange muganzirwazza ne masaka mu maaso ga aman bookshopomukubiriza wolukiiko lwabataka omutaka kayiira gajuule david kasibante ayagala buli butaka bwekika okubaako ensuku ekibira era mu kulambula kwakoze omwaka oguwedde ku buli butaka abaddenga alekawo ensigo zomuti oguyitibwa entaseesa ogulina emigaso emiyitirivuabataka bagamba nti baagala okutumbula empisa nomwoyo gwobulimi nobulunzi nga buli muzzukkulu alina okubeera ne walimira ssaako kyalundakayiira ayagala buli kika kiddemu okukola emirimu egyo gye kikola mu buganda okugeza abengeye nabengabi bagende mu maaso nogwobujjanjabi nabalala bwe batyoabataka era baayanjudde enteekateeka yokutandikawo sacco mwe batereka ensimbi era wano we bakungidde bazzukulu baabwe okutumbula enkulaakulana ngekola eno obwakabaka okuyita mu kabaka foundation bugenda kugitambuza okuyita mu misomokayiira yakubirizza abazzukulu okwenyigira mu ntambuza yemirimu gyebika obutereevubya  moses mulondo  ne dickson kulumbagavumenti eyimirizza   ku ntegeka  ezokuddizza mmengo ebyapa byettaka  nebintu bya buganda ebirala  ebyagiwambibwa gavumenti ezaayita olwobutakkaanya obupya obubalusseewo wakati wenjuyi zombissaabawolereza wa gavuumenti peter nnyombi  yategeezezza nti  mmengo ebakaluubirizzaamu  mu nteseganya ze baliko okuzza ebintu bya buganda byonna  kubanga  ebbaluwa ze bagiwandikira teziddibwamu ne mu nteseganya mwe bayitibwa tebalinnyayongoggyeeko  okwesamba enteseganya ssaabawolereza nnyombi yagasseeko nti mmengo yava ne  ku bimu ku byakkaanyizibwako  mu ndagaano ya kabaka mutebi ne pulezidenti museveni nawa ekyokulabilako  nti baali bakkaanya gavumenti ne mmengo obutasengula abantu ku ttaka eryabaddizibwa kyokka abe mmengo kino baakiziimuulatufunye okwemulugunya okuva mu disitulikiti nga mubende mukono ne mityana ngabantu beemulugunya  nti mmengo etandise okubasengula nabamu babinikibwa obusuulu bwe batasobola kusasula    nnyombi bwe yategeezezzayagasseeko nti waakyaliwo nenkalu ku nsonga ezobukulembeze obwennono e kayunga buruuli ne kooki  ze yagambye nti nazo tezinnagonjoolwa wakati waabwe ne mmengoomwogezi wobwakabaka bwa buganda dennis walusimbi ssengendo  bwe yatuukiriddwa yawakanyizza  ekya mmengo okugobaganya abantu ku ttakaokuggyako nga bannaffe ebyafaayo bya buganda babyerabidde naye kuva dda nga mu buganda musengwamu abantu era tewali mu kiseera agobebwa ku ttaka bonna bakolagana bulungi nekitongole kyettaka mu bwakabaka bwatyo bweyagambyewalusimbi yategeezezza mmengo teyinza kuva ku ndagaano nga bwe yakkaanyizibwako nannyonnyola nti nettaka erisinga  gavumenti tennalizza buganda nolwekyo si kituufu nti okugobaganya abantu ku ttaka eryo kugenda mu maasoyagambye nti  gavumenti erina byekwaso birala era nti kubanga waliwo ebintu bya buganda  gavumenti byekyagaanyi okuzza so nga tebiriko nkaayana yonna nawa ekyokulabirako  ekye nnyumba ya muteesa house esangibwa mu kibuga london bungereza poloti 52 awali ekizimbe king fahd mu kampala emmotoka ekika kya rolls royce ezaali eza ssekabaka muteesa ii nga zino zibalirirwamu obuwumbi mwenda nebirala pulezidenti museveni lwe yakwasa abakungu be mmengo ebyapa bya buganda ebyettaka 213 nga april 15 2014gavumenti yeeyama okusasula obwakabaka ensimbi obuwumbi 20 era amangu ddala nga yakakolebwa museveni yakwasa mmengo obuwumbi bubbiri kyokka ezisigaddeyo nyombi agamba gavumenti tesobola kuzisasula mulundi gumu era ayagala ye nakakiiko ka mmengo bafune entegeeragana ku kinowalusimbi yagambye nti ekirungi ekiriwo ebintu byonna ebyakanyizibwako mu ndagaano bimanyiddwa bya bwakabaka bwa buganda era tusaba babiteeke mu nkola awatali bukwakkulizo bwonna era ffe tulinze ebbanga lyonna ebintu bino we binaddizibwa obwakabakaembeera eno erowoozebwa nti ye yavuddeko mmengo obutakwasibwa byapa 82 akakiiko ka gavumenti bye kamala edda okwekkeneenya kuba gavumenti yali etegese september 2 2014 okubiwaayo kyokka omukolo ne gwongezebwayo olwa pulezidenti okubeera nga yali afunye olugendo olwamangu e kenya era nyombi agamba nti okukola kino ensonga ezo waggulu zirina okusooka okuteesebwakobino biddiridde  endagaano ya kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii ne museveni  gye bassaako omukono a august 1 2013 gavumenti eyawakati mweyakkiririza okuzza ebintu byobwakabaka ebyawambibwa eyaliko pulezidenti wa uganda milton obote mu 1966 oluvannyuma lwokuwangangusa ssekabaka muteesa iimu june 2014 nyombi yawandikira katikkiro charles peter mayiga ebbaluwa ku nsonga yebyapa 13 ebyakwasibwa mmengo oluvannyuma lwessaza lye kooki okuyita mu kamuswaaga sansa kabumbuli ii ne babikaayanira nti byalina kukwasibwa boendagano eno erimu akatundu akagamba nti kabaka akkiriza okuleekera obufuzi bwennono mu masaza bugerere ne buluuli ebifo byobukulembeze mu bitundu bino we bisangibwa nyombi kyagamba nti akakiiko ke kalina okwongera okukinoganya endagano bwegamba okulekera kitegeeza ki kubanga buli luuyi lulina entaputa yaalwobwe yali asisinkanye ababaka ba palamenti abava mu buganda nga october 152014 mayiga yabasaba okugenda mu maaso nokubanja gavumenti eyongere okuteeka mu nkola endagano eno ngezza ebintu byobwakabaka          gavumenti eyimirizza ku kuddiza mmengo ebyaffekabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii alagidde abavubuka okwewala zzaala amanyiddwa ennyo nga beetingi mu mwaka omuggya 2015omutanda bino yabyogeredde mu lubiri e mmengo nga aggulawo omwaka 2015 nagamba nti bwe wataabe kwegendereza kwa maanyi uganda yaakwesanga ngerimu omugigi gwabatasomye mungi nobubbi okweyongera kuba zzaala ono si mulambike bulungi tewandibadde kabi mu muzannyo nga guno naye tulowooza nti amateeka agagufuga manafubeetingi asinga kwenyigiramu bavubuka abatalina mirimu gya nkalakkalira sso nga nabakyasoma nabo beeyunidde nnyo beetingimutebi ii yasabye palamenti ne poliisi okuteekawo amateeka okusalira ensonga ya zzaala amagezi mu bwangu ngembeera tennayonoonekera ddalamu ngeri yemu kabaka yasaasidde abasiraamu olwokufiirwa abakulembeze baabwe mu ngeri eyentiisa ngabakasembayo kuliko sheikh dr abdulqadir muwaya ne sheikh mustapha bahiga abaakubiddwa amasasi mu mwezi gwa december wa 2014 tusana tukole nnyo okusitula embeera zaffe mu biti ebyenjawulo okutangira ettemu lye tuwulira kumpi buli lunaku obubenje ku makubo okutyoboola eddembe lyabaana abato nempisa ensiwuufuyakomeekerezza obubaka bwe ngayagaliza abantu okusanyuka nokujaguza mu mirembe bwatyo nabaagaliza omwaka omuppya 2015 ogwessanyu nenkulaakulanakabaka yalabiseeko eri obuganda mu lubiri e mmengo ngali wamu ne nnabagereka sylivia nagginda omumbejja katrina ssangalyambogo namasole margaret siwoza nabakulu abalala bangi era nasanyusibwa abayimbi abawerakomu kwogera kwe katikkiro charles peter mayiga yakunze abantu lukiiko lwa baminisita e mmengo okutuula okuzitongozabaminisita abali ku kakiiko kano kuliko ssentebe daudi mpanga ngono ye ssabawolereza wobwakabaka era minisita wa gavumenti ezebitundu apollo nelson makubuya ambmatovu christine nagawa mugerwa kasule nomwogezi wobwakabaka dennis walusimbi ssengendonga november 27 2014 akakiiko kano kaatongozebwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga bwatyo nakasindika okutema empenda ezigenda okuyitibwamu okukunganya ebirowoozo byabantu ba bugandangayogera ne bukedde mpanga yategeezezza nti  akakiiko kaffe oluvannyuma lwokutongozebwa bammemba ffena twatuula nga december 102014 ne tufuna ebirowoozo ebinaatulambika mu mulimu guno nga tulindiridde lukiiko lwa baminisita kutuula amangu ddala ku ntandikwa ya january 2015 okuzikakasaebirowoozo bino byalina okutongozebwa nga december 18 2014 kyokka ne kitasoboka wabula mpanga yannyonnyodde nti amangu ddala nga bamalirizza ensonga eno abantu bajja kumanyisibwa engeri gye banaawaayo ebirowoozo byabwe okugattibwa ku nsonga ezawamu mmengo zerinawalusimbi yagambye nti ensonga enkulu ze baagala okwongera okuggumiza mwe muli okunyweza ekifo kya kabaka mu ssemateeka era nti buganda bwa bwakabaka ngekitikkiro kyabwo ye kabaka okugabana obuyinza  federo ensonga yettaka nokunyweza ensalo zobwakabakaokukunganya ebirowoozo byennongoosereza mu ssemateeka kwatandika mwaka guno era agava mu palamenti gagamba wenaddiramu okukakalabya emirimu mu february 2015 ogumu ku mirimu ababaka kwe bagenda okutandikira kwe kutunula mu birowoozo ebireeteddwa nga sipiika rebecca kadaga ayagala may 2015 wanatuukira ngensonga eno evudde mu ddiiroakakiiko ka mpanga kalagirwa okukwatagana nakabondo kababaka ba palamenti okuva mu buganda era ssentebe wakabondo kano godfrey kiwanda ssuubi yategeezezza nti beetegefu okwanja ensonga zonna ezikwata ku bugandakuba bagenderera kugonjoola ensonga za buganda okuyita mu ssemateeka onokiwanda yannyonnyodde nti  wadde ssemateeka waffe alaga nga buganda bweri awamu era ekulemberwa kabaka waliwo obufuzi obulala ate yo gavumenti bwegamba nti yatongoza okuli nabo betumanyi ngabaami bamasaza ensonga ya federo gye tugenda okusooka okwanja okusobola okutuukiriza bino kiwanda yategeezezza nga bwe balina entegeka yakakiiko kakabondoakafuzi okusisinkana akakiiko ke mmengo mu wiiki eyokusatu mu january 2015 ate oluvannyuma akakiiko ke mmengo kasisinkane ababaka bonnabasobole okutwala eddoboozi eryawamu          akakiiko akakungaanya ebirowoozo ku nsonga za buganda kaagala nnongoosereza mu ssemateekabya dickson kulumba ne lilian nalubegakatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti ekizimbe kya masengere kyakukwasibwa kabaka ngekirabo kyamazaalibwa ge agemyaka 60 egyobuntu nga april 13 2015yakiggumizza nti  buganda twezimbe mulina emyezi ena okumaliriza omulimu guno ate saagala kuwulira byekwaso byonnakino nkirangiridde mu lwatu kirina okutuukirira era tewali kirina kutulemesaavunaanyizibwa ku kugula ebikozesebwa ku masengere fred kasozi mamba yategeezezza nti ekizimbe kino kyetaaga akawumbi kamu nobukadde 200 okumalirizibwa nasaba obuganda okusitukiramu okuzitoolabino byonna byabadde ku bulange mayiga bwe yabadde alambuza obuganda omulimu ogukolebwa ku kizimbe masengere ku lwokusatu ngabantu bazze mu bungi era beesonzeemu obukadde 20mu baawaddeyo kwabaddeko abasuubuzi mu kikuubo aba ktspa abaawaddeyo abasawo ebitabo bye bawadde mu tterekero bye yagambye nti byakuyamba okumanyisa abantu ku byobulamu kubanga kabaka ayagala abantu abalamuomukolo gwetabiddwaako o mumyuka owookubiri owa katikkiro hajj ssekimpi minisita mariam nkalubo mayanja ssentebe wa buganda twezimbe john fred kiyimba freeman nabakungu abalala          masengere yaakukwasibwa kabaka ku mazaalibwa ge aga 2015minisita wabavubuka okwewummuza nebyemizannyo e mmengo henry ssekabembe kiberu akalaatidde abantu ba buganda okussa amaanyi mu bye bakola nti yengeri yokka eyokuzza buganda ku ntikkossekabembe era yalabudde abali ku ttaka lya kabaka erya mayiro 350 nti singa banaalemwa okuwaayo emmere mu mbiri za kabaka kajja kuba kabonero nti banyooma nobutawagira nnamulondo kuba ngetebenkeddebino yabyogedde atikkula abatuuze mu ggombolola ya mituba 10 kamira e baamunaanika mu ssaza lye bulemeeze amakula ge baawaddeyo okuvujjirira beene nabantu be mu mbiri nga baakulembeddwaamu omwami wa kabaka atwala ggombolola eno hajjati mariam namuddubaawaddeyo ente enkoko amatooke omubisi omuganda enku nebiralaabanubbi bakwanze katikkiro charles peter mayiga ekiwandiiko omubadde ensonga eziwerako mwe basabidde kabaka asiime agende abalambuleko e bombo kubanga kabaka wa buganda yasemba okubalambula mu 1963ngasoma ekiwandiiko kino ssaabawandiisi wekibiina ekitaba abanubbi mu ggwanga ismail karim yagambye nti   twasanyukira kabaka bwe yasiima nayimirira e bombo natuwuubirako mu september bwe yali agenda ku ssomero lya janan ss bwe yatulaga okwagala kyokka tusaba asiime atulambule kubanga ku mulembe gwa katikkiro walusimbi yali atusuubiza nti kabaka agenda kutulambulaensisinkano eno yabadde ku bulange mmengo eggulo nga bano bakulembeddwa omubaka wa palamenti owa katikamu south polofkiddhu makubuya ssentebe wekibiina kyabanubbi muhamed wahib lt col abdallah nasur nabakiikirira abanubbi mu lukiiko lwa bugandawahib yalaze katikkiro obweraliikirivu bwe balina ku ttaka eryabaweebwa kabaka daudi chwa ii erigambibwa okubeera 2sq kyokka nga mu kiseera kino tebalirinaako buwandiike bwonna wadde ekyapa bwe batyo ne basaba ekitongole kyettaka mu buganda okukola okunoonyereza ku nsonga eno etereerekatikkiro mayiga yeebazizza abanubbi olwokwolesa enkolagana ennungi nabantu bamawanga amalala ne bawangala nabo mu ggwanga kubanga tawulirangako ntalo zonna ze balina nabantu abalala nagamba nti ekyo bannayuganda bonna kye balina okukoppa ensi okukulakarim yagambye nti kibanyiiza abantu okubayita basajja ba amin kyokka nga bo bakimanyi nti bantu ba kabakabaatonedde mayiga ebirabo oluvannyuma ne baamutwala mu mazina gaabwe agayitibwa lokuda agazinibwa nga bali mu ssanyu ne ku mikolo egyekitiibwa era nabiibyamuabanubbi bakwanze katikkiro charles peter mayiga ekiwandiiko nga baagala kabaka asiime abakyalireko e bombo kubanga basemba okukyaza kabaka wa buganda mu 1963ngasoma ekiwandiiko kino ssabawandiisi wekibiina ekigatta abanubbi mu ggwanga ismail karim yagambye ntitwasanyukira kabaka bwe yasiima nayimirira e bombo natuwuubirako mu mwezi gwomwenda bwe yali agenda ku janan ssyatulaga okwagala kyokka tusaba asiime atukyalireko kubanga ku mulembe gwa katikkiro walusimbi yali atusuubiza nti kabaka agenda kutulambulaensisinkano eno yabadde ku bulange  mmengo ku lwokusatu nga bano bakulembeddwa omubaka wa palamenti owa katikamu south polofkiddhu makubuya ssentebe wekibiina kyabanubbi muhamed wahib lt col abdallah nasur nabakiikirira abanubbi mu lukiiko lwa bugandawahib yalaze katikkiro obweraliikirivu bwe balina ku ttaka eryabaweebwa kabaka daudi chwa ii erigambibwa okubeera 2sq kyokka nga mu kiseera kino tebalinaako buwandiike bwonna wadde ekyapa bwe batyo ne basaba ekitongole kyettaka mu buganda okukola okunoonyereza ku nsonga eno etereeremu kwogerako gye bali mayiga yeebazizza abanubbi olwokwolesa enkolagana ennungi nabantu bamawanga amalala be bawangaala nabo mu ggwanga kubanga tawulirangako ntalo zonna ze balina nabantu abalala nagamba nti ekyo bannayuganda bonna kye balina okukoppa ensi okukulakatikkiro yagambye nti  kabaka ssi wa baganda wabula wa buganda ffena atuvunanyizibwako era tulina okumuwa ekitiibwa nga bwe mukolamwebale kusigala nga mukumye obuwangwa bwammwe era tugenda kwongera okukolagana okulaba nga tutumbula ebiruke naddala mu kitongole kyobulambuzikarim yagambye nti kibanyiiza abantu okubayita basajja ba amin kyokka nga bo bakimanyi nti bantu ba kabaka ne yeebaza olwendagano eyakolebwa ne gavumenti eya wakatibatonedde mayiga ebirabo oluvannyuma ne bamutwala mu mazina gaabwe agayitibwa lokuda agaazinibwa nga bali mu ssanyu ne ku mikolo egyekitiibwa era nabibyamuminisita omubeezi owabantu ba buganda ebweru charles bwenvu nabakungu abalala beetabye ku mukolo guno          kabaka ssi wa baganda wabula wa buganda  katikkiro mayigakabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii alagidde abavubuka okwongera okwegatta beenyigire mu bulimi nga balima ebirime ebyettunzi okusobola okwekulaakulanya          abavubuka mwenyigire mu bulimi  kabakaabatuuze be kiboga bacacanca oluvannyuma lwokufuna obukadde 250 ezokuddaabiriza eddwaalirossente zino ze zimu ku ezo obukadde 1400  gavumenti ze yasuubiza  okuddaabiriza eddwaaliro lye kiboga eribadde mu mbeera embissentebe wa disitulikiti eno israel iga yategeezezza nti gavumenti ngeyita mu minisitule yebyobulamu yayisa ssente zino nekigendererwa kyokutumbula omutindo gwebyobulamu mu kitundu iga yagambye nti eddwaaliro lino lijjanjaba abalwadde abasukka mu 500 buli lunaku era nti mu kiseera kino abantu bangi balyeyunira okuli nabava mu disitulikiti ye kyankwanzi ne mubendeyategeezezza nti okuliddaabiriza kujja kulifuula eddwaaliro  ekkulu eryomu kitundu erinaakola ku bulwadde obwamaanyi omuli nabagudde ku bubenje babalagiddeekyokulabirako tubadde nemipiira gyebika naye ba katikkiro baffe tebakunze bazzukulu kuwagira mipiira era obadde osanga ebisaawe nga byereere sso nga buno bwe buvunaanyizibwa bwabwebulijjo mulina obutakkaanya ne bakatikkiro bano mwasobodde mutya okukwatagana nabo mu lukiiko era mwavuddeyo nga muli kimutwakkaanyizza era twavudde mu lukiiko ffenna nga tuli basanyufu temuluwagira era temulumanyiera olukiiko olwo twaluvumiridde nti abaluteekawo baba bamenya mateeka kubanga abo ffe tubawa ebyokukola era bwe babaako amagezi ge batuwa baba balina kugayisa mu bakama baabwe abakulu bebika era bwe baba ngabakulu bebika ssi be babireese bayinza okubawa olukusa ne babatuma mu lukiiko ne bajjaate nekirala kye twalabye nti bakatikkiro bano ssi bansikirano era babeera nekiseera ekigere we bakomya obuweerezaa bwabwe nolwekyo bwe babeera nenkiiko ngezo nze mba ssiraba bye bagenda kuteesa nekiyinza okuddirira oluvannyuma lwokussaawo obukiiko ngobwo kwe kulaba nga tukoonaganaffe tusuubira nti bandibadde bakwatagana okubaako we beegattira singa tuba tubatumye omulimu nga gubeetaagisa okukolera awamu naye ekitali ekyo buli muntu agwanidde kwekuumira wa mukama we alinde byamutumabakatikkiro bano baatandikawo sacco naye era abataka abakulu bebika bangi temugiwagiraekyo nze sirina kye nnyinza kukyogerako kuba buli muntu asobola okukola sacco singa muba mwegasse wamu naye nga ffe ngolukiiko lwabataka tuba tetulina ngeri gye tugifugamu ebeera yaabwe kuba bayinza okuba nga beekolamu omulimu ne beetandikira sacco naye ate olwo omuntu bwawummuzibwa olwo nesigala ngetambula etyawabula era njagala okutangaaza nti mu lukiiko twakizudde nti abantu basussizza okweyita bye batalimu nnono yaffe omutaka amanyiddwa ali omu ye mutaka omukulu wekika ngakulemberwa mukama we ssaabatakaeno era yabadde emu ku nsonga ze twayagadde okutangaazaomutaka abeera omu abamasiga emituba empya nabalala obwo bwe bukulu bwabwe era kye kimu ku mulembe guno baleeta abebitiibwa naye ne bano ebitiibwa tulaba nga babijajaamizza nosanga owessaza nga naye ayitibwa wa kitiibwa ekintu ekikyamuowessaza essaza lye lyatwala kyekitiibwa kye bano abeefanaanyirizaako ekyabataka be tumanyi nga abatakansi abo nabo babeera ba njawulo era yensonga lwaki bayitibwa abataka nsi kuba ekyabwe kiva ku lwa kitundu ate nga balina ettaka eddenenolwekyo baabwekatikkiro charles peter mayiga atadde abali ku mulimu gwokuzimba ekizimbe masengere ku bunkenke okulaba nga kimalirizibwa olwa april 132015 nga terunnatuuka kubanga ayagala kibe ekirabo kyamazaalibwa ga kabaka agemyaka 60 egyobutoensonda zaategeezezza bukedde nti  katikkiro ayagala omulimu gwokuzimba masengere gwanguyizibweko kubanga ayagala akwase kabaka ebisumuluzo byakyo era akiggulewo ku lwa april 13 2015 ngakuza amazaalibwa gessentebe wakakiiko ka buganda twezimbe akali ku ddimu lyokuzimba masengere evaristo seguya yategeezezza nti omulimu baaguzuula mu makkati nga lwagiggulawokatikkiro charles peter mayiga asoomozza abakulembeze be mpigi okuteekateeka obulungi ebibuga byabwe okwetegekera enkulaakulana ejjansaba abakulembeze bekibuga kino ekye mpigi kya kabaka ngasala keeki e kabulabya catherine lutwama benjamin ssebaggala  ne anthony sempeerezaomulangira david alexander ssimbwa afiiridde mu ddwaliro e nakasero ku lwokuna mu ttuntu saawa 653 ngaweza emyaka 83taata wa kabaka omuto ssimbwa yatwaliddwa mu ddwaliro e nakasero ku lwokutaano wiiki ewedde ngali bubi abadde atawaanyizibwa ekirwadde kya puleesa nga nomutima munafu era amaze butongole yabadde akyali kabulaamawulire tugafunye omulangira aseeredde naye enteekateeka zonna eziddako tugenda kuzitegeeza obuganda nga katikkiro amaze okububikira kubanga abadde akyali kabula luzira nayimbulwa mu september 1968           okuva ku mulembe gwa amin abadde mubaka wa uganda mu mawanga agenjawulo okuli ethiopia ne china          amin yamubbira ku byama bya obote okulumba olubiri lwe mmengo kyokka bwe yabyogera tebaamuwuliriza         yatandika kkampuni eya chwa ii foundation ebadde erwanirira ettaka nebyobugagga bya kitaawe  daudi chwa          afudde tanunudde ssimbwa  kitaawe wa kabaka afuddeolulyo olulangira lutiisizza okuwandiikira pulezidenti museveni okulungamizibwa ku magye ge yawa katikkiro charles peter mayiga oba galiwo kutangira balangira kuba mu masiro gye balina obutaka bwabwe ne bawabula nti ekigango kikozesebwa nga ofiisikino kiddiridde katikkiro ngayita mu mumyuka we owookubiri hajji mohamood ssemambo ssekimpi okuwandiikira ssaabalangira ying moses kayima ngamutegeeza nga bwe watali nkiiko zonna zikkirizibwa mu masiro e kasubiebbaluwa eno eyawandiikibwa ku mmande nga october 27 2014 yayimiriza nolukiiko lwabalangira olwali lulangibwa ngaziyizibwaomulangira samuel bemba ngono yavunaanyizibwa ku nnono nobuwangwa mu lulyo olulangira era omukwanaganya wabalangira ne mmengo yategeezezza nti  katikkiro okugamba nti abalangira obutaka eri obugandamayanja nkangi atanganzizzajehoash mayanja nkangi eyaliko katikkiro wa buganda ku nsonga zabalangira zino yategeezezza nti kirabika katikkiro mayiga yabadde ayogerera mu byafaayo yavunaanyizibwa ku bantu bonna mu buganda era ngono yavunaanyizibwa ne ku balangira ngabaganda gwe basaba okubalaga kabaka waabwebwe wabeerawo obwetaavu katikkiro agenda mu kigango nasaba kasujju lubinga okumulaga omulangira agenda okufuuka kabakaabalangira nabambejja bagamba nti obumu ku butakkaanya bwabwe ne katikkiro kwe kubeera nti tayagala kuwabulwa nga bazze bamuwabula enfunda nnyingi yafuga buli kimuomwogezi wobwakabaka ayogedde ku nsonga zinowabula omwogezi wobwakabaka denis walusimbi ssengendo yagambye nti ensonga zabalangira katikkiro yazirambika bulungi mu lukiiko lwa buganda abalangira we bakomakatikkiro charles peter mayiga ayatulidde abalangira nti mu nnono za buganda tebateekeddwa kusemberera wadde okuliraana kabakayayongeddeko nti abalangira era tebalina na ngebyapa ebingi ebitannakomezebwawo ebbanja eddene erikyabanjibwa nebirala bingiyayogedde ku bika nagamba nti omukulu wekika yenna omupya assibwawo ateekeddwa kumala kuyisibwa wa katikkiro olwo gwonnaokusinziira ku muganda we amujjanjaba nabaggala ndagire talina kyasobola kwekolera wadde okwekyusa mu buliri nga buli kimu bakimusembereza busembereza nokumutegula waba yeebasetosobola kumukwatako nga tolina nkampa kubanga yenna avaamu amazzi oluusi nomusaayi ate omubiri gwonna ne we yeebakira ajjudde omusaayi nolwekyo ali mu mbeera mbi ddala nabaggala bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti wabula ebikozesebwamu ku kumujjanjaba tebabirina olwokuba nga nabasawo abamujjanjaba ba njawulo ngabamu be mmengo ne ntebe bakyalemeddwa okuzuula ekirwadde ekimulumamu kiseera kino ndagire akyasobola okwogera nokujjukira ebyafaayo naddala ebikwata ku kubatizibwa kwa kabaka nebyaliwo nga kabaka amukwasa ennyumba gy eyamuzimbira wadde ngalina amabwa mu kamwa ne mu bulago era nga aliira mu kaseke emmere ennyangungundagire bwe yabadde ayogerako ne bukedde yategeezezza nti kabaka bwe yali alambula ekkanisa ye ndoddo nokumukwasa ennyumba gye yamuzimbira yamubuuza ebintu bingi omwali nokwagala okumanya abamuweereza nti kyokka olwokuba teyazaala yamutegeeza nti alina omuntu amuyambako kyokka nga naye teyeesobola mu bye nsimbinti kabaka yeeyama okumulabirira mu ngeri yokumujjanjaba nga kuno kwe yasinzidde okumusaba amudduukirire nti kubanga abamujjanjaba kaakati tebalina busobozi bumalaeyalera kabaka ali ku ndiri e kajjansi robinah nakasaawe mwana wa nabaggala maama tetunnakoowa kumujjanjaba naye obusobozi butono ate nga yeetaaga ebintu bya bbeeyi emyaka gye gigenzeasaana kwegendereza ate nemmere gyalya tulina kugyegendereza asobole okubaako kateeka mu lubutoluli yali asobola okwewalula nafulumako wabweru naye kati takyalina kyasobola ate nga maama abeera naye awaka ali omu nakazzukulu akato akamuyamba bambi nako oluusi katya kubanga amanyi okutema emiranga ngobulumi bumususseemiri naluswata jjajja obulwadde bumuluma nnyo era oluusi nze ne jajja tusula tutudde ngalumwatusaba abantu batuyambe afune obujjanjabi obumala ate era bwe wabaawo abasawo abasobola okumanya obulwadde bwa jjajja bajje batuyambendagire wakati ku mukolo kabaka kwe yamukwasiza enju          nnamukadde eyalera kabaka ali ku ndiri e kajjansinnaabagereka sylvia nagginda asabye  abaana abagenda okutikkirwa ku yunivasite ye nkumba okubeera abeesimbu basobole okutuuka ku birubirirwa byabwebino nabagereka  yabyogeredde ku yunivasite ye nkumba bwe yabadde omwogezi omukulu  nga beetegekera okutikkira abayizi amasomo agatali gamuyategeezezza nti kasita obuntu buva mu bulamu bwomuntu kitegeeza nti aba afuuse muzibu nnyo era nga takyasobola kutambuza byakola mu bukkakkamu namazimaku mulundi guno omusomo gwabadde  ku mulamwa ogugamba nti omugaso gwabatandisi bemirimu nga tukwanaganya okukolera  munsi yonnayasomesezza ku  ngeri omuntu yenna anoonya emirimu gyasobola okukola nagufuna ngakolera mu uganda oba ngakozesa obusobozi obuliwo okufuna emirimuyakubiriza abayizi abagenda okutikkirwa okufaayo ennyo okulaba nga abakozesa amagezi gebafunye mu yunivasitebulungi basobole okukyusa obulamu bwabwe nabo ababali okumpiyasabye abayizi okukuuma erinnya lyabwe lyebakoledde ennyo lireme kusigibwa bitoomi mu kaseera  akatono ennyoenkya yunivasite eno egenda kutikkira abayizi abasuka 1000katikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti ebyenjigiriza nokujjumbira obulimi bye bigenda okuyamba okusitula ebizinga bye buvuma mu nkulaakulana byatyo nakubiriza abantu bekitundu kino okubyettanirabino katikkiro yabyogeredde ku lugendo lwaliko okutikkula abantu ba kabaka mu ssaza lye buvuma ettoffaali eryokukola emirimu egyenjawulo egyenkulaakulana mu bwakabaka lwe yatandise ku lwokubirimu kulambula ekitundu kino yalinnye ekidyeri okuva e kiyindi bwatyo nagoba ku mwalo e kirongo ku ssaawa taano era olwavudde wano nagenda ku st mary ss eryazimbibwa omuserikale wa kabaka vincent ssemakula era ono nawaayo 400000 ngettoffaali abantu abalala ne baleeta 98800                              ssaalongo ssemakula ngalambuza katikkiro olusukuolwavudde awo yayolekedde mu maka gomutaka ssaalongo antonio ssemakula ngono alina olusuku olusussa yiika 20 era katikkiro mayiga nasomooza abantu bonna e buvuma okuba ngono okusobola okukuza ekitundumayiga yagambye nti  bukya nzaalibwa situukangako ku bizinga bye buvuma era bulijjo ntegeezebwa ngabantu beeno bwe batali balimi wabula abavubi kyokka nsanyuse nnyo okusanga nti ssemakula yeenyigidde mu bulimi mugende mu maaso kuba mulina okwekolera okuva mu bwavuku mbuga yeggombolola ssabaddu busamuzi waasondeddwawo ettofaali lya bukadde 2020000 oluvannyuma katikkiro nayolekera embuga yessaza lino majjo gye yatulizza omwami wessaza lino patrick nsubuga kirumbalumba  nabamyuka be mu ntebe yokukulembera essaza linoabakulembeze mu kitundu kino okwabadde omubaka migadde nantume egunyu ssentebe wa disitulikiti adrian ddungu nabalala babadde wamu nabakungu ba buganda twezimbe abakungaanya ettofaali          katikkiro akungaanya ttoffaali e buvuma bya lilian nalubega ne dickson kulumbakatikkiro charles peter mayiga atikkudde abantu ettoffaali nabalambuza nomulimu gwokusereka ekizimbe masengere we kutuuse nalabula abamwogerera nti asusse okusabiriza nti basaana kwesunako kubanga abaggya kisubi ku liisomayiga yagambye nti mu kaweefube gwe baliko okutuusa buganda ku ntikko abantu basaana okweggyamu omuze gwokusabiriza bayige okweyiiyiza nga kino kye kijja okubatuusa ku kwezimbawaliwo abangamba nti nsabiriza naye nze bwe mba nkuggyako akajonjo ate tosobola kungamba kukuggyako kanyaaga mba nnyamba ggwe mmanyi waliwo abantu abazibu naye tujja kubaggyayo okumwetegekera mu bbanga eryo era asangewoenjawulonga july 4 2014 katikkiro yagwa bugwi ku masiro e kasubi nasanga ngabakozi bawummuddemu era nabateeka ku nningaokusambyako omulimuokuva mu bbanga eryo nnaalinya beatrice namikka ne katikkiro wamasiro gano ssaalongo edward mulumba bazze beemulugunya eri katikkiro ngomulimu gwa muzibu azaalampanga bwe gutambula akasoobossebo katikkiro ndi lwanaakomawo nga november 1 2014 terunnatuuka          katikkiro akyusizza ku byokulambula amasirokabaka ronald muwenda mutebi asiimye okukuliza olunaku lwa bulungibwansi mu ssaza lye kabula nga november 11 2014emikolo emikulu gyakubeera ku mbuga yessaza lye kabula e kakondo mu muluka gwe kalagalakino kiddiridde omubaka omukyala akiikirira lyantonde mu palamenti grace namara kirumira okusaba katikkiro bwe yali akimye ettoffaali ategeeze omutanda asiime abakyalireko kubanga balina ennyonta nnene okumulabakoomubaka namara agamba nti okukyaza omutanda mukisa gwamaanyi nasuubiza okukola ekisoboka okulaba ngayanirizibwa mu ssanyu mu ssaza lye lino mwagenda okumala ennaku ssatubakatikkiro bebika baanukudde bakama baabwe abataka abakulu bebika mu buganda nti newankubadde baabasomedde amateeka ge balina okugoberera ko nokubategeeza obukulu bwabwe w ebukoma mu ku kika nti kyokka kino tekiggyawo kiragiro kabaka kye yawa ngabalagira okukiika mu lukiiko lwabatakamu kiseera kyekimu ba katikkiro basabye kabaka mutebi ii abawe ekiragiro ekisalawo eggoye ku nteekateeka yabakulu bebika gye bagamba nti bo nga ba katikkiro tebagaana kugikkiririzaamu nti wabula ate bwaba nga ye yawa ekiragiro ekyabakomyawo mu lukiiko lwabwe ate tebasuubira muntu mulala okubawa ebiragiro ebibye nga nnannyini lukiiko walibano baategeezezza nti kabaka yennyini ye yawa olukusa ba katikkiro bebika okwetabanga mu nkiiko zabataka abakulu bebika oluvannyuma lwokukizuula nti bwe batazibeeramu ebika bingi bisigalira emabega olwabataka ababikulira okuba nga tebeesobola nga nokuzeetabamu kibazibuwalirabakama baffe wadde nga baagala tubalekere emirembe mu nkiiko zaabwe naye kabaka ye yatuwa ekiragiro nga bakatikkiro kwe tubadde tutambulirakyewuunyisa okulaba nga bakama baffe tebakyakitwala ngekikulu sso nga bandibadde balinda oba nokusooka ne bamusaba akimenyewo olwo bo ne balyoka batugobaganya naye ekyokwesalirawo bo bokka tekikola era babeera ngabamulabye mu kamwa ba katikkiro bwe baagambyebano era nga basinziira mu lukiiko lwabwe olutuula buli lwakuna ku kabakanjagala e mmengo nga nomulundi guno lwakubiriziddwa ssentebe waabwe omutaka enos kyobe baayisizza nekiwandiiko ekiraga obutali bumativu bwabwe ku ngeri abataka abakulu bebika gye baabayisaamu mu lusirika gye bagamba nti yagenderera kubalengezza mu maaso gabaamasiga be bakulemberabakama baffe be baatuyita okwetaba mu lusirika luno era nga okusooka mu nteekateeka eno ba katikkiro baali tebaatuyise kyokka oluvannyuma nga wabula ennaku bbiri naffe ne batuyitakino tekyali kibi wabula ate ekyokutuuka eyo ne batuyisa mu ngeri etategeerekeka kyatukuba wala  bakatikkiro bwe baategeezezza ne bawa nebintu ebyabakoleddwaako olwokubajolonga ekisusse omuli1 okubamma omukisa okwogera abamu ku boogezi bakira bwe baggya okwogera nga mu nnyanjula yaabwe basooka kwanjula bamasiga olwo ffe ne batusembyayo ekiraga nti ffe tetulina bwe tuli nga abamasiga weebali2  bakatikkiro bebika tebaayanjulwa mu lusirika luno ssonga twali bantu bakulu abaddirira abataka abakulu bobusolya3 mu kwanjula abakulu bebika abataka abataaliwo newankubadde nga katikkiro baabwe abamu twaliwo era tebaaboogerako nti ebika ebyo weebiri era abamasiga abaabivaamu tebaayanjulwa ekiraga nti waliwo akakuku kuffe bakatikkiro4 omutaka kayita musoke omukulu wekika kyenvubu ngakyali omukubiriza wolukiiko lwabataka ye yagoba bakatikkiro bebika mu lukiiko lwabataka kabaka mwennyini nalagira bakomewo kyokka kyennyamiza okulaba nga ate era omuntu yomu ye yalambise ensonga ezoku bagoba mu lukiiko lwe lumuomulundi guno omutaka nakirembeka ye yatugoba kyokka tulowooza nti yawubisibwa abamu ku bataka abaagala okuyisaawo ebyabwe5  olusirika terwagwanira kussibwa ku lunaku lwe lumu okuli omukolo nti ku ttaka lino gye buvuddeko kwaliko obupande obusoma nti embuga ya kawuula ekifo kya buwangwa nennono tekitundibwa era ofiisi ya katikkiro wa buganda yerina obuvunaanyizibwa ku kifo kinokyokka mu abatategeerekekaensonga zino ezokutunda ettaka lyembuga owolunyiriri lusambya agamba nti yawandiikirako dda katikkiro wa buganda ebbaluwa ngamusaba ayingire mu nsonga zinokatikkiro naye yalagira omutaka ndugwa okuziyingiramumu kuziyingiramu ne minisita omubeezi e mmengo avunaanyizibwa ku byobuwangwa yusuf wamala gaganga  naye yeetaba mu lukiiko lwensonga zino era nga lwatuula kibuye mu maka gomutaka ndugwaabazzukulu era balumiriza ne bannabyabufuzi mu kitundu okuli nabakulembeze ku  lc 1 okubeerako omunyago gwe baafuna ku ttaka lino basobole okuteeka emikono ku ttaka lye batundamu bantu be basinga okusonga olunwe mulimu omumyuka wa ssentebe wekyalo nga mukyala navunaanyizibwa ku byokwerinda  abbaasi kavumaavunaanyizibwa ku byokwerinda ku kyalo era nga bamusongamu olunwe okubeerako kyamanyi ku byokutundibwa kwettaka lino abbaasi kavuma yannyonnyodde byamanyi ku ttaka linoettaka lino lya kawuula era yaba alivunaanyizibwako ngomuntu wabula si kika kyonna ekyolugaveabantu abaasooka okuziika  ku ttaka lino baakola ensobi kuba wano baali balina kuziikawo kawuula omu yekka kyokka mu kiseera kino waliwo abafu bangiettaka lino kuliko abantu bangi era ngabamu bajja beesenzaakoebigambibwa nti twekobaana mu byokutunda ettaka lino si bituufu kuba siririnaako buvunaanyizibwa kye mmanyi nti ttaka lya kawuula kavuma bwagambagye buvuddeko mengo ngeyita mu kitongole kya nacrada ekiri wansi wa minisitule  yebyobulambuzi nobuwangwa yateekawo okunoonyereza ku ttaka lino era ne bafulumya lipoota ku ttaka lino eyafuluma nga  october 1 2013lipoota egamba nti okuva omukulu frank magala ne bannabyabufuzi  bwe baayingirira ensonga zettaka lya kawuula ekibanja kyonna kyasalwamu obubanja era abatunzi bettaka nabasenze ku ttaka lino baategeezezza nti kawuula frank magala ye yatundafrank magala kawuula gwe balumiriza okutunda ettaka yategeezezza nti abagamba nti yatunda ettaka lino bamusibako matu ga mbuzi kumuliisa ngookuva lwe nafuna obwakawuula situndangako wadde akatundu ku ttaka lye boogerakoekisooka ettaka lye nnyini lye boogerako tebamanyi gye liyitira bo batwaliramu nettaka lye kigobe erya national housingomuntu yenna balina okukomaabataka bamasiga obuvunaanyizibwa nebisaanyizo byabwe1 owessiga aba mwana wa mukulu wa kika omutaka wakasolya2 amasiga mu kika tegeeyongerako bungi ngabamu bwe bagenda bagamba oba nga bebika nobuvunaanyizibwa bwabwekayita musoke yakikkaatirizza nti abataka bakatikkiro bebika babeera basiige mu bika bino ababiyamba okulaba ngemirimu gyabyo gitambula1 katikkiro wekika tabeera tebakola mirimu gya nsikiranookugeza bano tebaabya wadde okusumika omusika mu kika nebirala ebiringa ebyo3 bakatikkiro bebika balondebwa bulondebwa omukulu wekika oba oluusi ngali nabakulu bamasiga nabalala ababa bakwatibwako mu kika ekyo era aweebwa ebbanga eggere okumala ku ntebe so ssi kulwako ngabamu bwe balowooza ne batuuka nokulowooza nti be bakulu bebikatusanze obuzibu bungi ngabobusolya egitabakwatakokyewuunyisa ate nga kisoboka omutaka eyali katikkiro wekika kyekibe bwe twali tukola emikolo ku kabaka ngagenda okutuuzibwa e naggalabi ku nnamulondo bwe yayagala nokukola emikolo ku ganoku lwokutaano mu maaso ga katikkiro charles peter mayiga nnaalinya tebattagwabwe bwe yakwasiddwa akazindaalo yategeezezza abantu abazze okulambula omulimu gwamasiro we gutuuse nga bweri enkola ya bungereza abe mawogola balaze kabaka essanyu ku mikolo gyamatikkira ge agomulungi ogwa 21ebifaananyi bya  dickson kulumba ne ssennabulya baagalayina          amatikkira ga kabaka agomulundi ogwa 21 mu bifaananyinga tukuza amatikkira ga ssaabasajja agomulundi ogwa 21 katikkiro  charles peter mayiga alaze ensonga ttaano lwaki mmengo yagaana okukkiriza enfuga eya regional tier nalambika buganda eyenkya bweneebeera mu mboozi ne dickson kulumbakiki kyojjukira ku matikkira ga kabaka era lwaki ngobuganda tusaanye okugakuzaokukuza amatikkira ga kabaka kubeera kuggumiza nsonga egamba nti buganda bwakabaka era kabaka kye kitikkiro kyabwomu bulamu obwa bulijjo tukuza emikolo egyenjawulo naddala amazaalibwa naffe tujjukira amatikkira ngakabonero kokuzzibwawo kwobwakabaka bwa bugandabwe buno obwakabaka bwe mwali mwagala okuddawoobwakabaka bwe twali twagala tebunnaddawo kyokka obeerawo ne byotandikirakoolukiiko lwa buganda lulina okukola emirimu gyalwo gye lulina okutuukiriza okuteeka ebiteeso ne bikola ku mbeera zabantuolukiiko lwabataka nalwo lulina okukola egyalwo nga bwe kyabanga eddaate obwakabaka bwandibadde bukola ku nsonga zaabwo ne tutalinda kukaabirira buyambi ku nsonga ezenjawulonaye mu kulaba kwange wadde kiri bwe kityo tutambuddeko buli kimu kizimbibwa mpolampolakimaze okweyoleka oluvannyuma lwemyaka kati egisusse 28 nti buganda tejja kufuna nfuga ya federo kyokka enkola ya regional tier mweri mu nnongoosereza ya ssemateeka wa 2005lwaki buganda tekkiriza nesooka egenda nenkola enobuganda yeekengera enkola ya ligyoni ttiya mu nsonga ttaano engeri katikkiro gye yalambikibwa okulondebwamu ekontana nennono zaffe obuyinza obuweebwa pulezidenti mu ssemateeka okweddiza ekitundu kyonna mu uganda singa abeera alabyeyo obuzibu kibi nnyoensonga yettaka yali ekwatiddwa bubi ngettaka mu buganda teriri mu mikono gyayo tewaliiwo ngeri ya ssimba erambulula engeri gavumenti eno eya ligyoni mweyinza kuyita okufuna ensimbi ezigitambuza nga kino abaganda bakiraba ngabagenda okudda mu kusabiriza nokukubanga amavi awantu mu gavumenti eya wakati okufunawo ssenteekirala mwalimu akawaayiro nga kalese disitulikiti mu buganda nga ziyita butereevu e mmengo ne zigenda e nakasero  gavumenti eya wakatingate twali twagala disitulikiti zonna mu buganda zituuke e mmengo aziyunge ku gavumenti eya wakatibwe weetegereza ngokugaba obuyinza nga bino tobirina obeera na byoya bya nswagavumenti ya wakati yakkiriza okusasula abakulembeze bensikirano  obukadde butaano buli mwezi ngomusaalammengo yagaana ssente zino okusasulwa kabaka naye  mu kulaba kwo yandisasuddwa mmekaffe nga buganda tetwetaaga musaala gulabibwa ngokuyamba omukulembeze okugenda okugula ennyaanya mu katalekye twetaaga gwe mutemwa ogusobozesa gavumenti ya kabaka okutambuza kadde omutemwa gwayo tuguteekateeka era omwo gavumenti bweba  mweteeka ssente kitegeerekekamu south afrika balina enkola nnungi nti buli mwaka gavumenti ebeera nomutemwa oguweebwa obwakabaka obwakabaka bwaffe bwandikutte ekkubo ngerya aga khan obwakabaka bwe businga kubeera mu busuubuzienkola aga khan gyatambuzaamu emirimu gye nnungi kubanga alina ebyokwekulaakulanya bingialina kkampuni
