nobwakabaka obulina ebintu ebyenjawulo omuva ensimbi ezirabirira emirimu gyabwo nga kino singa kitukibwako tubeera mu kwesiima kwa maanyi okusinga aga khan atalina kifo kyankalakalira nti buno bwe bwakabaka bwebwotunuulira entandikwa ya aga khan eva mu 1959 bwe yali e tanzania eyo era bwe yali ku kabaga kamazaalibwa ge ne basalawo okukungaanya buli kyabugagga kyonna kye balina ne bakiteeka wamu obukomo obwa zaabu nebirala era oluvannyuma  mwe mwava ensimbi ezikoze obugagga obwo bwonna bwalinanaffe  enkola eyettoffaali tusuubira ejja kutuyamba okuzimba buganda okudda ku ntikkoabantu abamu balowooza nti mmengo yateekamu obugayaavu buganda erina ettaka ddene naye terikozesebwa sso nga  twanditaddeko ffaamu  obukolero obutono nobulimi obwomulembeggwe olowooza otyaettaka obwakabaka lye bulina erisinga liriko abantu ate nno bwe bawulira mayiro 350 na lino ekyakazzibwa ne kirowoozebwa nti obwakabaka bulina ettaka ddene naye nga si bwe kirinkakasa nti ebyogeza abantu bwe batyo kwe najuliraemmamba obukulembeze bwa gabunga bugamba nti tebufunanga bbaluwa ntongole eraga nti kabaka yasiima natongoza nankere ngekikaokusinziira ku katikkiro wa gabunga dr adam kimala baatwalayo tasoobyeolukiiko luno olwatudde ku mmande nga july 21 2014 ku bulange  mmengo lwakubiriziddwa sipiika nelson kawalya nga lwabaddemu nokuyisa embalirira yobwakabaka eya 20142015 eyasomwa nga july 7 yeesambye ebyokuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu 2016bya johnbosco  mulyowaomumyuka asooka owa katikkiro wa buganda haji muhamood ssekimpi atuuzizza pookino wa buddu  vincent ssebowa mayiga ku mukolo ogwebyafaayobukya bwakabaka buddawo mu 1993 mayiga yasoose okukolebwako emikolo gyennono nga gino ku bapookino abasatu abakafuga budduomukolo gwokutuuza pokino gwabaddewo ku lwokusatu ku kitebe disitulikiti byonnakabaka yasiima mayiga okudda mu bigere bya charles kiyimba kwewaaya abadde pookino wa buddu ngono yadda mu bigere bya fredrick mulindwa walukejje eyasooka okubeera pokino ngobwakabaka buddiziddwaawo mu 1993haji ssekimpi bwe yabadde atuuza pookino yayambiddwaako minisita wa gavumenti ezebitundu e mmengo noah kiyimba  eyakiikiridde ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti ye mmengo david mpangayakwasiddwa ebintu byanaakozesa okukulembera buddu omwabadde omuggo gwobwapokino omutongole effumu  nengabomu kwogera kwa pookino eri bannabuddu  yalumbye abakulembeze ba disitulikiti ye masaka abakulemberwa ssentebe joseph kalungi  olwokulemwa okuva mu bizimbe byembuga yessaza e masaka ne batuuka nokumulengezza ne bamufunira akakuubo mbu waba ateeka ofiisi kye yagaanyipookino yategeezezza nti ekifo kye baamuwadde era we baakoledde omukolo baakiteeseteese mu kiro kyokka ate ne bakissaako kkufulu okutuusa ku makya ngomukolo ke gwawedde kitegeeza nti ofiisi bagenda kugyeddizayaloopedde katikkiro ababbi bettaka ate nga bakungu ba kabaka abakulu abeekulubeeseza ku ofiisi ya buganda land board eyassibwa e masaka nategeeza nti bano agenda kulwana nabo kuba kutongoza okuzimba bbugwe wamasiro e kasubissaabasajja kabaka awangaale nga nenkumbi ku mugongooyimba otya ekitiibwa kya buganda nga tolina na mmere gyolya mayiga ngakunga abantu be kyaggweabantu ba buganda tukolere wamu amaanyi ga buganda gali mu buli muntu ssekinnoomunze nja kukola namaanyi gange gonna era sijja kubaswaza mayiga ngali e bugereremu mulembe omutebi tetwagala basosola mu mawanganze kabaka bwe yampa ddamula abanyankole be baasooka okunkolera akabaganze oyo atawaanya nnamunswa gwe nnyambalira mayiga ku bukedde ffa mma          omwaka mulamba ogwa katikkiro mayigaomutaka kisekka ddungu atabukidde abataka abakulu abamasiga emituba ennyiriri nempya mu kika kyempologoma abataagala kukola mirimu egyabakwasibwa nagamba nti bwe baba balowooleza mu kulya biyungula bya nnyama nga beerabidde okulambika abazzukulu ssi waakukolagana nabomu kiseera kye kimu kisekka awadde amagezi abazzukulu ba ssebuganda okuddayo ku nnono batuukirize emikolo bakadde baabwe gye baakolanga gye yagambye nti bangi bagiragajjalira nga balowooza gya sitaani ne beesubya emikisa  kisekka yabadde abuulirira abaana nabazzukulu ba baliita nga bano yabakungaanyizza mu nsiisira yomukulu wekika eyabadde emutegekeddwa mu kwabya olumbe lwa ruth najjuuko olwabadde ku kyalo  kittanswa e ssingo ku lwomukaaga          omutaka wempologoma atabukidde abakulu bamasigabya akaseko ku matama          bafaaza mu kampala bawadde ettoffaali lya bukadde 12 katikkiro wa buganda peter mayiga yasiimye abaganda mu ankole  olwokusalawo okujjukira  obujjajja bwabwe gye bava ogwakoleddwa isaac ssemuwemba bwe yabadde ayingira enju ye okufumbiza  bawala be babiri nokuyozaayoza abaana be basatu ne mutowe okumaliriza emisomo mu matendekero agenjawulo  ku lwomukaga lwa wiiki joseph musisi bwakoodo bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti ebbula lyebikozesebwa ebimu nalyo libatataaganyaamu bwe baba bakola emirimu gyabwe kyokka nategeeza nti mu kiseera kino katikkiro aliko ensimbi ze nga  robert lusambya bwe yagula ettaka lino era nga bbo abebyokwerinda balina okumuwa obukuumi ngalina kyayagala okukolera ku ttaka lye nti wabula tebannamanya ddi lusambya lwe yeetaaga kukulaakulanya  kifo kye nti era bwekirituuka abaliriko bajja kutegeezebwalusambya mutabani womu ku bakuuma ettaka lya mujaguzo ayitibwa simon kafumbirwango   kigambibwa nti yatunda ekitundu ku ttaka lya mujaguzo ku ntandikwa ya 2012 amayumba agasoba mu 150 ne gamenyebwa nga ne mu 2013 era bakanyama abaali bakulembeddwamu eyali omubaka wa pulezidenti mu kampala bajja ne batandika okukoona ennyumba ezaasigala wabula abatuuze ne  babalemesakafumbirwango yategeezezza nti mutabani we yatwala ebiwandiiko byettaka lino namubuzaabuza ngamulimbye nti agenda kufuna mulimu namuteerako  omukono nga tategedde nti yali atunda ttakarobert lusambya eyatunda ettaka lya mujaguzo yategeezezza nti alina ebiwandiiko byonna ebimuwa olukusa okutunda ettaka lye nga byateekebwako emikono okuva e mmengo nti era yafunye nebbaluwa za kkooti ezimukkiriza okukulaakulanya ekifo  kinokkooti ya kisekwa etandise namaanyi okuwulira omusango gwokuboolebwa kwabamu ku bazzukulu mu kika kyempeewo bwegaanyi abawaabi kalyankoloabawaabi mutuwadde obujulizi bungi omuli nobulaga nga ssekabaka daudi chwa bwe yamala okusala omusango gwekika kyammwe kyokka nagamba nti ssinga yamanya nti kitaawe ssekabaka mwanga ii yagusala dda teyandizzeemu kugusala bino tetugenda kubitunuulira ekikulu kye tuzze okuwulira gwe musango gwa bazzukulu bowessiga kalyankolo mwe balumiririza omutaka paul mbazzi kiggye okubaboola nti baagusala ddamutabani wowessiga lya kalyankolo asigaddewo yekka omutaka thomas bbwaddene kisawuzi yawawaabira omutaka paul mbazzi kiggye omukulu wekika kyempeewo ku musango oguli ku fayiro kd12013 ssaabasajja yagenderedde okulaba ngalondoola emirimu egikolebwa mu masaza nabaami ku mitendera egyenjawulo okumusisinkana ne bamutegeeza entambula yemirimu gyabwe eyo mu bitundu bye bakulemberabangi kumusisinkanga ngeno bwe twekubamu tooci mu buweereza bwaffe mu mirimu gye yatukwasa minisita kawuki bwe yategeezezzaobwakabaka bulina ennaku ezenjawulo okujagulizibwa entambula yemirimu egyenjawulo nekigendererwa kyokukuuza bugandaku nnaku zino kuliko bulungibwansi ebyobulamu abavubuka ebyobulambuzi ngennaku zino zikozesebwa okukuba tooci mu ntambula yebitongole ebyossebo minisita ssebwana ssengendo bwe yategeezezzassebwana kiberu kisiriiza amyukibwa aloyzius ssemmanda ne fredrick kabuye musisi bonna abeyamye okukola nomutima gunossebwana kiberu kisiriiza amyukibwa aloyzius ssemmanda ne fredrick kabuye musisi          kabaka asiimye okutondawo olunaku lwa gavumenti ezebitundubya lilian nalubegakkooti enkulu e nakawa eragidde omutaka omukulu wekika kyengeye joseph kabaalu aweeyo kabaalukabaalu ye katikkiro wekika kyengeye kyokka nga mu kiseera kino yakola nga kasujjakigambibwa endagaano yomugenzi yunia nanfuka yagiggya ku paulin nankya eyali abikuumakigambibwa nti nanfuka yafa mu mwaka gwa 2009 era ngekiraamo kye nendagaano yali abikwasizza muzzukulu we paulin nankya eyabikuumira ebbangamu kiseera kyokwabya olumbe nti kabaalu akuuma entebe yobwa kasujja yayisa ebirango ngayita omuntu alina ekiraamo kyomugenzi nebintu bye ebirala abimuwe era nankya kye yakola nabimuwa nga yeerimbise mu kugamba nti kuno kwe yali agenda okusinziira alage olunaku olutuufu olwokwabizaako olumbekigambibwa nti ebimu ku bintu byomugenzi bya bulaankanyizibwa nga kino kye kyawaliriza michael kiseegerwa  omu ku baaliwo nga nankya akwasa omutaka kabaalu ekiraamu nebirala okuyita mu balooya be aba godfrey and mulumba co advocates nakuba mu mbuga omutaka nga baagala akomyewo endagaano zomufu nekiraamo bye baamuwa kyokka nga abyegaana          kkooti etabukidde omukulu wekika kyengeye ku kiraamobya rogers kibirige kyamufumba wa kabaka akwata engabo emanyiddwa kaamaanyi aziikiddwa wakati mu kwaziranassaalongo ignatius ssebalamu abadde omutuuze we wampeewo kasangati yaziikiddwa ku biggya bya bajjajjaabe e busambu mu disitulikiti ye luweerossaalongo ssebalamu ava mu kika kyembogo abadde kyamufumba akwata engabo kaamaanyi erabika ku mikolo gya kabaka okumala kyamufumba ngalina kuba wa kika kya mbogofredrick ssentamu agamba nti omugenzi ssebalamu obuvunaanyizibwa buno bwamukwasibwa mu 1993 era nga ye yakola omukolo gwokukwasa kabaka engabo eno ngatikkirwa e naggalabibuddookukwata engabo kyamaanyi kwatandikira ku mulembe gwa ssekabaka ssuuna ii musajjawe kyamufumba eyali yeddira embogo ngali mu ggye bwe yakulemberamu banne ne bawangula olutabaalo era okutambulamukino baakituuseeko oluvannyuma lwa katikkiro charles peter mayiga okusisinkana sipiika wa palamenti yamawanga gobuvanjuba bwa afrika margaret nantongo zziwa  namugamba nti federo zeeyogerako tezitaliziddwa kubanga gugendereddwamu okuleeta abantu bekitundu kino okwekulaakulanyamu kwogera  ku nsonga eno munnamateeka peter muliira  eyaliko minisita e mmengo yannyonnyodde nti eyawamu kyalambikibwaokugeza mu ndagaano ya 1900 akatundu akokusatu kagamba nti buganda ejja kubeera pulovinsi ekulirwa kabaka ekola ku nsonga zaayo mu uganda eyawamuate mu katundu 11 yaweebwa bwa afrikayannyonnyodde nti buganda kyerina okukolako mu bwangu kwe kukola ssemateeka waayo agattibwe ku ssemateeka wa uganda olwo federo gye yettanira etandike okukola nti kyokka singa kino balimbaobukulembeze okuva mu maka okutuuka ku katikkiro ne kabaka emitendera egyo gyonna giri ku musingi gwa federo amasaza nebika bwe bityofedero kigambo kyagandawazibwa okutegeeza enkola abantu mwe beegattira okukola ku nsonga zaabweensonga yokugatta amawanga gobuvanjuba bwa afrika yatandika dda mu 1924 ku mulembe gwa ssekabaka daudi chwa ii kyokka buganda negyekengera negigaana oluvannyuma board  blb omukungu kyewalabye male  agambye nti abaami ba kabaka  be bavunaanyizibwa ku ttaka lya kabaka neddala lyonna eryaddizibwa mmengo  nalabula  nti abanaakolagana ne lc  okugula  ebibanja  ku ttaka lino  nokubakolera endagaano  banaaba  baguze mpewoyagambye nti  buganda land board egenda kuwaayo ebiwandiiko ebitongole  eri abaami kwe baneesigama okukola ku nsonga zettaka lino mu bitundu byabwe  kyokka nabalabula nti aneenyigira mu mivuyo gyokulitunda oba  okusaba ekkanzu mu ngeri eyamancoolo wa kugobwa noluvannyumma avunaanibweyagambye nti ebbaluwa eneetongoza abali ku ttaka lino bya kabaka lubega mutunzi  yabyogedde alambula ettaka lyembuga ye butambala mu nteekateeka gyakoze okutalaaga amasaza gonna yeetegereze  embeera eriwo ku ttaka erigwa mu kiti kino nebizibu ebiriwoomulimu gwammwe kukuuma ttaka lino nokulondola  emivuyo egiriwo  mu bitutegeeze bikolebweko mu mateeka so si kulitunda wadde okusala emisangoabebibanja temubagoba wabula mubawandiike  mu ngeri  entongole basasule ekkanzu nemisoso emirala ssente  zigende mu ggwanika male bwe yagasseeko nakubiriza abamasaza ababadde  bataddewo enkiiko ezikola ku ttaka  lino  baziggyewo  kuba  buno buvunaanyizibwa bwa buganda land boardomukungu yayogedde ku  baafuna liizi ku ttaka lya kabaka  nga bayitira mu gavumenti eya wakati nagamba nti si baakugobwa wabula  omutemwa  gwe balina okusasula buli mwaka oba okuzizza obuggya balina kuzisasula mmengomu lukiiko olwetabiddwaamu owessaza katambala  nabamagombolola  mu ssaza linomale yabasiimye okusimba  muwogo nolusuku  ku ttaka lyembuga nakubiriza abaami abalala babalabirekokatikkiro webyalo lubega mutunzi yalombojjedde aba blb emivuyo egyetobese ku ttaka lya kabaka mu masaza namagombolola  nagamba nti lingi litundiddwa  ate awalala abantu balyewangamizzaako ku kifuba ekikosa obwakabakaye katambala hajji twaha lwanyaga yasiimye mmengo okulungamya enkola ku ttaka lya  kabaka  kuba  ebawadde omugabo          akulira ekitongole kya buganda land board atangaazizza ku byettaka lya buganda mu masazaakulira akakiiko  kabaka ke yalonda okulondoola ettaka lya buganda   apolo makubuya asabye gavumenti eteeke mu nkola ekisuubizo kyayo ekyokuddiza buganda ebintu byayoolukalala lwebintu byonna buganda byebanja gavumenti twalugiwa omwaka oguwedde kati kye tulize lwe lunaku  lwe banaatuyita batuddize ebyaffe makubuya bwe yagambyeyagasseeko nti akakiiko akakola ku byettaka akakulirwa baguma isoke ke kaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa okulaba nga bafukuuza ebyapa byonna ebya buganda we biri bizzibwe e mmengo ngendagaano  pulezidenti museveni gye yakola ne mmengo bwegambamakubuya yagambye nti talina kutya kwonna nti gavumenti tejja kuzza bintu bya buganda naye asuubira nti ekirwisizzaawo okussa mu nkola ebintu bino gyemitendera egiri mu kakiiko  ka gavumenti akakola ku byettakamakubuya agambye nti  olukalala lwebintu bya buganda  lwe twatwalirira gavumenti mwalimu ebimu  ku bintu binoabali ku kakiiko kano akakiiko akalondoola ebintu bya buganda kuliko omulangira david wasajja apolo makubuya ben matovu ne william nagaggaakulira olikiiko  olufuga ettaka  baguma isoke yategeezezza nti olukiiko lwakulemberwa lwamaze okulayizibwa wiiki ewedde era lugenda kutandikira ku bya mmengo byerudde ngebanja gavumenti ebikwase ababivunaanyizibwakoyagambye nti omulimu gwe gwakubikwasa lukiiko olwalondebwa gavumenti          mmengo esoomoozezza gavumenti ereme kutambula kasoobo mu kuzza ebyaffewabaddewo katemba mu maka gomugenzi euliya nakyembe e kajjansi omutaka wilson ndawula ssebuganda nnamuguzi omukulu wekika kyempologoma bwalagidde abakungu ku lukiiko lwekika kino ne bakwata olumbe lwe baabadde basuzeemu nga baagala okulwabya kyokka nga tebayise mu mitendera egirina okugobererwassebuganda nnamuguzi yalagidde katikkiro wekika kye mpologoma kisekka ddungu nomuwandiisi wolukiiko lwekika sserwadda ssempiri abaakedde mu bunyonyi ne basanga abaasuze mu lumbe nga beteekateeka okufulumya olumbe ne babagaana okubaako kye bakola era ne balagira abaabadde balwetabye mu okulwamukaekituleese wano kukwata lumbe luno kubanga temwaweebwa lukusa kulwabya ate ssebuganda ebbanga lyonna abadde abayita abawabule nokubagatta ngasinziira ku butakkaanya bwe mulina ne mugaanaolumbe terugenda kwabizibwa era mulina okujjulula buli kye mubadde mutegese okukola katikkiro wempologoma kisekka ddungu bwe yagambye abaabadde mu lumbeebyokutuswaza ngekika nga mukola emikolo egyandibadde giyisibwa mu ngeri yobuwangwa mmwe ne mukola bye mwagala tetujja kubikkiriza era nababadde balowooza okukola mu ngeri ngeno tetujja kubakkiriza omutaka ddungu bwe yagambyebino byabaddewo ku lwomukaaga ku makyakatikkiro wekika yasooka nayita akuuma essiga lya ndawula lukanga mu kika kye mpologoma edward wasajja nga ye yabadde akulembeddemu abazzukulu be okwabya olumbe lwa euliya nakyembe ne yeerema era namusindikira omukungu ku lukiiko lwekika jbntale agonjoole ensonga zaabwe kyokka era ne bagaana okumuwulirizabano era basuubiza nga bwe baali abokusisinkana ntale bamalirize ensonga nga tebannasula mu lumbe kyokka ne batakikola ekyawalirizza ssebuganda okulagira ne lukwatibwa era bye baabadde bategese okulya nokunywa ne babirya awatali kussaako musikabo bazzukulu ba nakyembe abaali batwaala okwemulugunya kwabwe eri katikkiro wekika kye mpologoma nga bano abamu baali ba mwana we omuwala baasanyukidde okuyimiriza okwabya olumbe lwa jajjabawe nga bagamba nti bano babadde baagala kubanyagulula bintu bya mugenzi era nga nobuvuyo obusinga baabutadde ku jjajaabwe owolunyiriri lwa njawampi gwe baagambye nti abadde afukuutirira nnyo ebyokwabya olumbe luno asobole okukola emivuyo nga gyazze akola mu nnyimbe endala omuli nokwegabira ku bintu byabafu baba ayimbidde ennyimbeomutaka kisekka ddungu yalabudde nti kino ekiseera bagenda kutereeza nzirukanya ya kika nokulambika ennono nobuwangwa bwa buganda obutuufu era nti tebagenda kukkiriza kuswazibwa bazzukulu nga bakola ebintu ebikontana nennono za bugandakatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga leero lwalambula abaganda abali mu bitundu bya ankoleahmed kateregga ne ali wasswa balaze ebyafaayo byabwe mu kitundu kino gye bagenze mu maaso nokubunyisa ekitiibwa kya bugandaankole kye kimu ku bitundu bya uganda ebyasengwamu abaganda abangi okumala emyaka nebisiibomu kubala abantu okwa 1991 disitulikiti ye mbarara yokka eyali tennaba kusalwako isingiro ibanda ne kiruhura yalimu abaganda 100000ekimu ku bitundu ebisingamu abaganda abangi lyessaza lye bukanga mu disitulikiti ye isingirolino lya muliraano ne kooki era abaganda bangi okuva e kooki abalirimiramu okulirundiramu awamu nokulisuubuliramumu bano mwe muli ne nnaggagga gordon wavamunno owa spear motors dr asumani lukwago omuwandiisi kumuttakyokka bo ne beetulinkiriza ne bamutta natandika okubayigga nabenganda zaabwe nabo abatte ne bagenda nga bakunta bukunsi okukkakkana nga batuuse e bunyaruguru na kati gye bakyaliomu ku baakwasizza katikkiro charles peter mayiga mu kaweefube wokuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubiabaddako be baddukirayo mu ntalo zeddiini ezenkomerero yemyaka gya 1880 nentandikwa ya 1890abasomi abakristu nabasiraamu bwe baagoba kabaka mwanga ii ku bwakabaka ne bassaako kiweewa ate abasiraamu ne bamubagobako naye ne bamuggyako ne bassaako nuuhu kalema abakristu baddukira mu ankolepulezidenti museveni muli ne mutaasa kitaawe wa haji mutaasa kafeerobano basangibwa mu kibuga mbarara nemiriraano ne mu masaza nga isingiro naddala mu kabuga kaberebere ku luguudo oluva e mbarara okugenda e kikagati gye okuyambako ku kuzimba amasirokatikkiro eyabagabudde kacaayi yabakalaatidde okuba abaamazima era abenkanya mu buli kye bakola era nabasiima olwokussa ku bbali ebyobufuzi ne bakolerera okutwala ensi basonze ezamasirobya saul wokulira abakulembeze be kayunga boogedde ku kulambula kwa kabaka ngakabonero akooleka emirembe nokugatta abantu mu bugerere ate ababadde balina ekiruyi ku mutima boogedde bamawanga agenjawulo naye bonna abamanyi ngabantu ba bugandayakubagizza abo bonna abaafiirwa abantu baabwe mu 2009 era nasaasira abaafuna ebizibu ebyenjawulo nokufiirwa ebintu nagamba nti obuganda buli wamu nabo ku nsonga zonnatukubagiza abaafiirwa abantu babwe mu 2009 era tusaasira abaasibwa mu ngeri etali ntuufutulina essuubi nti okufa nokubonaabona bwe kutyo tekujja kuddamu bwe yaggumizzayasoose kutegeeza nti bugerere okuva mu 1920 muzze musengamu abantu abamawanga agenjawulo kati emyaka 1000 kyokka bonna boogera olulimi lumuyakuutidde abazadde okuwuliriza abavubuka era nabaana bawulirize abazadde kye babagamba kubanga ekiseera kiwanvu bakizudde ngolumu ekivaako obuzibu buba butawuliziganyayagambye nti abantu bakozesa amaanyi mangi nga bakola ebyabwe okusinga bwe kibeera nga bakozesebwabwe kityo amaanyi agakozesebwa ngabantu basonda ssente ezokwanjula nokukola embaga bagakozese okusonda ssente ezokutandikawo emirimuwabula enjawulo gye babeera bateekawo kabaka ategeka okugenda okulambula essaza lye erye bugerere olwaleero ebintu bye yaleka akoze nokutongoza mu october 2008 lwe yasemba okubaayo bingi byazingamamu bintu bye yali atongozza mwalimu ekifo kyokuzimbamu amakolero kyokka olwebizibu ebibaddewo ekifo kyalekebwawo ngera kibadde kiduumuseemu nsiko mpozzi nawamu okusimbwawo omusiri gwa muwogorobinah magezi akulira abakyala mu buganda kabaka yali atera okukyala mu bugerere era ngokuva lwe yatuula ku nnamulondo okutuuka mu 2008 yali yaakalambula bugerere emirundi egisoba mu esatussaabasajja yatwagala ngatulambula kumpi buli mwaka  ate nga buli lwajja waliwo ekintu ekiyamba abantu okwekulaakulanya kyatongoza gamba ngamasomero amalwaliro amakolero ebifo byobulambuzi nokuwabula abalimi nebiralakkanisa yabadiventi e bukolooto kabaka gyagenda okutongozzawadde ngemirundi egisinga yaggyanga nalambula olunaku lumu mu 2002 yajja natulambula okumala ennaku ssatu okuva nga october 20  22 nasimba nejjinja ku ssaza e ntenjeru awazimbiddwa olubiri lweku mulundi gwe yasembayo okujja mu bugerere   yatandika na kugema baana ku ddwaaliro e kayunga bwe yava wano nasimba ejjinja mu kifo awaalina okuzimbibwa amakolero mu ssaza lye bugerere e tente wabula olwembeera yokusika omuguwa ebaddewo tewali kyali kikoleddwa mu kifo kinobwe yava wano yalambula abalimi natongoza ekifo kya kayonza resource center ekya mukyala margaret mbaziira nemirimu gye emirala naddala egyokulunda ebyennyanja e bukeerere noluvannyuma natongoza amasomero nakyessa ss ne nnaalinnya irene ndagire ss ne nakyessa health center ii e nakyessa we yayogerera eri obugandaabatuuze bangi bakkaatiriza nti ebbanga lino we wabeereddewo okusika omuguwa ku kukyala kwa kabaka bafiiriddwa bingimagezi yategeezezza nti ssaabasajja yakubirizanga abantu bonna okuba abakozi ennyo okulwanyisa obwavu nokukuuma obuwangwa bwabwe okusobola okuggya buganda ne uganda mu nvuba yobwavuejjinja awali akasale akeetooloovu  mu kifo kabaka kye yatongoza okuzimba  amakoleroomutaka ssemakula katende yagasseeko nti wadde abaddewo enfunda zonna kabaka zazze alambula bugerere omulundi guno akakasa abantu bagenda kuba basanyufu lwa nsonga nti ebbanga libadde ddene so ngate wabaddewo nokusika omuguwa ku wa essaza gye ligwaokuva ku mulundi kabaka lwe yasemba okulambula bugerere tubadde ngabaasalwa ku bugandaku bibaddewo ngoyinza okulowooza nti bwobuuka omugga ssezzibwa oba ozze mu ggwanga ddala olwensonga nti amawulire nensonga ezisinga okuva e mmengo tubadde tetukyabifunankakasa nti okukyala kwa kabaka kwa kwongera okunyweza obumu mu bantu be nenkolagana namawanga amalala kuba abantu naddala abavubuka abaali abato lwe yasembayo okulambula bugerere babadde bamwebuuza katende bwe yakkaatirizzaye nnaalongo mukyaya  yategeezezza nti bugerere babadde basigalidde nnyo emabega mu byenkulaakulana kuba abantu bawuliriza nnyo kabaka ngayogedde era mu kiseera we yalambuliranga bugerere abantu baali  beeyongedde okuba abakozi nga nemmere etundibwa yeeyongedde          ebintu ebizingamye e bugerere  bukya kabaka asemba kugendayoabakulembeze babanyala bakakasizza nti tebalina mutawaana gwonna na kabaka kulambula essaza lye erye  bugerereomwogezi wobwassabanyala james rwebikire yagambye nti endagaano pulezidenti museveni gye yassaako omukono ne kabaka wa buganda yamalawo embiranye yonna eyaliwo wakati wabanyala nobwakabaka bwa bugandayagambye nti abantu be bugerere balindirira kimu kwaniriza kabaka wa buganda olwaleero  yonna gyagenda okuyitawabula yalaze okunnyolwa olwokuba nti  abantu ssabanyala bakola nabo tebaayitiddwa mu butongole nti kyokka ekyo tekijja kulobera mikolo kugenda mu maaso nga bwe gyatekegeddwarwebikire yatangaazizza nti ekyo ate tekitegeeza nti abanyala tebawagira mirimu gikolebwa obwakabaka bwa buganda nayongerako nti bali mabega wa nteeketeeka zonna ezokwekulaakulanya eziwagirwa obwakabaka bwa buganda era bawagira okulambula kwa kabaka mu bugereretusaba gavumenti nti nga kabaka okulambula bugerere ekyalambikibwa mu ndagaano ya pulezidenti nobwakabaka  bwe kituukiriziddwa nebirala bituukirizibwe omuli okuddiza ssabasanyala embuga okuli eye ntenjeru bbaale kangulumira ne kayunga rwebikire bwe yayongeddekoyasekeredde abalowooza nti abanyala ne mengo bakyalina okusika omuguwa natangaaza nti ebyo byasigala mu ndowooza zabantu mpozzi ne bannakigwanyizi abaliko bye baali bafuna ngenjuyi zombi zirwanaganayagambye nti obweraliikirivu bwe balina bwe bwabantu abanajja ne kabaka abalowooza nti bajja kukola effujjo mu ngeri eyokwesasuza kwebyo ebyaliwo mu 2009 nasaba poliisi eyongere amaanyi mu byokwerinda          kabaka e bugerere beene tumusanyukidde  kimezeminisita webyamawulire e mmengo dennis walusimbi agambye nti ensonga enkulu eyokulambula kwa kabaka mutebi ii mu ssaza lye bugerere gye yakoma okulambula emyaka etaano emabega nti kwakutabaganya bantu be mu kitundu kinowalusimbi yategeezezza nti ensonga endala egendereddwa mu kulambula kwe bugerere kwe kutumbula enkulaakulana mu bantu bekitundu kinoyagambye nti kino kyeyolekera ku mirimu egyenjawulo gyagenda okukolayo omuli okulambula abalimi abenjawulo okuli fred mugalula alina faamu yebisolo okulambula ensuku emmerezo zemmwaanyi nebitooke nga zigendereddwaamu okuddamu okuyitimusa obulimi mu kitundu kinowabula walusimbi yasabye abantu okwewala okukozesa olulimi olukambwe era oluvvoola kubanga bangi bawuliddwa nga bagamba nti bagenda bugerere kuwamba nokukomyawo essaza linonsaba abantu baffe okubeera abakkakamu mu kulambula kuno baleme kukozesa lulimi lunaaleetawo mbeera ya bunkenke na kulwanagana mu bantu baffe walusimbi bwe yawabudde kubanga abeesunga okugenda e bugerere nebigendererwa ebikambwemu mwoyo gwokutabaganya kabaka waakusisinkana abantu abenjawulo e bugerere era nga yakoleddwa nenteekateeka okusisinkana abakenyi abamu ku bantu abasangibwa mu kitundu kinoku nsonga ya maj baker kimeze atwala abanyala walusimbi yannyonnyodde nti ono naye muntu wa kabaka nga tewali muntu agaanibwa kwetaba ku mikolo gya kabaka nga kimeze bwanaabeera ayagadde okubeera ku mikolo gino tewali buzibuakulira ebikwekweto mu poliisi grace turyagumanawe eyali ku ssezibwa okugaana katikkiro walusimbi okuyingira bugerere mu 2009 yategeezezza nti ku mulundi guli yayagala waleme kubaawo buzibu wakati wenjuyi ezaali zisika omuguwapoliisi erabudde abantu abagenda okwetaba ku mikolo gya kabaka ngalambula bugerere nti tegenda kugumiikiriza bamenyi bamateeka nabaneetabamu okukola effujjo nti kubanga bino biseera bya butujju poliisi mwerina okukolera ogwayo nobwegenderezaavunaanyizibwa ku bikwekweto mu poliisi grace turyagumanawe agambye nti ebyokwerinda mu kulambula kwa kabaka e bugerere bigenda kukulirwa akulira poliisi yennyini gen kale kayihura era nga baakuteekayo abaserikale abamala olwokukuuma emirembetetujja kukolera ku kyabantu okuba nti bagenda kusanyuka kulya na kunywa olwokuba balabye kabaka olwo ffe tuleme okukola ogwaffetugenda kukola mulimu gwaffe mu bujjuvu era tetugenda kugumiikiriza ba ffujjo turyagumanwe bwe yagambyebino yabyogeredde mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire olwayitiddwa minisita webyamawulire nolukiiko e mmengo denis walusimbi olwatudde ku bulange e mmengo ku lwokuna era nga luno lwetabiddwaamu nomwogezi wa poliisi judith nabakooba nakulira amagye ga kabaka lt musaazi lutwamaminisita ssengendo ayanjudde anteekateeka eyennaku essatu mu bujjuvu nga kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii waakutuuka ku mmande nga january 27 2014 asookere ku ddwaaliro e kayunga oluvannyuma alambule olusuku lwe ku mbuga yessaza lino wagenda okusisinkana abantu abenjawuloku lunaku lwe lumu agenda kutongoza sitoowa omuterekebwa emmere ngeri wa musajja we nsamba kumaama e nakyesaajja kulambula abalimi nokusimba emiti noluvannyuma ayogereko eri obuganda ku mbuga yeggombolola e bbaaleku lwokubiri waakutandikira ku misiri gyemmwaanyi nemiti ku ggombolola e busaana okugema abaana ku ddwaaliro lya bukambo hc ii ekyemisana kyakukwatirwa e nazigo mu kigokabaka ajja kulambula ffaamu yennaanansi ewa bashir ziraba ate oluvannyuma ayogereko eri obuganda ku mbuga yeggombolola e kangulumiraku lwokusatu ajja omulangiraerinnya mbogo kkulu nnyo mu bwakabaka bwa bugandannannyini lyo  muntu wa byafaayo  mu buganda kyokka erinnya libadde lisuuliriddwa abomulembe gunonuhu kyabasinga mbogo gwe yabbuddwaamu yagasseeko  nti baasazeewo okubbula mu mwana wa wasajja olwokujjukkira  omulangira nuhu kyabasinga mbogo eyali omusajja omukulembeze era omuntu owekitiibwa mu buganda nagamba nti baayagadde erinnya mbogo okusigala nga balikuuma  nabomulembe oguliddako balisangewoerinnya edward nnaalinya nassolo yagambye nti lyavuga nnyo  kubanga nnannyini lyo sir edward muteesa ii yomu ku ssebakaba ba buganda abaali abettutumumaj gen sir edward frederick william david walugembe mutebi luwangula mutesa ii ye yali kabaka wa buganda owa 35 nga yafuga wakati wa  1939 ne 1969ye kitaawe wa kabaka ronald mutebi iinnaalinya nassolo nomulangira wassajja be bamu ku baana ba sekabaka muteesa iiomulangira wasajja nomuzaana nankya ku mbaga yaabwewasajja ayogedde omulangira wasajja yagambye nti kabaka mutebi yaleeta essuula empya eyokutuuma abalangira nabambejja amannya agebyafaayo nga ssangalyambogo ssemakookiro namalalaerinnya mbogo bwe lyaweereddwa omulangira okuva mu bassenga be nnalisanyukidde nnyo wassajja bwe yagambye naliwaana nti linnya  lya byafaayo  mu buganda  ate lya  buvunaanyizibwamustafa mutyaba omu ku bawandiisi webyafaayo mu buganda era nga yaliko minisita e mmengoennyumba ya mbogo yekyasigaddewo   mu nnyumba  ezebyafaayo  mu bugandambogo yazimba ennyumba eyo gye mulaba e kibuli mu 1892 na kati ekyaliwo  mu mbeera eyeegombesayategeezezza nti  mbogo yali musajja mufuzi owekitiibwa ngasitula buli munene yenna  nagamba nti ne captlugard  yeesitulanga nagenda ewa mbogo buli lwe yabanga nensongaabakulembeze ba uganda  bonna babadde bajja beesitula ne bagenda  mu nnyumba ya mbogo mutyaba bwe yannyonnyodde ku kitiibwa kya mbogo nagamba nti omulangira okutuumibwa erinnya eryo kabonero akalaga obukulu bwalyo mu bugandabwe yabuuziddwa oba omulangira mbogo asuubirwa okulya obwakabaka ssaabangira kayima yategeezezza nti kizibu nnyo kubanga oyo mulangira wa kanabba si mulangira wa mujaguzoomulangira wa kanabba ye  mwana  omulenzi azaalibwa  omulangira atali kabaka ate omulangira owa mujaguzo ye mwana omulenzi azaalibwa kabakakayima yagambye nti abalangira abalina omukisa okulya obwakabaka be baana ba kabaka abalenzi oba baganda ba kabaka oba bakitaawe ba kabaka  nannyonnyola nti omulangira owa kanabba okufuna omukisa  abalangira aba mujaguzo balina kuba nga bonna baweddewo nolwekyo omulangira mbogo talina mukisa gwa kumpiebifa ku nuhu kyabasinga mbogo1yazaalibwa  mu 1835 nafa  1921 nga wa myaka 86 naziikibwa e kawempembogokitaawe ye yali ssekabaka  suuna ii eyafuga wakati wa 1832  okutuuka 1856nuhu mbogo yomu ku baana 218 ssekabaka ssuuna ii be yazaala mu bakazi 148ebyafaayo biraga nti mbogo ye yalina okulya  obwakabaka nga ssekabaka ssuuna akisizza omukono kyokka nnamulondo  yagirekera muto we muteesa i kubanga ye yali asazeewo  okusoma eddiini yobusiraamu eyaleetebwa abawarabu mu 1844nolwekyo omulangira mbogo yali muganda wa ssekabaka mutesa i  eyali azaala ssekabaka  danieri basammulaekkere mwanga ii mukasaomulangira mbogo yawangangukira e zanzibar mu 1890 olwentalo zeddiini ezaaliwo mu buganda wakati wabasiraamu nabakiristaayo mbogo yakkiriza okudda ku butaka  nabagoberezi  be mu 1892 oluvannyuma lwenteeseganya ne captlugard  eyali akiikirira abazungu abafuzi bamatwalemu ndagaano eno mbogo yakkiriza okubeera wansi wabangereza era nti yali tajja kukaayanira bwakabakaenteseganya za mbogo ne lugard ze zavaako abasiraamu okuweebwa  amasaza asatu busujju ggomba ne butambala basengemu wadde oluvannyuma gomba ne busujju gaabaggyibwako ne basigaza butambalambogo ye yazaala omulangira badru kakungulu wassajja eyamusikira  mu 1921 nga wa myaka 14  gyokka nga jjajja wobusiraamukakungulu yafa mu 1991 nasikirwa omulangira kassim nakibinge kakungulu          omulangira mbogo ayalulwa wiiki eno bamwongere namannyakatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga akyalidde omulangira david wasajja nomuzaana marion nankya mu ddwaaliro lya nakasero nabakulisa okuzaalira obuganda omulangira edward mbogokatikkiro mayiga okugenda mu ddwaaliro yawerekeddwaako omwogezi wobwakabaka dennis walusimbi ssengendo nga yatuuseeyo ku ssaawa 500 ezoku makya natonera omulangira mbogo ekirabo ngakabonero akokumwanirizayagambye nti buganda okutojjera nokugaziwa kwe kufuna omulangira oba omumbejja azaaliddwa era omulangira mbogo lye kkula lyomwaka ne yeebaza katonda okuwa buganda omulangiranjagala okukulisa omulangira wasajja nomuzaana nankya olwokuzaalira obuganda omulangira mbogo era lino lyekkula lyomwaka katonda tumwebaza olwekkula lino katikkiro mayiga bwe yategeezezza bwe yabadde agenze mu ddwaaliro lya nakasero hospital ku mmandeyategeezezza nti omulangira edward mbogo ajja kubeera namannya mangi okwongera kwago ge yabadde amaze okutuumibwa bassenga be ge baamuwaddekatikiro mayiga yagambye nti kabakamutebi nga jjajjaawe ajja kumutuuma erinnya ku lwobugandayannyonnyodde nti erinnya eryatuumiddwa omulangira mbogo ddungi nnyo kuba gwe balibuddemu omulangira nuhu mbogo yali wamaanyi naddala mu kiseera entalo zeddiini bwe zaabalukawo mu buganda bwe yakubiriza nokukunga abagoberezi okukkakana nobutalwanagana ekyaleetawo emirembeye omulangira david wasajja yagambye nti kabaka mutebi yaleeta essuula empya eyokutuuma abalangira nabambejja amannya agebyafaayo nga sangalyambogo ssemakokiro nga naye erinnya mbogo bwe lyaweereddwa omulangiraokuva mu bassenga be yalikkiriza kuba lyabyafaayo ate nga lirina obuvunaanyizibwabya dickson kulumbakatikkiro charles peter mayiga asoomoozezza buli maka okubeeranga nensawo enzibizi okuyambanga okuggya famire mu biseera ebizibu nga kino kyakukomya okulindiriranga abagagga okubayambaamagezi gempa abantu baffe mu buganda buli famire esaanye ebeere ne akawunta buli muntu kwatereka ensimbi ezessalira nga zino zikozesebwa mu biseera byakatyabaga ne mutalindanga bagagga mu famire okuva e kampala bakole ku nsonga famire mweba etubidde mayiga bwe yategeezezzamayiga agamba nti okuzza buganda ku ntikko kulina kutandikira mu maka nga galwana okugoba obwavu kubanga kye kimu ku bisinga okuswaza buganda bwatyo ne yeebaza abantu abafubye okukola okweggya mu bwavu ne bafuuka ekyokulabirako eri abalala nga muno mulimu abagagga ba kwagalanakatikkiro ku kkono ne mutaasa ku ddyookubuulirira kuno katikkiro mayiga yakukoledde ku kijjulo ekyategekeddwa olukiiko olwakwasibwa ii yataddewo akalombolombo nga buli kika omuva namasole okukulemberanga omulimu gwokuzimba olubiri lwe ngeno yensonga lwaki ku mulundi guno abenkima be baakulembeddemu omulimu gunonamasole sarah kisosonkole azaala kabaka mutebi ii  bwe yazaama mu myaka gya 1970 yasikirwa namasole zirimbuga eyazaamye omwaka oguwedde bwatyo nasikirwa margaret siwoza nagawa bonna nga bava mu kika kyenkimanamasole zirimbuga yali atuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwe ngasinziira mu maka gye yafumbirwa kyokka ngentegeka zibaddewo okumuzimbira olubiri lwe bbumbu e kiteezi mu ggombolola ye nangabo mu ssaaza lye kyaddondoolubiri luno twagala omwaka guno okugenda okuggwaako nga luweddelwakuzimbibwa mu ngeri egya mu nnyina kabaka nolwekyo wadde abenkima ffe abakulembeddemu ku mulimu guno naye olubiri e bbumbu gutambuddebya dickson kulumbaomukazi asoose okulya obwa lluweekula aweze nga bwagenda okukola obutaweera okutumbula obumu mu bantu  bomu buweekulaluweekula omuggya immaculate nantaayi kafeero yategeezezza nti eno yensonga gyagenda okutandikirako oluvannyuma lwebbanga okuwera nga waliwo abantu abaagala okwekutula ku buganda badde e bunyoroensonga yabantu abeefunyiridde okukutula essaza lyaffe nti baagala kudda buweekula yemu ku nsonga ze ngenda okutandikirako era ngenda kubayita mu lukiiko tutuule bambuulire kiki ddala kye baagala nantaayi kafeero omukyala yekka eyalidde obwami mu nkyukakyuka kabaka ze yakoze mu baami bamasaza   bwe yategeezezzabuweekula ssaza eriri ku nsalo ya buganda ne bunyoro mu disitulikiti ye mubende era nga musangibwamu abantu bamawanga agenjawulo naye gye buvuddeko waasibukayo abantu abagamba nti banyigirizibwa okuba mu kitundu kino nga bali wansi wa buganda nga mu kiseera kino baagala badde wansi wobukulembeze bwe bunyoronga katikkiro charles peter mayiga ateekateeka okukyalira essaza lino okunonayo ettaffaali luweekula agamba nti kino kye kimu ku byasimbyeko essira          omukyala asoose okulya  obwaluweekula awezeabadde omukuumi wa kabaka owoku lusegere eyawummuzibwa mu kifo kino gye buvuddeko agudde mu bintu kabaka bwamulagidde okukulira abakuumi be abatali ba byambalodavis kibuuka era kabaka yamulagidde nokukulira abasirikale abaazirwanako abegyenkaaga abali mu mbiri ezenjawulo ngobuweereza bwe bwatandise mwezi guweddeomu ku baazirwanako eyasangiddwa mu lubiri yagambye nti kibuuka yatandika okukola nga december 1 2013 era ngebbaluwa eyamuweebwa ngemukakasa ku mulimu guno yamulagira kutandika kukola kwolwokibuuka ye yazziddwa mu kifo kyeyali akulira amagye ga kabaka agatali ga byambalo maj ssenkoma eyafa omwaka oguwedde  era ngokuva lwe yafa ekifo kino kibadde kikalukibuuka naye yawummuzibwa ku kifo kyokuba omukuumi wa kabaka owoku lusegere nalagirwa okukola ku wankaaki wa bulange we yakolera akabanga akatono oluvannyuma nalagirwa agende akolere ku wankaaki wolubiri e mmengo nga kigambibwa nti eno kabaka gye yamusanga namubuuza kye yali akola ku mulyango era nalagirwa atandike okukulira amagye ganokati kibuuka atuula mu ofiisi yomugenzi ssenkoma mu lubiri e mmengo era ngensonda zigamba nti yandibadde yeetuukira butereevu eri kabaka nti kyokka akulira amagye agakuuma kabaka mu kiseera kino musaazi yamutwala era gwasooka okutegeeza ku buli kimu kyaba alina okukolakibuuka ye mukuumi wa kabaka owoku lusegere eyasookera ddala nga yatandika okumuweereza bwe yali tannatuuzibwa ku nnamulondo e naggalabi mu 1993 ekitegeeza nti amaze ebbanga ddene ngaweereza kabakakigambibwa nti ne mu nteekateeka zokutuuza omulangira mutebi kati kabaka ku nnamulondo bwe zaali zikolebwa kibuuka yali omu ku baatambuzanga ebbaluwa ezaayita abagenyi kyokka nga kabaka we yawerezza emyaka 20 ku nnamulondo omwaka oguwedde kibuuka yali amaze okuwummuzibwa mu kifo kino emyezi mitono emabegabo abegyenkaaga baasanyukidde kabaka okusiima nabawa omuntu abategeera nabo gwe bategeera obulungibaategeezezza nti mutendeke akwata buli muntu nga bwaba ali era ateegulumiza          kabaka alonze kibuuka eyawummula okukulira aba leeya abamukuuma bya lilian nalubega ne juliet lukwagonnaabagereka sylvia nagginda asiimye abazadde ababawadde abaana mu kisaakaate ekyomunaanandi musanyufu okulaba ngabazadde batuteekamu obwesige ne batuwa abaanasi mulundi gumu gwokka wabula okuviira ddala ekisaakaate lwe kyatandika mu 2007 mbeebaza olwemirimu gye bakola era mbasaba okwongera lwokubiri bwe yabadde ayigiriza abaana abali mu kisaakaate kinoyasanyuse okulaba nti abaana ebibayigiriziddwa babikutte bulungi nasaba abazadde nti balina okubayambanga nga bakomyewo awaka okulaba nga tebeerabira ebyo ebibasomeseddwa mu kisaakaatemu bintu abaana bye baalaze nnaabagereka ebibasomeseddwa ne babikwata mulimu okuwaata emmere okwekuuma nga bayita mu kukuba kalati okufumba emmere kisaakaate nga bali wakati wemyaka 6 ne 18abaana ku lwomukaaga baakyaddeko ku ssomero lya trinity college e nabbingo ne basiiba mu lusuku lwa nnaabagereka nga bayiga okulima olusuku ate nokwongera okwekenneenya obulombolombo nennono ezigobererwa omuganda mu kulima ensukunakate kikomeko abaana yabalaze engeri gye bakolamu ddole okuva mu mitima gyebitooke nebyayi era nabakubiriza okuba abayiiya kumpi okumalirizibwa nga singa ofuna omukisa noyitako mu kifo kino ekiro kyakayakana olwamataala agateekeddwa ku bbugwe azimbibwa nga gaatandikidde ku ludda oluva e nakulabye okudda e kasubiekyewuunyisa ku bazimbi abakwataganya okuzimba bbugwe ono tekuliiko asussa myaka 30 ngabasinga obungi bali wakati wemyaka 20 ne 30 kyokka bakola omulimu guno nessanyu nokwagalaomulimu bagutambuza ku sipiidi nga kirabika gunaatera okuggwabbugwe ono waakwetooloola amataala yenna singa anaaba awedde kisobozese okwongera ku bukuumi ku masiro nokugalabisa obulungiavunaanyizibwa ku kabaka kyokka nga teyasobola kumalirizibwa wadde nga kabaka gye yalina okukoleramu emikolo ne nakkukaweesa yategeezezza nti ennyumba eno yagenda mu maaso neserekebwa omukyala rose nalumansi kyokka yategeezezzakuliko ennyumba gampwedde etannamalirizibwa ate nga temuli na madirisa na nzigi kyokka nga mwe mwagalamizibwa banakku okuli owa ssekabaka ssuuna ii ne muteesai owa mwanga ii kiweewa kalema ne chwaii owa muteesa ii eyaseerera ku mulembe gwa kabaka ronald muwenda mutebiwaliwo enju yabalongo nekibira kyabalongo ekyasaayibwa abantu kyokka nga kyali kikolebwamu emikolo abekika kyeffumbeyayongeddeko ngekifo kino bwe kitaliiko bbugwe ngabantu bakisaalimbirako nga bwe balabye ekintu ekyobulabe ate nga tekirina na nakku oluvannyuma lwomuwala eyali alondeddwa obutakolebwako mikolo era nga oluvannyuma yagendayasabye mmengo okubakwasizaako okusobola okuzimba embuga eno nga tennasaanawo kuba njulu nnyo eri obwakaba bwa bugandaebbugumu lyeyongedde mu ssaza lye bugerere okukolerassaabawolereza wa gavumenti ya kabaka era minisita wa gavumenti ezeebitundu mu buganda daudi mpanga agamba nti bano balina okutambuza obukulembeze bwabwe nga bagoberera ensonga ssemasonga ettaano obwakabaka ze bwagala okutuukirizaensonga zino kuliko egamba nti kabaka kyekitikkiro kya buganda era obwakabaka okutereera ngali ku nnamulondo kubanga buganda bwakabakaokugabana obuyinza mu nkola ya federo okulongoosa nokutumbula embeera zabantu ba buganda okukuuma nokutaasa ensalo za buganda ettaka nobutonde bwensi ssaako okulaba ngabantu ba buganda bonna bali bumubuganda eyitibwa bwakabaka bwa buganda so si bwa baganda nolwekyo mulina okufuba okulaba ngabantu bekitundu kino bali bumu mufube okulaba nga tewabeera nsonga yonna ebatabulatabula daudi mpanga bwe yafalaasidde abaamiyabasabye okugendera ku njogera yekiganda egamba nti alidde obwaami nagamba nti ayagala okulaba endya enganda eyeesigamanga ku kuleetawo enkyukakyuka mu bitundu wabula si eno eyennaku zino ejjudde obulyakeembeera endala gye balina okukyusa kwe kulaba ngamasaza ku mulundi guno ge gayimirizaawo mmengo nga bwe kyalinga edda kyokka nga kikyuse mu biseera ngobuyambi bwonna obwokutambuza emirimu gyamasaza ngate  buva mmengo nga bwe muli maaso ga kabaka mulina okwettanira okukozesa enkola zempuliziganya empya eziriwo mu nsi nga twagala buli kifa mu masaza okutegeezebwa embuga emirundi ebiri mu wiikilipoota bwetyo ejja kuyamba okutambuza emirimu ngate temuvudde gye mubeera kujja mmengo mpanga bwe yakuutidde abaami banoabaami abaggya basabiddwa okulaba ngenfuga yebitundu enganda nga bwe yateekwateekwa bajjajjaffe ntekyusibwa bagendere kweyo kubanga yakolebwa ngegoberera mitenderamu kino yabasabye obutabuuka mitendera gino mu buweereza okuva ku mutongole okutuuka ku wessaza naye nawuliziganya nabamuli wagguluwiiki ewedde abaami abasukka omusanvu baakwasiddwa obuyinza kyokka ngemikolo gino gyabaddemu katemba okuli abaami abaawummuziddwa obutalabikako okuwaayo obuyinza okumwanirizaomubaka mu lukiiko lwa buganda haji mutaasa kafeero akiikirira abaganda abali mu ankore ne kigezi yagambye nti emikolo gigenda bulungi nga bwe gyategekebwa era teginnaba kwongezebwayo nga 450omulimu ku kuzzaawo  amasiro kutambula bulungi kyokka ngokusomoozebwa kukyali ku wa wanaava essubi eddungi erinaamala omulimu ngenjole ezeetaagisa zisukka 30000ssebo katikkiro omulimu gwamasiro nokuvvoola buganda7 olukungaana lwavumirira enteeseganya ezitaggwa ezitalina kizivaamu ate nga si nnambulukufu wakati wa buganda ne gavumenti eya wakati8 kyasalibwawo okutandika okulondoba kiseera ekyo yingjb walusimbi yalagirwa asabe kabaka asiime okulambula obukulembeze obwensikirano obwenjawulo mu uganda olwokugaziya nokunyweza emikwano gya buganda mu ugandaensonga nnyingi kwezo ezaayogerwako mu ttabamiruka wa 2012 ezikoleddwaako ngezitannaba ziri mu nteekateeka era bwotunuulira endagaano yokuddiza buganda ebyayo buwanguzi bunene kubanga ensonga eno yayogerwako nnyo mu ttabamiruka minisita webyamateeka nobwenkanya mu buganda era ssentebe wolukiiko olutegeka ttabamiruka apollo makubuya bwe yannyonnyodde ku byasalibwawo omwaka oguwedde          ttabamiruka 2013  oyagala buganda engagga mu myaka 20 egijjakatikkiro charles peter mayiga awadde abakungu ba kcca amagezi nti bwe baba baagala okuggyako erias lukwago ku bwa loodi meeya wa kampala bayite mu mateeka nti kubanga go tegalemererwakatikkiro agambye nti emitendera mingi egiyinza okuyitwamu omuntu bwaba ayagala kujulira mu kkooti okusinga okukozesa amaanyi geyagambye agaakozeseddwa nga ba kkansala baggyako lukwago ne balumya ne ba looyaensonga za loodi meeya ezikyankalanyizza ekibuga zisaana zikwatibwe mu mateekalukwago bwabaako ne kyeyeemulugunya oba kyeyandyagadde okugonjoola alina kugenda mu kooti era bwekityo ne ku balala naye okutuuka nokugoba ekiragiro kya kkooti ne bayuliza ne looya engoye ekyo tekiraga buvunanayizibwamulina okukwata ekiragiro kya kkooti bwe muba temumatidde nakyo muddeeyo mu kkooti mujulire okusinga okweyisa mu ngeri enkyamunze nga munnamateeka mbawa amagezi muyite mu mateeka okugonjoola ensonga zekibuga mayiga bweyagambye katikkiro bino yabyogedde bweyabadde ayogera eri nnamungi wabantu eyeeyiye ku bulange e mmengo ku mukolo kwe baasondedde 83376200 ezokuzimba bbugwe wamasiro ngabantu baavudde mu bitundu bya bugnada ebyenjawulo omwabadde nabaana bamasomerokatikkiro yagambye nti nga tugenda mu maaso nokuzimba amasiro mu kampala twetaaga obutebenkevu mu kibuga era buli nsonga tulina okugikwata mu ngeri yamateeka okusobola okugiggusa          katikkiro mayiga avuddeyo ku nsonga za lukwagoomukungu wa kabaka avunaanyizibwa ku kusonda ensimbi  zamasiro ge kasubi mu masaza okuli kyaggwe buvuma ne bugerere agambye nti yeesunga olunaku  kabaka lwanaasiima okulambula ku bantu be abe kayungawilson mukiibi omugagga womu kikuubo agambye nti abe bugerere kati balina essuubi nti bafunye essuubi olwa katikkiro mayiga okugendayonneesunga kabaka lwanakkiriza okutukyalirako mmulambuze abantu be mu bugerere mu kiseera we mbadde nga ntawuka mu kitundu kino nga nteekateeka okukyala kwa katikkiro nkizudde ngabantu balina ennyonta yokulaba ku mutanda mukiibi bwe yagambye oluvannyuma lwomukolo gwokusonda ezamasiro e kayunga wiiki eweddewiiki ewedde katikkiro peter mayiga yayaniriziddwa mu ssanyu e bugerere gye  yabadde agenze okusonda ssente zokuzaawo amassiro era nga yakunganyizza ensimbi ezikunukiriza mu bukaade 60guno gwe gwabadde omulundi ogwasoose okuva katikkiri jb walusimbi lwe bamukomya ku mugga ssezibwa ogwawula kyaggwe ku bugerere gyebuvudeko ekyavaako obwegugungo wanna mu ggwanga obwafiiramu abantu abawerako nabalala ne basibwa e luzira          abe kayunga beesunga kabaka lwalisiima okubalambulabya dickson kulumbaamakampuni agali ku gwokuzimba bbugwe ku masiro e kasubi gaweereddwa nsalessale wokumaliriza omulimu nga december womwaka guno tannaggwaako mu kaweefube wokumaliriza amasiro gonna mu march 2014mu kiseera kino aba design  constructs consults ltd nga be bakola oludda oluva waggulu ku masiro okukkirira mu tawuni ye kasubi baatandise dda okuzimba obusenge ate aba zerah bakutte oluuyi oluva ku muzigiti okukkirira e nakulabye ate uganda builders eva awabadde wasinga okuyiibwa kasasiro ku luuyi lwe nakulabye okudda e kasubibakyali mu kusimba mpagigerald ssentongo owa design  constructs consults agambye nti omulimu gwakwanguwa kuba buli kyetaagisa weekiri ate nabakozi bakola baagalakatikkiro charles peter mayiga asoomoozezza ekitongole kya joint clinical research centre okuva mu nju yobwakatikkiro butikkiro asobole okugikozesa kubanga ebbanga lye bakoleddemu limalabutikkiro gemaka ga katikkiro amatongole kyokka obwakabaka bwe bwaggyibwawo mu 1966 enju eno yatandika okubeeramu abaserikale okutuusa mu 1990 lwe yateekebwamu pulojekiti enoonyereza ku byobulwadde bwa siriimubakatikkiro bonna ku mulembe omutebi babaddenga basula mu maka gaabwe agobwannannyini era mayiga yanaabeera akoze likodi nga katikkiro asoose okusula mu nju eno mu myaka egigenda mu 50butikkiro eri ku plot 893 ring road mu maaso golubiri e mmengo kati ekozesebwa ngawajjanjabirwa abalwadde mu ddwaaliro lya jcrcmayiga agamba nti butikkiro yemu ku byaddizibwa buganda mu 1993 ngobwakabaka buzzibwawo mu mateeka ngeri wamu ne bulange olubiri lwe mmengo nebirala mu tteeka lya traditional rulers restitution of assets and properties statute july 23 1993butikkiro yasigala ngekozesebwa ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku siriimu oluvannyuma lwa ssaabasajja okukiraba ngemirimu egyali gikolerwamu gyali gigasiza wamu abantu kyokka ebbanga lyeryoekirungi nti bannaffe bano baafuna ekifo ekyenkalakkalira ekinene nolwekyo bakole enteekateeka kubanga katikkiro ayagala kubeera mu maka ge amatongoleggwe toyagala kusanga katikkiro mu maka ge agennono mayiga bwe yategeezezzaaba jcrc boogeddeakulira joint clinical research centre polofpeter mugyenyi yagambye nti basanyufu nnyo eri obwakabaka olwobubudamo obubaweereddwa okumala emyaka egisukka mu 20 era enkwatagana weeri ku ngeri yokuzza ekifo kinoaba jcrc baafuna e lubowa ku bugazi obusukka yiika 20 ngekifo kyabwe kyatongozebwa pulezidenti museveni mu 2011mugyenyi yategeezezza nti okusaba kwa katikkiro bakutegeera kyokka ekifo kino kirimu ebyuma ebyokwegendereza ennyo nga byakutwala akaseera okusengulwawaliwo okunoonyereza okukyali mu makkati ekitegeeza nti bwotaataaganya ebyuma mu kiseera kino okunoonyereza kubeera kufuddenaye tujja kugenda mu maaso nenteeseganya nabakungu mu bwakabaka ku nsonga eno kubanga nensonga yabwe erimu eggumba polofensonga endala eyinza okulwisa enteekateeka yokugiwaayo ya kitongole kya jcrc we kyayingirira nga waaliwo enju emu yokka naye kati wazimbiddwaawo ebizimbe ebirala ebikola nga waadimugyenyi tayinza kuwa bbanga lya ssalira we banaaviirawo kyokka yagambye nti si ddene kuba ebintu byabwe ebisinga biri lubowa          katikkiro asitukiddemu okubanja ennyumba butikkiroebika bya buganda birina abazzukulu bangi kyokka ebisinga tebirina bifo bitegeerekeka we bituuza nkiiko okuteesa ku nsonga zaabyo enkulu wadde ofiisi omwokutereka ebiwandiiko ebikuluomusasi waffe kizito musoke ayogedde nabamu ku bakulembeze mu bika bya buganda ebyenjawulo ne bannyonnyola ekikyabalemesezza okuzimba ofiisi zebika byabweabazzukulu baatandika omulimu gwokuzimba ofiisi zekika mu 2005 kyokka na kaakati tezinnamalirizibwa olwebbula lya ssenteomulimu gwonna baagubalirira okumalawo obukadde 135 naye mu kiseera kino bakyetaaga obukadde 85 okumaliriza ofiisi eno etennaba kutungirira wadde okuggalankajja asabye abazzukulu bajjumbire enkiiko zekika buli lwamukaaga olusooka mu mwezi e lugala okuwagira enteekateeka zekikaekitaawuluzi kino baakukikola nga kya mulembe nga kisobola nokupangisibwa abantu ne bakoleramu emikolo ne kyongera ku nnyingiza yekikamu january abenkejje lwe bagenda okuddamu okusisinkana era akubiriza abazzukulu bonna okudduukirira omulimu gunongekika tulina bingi bye tukozeeko era omukulu wekika twamala dda okumugulira emmotokatulina entegeka yokuzimba ofiisi zekika ezomulembe ku butaka nga kuliko nekifo ekinene omuteesezebwa enkiikoomulimu guno gusuubira okuwemmenta obukadde 720 kyokka nga mu kiseera kino twakakungaanya obukadde 45 bwokkakatikkiro yeekokkola bbula lya ssente ezisibye kumpi buli kimuekizibu ekinene ekiri mu bika bya buganda kya bavubuka kwesamba mirimu gya bika wadde nga boogerwako ngabakulembeze benkyaweesanga ngemirimu gyekika ekiramba gitambulira ku bantu ba lubatu ekikuleetera okwebuuza nti ddala bwe balivaawo ekika kirisigala ku ki          enkiiko zebika zituula mu bisiikirize bya mitiababaka ba palamenti basonze obukadde 153 ezokuzzaawo amasirokino kiddiridde katikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga okukyala mu palamenti olwaleero lwakubiri mu kaweefube wokusionda ensimbi zokuzzaawo amasiro gyaweeredde ababaka amagezi nti omuntu akwata ekyokubiri mu kulonda kwobwa pulezidenti akkirizibwenga okukiika obutereevu mu palamenti akulirenga oludda oluvuganyamayiga yagambye nti kino kijja kumalawo okusika omuguwa okubeerawo ku ani alina okukulira oludda oluvuganyayagambye nti akulira oludda oluvuganya lwa mugaso mu kuwabula gavumenti nawa amagezi nti bwe wabaawo ekirungi ekikoleddwa gavumenti naye asaanye okusiimwakatikkiro ngabuuza ku sipiika kadaga mu ofiisi yebino katikkiro eyabadde akyadde ku palamenti okukungaanya ssente zamasiro yabitegeezezza ngali mu ofiisi yakulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti nandala mafabiensimbi obukadde 153 ze zaasondeddwaeno gye yavudde okugenda ewa nnampala wababaka ba nrm justin kasule lumumba gye yasisinkanidde abakulira akabondo ka nrm ne bamukwanga obukadde mukaagaera lumumba gye  yasabidde abakulembeze bennonno ne bannaddiini okuwabulanga ebintu ebiba bitatambudde bulungi nga basisinkana abakungu ba gavumenti mu buntu mu kifo kyokusinziiranga mu mawulireababaka nga banyeenya ku galiba enjolekatikkiro yagambye nti kabaka muzadde era akungaanya abantu bonna wabula nagamba nti ye ngomuntu tayinza kuganya muntu avvoola kabakayasabye aba nrm obuteeyambisa bungi bwabwe mu palamenti okuyisa amateeka aganyigiriza aboludda oluvuganyaminisita amelia kyalbadde ngassa omukono ku ceeke eyaweereddwaayo baminisita ba kabinetiamuddiridde ye deo kiyingi omuwanika wakabondo kababaka ba palamenti abava mu bugandangayogera ku kukyala kwa mayiga  sipiika rebecca kadaga yagambye nti bagenda kunyweza enkolagana ya palamenti ne bugandanagamba nti okukyala kuno kwabadde bwa byafaayo kuba kwe kusoose mu byafaayo bya palamentikatikkiro yagambye nti buvunaanyizibwa bwa palamenti okukuuma ebyobuwangwa bya bannayuganda bonnayayongeddeko nti kabaka ayagala ababaka ba palamenti bakolenga amateeka olwobulungi bwa bannayuganda nga gakuuma obumukatikkiro mayiga ngawandiika mu kitabo kyabagenyi mu ofiisi ya akulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti uganda nnenne nnyo ffene etumala naye tusaanidde okuyiga okuwuliriza abantu ababa balina kye boogera wamu nabo ababaako bye beemulugunya  katikkiro bwe yagambyekyokka yewuunyizza okulaba nga lipooti yokuggya kwamasiro tefulumizibwanga kati emyaka ebiri bukyanga gatetawabula minisita wekikula kyabantu lukia nakadaama yagambye nti akakiiko akabuuliriza ku kuggya kwamasiro gano kaafulumya lipooti netwalibwa mu lukiiko lwa baminisita era enaatera okufulumizibwakatikkiro yasabye abakumbeze okuba namazima nobwesimbuyagambye nti ebizibu bya bannayuganda bifaanaganasipiika rebecca kadaga yagambye nti ebyaliwo mu 1966 ne 1967 ngobwakabaka buggyibwawo bisaanidde okudda ebbaliwano katikkiro mayiga ngayanirizibwa ku palamentioluvannyuma lwokulya ekyemisana katikkiro yagenze mu palamenti natuula mu kifo awatuula abakungu palamenti neyisa ekiteeso ekisiima abakumbeze ba buganda omuli kabaka  ronald mutebi ne bakatikkiro bonna omuli charles peter mayiga nabalala abavaako nga mayanja nkangi dan muliika mulwannyammuli ssemwogerere          ababaka basonze obukadde 150 ezamasiroomulimu gwokuzimba bbugwe ku masiro ge kasubi gugenda mu maaso nga kati abazimbi bamaze okusimba emitayimbwa gyempagi nenkokotomu kiseera kye kimu omuwanika wolukiiko olunoonya ssente zokuzimba bbugwe ono gaster lule ntake agambye nti bakyetaaga ssente zokuzimba kubanga ze baakafuna tezimala kukola mulimu gwegombesantake yagambye nti bagenda kumala yagambyeye emmanuel butebi amyuka akulira akakiiko akazimba bbugwe yategeezezza nti abazimbi abenjawulo be baaweereddwa ogwokuzimba ngabamu baatandikidde nakulabye ate abalala kasubi okusobozesa okugukwataganya amangubbugwe yabalirirwa okumalawo obuwumbi bubiri nga kati baakasondawo obukadde obuli mu 800          empagi za bbugwe wamasiro e kasubi zitandise okusimbibwakatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga leero ali mu mu palamenti gyagenze okusonda ssente zokuzzaawo amasirossentebe wababaka ba buganda godfrey kiwanda yategeezezza nti katikkiro agenda kutuuka ku palamenti ku ssaawa ewa sipiika rebecca kadaga ku ssaawa 600 ezomu tuntuoluvannyuma agenda kutwalibwa ku kyemisana aveeyo agende mu kisenge ekinene ekya palamenti atandike kaweefube wokusonda ssente zokuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubibwanaava eno agenda kugenda mu palamenti ya bonna atuuzibwe mu kifo awatuula abakungu noluvannyuma ekiteeso kyokusiima abantu bonna abalina kye bakoze mu kuzzaawo amasiro kireetebwe mu palamenti kikubaganyizibweko ebirowoozokiwanda yagambye nti guno gwe mulundi ogusoose nga katikkiro akyala mu palamenti ya ugandakyokka yagambye nti palamenti tegenda kwogera ku nsonga za buganda abavubuka okwetegekera ebiseera ebyomu maaso nga beetandikirawo obulimu obutonotono obugya mu kumanya kwabwe bawone okunoonya egyomu ofiisi kati egitakyalabikamu ngeri yemu magulunnyondo asiimye abaatandikawo ekibiina kya baganda nkobazambogo era nasiima polofdan kajumba olwomulimu ogwamaanyi ennyo mu kulambika abavubukangali ku bikujjuko byemyaka 22 ebyekibiina kya nkobazambogo mu lubiri ku lwomukaaga omutanda yagambye nti ekibiina kino kikoze emirimu mingi emirungi omuli okukunga abavubuka okubabangula mu mpisa obuwangwa awamu nennono ssaako okubasomesa obukulembeze enkulaakulana nokwagala eggwanga lyabwe nebirala bingi kyokka nti guno omulembe muzibu nnyo era gwetaaga abantu abayigirize nolwekyo mulina okufuba okusoma ennyo mutandikewo emirimu egyesigamye mu busobozi bwammwe muleme kubeera awo nga mumala obudde mu kunoonya emirimu egitaliiwobeene yagambye nti mu bbanga lino eryemyaka 22 bingi nnyo bye mutuuseeko ngabavubukaolwaleero mututegeezezza nti mwatandikawo sacco gye muyita ssuubi lya zambogo era nga tusuubira nti ejja kuba erimu ku makubo agokweggya mu bwavu era twebaza abo bonna abagitandiseewo nabo bonna abeetabye mu ntegeka zomukolo gunoomutanda yatongozza sacco eno nasala ne keeki okugabula obuganda wakati mu mizira okuva mu bavubuka ba nkobazambogo nabantu abazze ku mukoloabavubuka mukole nnyo awatali kweganyakatikkiro charles peter mayiga yagambye nti abantu basaana okwettanira ennyingo zomulembe guno omupya bakole emirimu gyabwe wakati mu bwerufu okutuuka ku kwesiimayakikkaatirizza nti kabaka okuwa abavubuka omulembe guno kitegeeza nti abalagidde okukola ennyo mu myaka gyabwe okutwala buganda mu maaso era nabasaba okukozesa obuvubuka bwabwe nga tebannakaddiwaye minisita wabavubuka e mmengo henry ssekabembe yategeezezza kabaka nti we yajjira mu bukulembeze nga bangi baagala okutaawuula entalo era wano we yasinzidde nawera eri maasomoogi nti ku mulembe gwe tagenda kuganya bavubuka batalina busobozi kuweebwa buvunaanyizibwa era ne yeeyama nti agenda kusooka kugogola nkiiko ezikola okuweereza abavubuka ateekemu abantu abalina obusobozi era abakozi abatasobola abazze ebbalikyewalabye male akulira ekitongole kya buganda land board era eyakulidde ogwokutegeka omukolo guno yategeezezza nti nkobazambogo kyatandikibwawo ngekyebyobufuzi okulwanirira abayizi abaganda abaali batyoboolwa mu ttendekero ekkulu e makerereyeebazizza bannaabwe nabasomesa abakkiriza okutambulira awamu nabo omwali nabaakuliranga ekisulo kya lumumba gye baatuulanga nga bakyali mu kuyigganyizibwassentebe wabavubuka mu buganda richard kabanda yagambye nti katikkiro mayiga waakukola ku lwabavubuka ba buganda era ne yeebaza kabaka olwokufuula omulembe guno ogwabavubuka          mukozese obuvubuka bwammwe muleme kwejjusa nga  mukaddiye  kabakaabalangira abambejja ne bannaalinnya basabye ssaabalangira yingmoses kayima okwongera okubakumaakuma nokukuuma ekitiibwa kyolulyo olulangiramu lukiiko lwokutabagana olwatudde mu kigango e mmengo wiiki eyaggwa olwetabiddwaamu ssaabalangira kayima abalangira abambejja ne bannaalinnya baategeezezza nga bwe bamaze ebbanga nga balina ensonga ezibalumabaategeezezza nti  enkaayana nokusika omuguwa bifumbekedde mu lulyo olulangira ekituusizza bangi ku bannaabwe okuggweera mu kkooti kyokka ssaabalangira natavaayo kubayambabaategeezezza ngensonga zonna bwe zaava ku kusitukiramu kwe baakola amangu ddala ngamasiro gaakaggya bwe beenyigira mu kuzzaawo bbugwe kyokka ne balemesebwa mu ngeri etaali nnungamumu kubaanukula ssabalangira yategeezezza nti embeera eno yajjawo olweffujjo abantu abenjawulo lye beenyigiramu oluvannyuma lwokuggya kwamasiro ne batuuka ne ku ssa lyokuvvoola olulyo olulangira bwe baakomwakoyagambye nti mu kiseera kino yafuna okusoomoozebwa kungi okwava mu bantu abenjawulo omwali naboolulyo olulangira bennyini bwe baamuwandiikiranga amabaluwa  agatyoboola ekitiibwa kye  ensonga eyamuggya mu mbeeramu lukungaana luno yeetondedde olulyo olulangira olwensobi eno era nasuubiza okulongoosa  nokutondawo enkolagana          abalangira abambejja ne bannaalinya basabye ssaabalangira ayongere okubakumaakumaabatuuze be kasokoso mu kira town council beekubidde enduulu mu palamenti nga baagala eyimirize entegeka za poliisi nekitongole kyebyamayumba ekya national housing corparation okubagobanya okuva ku ttakamu kiseera kyekimu nababaka ba palamenti ku beemulugunyirizza omuduumizi wa poliisi gen kale kayihura nga bagamba nti poliisi eyitirizza obukambwe ngenkola ku nsonga ze kasokoso netuuka nokukuba abaana abato ttiyaggaasiomubaka we wakiso rosemary sseninde yatutte ekiwandiiko kyabatuuze be kasokoso  kiganda ne banda b1 mu palamenti ngagamba nti bagobaganyizibwa okuva ku ttaka ngabamu babaddeko okuva mu myaka gyenkaagasseninde agambye nti abatuuze abamu baagulako ebibanja nabalala ne bagula poloti ku balinako ebibanjaategeezezza nti abatuuze abamu baafuna looni ne bazimbako amayumba nolwekyo okumala gabagobaganya ssi kikolwa kirungibasabye palamenti ebuulirize ku nsonga zino okuzuula nannyini ttaka omutuufu nengeri obusenze gye buzze bukyuka okuva mu myaka gyenkaagaera nga baagala palamenti eyimirize entegeka zokugenda maaso nokubagobaganya okutuusa ngokubuuliriza kuweddeye gen kale kayihura abadde mu kakiiko ka palamenti akalondoola ensasaanya yensimbi zomuwi womusolo ettaka erisinga e kyaggwebanakyaggwe okuva okumpi newala babuze okufa essanyu  kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi bwasiimye nabalambulakobannakyaggwe basimbye ebiyitirirwa mu buli kabuga ssaako okuyonja mu divizoni ye goma mu munisipaali ye mukono ku ssaawa 5 ezoku makya ku ssandeeno yagguddewo mayiro ya bulungibwansi eyoluguudo oluwezaako kiro mmita 7 nga luno abantu ba bulijjo nga bali wamu nomubaka betty nambooze nabakulembeze abalala be beenyigidde mu kulukolanambooze yagambye nti oluguudo luno oluva e nyanja ku luguudo oluva e kayunga okuyita e gayaza ate ne lugatta e bukeerere naye nga lubadde lumaze emyaka nebisiibo okuva mu mwaka gwa 1966 bwe lwabomoka omugga ne guluziba ngabantu babadde basanga obuzibu okusala omuggaabatuuze baalaze essanyu eryensusso okulaba nga kabaka nenkola ya bulungibwansi abatuusizza ku kkula lyoluguudo nga babadde tebayita naddala enkuba ngetonnye wadde nga balina nabaana abasoma ababadde balina okusala omugga guno buli lunakukabaka waakumala ennaku 3 mu ssaza lye kyaggwe ngalambula nokusimba emiti ngentikko yokulambula kuno ejja kubeera ku mbuga yeggombolola e nyenga mu disitulikiti ye buikwe olunaku lwa bulungibwansi mu buganda lwe lunaakuzibwa nga october 8 ku lwokubiri nga ku lunaku luno kigambibwa nti buganda lwe yafuna obwetwaze          kabaka atongozza bulungibwansi e kyaggweleero tukutuusaako ekitundu ekyokubiri ku mboozi yomufuzi we kenya agamba okuba omulangira wa bugandaabawanga bayingira kenyaoluvannyuma lwokufa kwa wamoyi omwana we wanga iii ye yamuddira mu bigere era yasenguka okuva e ibanda nagenda e bunookukuza abaana abassa ekitiibwa mu byobuwangwa wamu nokulaba  ngabasajja nabaana abalenzi nabo tebalekebwa bwerunnaabagereka ne nnaabakyala wa ashante mu ghana  baasisinkana  mu october wa 2012 okukola okutumbula enkulaakulanaabakyala okuva mu kibiina kyamawanga amagatte un  aba united nations country team naba  african union commission  be bamu ku bagenda okuyamba mu kutegeka olukungaana ssente obuwumbi 20 zebadde egibanjaminista avunanyizibwa ku kwogerera mmengo era nga ye wamawulire nensonga zolukiiko denis walusimbi bwategeezezzassengendo yasinzidde mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire e mmengo ku lwokuna nategeeza nti mmengo yamaze dda okufuna obuwumbi bubiri ku akawunta zeggwanika nga zino gavumenti zeyasoose okusasula ngekendeeza ku buwumbi 20 obugibanjibwatusuubira nti ssente zino obuwumbi obubiri era ziggya kweyongerako oluvannyuma lwa ttiimu yaffe kabaka gyeyalonze okwekenneenya nokuzuula ebimu ku bintu byaffe ebyatundibwa nebyo ebyonooneddwa mu bbanga lye bimaze nga biri mu mikono gya gavumenti eyawakati ssengendo bweyagambyewalusimbi era ategeezezza nti kabaka yalonze olukiiko lwabantu babiri okuli omulangira david wasajja ne appolo nelson makubuya  ono nga ye minisita avunanyizibw aku nsonga zamateeka e mmengo nabalagira okukwatagana nolukiiko olwassibwawo gavumenti okussa mu nkola endagaano gye baakola okuddiza buganda ebyayo bakakse nga essibwa mu nkolakyo ekitongole kya kabaka ekya buganda land board kikwasiddwa omulimu gwokukuuma ettaka lyobwakatikkiro eryomuwanika neryomulamuzi eryakomezeddwawominisita walusimbi yakikkatirizza nti balina essuubi nti ebintu bya buganda byonna gavumenti byeyasuubiza okugiddiza nga august 2 2013 bwe yassa omukono ku ndagaano ne kabaka bigenda kukomezebwawo mu bbanga obuwumbi 20 bwebanjaku ntandikwa yomwezi guno kabaka ne pulezidenti museveni bassizza omukono ku ndagaano gavumenti mwegenda okuddiza buganda ebyayo omuli ebintu ngembuga zamasaza namagombololaokuva leero tukuleetedde embeera embuga zino gye zirimubya dickson kulumb aabamasaza agenjawulo agaddiziddwa kabaka baagambye nti ettaka erisinga obunene eryamasaza gano lyatwalibwa dda abantu abaalyesenzaako ne gavumenti yennyinie buluuli owessaza kimbugwe yali yalemesebwa okukolera ku kitebe kyessaza e nakasongola oluvannyuma lwabantu baayo okuteekako ssaabaluuli mwogezabutamanya namugaana okuddamu okukolera emirimu gye mukifo kinoomumyuka wa kimbugwe david kitaakule yagambye nti babadde mu mbeera yakuyambibwa omuntu nnakyewa eyabawa ekifo we babadde baddukanyiza emirimu balyesenzaakomu busiro ekitebe kyessaza ekisangibwa e ssentema ettaka gavumenti eya wakati yalisalakoekitundu nessaako ekkomera nennimiro zekkomerakayima owessaza lye mawokota steven nnawuba limaliddwaawobya ahmed katereggaomutaka namuyonjo owe bugerere avuddeyo nagamba nti takaayanira kukulembera ssaza eryo nti ekifo kye kyasigala ku bukulu bwa mutubamu bbaluwa gye yawandiikidde bukedde ku lwokuna omutaka namuyonjo dr g h kkolokolo akolera e paris mu bufalansa yagambye nti bulondoganyi ngedda bugerere bwe yayitibwanga lyali ssaza ttono nnyo kumpi eryali litwala kati bbaale eryafugwanga omutaka namuyonjo nti kyokka bwe lyagaziyizibwa ekitundu ekinene ekimanyiddwa nga ntenjeru ne kisalibwa ku kyaggwe ne kirigattibwako namuyonjo yakoma okubeera omwami waakyo olwo kabaka nasiima okulonderamu omwami owessaza mugerereobwannamuyonjo bwasigala kuba mutuba ogulina obutaka e galiraaya mu bbaale eryaweebwayossekabaka edward muteesa ll mu balangira be kibulala e ssingo sso si obufuzi obwennono obwessaza lye bugerere dr kolokolo kakensa mu lulimi olufaransa era ngasomesezza mu yunivasite ya bufaransa okumala ekiseera ekinene bwe yagambyeyajjukizza nti okumanya abomutuba gwa namuyonjo ne bannabugerere bonna bawulize nnyo eri obwakabaka bwa buganda obote bwe yaggyawo obwakabaka mu nsasagge ya 1966 muto we omulangira andrew kyeyune yomu ku baganda abeenyigira mu lukwe lwokutemula obote ngava e luzira okukyakala olwabulako katono okukwasa eyali omumyuka we omugenzi dr john babiihaomufuzi wa bugerere ne buganda yonna owennono ye ssaabasajja kabaka era kaweefube bugandanagamba nti buganda erina omugabo munene nnyo mu uganda kwe kunokolayo erinnya uganda eryava mu buganda  olulimi oluganda lwe yagambye nti lwogera abantu obukadde nga 23 nebiralayalabudde nti mukiibikatikkiro peter mayiga agambye nti tagenda kukkiriza muntu yenna kwekiika mu nteekateeka ya kumaliriza kuzimba masiro ge kasubi mu march womwaka ogujjamayiga agambye nti newankubadde alina zino baakukolera ku biragiro byakoyalonze  olukiiko olukulemberwa minisita wa kabaka eyawummula nnannyini kkampuni ya peacock kaddu kiberu ngamyukibwa minisita wa kabaka owa gavumenti ezebitundu akakiiko ka  ggwangamujje akakulirwa john fred kiyimba  eyakazibwako erya free man  amyukibwa yosam kittatta lutaaya ne julius ssempala omuwanika ye guster lule owa ntakke nga  waakukolera wansi godfrey ssenkaayiabalala kuliko ronald kirumira wamala balunabba omukozi wa bukedde  kalooli sserugga abby mukiibi  abasi kabule ssaalongo mukiibi wilson ddungu tabula ronald magunda nabalala          amasiro galina okuggwa mu marchmu 1993 yayongera amaanyi mu mirimu egikolebwa abakozi bobwakabaka bwa bugandayayongera amaanyi mu kibiina kya ssuubi lya bugandamu 1994 yazzaawo bulungibwansi yatandikawo ekitongole kya bucadef era yalonda joseph mulwannyammuli ssemwogerere okubeera katikkiromu 1995 yasisinkana paapa john paul ii e roma yalambula amasaza kyaggwe bulemeezi buddu era nalangirira nti agenda kuyingiza abavubuka abakyala nabayivu mu lukiikoembuga ya mugerere e bugereremu 1996 yasisinkana abavubuka abava e busujju nabawa amagezi okuva mu bibuga okudda mu byalo balime nokulundayatalaaga obuganda nakunga abantu okugemesa abaana baabwemu 1998 yazzaawo abaami bamasaza abamagombolola nabatongolemu 1999 yawasa nabagereka mu lutikko e namirembemu 2001 yazaala sarah katrina mirembe ssangalyambogo nachwamu 2005 yalonda dan muliika okubeera katikkiroebyaffe mu busujju ewa kasujju bituddiziddwamu 2007 yalonda jb walusimbi okubeera katikkiroyatandika yunivasite ya muteesa i royal kyokka ngabayizi abaagisookamu baayingira mu 2011mu 2008 yayongera amaanyi mu byobulamu naddala okugema abaanamu 2009 yazimbira nabakooza eyakweka kitaawe ssekabaka muteesa 11yassaawo ensawo ya kabaka eyebyenjigirizamawogola ewa muteesa nayo bitereddemu 2011 ayongedde amaanyi mu byobulimi ngessira aritadde ku nnima eyomulembe bwe yatongoza abalimi abagundiivu mu bitundu abalina okusomesa abantu be ennima eyomulembemu 2012 yatongoza engoma obugandabumu bwe yali aggulawo olukiikoyakubiriza bannaluweero okujjumbira okulima kubanga buli gye yayitanga ngalaba nsiko bwe yali akyaddeyomu 2013 kabaka alonda charles peter mayiga ku bwakatikkiroakubirizza abavubuka naddala abasoma okweggyamu emize gyokwekalakaasaamaka ga luweekula e buweekula2 ettaka lyobwakabaka lyonna mu bibuga nobubuga3 poloti esangibwa ku kibanja nnamba 52 ku kampala road4ennyumba ya buganda eyitibwa muteesa e london mu bungereza5okuzza obuggya liizi zettaka ezaali okusisinkana abatuuze bomuluka gwe kasubi abaabadde bazze okulambula ku kifo nabategeeza nti balina ekizibu mu masiro ekyobutaba na mazziamasiro ge kasubi gaakwata omuliro mu march wa 2010 ennyumba muzibwazaalampanga neggwawogavumenti ya kabaka yatongoza kaweefube wokuzzaawo amasiro gano era ngobuganda buli mu kusonga nsimbi okukola omulimu guno          omuliro mu masiro ge kasubikatikkiro charles peter mayiga asisinkanye abagagga bomu kampala abaakulembeddwaamu minisita webyobusuubuzi  ameria kyambadde nabategeeza ngobuvunaanyizibwa bwokuzzaawoamasiro nokutwala buganda mu maaso bwe butali bwa katikkiro yekka oba baminisita ba kabaka nti wabula bwa buli muntu ayagaliza obwakabakakatikkiro agambye nti mu nkola eno eyomulembe omutebi tewali kufa ku mbeera zabantu ezebyobufuzi na ddiini wabula omwoyo ogukwata ku bwakabaka era mmengo nneetegefu okuwagira abo abawagira enteekateeka za kabaka okutwala buganda mu maasoabasuubuzi bangi abali mu kibuga kyokka nga nabo bye bafunye babiggya mu bantu ba kabaka nolwekyo kuno kubanga okuzza obwenkulumu nti muddiza ku kabaka nnannyini bantu abo era naffe tujja kubawagira kubanga tumanyi nti nammwe muwagira kabaka katikkiro mayiga bwe yagambyeyabadde akyaliddwa abagagga okwabadde nabukeera bosco muwonge nomukyala john ssebalamu ne mukyala we ne minista ameria kyambadde nga baawaddeyo 16500000 ziyambeko mu kuzzaawo amasiro nokuteekateeka ebikujjuko byokujjukira amatikkira ga kabaka agomulundi ogwa 20 agagenda okukuzibwa mu lubiri e mmengo nga  august 3minisita ameria kyambadde yasuubizza obuwagizi bwabwe eri obwakabaka nokutwala buganda mu maaso          minisita nabagagga beeyamye ewa katikkiromwana wange abantu ne bwe bajagalala poliisi nebakubamu ttiyagaasi ababalagala mu maaso era nabasonsomola ne mu nnyindo kyokka nga bwe bayimba kitiibwa kya buganda nga bwe kyava eddakale oba bagamba nti abo omwoyo gweggwanga gwe guba gubaboyaanya ate bano bo oboogerako kibataamuuse bagudde ku oyo ayitiddwa omubbi amateeka bagatwalidde mu ngalo bamukubye era bamusse mbulaga kyokka ku nkomerero bayimbye kitiibwa kya bugandaye zizinga kiki ekimusiibyanga mu mwenge ngajenguka nabulako ekyomugaso kye yeekolera oba kyakolera eggwanga kyokka namaliriza ngayimba kitiibwa kya bugandaera nasaakaanya nti nnaayimba ntya ne sitenda ssaabasajja kabakazizinga takimanyi nti bulijjo ssaabasajja kabaka akubiriza abantu be bave mu kukuba embeekuulo bakole emirimu eginaabaggya mu bwavubwatyo ne katikkiro peter mayiga kyamuyitiriddeko natuuka nokulya mu ttamabwe yabadde ayogera eri olukiiko lwa buganda mayiga yavumiridde nnyo abantu abayimba kitiibwa kya buganda awatali kigendererwa ekirimu amageziyagambye nti obwavu butusibyeko akanyaaga kyokka bangi bakomye ku kuyimba kitiibwa kya buganda naye tebalina kye bakozeewo okuggya eggwanga lyabwe mu bwavu oba nabo bennyini okweggya mu bwavumayiga yabuuzizza nti ekitiibwa kya buganda tunaakikuumira tutya mu bwavu obwokweyaguza olugyo sso nga bajjajja ffe baakikuuma ne bakitutuusaako nga kitiibwa ekya buganda engaggayasoomoozza abavubuka bave mu kuyimba kitiibwa kya buganda ekiruma ekitalina kaliibwako bave mu kubeera ba ngalobunani bakole emirimu ngate bakola buteebalira beegaggawaze era bagaggawaze nensi yaabwe olwo lwe banaakuuma ekitiibwa kya buganda nokukituusa ku baliddawonaye nga kwo okuba kyo ekitiibwa kya buganda kijaajaamiziddwa nnyo ebiro bino ne kiyimbibwa ne we kitaaliyimbiddwaggwe kale abali mu bikolwa ebyobumenyi bwamateeka ekitiibwa kya buganda baalirurumbaganidde ki okuluyimbawo ayi mzee zedde  ngalabye ennakukale lwaki onywa omwenge nojenguka nobulako ne ke weekolera kyokka nosigalamu kayimba  kitiibwa kya buganda nokiyimba ngovuya buvuyaekitiibwa ekitukubiddwa mu ttamiiro kiba kikyali kitiibwa nnaba kinaye mmwe abomulembe guno bajjajja mmwe okumala okubakwasa ekitiibwa kya buganda nga tekiriiko kamogo kyokka mmwe ne mukigalabanja ne kiribukalibuka ne kifuuka ekyolwogo era ekyokujaajaamya mumanye nti mungu bwalinyiiga talirema kubakuba bbalaayi mu mitwe egyo mufungalalire mu bubuyabuya bwammwe          otamiirukuka otya nosigalamu kayimba kitiibwa kya bugandakatikkiro charles peter mayiga agambye nti buganda ne tooro bisobola okutumbula enkulaakulana singa kaweefube ateekebwa mu kutumbula ebyobulambuzi ayongerwamu amaanyi kubanga ebitundu byombi birina ebyobulambuzi bingi ebiyayaanirwa mu nsi yonna tulina okutumbula obulambuzi mu bannansi baveemu endowooza nti okulambula omuntu alina kulinnya nnyonyienkolagana eno bwebeerawo abalambuzi abajja mu buganda batuuka ne tooro ate nabatuukidde e tooro ne bajja mu buganda mayiga bwe yategeezezzamayiga okwogera bino yabadde asisinkanye abakulembeze okuva mu bukama bwe toro nga baakulembeddwamu katikkiro waayo stephen kaliba abaamukyalidde mu ofi isi ye ku bulange e mmengo ku lwokunae tooro eriyo ebyobulambuzi okuli ensozi rwenzori ebibira nebyobuwangwa okuli olubiri lwomukama ate mu buganda ebimu ku byobulambuzi kuliko amasiro ge kasubi bulange olubiri e mmengo ennyanja ya kabaka nebirala bingistephen kaliba yategeezezza nti okukyala kwabwe kwagendereddwamu okunyweza enkolagana wakati wobwakabaka bwombi nga kino kyakubatuusa ku birungi ntoko          buganda ne tooro zikwasaganye mu byobulambuzi mayigaabaami ba ssaabasajja omuli abemiruka nabatongole mu ggombolola ya mituba 4 kawugamu ssaza lye kyaggwe baakubiriziddwa okukunga abantu mu bitundu bye batwala okukola ennyo baleme okuswaza bugandassekiboobo alex kigongo kikonyogo ye yabasibiridde entanda eno bwe yabadde akola omukologwokubalayiza nokubakwasa ebbaluwa zaabwe ku kitebe kyeggombolola eno e kawuga kulwokusatu          ssekiboobo alayizza abaami ba kabaka mu kyaggweembalirira ya buganda teyanjuddwa mu bujjuvu omuwanika eva nagawa mukasa ayanjudde ya buwumbi 7 ekole okutuusa mu december balyoke bagiyise mu bujjuvuminisita nagawa bwabadde agyanjulira olukiiko ategeezezza nti kabineti yatudde nesalawo minisitule zobwakabaka zisooke zirambike enteekateeka zaazo era nebitongole byonna bikole bwebityo kibasobozese okubiteekerateekera obulungiyayongeddeko nti embalirira yobuwumbi 7 yakutambuza buganda okutuuka mu december olwo balyoke bayise embalirira enzijuvu ngetambulira wamu nenteekateeka ya katikkiro namutayikakatikkiro charles peter mayiga bwabadde ayogera mu lukiiko olutudde e bulange mmengo olwaleero ategeezezza nti abaganda balina okukola bave mu kulowooleza mu byobwereere kubanga ebirungi biva mu ntuuyoolukiiko lukubiriziddwa sipiika nelson kawalya nakuutira abakiise okukuuma ebiseera kubanga olwaleero bangi batuuse kikeerezikati kkiro charles peter mayiga alabudde abakulu bebika ku bazzukulu baabwe ababasaba obukulu mu bika ne batuuka nokubawa enguzi babawe ebifo bayogeddeko nti be basibye ensowole mu bika nokubidobonkanyabwe tuba nga twagala okukozesa ebika byaffe okutwala mu maaso eggwanga lyattu buganda tusaana okuba abeerufu mu buli kye tukolaamazima kikulu nnyo mu kubeerawo kwomuntu nokutuuka ku buwanguzi mayiga bwe yagambye ngabennyonyi namungoona abaakulembeddwaamu katikkiro wekika omutaka muliika bamwanjulira omukulu wekika omuggya ibrahim nsigalira kabuzi kajjabwongabaawaddeyo 850000 ezamasiro ne 100000 eri emirimu gyobwakabakamayiga yalagidde muliika okuwandiika bazzukulu be ngolukalala terukka wansi wa 20000 alweyambise okubateekerateekera ebiyinza okubabbulula mu bwavu          katikkiro alabudde ku bagula obukulu mu bika bya bugandaomutaka ssebuganda namuguzi wilson ndawula owempologoma abaamasiga emituba nolukiiko lwekika balabudde okukuba mu mbuga mohamood kateregga nabazzukulu bali nabo be balumiriza okwerimbika mu bukulu bwekika ne babuzaabuza abantumu lukungaana lwabaamawulire ku mbuga yekika e lwaddamatugga namuguzi yategeezezza nti mohamood kateregga abazzukulu abolubatu nabaamasiga basatu ssembiro kakadde mpuku ne golooba mujambula balimbalimba nokubuzaabuza abazzukulunga march 29 2006 kabaka yasalawo nga hajji mohamood kateregga bwe yali ensowole era namulagira aweeyo byonna ebikwata ku kika eri wilson ndawula namuguzi omutuufu kyokka ye ne kaakati yeeyita omukulu wekika kinokatikkiro wekika patrick kisekka ddungu yategeezezza nti mohamood kateregga kennyini yamutegeeza nga kitaawe omugenzi gwe yaddira mu bigere bwe yamukuutira nti tagezangako kwesiba ku bukulu bwa kika kubanga naye yali yalondebwa kubeera ssebuganda owekiseera
