womukulembeze weggwanga edward kiwanuka ssekandi akuutidde katikkiro charles peter mayiga nobukulembeze bwonna mu bwakabaka nabaganda  okubeeranga abanjulukufu mu nkola yemirimu obwakabaka lwe bunaakulaakulananze ssekandi sigeya omuntu bwaba akoze ekintu kye sikkiriziganya nakyo mmutegeerezaawobye njogera emisana nekiro bwentyo noolwekyo enkola nsuubira yegenda okutwala obwakabaka bwaffe mu maaso era we mufunye obuzibu munnyingizeemu ssekandi bwe yategeezezzabino yabyogeredde ku kabaga abasomera mu st marys college kisubi ke baakoze okusiima katikkiro eyawummula yingjb walusimbi emirimu gye yakola ku bwakatikkiro bwe nokuyozaayoza katikkiro charles peter mayiga bombi abaasomera e kisubiakabaga kaabadde ku city royal hotel e bugolobi ku lwokutaano akawungeezissekandi naye eyasomera e kisubi nga yali mu nju ya mugwanya yasiimye enkola banne gye bakutte gye yagambye nti eraga obugunjufu abaasomera e kisubi bwe balina nasaba bonna abaasomera mu masomero gaabwe okugunjaawo enkolagana ngeno kubanga erimu emigaso ntokomu kwogera kwe katikkiro charles peter mayiga yayongedde okukinogaanya nga bwagenda okwongera obwanjulukufu mu mirimu e mmengo ne yeebaza banne bwe basoma okumulaga essanyu nga bamwaniriza ekintu kye yagambye nti kimuwadde essuubi obuganda bwonna bwakukolagana naye era tajja kubuyiwaye katikkiro eyawummula ying jb walusimbi nga yali mu nju ya kiwanuka yategeezezza banne nti agenda kufunayo akadde awandiike ekitabo ekiraga byayiseemu mu bulamu kubanga ayise mu kusoomoozebwa kungi yonna gyabaddenga nkyasoma e kisubi kata bangobe ne ku yunivasite e nairobi kaabula kata bangobe olwensonga ezitali zimumpeerezza obwakabaka emyaka 23 kyokka e mmengo eyo si wangu waliyo okusoomoozebwa kunginammwe muzze muwulira bwe bayisaamu bakatikkiro kintu jolly joe kiwanuka yamuyitanga majjangwa yingyayongeddeko nti omulimu gwokuzimba obwakabaka gulina kukolebwa kitole nga buli omu ajja nateekako ettoffaali nomulala bwatyoyayagalizza katikkiro omuggya charles peter mayiga obuweereza obulungi ateekeko ettofaali ate nabalijja bwe batyoabaasomerako e kisubi nga bayita mu pulezidenti waabwe ebert byenkya bawadde yingwalusimbi ekirabo ekimusiiima ne mayiga naweebwa ekimuyozaayozaomukolo gwetabiddwaako abanene abalala okuli amyuka katikkiro ambssendaula polof fred ssempebwa akulira tivvi za vision group mark walungama babbulaaza okuva e kisubi nabalala          ssekandi asabye katikkiro peter mayiga abe mwanjulukufukatikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga asiimye omulimu omulungi ogukolebwa bukedde mu kutuusa amawulire agakwata ku bwakabaka bwa buganda ku bantu naddala ogukolebwa ennaku zino ogwokunoonyereza nokufulumya ebyafaayo bya buganda bangi bye babadde batamanyiokutuuka ku bino katikkiro yabadde asasinkanye abakungu okuva mu kkampuni ya vision group nga baakulembeddwa agikulira robert kabushenga abaamukyalidde e mmengo ne bamuyozaayoza okulya ekifo era ne beeyama okukolagana nayemu nsinsinkano eno eyabadde mu ofi isi ya katikkiro ku bulange eggulo kabusenga eyawerekeddwaako akulira ttivvi za kkampuni ya vision group mark walungama nomumyuka womukungaanya wolupapula lwa bukedde michael ssebbowa yagambye nti vision group yaakugenda mu maaso nenkola yaayo eyokuwagira enteekateeka za buganda ne mmengo ezenjawulo era nga mu kiseera kino yeenyigidde butereevu mu kujaguza amatikkira ga ssaabasajja agomulundi ogwa 20yategeezezza katikkiro nti mu nkola eno emikutu gya vison group egyenjawulo okuli bukedde olupapula leediyo ne ttiivi buli lunaku bituusa ku bantu ebyafaayo bya buganda ngenkola eno mu kiseera kino yeegattiddwako nolupapula lwa new vision olwolungereza era nga kino kyakukolebwa okutuukira ddala ku matikkira nga nga july 31 2013katikkiro naye yasiimye empereeza ya vision group naddala emikutu gyayo egya bukedde olwokutuusanga ku bantu babuganda amawulire naddala ago agakwata ku kabaka nokuwagira enteekateeka za buganda          katikkiro asiimye bukedde ku byafaayo bya bugandamargaret nagawa siwoza yayanjuddwa mu butongole nga namasole okusikira namasolezirimbuga eyaseeredde wiiki eweddeomukolo gwabadde mu masiro e kasubi ku lwokusatuyayanjuddwa wakati mu ssanyu john white jjagwe owoolunyiri lwa buzibwa era jjajja woluggya lwa bakisosonkole nga buno bwe bukojja bwa ssaabasajja kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi iimu masiro e kasubi baayaniriziddwa nnaalinya beatrice namikka eyagenze mu maasonakuutira namasole siwoza omuggya nemirimu zirimbuga gyabadde akola nga talina kyeyeeganya gwoddidde mu bigere abadde muntu mukozi era nga ne wano muffe emirimu agitambuza bulungi era nga mmulaba mu mirimu gyaffe nnaalinya namikka bwe yakuutidde namasoleomuggyaku busika buno yateereddwaako ne lubuga justine kayaga ne ssaabaganzi ssaalongossekitooleko ngono ye yamukutte namukwasa omulangira mu masiro e kasubi nga bwamugamba nti mukyala wo wuuno oluvannyuma lwa buli luuyi okuwa lunnaalwo enkokoekikolwa kino kyaddiriddwa amazina nobuluulu era ngokusanyuka kuno kwamaze eddakiika ezisoba mu 10mu kwogera kwe eri abaabaddewo namasole siwoza yeeyamye okukola obulungi omulimugwa maama era nasuubiza okukolagana obulungi ne banamasole banne abalala mu kaweefube wokukuuma ennono nobulombolombo bwa bugandakyategeezeddwa nti oluvannyuma lwokwanjula mu bassekabaka e kasubi yatwaliddwa mulubiri e bbanda ewa ssaabasajja okwanjulwayobya steven musoke lilian nalubega ne dickson kulumbakatikkiro asinzidde mu lukiiko e mmengo nagamba nti buganda nneetegefu okuteesa ne gavumenti eya wakati ku bintu bya buganda kyokka nategeeza nti ssi yaakugoberera bukwakkulizo wadde okupapakatikkiro peter mayiga eyabadde ayogera ngakkaatiriza ensonga yakiggumizza nti bugandanneeteefuteefu okuteesa naye buli kyanaakola ajja nga kumala kwebuuza ku kabaka nabantube kikwatakosi kibi okuwuliriza nokumanya endowooza yomuntu ku nsonga yonna ngoyita mu kuteesaera oyinza obutagendera ku byagamba naye ngobiwulidde katikkiro bwe yagambye kyokka nategeeza nti wabaawo obutali bwenkanya omuntu bwaba akubanja ate nosalawo musooke kuteesayabadde ayogerera mu lukiiko lwa buganda omulundi gwe ogwasoose nga katikkiro wakati mu bbugumu nokumukubira emizira nokuyimirira butengerera bakira buli lwabaako ensonga eyessimba gyalambise eri abakungu bangi omwabadde katikkiro eyawummula joseph mulwanyammuli ssemwogerere ababaka ba palamenti abava mu buganda abaana nabengandaza namasole zirimbuga eyaseeredde wiiki ewedde baminisita bolukiiko abennyumba ye nabeekika kyomutima nabamu ku bannaddiiniebintu 4 byatandikirakokatikkiro eyamaze essaawa ezisoba mu bbiri ngayogera yasoose kwogera ku bulamu bwa namasole rebecca zirimbuga musoke gwe yayogeddeko ngakuumye ennyo ekitiibwa kye nokulambika kabaka ku nsonga ezitali zimu nga muno alereddemu nabantu ba buganda kumpi bonna abamuyigiddeko ebingiomukiise joyce mpanga ngabuuza ku bamulekwaba namasole zirimbugayamenye ebintu bina bye bakkaanyizzaako nolukiiko lwe bye bagenda okutandikirako okuli ekikulu ekyokukuuma nokutaasa namulondo okuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi ne wamala okutereeza embeera nenzirukanya yemirimu mu bulange ne mu bwakabaka nokuzimba ekizimbe kya bulange plazaamasiro gaggwa mu march 2014wano we yalangiridde okuzzaawo enkola yekinyegenyege era nawera ngomulimu gwokuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi bwe gulina okumalirizibwa mu march 2014yakkaatirizza ensonga yobumu ate nobukozi nategeeza nti waakutwala mu maaso nenkola eyomumuli katikkiro ying jb walusimbi gye yatandikawo gye yagambye nti erambika bulungi obukozi mu bantuolukiiko luno lwakubiriziddwa omumyuka wa sipiika ahmed lwasa era nga baminisita yingmartin kasekende owebyettaka ne minisita omubeezi namiiro kisitu owebyobulambuzi baalayiziddwaminisita webyamateeka ne gavumenti ezebitundu david mpanga ne bawera obutatiiririra kabakamayiga yagambye nti ebintu bino byonna waakubikolera wansi womulamwa ogugamba nti enkola yomulembe omuggya omuli obwerufu obuyiiya obunyiikivu nobwagazi nakikkaatirizzanti amanyi bulungi ebisoomooza buganda era nanokolayo amateeka agayisibwa ku kabaka gagamba nti gamuggyako eddembe okutondawo obukulembeze bwensikirano obwekimpatiira mubuganda okulemesa kabaka okwetaaya mu nsi ye nokugaana okussaawo enkola eyokugabana obuyinzatewali kuddirizaamu ku bye tubanjawabula abantu abaabadde mu lukiiko baakubidde kattikiro engalo ezamanyi bwe yaweze okugenda mu maaso nokubanja ebintu bya buganda okuli enkola eya federo ettaka ensimbi mmengozebanja gavumenti nokulwanyisa abakulembeze abensikirano abekimpatiirayalabudde abaagala okwawulayawula mu baganda nga bayita mu bibiina byobufuzi eddiini namawanga kyagamba nti kya kuzza mabega enkulaakulana mu kitundu kino          tujja kwongera okuteesa ne gavumentimayigabya lilian nalubega ne ruth faith nakanwagimmengo efulumizza enteekateeka zokuziika abadde nnyina wa kabaka namasole rebecca zirimbuga musoke eyafudde ku lwokuna mu kibuga nairobi ekya kenyamu kiwandiiko ekyassiddwaako omukono katikkiro wa bugnada charles peter mayigga omubiri gwa namasole gwatuuse eggulo ku lwomukaaga ku kisaawe e ntebe okuva e nairobi gyabadde ajjanjabirwa era nga bendera za buganda wonna zigenda kwewuubira wakati ku mirongooti olwokukungubagira omugenzi okutuusa ngamaze okuziikibwa ku lwokubiriku mmande nga june 24 wagenda kubaawo olukiiko lwa buganda mwe bagenda okusinziira okwogera ku mugenzi na byonna ebikwata ku bulamu bwe noluvannyuma ku ssaawa 900 ezolweggulo omwoyo gwe gusabirwe mu lutikko e namirembenamasole agenda kugalamizibwa e makonzi mu ssingo nga june 25 essaawa 800 ezolweggulo era nga eno yewaaziikibwa ne bbanamasole zirimbuga ye yasikira sarah kisosonkole nnyina wa kabaka era ngenfunda nnyingi babadde batambula bonna naddala ku mikolo gyobwakabaka emitongolenamasole rebecca josephine zirimbuga  musoke yazaalibwa nga february 19 1932 mu ddwaaliro e mengo  ngazaalibwa omwami nomukyala kupuliano kisosonkole bisase nomukyala damalie najjuma bisase kisosonkolezirimbuga yasomera   aggrey memorial school kings college buddo makerere university ne buyindimu 1948 yali omu ku mperekeze ku mbaga ya sir edward  11 bwe yali awasa damalie nakawombeyafumbirwa pulofeesa latima musoke mu 1952 gwe yazaalamu abaana omusanvuokusinziira ku mwannyina john white jagwe era nga yomu ku bali mu mitambo gyenteekateeka zokuziika agamba nti namasole bwanaamala okusabirwa e namirembe waakutwalibwa mu maka ge e kyaliwajjala bamukubeko eriiso evvannyumanga tannaziikibwa e makonzi waakusooka kukolebwako mikolo gyobwanamasole  mu nju ye eri e bumbuomugenzi abadde mukyala mukristaayo era ngabadde asabira ku st peters church e kireka kamulikatikkiro charles peter mayiga nomukyala margaret mayiga ssaako omulangira david wassasjja nomugole marion nankya baacamudde abantuabantu nga babuuza ku katikkiro mayigaolwo baabadde baayingirawo nga bakumba ku kabaga akaamutegekeddwa mukwano gwe hope mukasa okumukulisa okutuuka ku kitiibwa kinokatikkiro yatuuse ku ssaawa ngemu eyakawungeezi abantu ne bamukubira emiziraabamu ku bagenyi nga basala ddansioluvannyuma omulangira wasajja nomuzaana nabo baayingiddewo ne nkulabira essanyubaabadde mu maka ga hope mukasa e lubaga ku lwomukaagaekitiibwa kya buganda kyayimbiddwa era olwawedde buli omu nabuuza ku munne ngeno bwe bakulisa mayiga okugwa mu bintukatikkiro yeebazizza abantu okumusabira wabula nagamba nti abadde anyumirwa nnyo okwetaayiza mu mikwano gye naye ekitiibwa kye yafunye tekikyamukkiriza kutuula nnyo mu lukale era alina gyabadde atuula ne mikwano gye akawungeezi ne babaako bye balya naye talowooza nti anaddayobaalidde ne banywa ne basindisa bigere ngeno bwe basala ddansi          katikkiro mayiga bamugabudde ekijjulo makekekabaka ayongedde ku muwendo gwa baminisita be bwalonze abaami babiri nomukyala omu okwegatta ku kabinenti gye yalonda gye buvuddekoabaalondeddwa kuliko owek charles bwenvu abadde mmemba mu lukiiko lwa buganda gwawadde okuba minisita omubeezi owensonga zabantu be abali ebweru wa uganda owekwamala gaganga  abadde omwami we atwala essaza lye busujju nga kati ye minisita we omubeezi owebyobuwangwa ne ritah namyalo kisitu nga  kati ye minisita omubeezi owebyobulambuzimu kiwandiiko ekitongole ekyafulumiziddwa ofiisi ya ssaabasajja nga kissiddwaako omukono gwomuwandiisi we omukulu owekyama abaalondeddwa balagiddwa okutandikirawo okukola mu bitongole ebibaweereddwa nga beegatta kwabo be basanzeewomu kiseera kino ekifo kyowessaza lye busujju kisigadde kyereere nga kati nakyo kitunuulidde kujjuzibwaminista bwenvu  nzaalwa ye  mawokota nga yeddira ngongeye dayirekita wessomero lya st jude ss katende era mulimi wa nva endiirwa omuli entula okra ne kaamulali ebitundibwa ebweru weggwangayategeezezza nti agenda kutandikira mu kukunga abantu ba ssaabasajja beenyigire mu kulima enva endiirwa kubanga tezitwala biseera bingi kukula ate nga za ttunzi ebweru weggwanga naddala e bulaaya          kabaka alonze baminisita abalala 3bya deborah nanfuka  luke kagiri  prossy kalule ne lillian nalubegakabaka  anyoleddwa nnyo olwabantu be abaafiiridde mu kabenje nabalala abaalumiziddwa nga bagenda okuwagira omupiira gwa masazamu bubaka obusaasira eri abantu be ssingo ne busujju kabaka yategeezezza nti yafunye amawulire agennaku agokufa kwabantu bano nabaalumiziddwa nasaba emyoyo abagenzi okuwummula emirembe ate abaafunye ebisago nabaagaliza okussuka amanguyasaasidde abamasaza owe busujju owa singo olwokufiirwa kuno era nasaasira nabategesi bomuzannyo guno olwekikangabwa kinogwo omuwendo gwabantu  abaakafa gulinnye okutuuka ku mukaaga  ngabantu 10 abaamenyese amagulu emikono bajjanjabirwa  mu ddwaaliro e mulagoabaafudde kuliko situart musiitwa 16 abadde omubazzi ku station road ngasoma s3 ku pride ss emmanuel kibuuka makanika godfrey sebatta naye makanika e mityana ne zaidi joloba 16 abadde asoma s1abalala abaafudde kuliko kamada luyima 20 ne rogers senfuka 20 nga babadde bakolera ku kabuzi lane e mityanaabali e mulago kuliko ivan kaweesi 23 omutuuze we mityana yalongooseddwa olubuto ekyuma lwe kyasaze daniel kizza omutuuze we mityana ngayoza mmotoka eggumba lyamenyekedde mu kisambiabalala kuliko joseph kigundu 22 owe mityana yamenyese eggumba lyomu kiwato micheal kyagulanyi 30 omutuuze mityana nga muzimbi yamenyese okugulu era nalumizibwa omutwe wabula ssente zekifaananyi zikyabuzedorothy kaggwa asaba abazirakisa okumuyamba ali ku ssimu 0712202526juma sentongo avuga bodaboda  yatabuse omutwe oluvannyuma lwomusaayi okumugenda mu bwongo musa semyalo 16 asoma obwamakanika mu kiyembe yamenyese okugulu ate julius kaweesi muyizi mu central college abubakar nsubuga joseph muliika juma sentongo ne robert waswaomuduumizi wa poliisi e mityana henry kintu abasinga baamenyese amagulu era bakyajjanjabibwa          kabaka asaasidde abenganda zabafi iridde mu kabenje ke mityanakatikkiro charles peter mayiga akoonye ku bintu ebyenjawulo ebirina okutereezebwa mu masiro ga bassekabaka ba buganda yalambudde ku lwokuna okulaba embeera mwe gali nokumanya kiki ekyetaagisa okutandikirako          katikkiro mayiga awadde ebiragiro ku masiroomutaka mazige robert kitenda akulira ekika kyempindi akunze bazzukulu be bonna gye bali okuvaayo okununula ettaka lyabwe e muyenje ne nsumba mu mawokota eryawuwuttanyizibwa bannakigwanyiziyabadde atongoza mboggaomuwandiisi we ye ntabaazi kasibante atenga fred kabanda yagenda okuwanika ensawo yekika owamawulire ye jombwe kamya omubaka wa pulezidenti e mukono john fisher kasenge yagenda okukulira ebyenjigiriza          omutaka mazige alonze olukiiko lwekika olupyakatikkiro charles peter mayiga yeeyanjudde mu masiro ga bassekabaka e kasubi nategeeza nga kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii bwe yamukuutidde asooke kwemalira ku mulimu gwokuzzaawo amasiro ganokatikkiro eyagenze mu e kasubi eggulo ku lwokuna ku nkya yayaniriziddwa ebikonge e mmengo bannaalinnyaomwabadde nowamasiro gano gertrude tebattagwabwe abalangira nabambejja abaabadde bakuba obuluulu okuva lwe yayingidde okutuuka ku muzibwazaalampanga we yaggyiddemu engatto natuula ku mikeeka nembugomayiga nganywa ku mwenge omugandannaalinnya yamwanirizza namutegeeza nga bwazze okufuna emikisa gya bassekabaka bajjajjaabe kyokka namukuutira obutateeka malala mu bukulembeze bwe nembaliga ngakola emirimu gya ssaabasajjakatikkiro eyawerekeddwaako omumyuka we hajji mohamood ssekimpi ssemmambo yayogedde gye bali ngafukamidde nategeeza ngomutanda bwe yamukuutidde okukola omulimu gwokuzimba amasiro guggweoluvannyuma yawadde bannaalinya amakula gebita byomwenge amatooke nebintu ebirala ate mu bibbo bya bassekabaka abana nassaamu ebirabo nga bwabasaba emikisa ngafukamiddebaamuwadde ku mwenge omuganda nanywako nemmwaanyi wano nasaba ayingireko mu kibira wabula nnaalinnya namutegeeza nti eyo alina kuyingirayo ngakyadde bukyazi naye kati azze kweyanjula mu butongolebwe yavudde wano yeeyongeddeyo mu masiro ge wamalaabayizi ba rainbow international school bakyalidde nnaabagereka mu ofiisi ye ku bulange e mmengo nabasomesa ku bintu bingi ebimukwatako nobwakabaka bwa bugandaabaana bano abaabadde bawerekeddwaako abasomesa baabwe wakati mu kubannyonnyola ebimukwatako baamubuuzizza ebibuuzo bingi nga nokusinga baabadde baagala okumanya lwe yafuuka nnaabagereka ne byakoledde obwakabaka nabantu baabwokuno baagasseeko katikkiro wa buganda charles peter mayiga gwe baabuuzizza kyayinza okukola singa omuzigu abazingiza nga bali mu lukiiko ne kabakaemboozi ya nnaabagereka nabayizi nga bwe yabaddeali mu lubiri kubanga gyabeerabuzibu ki bwosanze mu kukunga abantu ba bugandaabantu ba buganda si bangu singa oba tobatuukiridde naye tufubye era tukyagenda mu maaso nga nnaabagerekaokuva lwe nnafuuka nnaabagereka nnatandikawo ekitongole kya nnaabagereka development foundation mwe mpise okuweereza abantunfubye okulaba nga ngunjula abaana abatalina mwasirizi abali mu charles peter mayiga atongozezza olukiiko olugenda okutegeka amatikkira ga kabaka agomulundi ogwa 20 nga lukulirwa sipiika nelson kawalya nalungamya ku nkola eyokugoberera wabula essira asinze kulissa ku kukuuma biseeraolukiiko yalutongolezza mu bulange e mmengo ku lwokuna nasaba mmengo eggulewo akawunti yemikolo ngerabirirwa muwanika wa buganda nalabula nti ekyokubeera nga buli mukolo zokuddamu enteeseganya zaayo ne bugandanambooze era yayagadde okumanya bani abali ku kakiiko ka gavumenti akagenda okuteeseganya ne buganda tumwebaze yagambye nti pulezidenti museveni gye buvuddeko yalonda omumyuka we edward ssekandi yaba akulembera akakiiko ka gavumenti akagenda okuteesa ne mmengo kyokka teyayogera bagenda kutuula ku kakiiko kanominisita tumwebaze yagambye nti ensonga ezokuteesaako mmengo yejja okuzireeta ne gavumenti kweneeyongereza ezaayo okuteesa bwe kunaaba kutuusekyokka ababaka ba buganda baagambye nti okunnyonnyola kwa tumwebaze tekumala ngate ne sipiika rebecca kadaga yabalemesezza okubaako ebirala bye babuuzabaakkukkulumye nti ababaka abalala abatava mu buganda baatandise okungola aba buganda bwe baabadde bagezaako okubaako bye bongera okubuuza tumwebazebategeka kuleeta kiteeso kijjuvu mu palamenti eteese ku nsonga eziruma obugandaababaka abaabadde mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire kwabaddeko patrick nsanjagodfrey kiwanda betty nambooze ken lukyamuzi latif ssebaggala ne deogratius kiyingibuganda erina ababaka 90 mu palamenti          ababaka basaba palamenti ezze abantu kye bagamba ensonga za buganda mu ddiirojohn baptist walusimbi ne kabaka agenda kusimba emiti ngakuza amazaalibwa ge agemyaka 58 nga 13 april omwaka gunokatikkiro yakubirizza abantu bonna okwetaba mu kaweefube ono nagamba nti abo abali mu bibuga nga tebalina we    musimbe emiti okukuza amazaalibwa ga kabakagavumenti ya japan emalirizza okuwaayo obweyamo bwayo ku masiro bwewaddeyo ensimbi ezikunukkiriza mu buwumbi bwensimbi za uganda bubiri eri omulimu unesco baazikwasizza omubaka wa uganda e bufalansa ambensimbi zino gavumenti ya japan yazikwasizza unesco era ekibiina kino ne kizikwasa omubaka waffe e bufalansa ngekisigalidde ye mubaka ono okuzisindika mu ofiisi ya unesco e kampala bwatyo yingnsubuga bwe yannyonnyodde ku nsimbi zinomu ngeri yemu ekibinja kyabajapani abakugu kyatuuse wiiki ewedde okwekkeenneenya ebyokuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi we bituuse nokuwa amagezi ku ngeri omulimu guno bwe gulina okutambuzibwaekibinja kino kyabantu babiri okuli s hasegawa ne polofk nitto nga bano bakugu mu kuzimbisa embawo essuubi nemmuli nga kino kye bakola ewaabwe mu japanekitongole kya unesco kyakwasa japan okukolagana ne uganda kubanga eggwanga lino lirina abakugu mu kusereka nga bakozesa essuubi nga bwe kikolebwa wanobano balambudde okukozesebwa mu kuzimba amasiro kirungi abantu okujja okutukyalirako okulaba ebintu gye biva kubanga wano mu kyaggwe tulina ebintu ebijja okukozesebwa mu kuzzaawo amasiro era nneebaza ne hajji wansi nokukuba ebifaananyi buli kintu ekikolebwabagala okulaba nga waberawo ebifo ebyenkalakalira ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kuzimba amasiro okugeza essuubi emmuli nebirala nga birina we birimirwae obuwumbi  bubiri okuzzaawo amasirosipiika wolukiiko lwa buganda hajj kaddu sserunkuma asoomoozezza abe mawokota okuba abanafu era abagayaavu emmere gye balya neba ngeva mu bitundu ebirala ngate edda baalinga beeriisa emmere eyafikkangawo ne bagitunda mu bitundu ebiralakyennyamiza nti temukyalina mmere nga ne gonja gwe mwalinako enkizo mu kumulima naye kati ava mu bitundu birala nebweru weggwanga  hajj sserunkuma bwe yasoomoozezza abe mawokotaokwogera bino yabadde asisinkanye abakulembeze okuva mu ggombolola ye kammengo mu disitulikiti ye mpigi bwe baakyadde embuga wiiki eweddesipiika yasabye abakulembeze bano abaakulembeddwa ssentebe wa lc 3  fred male okukubiriza abantu mu kitundu okwekolamu ebibiina mwebabeera balimira emmere nga bwekikolebwa abe kabale mu kulima obummonde nobutungulubaawaddeyo 260000 ziyambe ku masiro ate ne bagula ne satifikeeti ya 120000male yaloopedde sipiika ngabavubuka mu kitundu kino bwe batakyayagala okukola mirimu muva nsimbi nga bettanira zibagulumbyaennamula eno yakakasizza omutaka george william muwanga luntamye abadde attunka nabenju ya sam kisabagire ku bukulu bwessiga lino ngebbaluwa yagimukwasirizza ku bulange e mmengo wiiki eweddemu bbaluwa ekakasa luntamye ku bwessiga lya ssenkungu erisinga amaanyi mu kika kyengonge katikkiro yagambye nti amaze  ebbanga nga yeetegereza enkaayana mu ssiga lino era kuno kwe yeesigamiza okulamula kwekatikkiro yategeezezza nti nga february 25 2009 yafuna ebbaluwa okuva ewomutaka herbert muwanga kisolo ngewakanya okuddamu okuwozesa omusango gwobukulu bwessiga lino mu mbuga ya kisekwa kubanga gwali gwaggwa dda okuwozesebwa kkooti yakasolya kekika kyengonge  ne gusalibwa ngomutaka omutuufu ali ku bukulu bwessiga lya ssenkungu ye george william muwanga luntamyehajj dauda mukasa abadde mu mitambo gyokuwoza omusango guno ku luuyi lwa luntamye yategeezezza nti wadde kisolo yalambika bwati naye ekiwayi kyabantu be namasuba nga kikulemberwa nalukoola kyagenda mu maaso nokutwala okwemulugunya kwabwe ewa kisekwa era kisekwa nalaga obwetegefu bwokuwulira omusangobano baawaaba omusango gwessiga lino ngate si bebaali bawaabye omusango mu kusooka kubanga ensala entuufu kisabagire yali agikkiriza era bwatyo nagigondera hajj mukasa bwe yannyonnyoddekatikkiro wessiga lino era nga ye minisita webyobulimi e mmengo lutaaya mukomazi yagambye nti obuwanguzi obwatuukiddwaako kabonero akaalaze nti ebintu byebika bisaanye kubeeramu abo abatuufu abalina obuvunaanyizibwa obuzaalemu balala abaabaddewo kwabaddeko ne kaggo tofiri kivumbi malokwezza          katikkiro asaze eggoye mu gwessiga lyengongeomutongole wa kabaka atwala omuluka gwe magonga mu ggombolola ye malangala mu ssaza lye busujju mu mityana alaze obutali bumativu olwabamu ku basenze ku ttaka lya kabaka abeeyongera kuzimalira mu kkootimeeya asea jb yagambye nti yasisinkanye abamu ku  bagamba nti be bannannyini ttaka okwabadde  ssenseko kulubya nabembogo   oluvannyuma lwolukungaana olwasooka ne bakkaanya nti ebbanga  nga bakimanyidde ddala nti  ettaka kwebali eriweza sikweya mayiro taano  nekitundu lya mwana womwami ssenseko kulubya kyokka ebintu byonoonese  bwe wavuddeyo  abalikaayinira era ne balaga  nga kulubya bwalirina mu bukyaamubangi batandise okweraliikirira kwani mutuufu ku  ttaka kwebali kyokka nolukiiko olwabadde lutudde okugezaako okusalawo  eggoye   abaalwetabyeemu kyababuseeko bwe baalumaze mbagirawo  nga  kimaze okutegeerekeka nga bwe waliyo nabalala abagamba  nti lyabwe olwo bonna ne basabwa okuleeta ebiwandiiko ebikakasa bye  boogera bitunulwemu abakulembezebino we bigyidde okuleeta ebiwandiiko byabweyabadde amaze nokulondesa abantu ku buli kyalo mu  lugazi abagenda okukiika ku lukiiko olunene ssaako omusigere nsimbi  sizoomu alina okudda mu kifo kyomutaka sempala eyafa  gye buvuddekokulubya  yeewuunyizza abantu abeesiba ku ttaka lya  jajjaawe ezekeeri mugambe  eyafa nasikirwa kitaawe serwaano wokulira  naye eyafa olwo ye kulubya namuddira mu bigere nga yaalikuuma ku  lwabaana omunaanakulubya yabadde amaze okutegeeza nga bwayagala  okutegeeregana nabantu batandike okumuwa busuulu naye abeeko ne  bwaganyulwa mu ttaka lino ekitabaddewo okumala ebbanga eddene ngabaliko  tebalina kye bamuwa yajulizza omugenzi meeya saidi mubarak okuba nga  ye yali tasobola kuwuliriza bantu balinga bano abeesiba ku ttaka eritali  lyabwe nti naye ono meeya aliko  asea jb obukambweobutawuliriziganya bwe bwatandise okweyoleka abamu  ku batuuze ne basaba ddereeva wa kulubya amutwale olwokwewala ebyabadde  biyinza okuvaamu abantu okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo ne bakola effujjo          abomu kibuga kye lugazi basobeddwa ku bwannanyini ttaka kwe bali ssenseko kulubya buli omu alage bwiino nabalala 2 bakaayanaamazaalibwa ga kabaka ronald muwenda mutebi ii gengedde era agomulundi guno emikolo gigenda kubeera mu lubiri e mmengoakulira olukiiko olutegeka emikolo owekitiibwa ahmed bamweyana mu lukungaana lwabamawulire lweyatuuzizza ku bulange eggulo yategeezezza aprilomwaka oguwedde emikolo gyali ku kigo e kisubi mu busiro abantu baabulijjo bangi ne baggalirwa wabweru olwobufunda bwekifo ne batabuka ne poliisi gye baakuba amayinja abaserikale abamu ne bavaawo nga batonnya omusaayiminisita owa guno na guli mu ofiisi ya katikkiro e mmengo israel mayengo akalaatidde abaganda okwewala okusosola abantu abamawanga amalala abajja mu buganda kuba nabo kitundu ku bikola obuganda nokubuweesa ekitiibwamayengo agambye nti ssaabasajja kabaka ayagala abantu bonna mu buganda era kuno kwasinziira okubawa ebifo byobukulembeze olwobumuabantu abava mu mawanga amalala ne bajja okukolera wano mubalage okwagala nga naffe bwe tweyagala kyokka mulina okuteekawo enkola eneebasobozesa okulaba nga bassa ekitiibwa mu buwangwa bwaffe nennono bireme okuzaawa mayengo bwe yakkaatirizzajbwalusimbi okusisinkana abatuuze mu ggombolola ya mutuba i buwunga mu ssaza lye buddu abaakulembeddwaamu oweggombolola ssaalongo kasule makuddebaabadde ku bulange ku lwokubiri makudde nakwasa mayengo 525000 okuyambako ku mirimu gya buganda omuli nokuzzaawo amasiroensisinkano yabadde  okuyambako mu kuddukanya emirimu gyobwakabaka nga ku zino 320000 za kuzimba masiromayengo yalaze okutya olwabaami ba kabaka nabantu ba bulijjo abongedde okulagajjalira okuyita ebitundu byabwe amannya amatongole agaabiweebwa obwakabaka beyagambye nti kaweefube gwe baliko  waakulaba nga ennono zaabyo zifa era nga wano weyasinzidde nabakalaatira amannya amatongoloe bulijjo okugassa mu kwogera kwabwe abaana bnabazzukulu abalijja basobole okumanya ebyafaayo byebitundueyaliko omumyuka wa pulezidenti wa uganda polofgilbert bukenya ayanjadde enteekateeka eyokulwanyisa obwavu mu buganda nebitundu byeggwanga ebiralabukenya ayise mu byemikono nobulimi nga muno mulimu okuluka ebikapu emikeeka ebibbo ssaako okulima ebirime ngebinyeebwa ebizungu ebimanyiddwa nga macademia nuts herbiscus plant ne apo ezirimibwa mu bitundu ebyebbugumu nga bino byonna bisobola okukolerwa nokulimwa awantu awafunda kyokka ate omulimi nafunamu kinenenalina enteekateeka yokukunga abantu mu buganda okulima ekirime kyemmwaanyi kyokka ne nkizuula nga tekikyasoboka kuba abantuu abasinga obungi ettaka balyetunzeeko nga kati abamu basigadde ku buwugiro bwa poloti wali nnyumba na kaabuyonjo polofbukenya ngalaga ekika kyebikapu abazungu bye beetaaga okusikiza obuveerabukenya afunye akatale mu amerika gye beetaaga ebikapu 1000000 emikeeka 1000000 abamerika gye bakozesa ku biici nebibbo 1000000 buli mwezi nga kati ekisigadde kukissa mu nkolamu nteekateeka eno bukenya yakwataganye ne kkampuni ya across africa eyatandise okubangula bannayuganda mu kuluka ebiruke ebyetaagibwa ku katale ka amerika era nga mu nteekateeka eno abakyala 15000 be bagenda okutendekebwa olwo buli omu akolerenga awaka we  noluvannyuma atwale ebiruke mu bifo ebinateekebwawo okubibagulako okwetooloola buganda nawalalaekika kyebinyeebwa macademia nuts kati kye kisinga ettunzi mu nsi ate nga kikula mangu wadde nga kirime kya muti ekibaako entontogolo omuba ebinyeebwa bino nga bwe zikula zeeyasabukenya agamba nti omuti ogumu nga gwabaze obulungi omulimi asobola okukungulako kkiro eziri wakati wa 15 ne 20 nga buli emu egula doola za amerika 17 siringi za uganda 44200 ate ngomuti gussaako sizoni bbiri buli mwakaomulimi bwaba asobola okusimba emiti 100 kitegeeza buli sizoni ayingiza obudde 66 mu siringi za ugandabukenya agamba nti akizudde nga apo eyekika kino esobola okudda ku ttaka lya buganda ate nga kibala kya ttunzi mu ggwanga ne mu nsi yonnaomuti ogumu gusobola okubaako apo 300 buli sizoni mu sizoni bbiri buli mwaka nga buli apo egulwa 500 ekitegeeza nti mu miti 100 omulimi abeera ayingiza obukadde 15 buli sizonikino kirime ekikola ngeddagala erijjanjaba endwadde okuli kookolo puleesa nendalakikula mangu era kkiro yaakyo egula ensimbi za uganda 70000 ngomulimi bwaba akinyiikiriridde tayinza buteggya mu bwavu na kusasulira baana be fiizibukenya agamba nti omuntu alina ku ssente zentandikwa asobola okwetandikirawo obukolero obutonotono mu maka ge natandikira ngakozesa abantu bomu maka geyawadde ekyokulabirako kyobukolero bwe yatandikawo mu maka ge e lwantama mu ggombolola ye kakiri okuli we basaanuusiza amayembe gente ne bagakolamu ebyokwewunda nebitimbibwa mu nju oba ofiisiebirala kuliko okutunga ebitambaala ebitengi nengoye endala okukola ennoni ssabbuuni owamazzi nebitole okukola ebyokwewunda byabakyala mu bipapula bye yagambye nti singa biba bijjumbiddwa bisobola okuggya abantu ba buganda ne uganda mu bwavu          olutalo ku bwavu mu buganda polofbukenya ayanjudde enteekateeka zebyobulimi nebyemikono okulwanyisa obwavummengo eyungudde ekibinja kyabavubuka abasoba mu 60 batalaage buganda nga bakunga abantu okuleeta ebikozesebwa mu kuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi naga ssekabaka ssuuna ii e wamala mu busirokino kiddiridde omulimu gwokuzzaawo amasiro gano okutandika kyokka ngebikozesebwa bikyeveera okuva mu bantuomumyuka wa katikkiro owookubirihajji ssemambo ssekimpi era minisita webyobuwangwa nennono yategezezza ku lwokutaano nti abantu bano basazeewo okukola omulimu guno mu bwannakyewa nga bakwanaganyizibwa omukungu ssewava ssserubiringobwakabaka tusaba abantu bonna okukolagana obulungi nabantu banobwe batuuka mu byalo eyo babalagirire ebikozesebwa gye biri hajji ssekimpi bwe yategeezezzaebimu ku bifo gye baakatuuka kuliko e ssingo busujju buddu ne bulemeeziomulimu gwokuzaawo amasiro gugenda mu maaso kyokka mu kiseera ebintu ebisinga okwetaagisa zemmuliera bannakyewa bano abakwanaganyizibwa omukugu ssewava ssserubiri kye kimu byebatandikiddekongomulimu guno gutandika  abaami bamasaza bawebwa obuvunanyizibwa bwokunoonya ebifo mu masaza gabwe buganda bumu afuddeaboluganda lwa namasole juliana ndibalekera eyaziikiddwa ku lwokubiri aboludda oluwakanya omusika eyateereddwaako bagobeddwa mu lubiri wadde babadde bakyakungubagaobutakkaanya bwatandise okuva   namasole juliana ndibalekera lwe yafudde  nga abekika abamu bagamba nti omugenzi  teyakola kiraamo era godfrey bugoba kitaawe  wa madalena ndibalekera eyateereddwaako ngomusika yaleese kijingirireaboluganda bano okuli nababadde babeera mu lubiri nomugenzi ku lwokubiri nga bakyakungubaga kyababuuseeko amagye bwe gaabagobye mu lubiri ne bakwata engugu  zaabwe ne basula e wabweru  wolubiri ngoludda  oluwagira omusika eyateereddwaako lugamba nti abantu bano baabadde nekigendererwa  kyokukola effujjo mu lubiribugoba yategeezezza nti baagoberedde kiraamo kyomugenzi okussaako omusika kyokka ekyokugobera aboluganda ebweru omukulu wessiga yalina okubyogerakokye mmanyi baagobeddwaamu nti bandikola effujjo kuba mu kuziika baabadde batandise okucankalanya embeera bugoba bwe yategeezezzawabula oludda oluwakanya omusika nga lukulemberwa  patrick mukasa baategeezezza nti omugenzi teyaleka kiraamo nga beebuuza bugoba gye yakiggyebaalumirizza nti  nemikolo gyokuteekako omusika gyakoleddwa kifuulanengemu kiseera kino abasika bali basatu nga kuliko margaret nalubega eyaleeteddwa omulangira walugembe muteesa eyagambye nti mwana wa muteesa ngomugenzi gwe yalaama  okumusikiraomulala ye justine namuddu ngono abekika abasinga gwe bagamba nti omugenzi gwe yalama okumusikira ne  madalena ndibalekera  ngono omugenzi abadde amuyita ssengabagamba nti omusika eyateereddwaako muto ngayinza nokuleeta omusajja mu lubiri          aba namasole babagobye mu lubirikatikkiro wa buganda yinginiya john baptist walusimbi agguddewo olukiiko lwa buganda nayanjulira abakiise ebituukiddwaako okuva lwe lwasemba okutuula mu december womwaka oguwedde okuli okumaliriza bulange plaza namasirokatikkiro yayanjudde enteeekateeka zokumaliriza ekizimbe kya bulange plaza nategeeza nebyetaagisa olwo abakiise ne basonda ensawo za seminti 850 okudduukirira omulimu era nalaga nomulimu  gwokuddaabiriza amasiro ge kasubi we gutuuse nategeeza nti emikolo egyennono giwedde kati bagenda kuzimbaokwogera bino yasoose kubikira lukiiko namasole wa ssekabaka daudi chwa juliana ndibalekerayayongeddeko okutegeeza olukiiko nti okunoonyereza kwe kukwatibwayennyamidde olwempisa zabavubuka ezisiiwuuse ennyo okuva ku nnyambala nenneeyisa ekivuddeko nokutyoboola olulimi era wano we yayisirizza ekiragiro buli mmemba wa lukiiko afuuke mmemba mu kibiina kyolulimi olugandasipiika kaddu serunkuuma ngaggulawo okuteesa yasoose kukulisa bannakenya okuyita emirembe mu kulonda omukulembeze weggwanga nokuyozaayoza pulezidenti uhuru kenyatta tebabamanyi nategeeza nti owekitiibwa tony kiyimba kaggwa yakomawo okuva e buyindi gye yagenda okujjanjabibwa kyokka akyali mugonvu era nomukiise kasim musoke akiikirira abalina obulemu akyali mukosefu nga nokugulu okumu kwabadde asigazza baakusazeekoabakiise baategeezezza olukiiko nti bangi tebamanyi mirimu gyabwe kye bava bajja mu lukiiko ne beemulugunya nti tebayitibwa ku mikolo wabula katikkiro yabalungamizza nti waliwo ensirika ezitegekeddwa okulaba ngensonga zino zonna zimulungulwakatikkiro yalabudde abavubuka abadda mu bulange okugeya baminisita nti bakaddiye nagamba nti kituufu emiti emito gye giggumiza ekibira naye abavubuka tebateekwa kuyisa mu bakadde maaso          katikkiro yennyamidde olwempisa zabavubuka ezisiiwuusemmengo esanyukidde ekya gavunenti okuggya mu ddiiro ekyokuzzaawo gavumenti za buganda busoga bunyoro acholi ne lango mu nfuga eya regional tier negamba nti ekisingako kwe kuweera ddala federo eri ebitundu ebigyettaniraminisita e mmengo owensonga zolukiiko baminisita nebyamawulire charles peter mayiga yategeezezza nti kirungi gavumenti bweba ewulirizza abantu neggya mu ddiiro etteeka lya regional tier naddala bweneeyita be kikwatako omuli abakungu abataka abaami nabantu ba ssaabasajja ne bagiwa ebirowoozo byabwenaye tulowooza nti ekyokuziba obuzibi ebituli mu tteeka lya regional tier tekimala ssemateeka wa 1995 eyalongoosebwa mu 2005 yaba alongoosebwa olwo mu kifo kya regional tier mubeeremu federo yennyini kubanga yesinga okwettanirwa abantu ba uganda abasinga obungi mayiga bwe yategeezezzaate ye omumyuka wa ssentebe wa nrm atwala buganda al hajji abdul nadduli yagambye nti ekyokuggya mu ddiiro ebbago lino lyongere okulongoosebwamu tekyandibadde kibi naye bwe kaba akakodyo kokuliggyirawo ddala ekyo kiba kikontana ne ssemateeka akirambika nti obuyinza bulina okugabanibwa wakati wa gavumenti eya wakati nezebitundumayiga yagambye nti regional tier kwe kwali okukkaanya okwali kutuukiddwaako mu nteeseganya za gavumenti eya wakati ne mmengo nti kyokka ne musigalamu ebituli ebyali bisuubirwa okuzibikirwa etteeka kye yagambye nti teryakikolaemu ku nsonga eriko kalumanywera yeyokulonda katikkiro wa bugandaabaami bamasaza bawakanya katikkiro okulondebwa abantu bonna nga baagala kabaka yaba yeeronderanga gwanaabanga asiimye ate abataka bakkiriza katikkiro okulondebwa abantu bonna naye ngabeesimbyewo balina kuba baganda          mmengo esanyukidde ekya gavumenti okwetegereza regional tierabantu ba ssaabasajja okuva mu masaza ga buganda 18 beekozeemu omulimu ne batandikawo ekibiina kyobwegassi ekituumiddwa buganda traders  merchants cooperative btm ekigenda okuwoma omutwe mu kulwanyisa obwavu mu buganda wonnaekibiina kino kati ekirimu bammemba abasukka 1000 kiweera ddala ekifaananyi kyobwegassi nga bwe kyabeeranga edda mu myaka gya 1950 ne 60abatandisi bekibiina kino baagala buli muntu akyegatteko era olutalo ku bwavu basazeewo okulutandika nga beenyigira mu bulimitugenda kutandika na kulima kasooli kubanga gwe tusobola okufunako akatale amangu ngate twagala okumukolamu ebintu bingi ebireeta ensimbi phenihas kayegga avunaanyizibwa ku bikolebwa mu kibiina kino bwe yategeezezzakasooli waakukolebwamu butto emmereeyabantu neyebisolo amanda omukka ogufumbisibwa biodiesel nebirala bingiobwegassi bwa kuyamba abantu ba buganda okuloza ku bulamu obweyagaza nga bwe kyalinga edda hamza ssenoga batiibwe ssentebe wa btm bwe yategeezezzaye minisita wobwegassi mu buganda nsamba kumama yagambye nti obwegassi buyamba abantu okufuna eddoboozi limu mu katale kebyo bye bafulumya wamu nokwongera enkolagana wakati waabweyalabudde abeegassi okwewala ebyo ebyavaako obwegassi okusasika okuli amazima okubula mu bikolebwa nobukulembezekirungi abeegassi okulonda bwagala buli ggombolola libeeremu ekibiina kyobwegassi era okusinziira ku kaminsona wobwegassi e mmengo harris lubega ekigendererwa kya kwongera kutumbula mirimu egikolebwa wamu nokugoba obwavumu kiseera kino amagombolola 110 ku 192 agali mu bwakabaka galina ebibiina byobwegassi wadde wakyaliwo ebisoomooza ebikyalemesa abantu okubijjumbiraye minisita wentambula za kabaka kabuuza mukasa bwe yabadde ayogera nabaavudde e nakisunga okuleeta amakula e mbuga yagambye nti obwegassi bwe bwakulaakulanya buganda era bajjajjaffe kwe baayimirira okutuusa buganda buli omu we yagyegombera          amasaza 18 gaggudde olutalo ku bwavuakola nga katikkiro wekika kyolugave mustafa mutyaba asiimye polofmark crowther enzaalwa ya canada akoze ennyo okutendeka abasawo mu yunivasite za gavumenti omuli makerere mbarara ne gulu bwatyo namuyingiza mu kika kino namuwa nerinnya erya mukiibicrowther yava mu yunivasite ya mcmaster e canada nekibinja kyabasawo abatendeka abasawo mu nkola ya nnakyewa eya international outreach program iop egenderera okutumbula omutindo gwobujjanjabi eri abantu ba bulijjocrowther akoleredde uganda naddala buganda era kimugwanidde okuyingizibwa mu kika kyolugave mutyaba bwe yagambye ku mukolo gwokumusiima ku ndere centre e kisazi ku lwokusatu nga gwetabiddwaako ne joseph musisi omukwanaganya wekibiina kya st josephs health system ekikola ku kusaasaanya obujjanjabi mu bantuomuzungu yakoleddwaako emikolo gyobuwangwa omuli nokumwambaza ekkanzu ssaako okumukwasa omuggo ngakabonero komusajja omugandaminisita webyamawulire e mengo charles peter mayiga atenderezza omugenzi eria kategaya gwayogeddeko ng abadde omukulembeze omulungi ateekuluntaza omukkakkamu era ngabadde muwulize eri buli muntuwabula yennyamidde olwobukulembeze kateegaya mwabadde akolera bwagambye nti bwandibanga bwe bumulemesezza okutuusa obuweereza obulungi mu bantu ngempisa ze bwezibadde zeeyolekayategeezezza nti eggwanga lyonna libadde limanyi kategaya nga nabaana abato babadde bamumanyi kyokka nga ssirwa bukozi bwe wabula nga bangi bamumanyi nga amyuka katikkiro womukulembeze weggwanga ate nga nebbanga lyonna abadde ku lusegere lwa pulezidenti nga kibadde kizibu obutamanyikabya job nantakiika ne dickson kulumbammengo evuddeyo ku nsonga zakatale ke nakulabye nerangirira nti ekyalina obwannannyini ku katale kano era negumya abasuubuzi nti tewali muntu yenna alina buyinza kubataataaganyamu bbaluwa ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti ya buganda apollo makubuya gye yawandiikidde ekitongole kyebyettaka ekya buganda land board ngetangaaza ku nsonga zakatale ke nakulabye yalaze nti obwakabaka bukyalina obwannannyini ku katale oluvanyuma lwa liizi gyebwafuna mu 1965 eyemyaka 99 etennaggwaakoobwakabaka bwafuna liizi mu kiseera nga wakyaliwo mengo munisipaaliwadde munisipaali tekyaliwo obwakabaka bukyali bwetegefu okutwala akatale kano mu maaso ekitundu mu bbaluwa bwe kisomamu byaddizibwa obwakabaka mu 1993 nakatale kano kaalimu era makubuya yasabye wabeerewo enkolagana ennungamu wakati wobwakabaka nomukyala nnanyinni mayiro eno ayitibwa robinah nnabagereka kuba liizi eggwako mu 2064bino bwe byagudde mu matu gabasuubuzi eggulo ne busakyewalabye yagambye nti tewali mukozi wa kitongole kino akkirizibwa kukwasibwa nsimbi ezekika kyonna era batadewo akawunta mu bbanka ezenjawulo abantu bonna abasasula ensimbi zettaka kwe balina okusasuliraomuntu ne bwoba osasula kkanzu ngowaayo nsimbi olina kugenda mu ofiisi zino eziteekeddwaawo omanye engeri yokuzisasulamu mu bbanka naye ebyokusasula ensimbi zammwe mu ofiisi nsonga eno okulaba nga teleetawo njawukanaensonda zaategeezezza nti ababadde bakulembera omuzikiti guno gye buvuddeko baasaba mmengo ebawe olukusa baweebwe ekyapa ku ttaka eririko omuzikiti gunoabataka abakulu bobusolya bagambye nti abaganda kibakakatako okuzzaawo enju ya muzibu azaalampanga mu masiro ge kasubi nga bayita mu kusonda ensimbi okudduukirira omulimu gunoabataka abaakulembeddwaamu omulungamya wolukiiko lwabwe omutaka nakirembeka allen waliggo  baabituseeko mu nsisinkano nomumyuka wa katikkiro owokubiri e mmengo haji muhammed ssekimpi  eyabayise mu bulange gye bazzukulu baaabwe babakubirize okwongera obuwagizimu lukiiko lwe lumu omukulu wekika kyengonge omutaka kisolo muwanga ssebyoto yayanjudde katikkiro we omuggya omutaka ssaalongo george william kitandwe eri olukiikoomutaka nakirembeka yakuutidde omutaka kisolo ne katikkiro we  bakole entegeka ezokwabya olumbe lwomugenzi kisolo ngono ssebyoto gwe yaddira mu bigere          abataka bawadde amagezi ku kusonda ezamasiroabasuubuzi mu katale ke nakulabye bazzeemu okusasula empooza oluvannyuma lwembiranye ebaddewo nga baagala okukaggya mu mikono gya kkampuni ya kabaka eya rexbakino yaweebwa mmengo ngera tennagwaakoye atwala poliisi ye nakulabye musa tamuzadde eyeetabye mu lukiiko luno yalabudde ababadde beefunyiridde okutabula emirembe mu katale kano bakikomye nagamba nti mwanjoensonda e mmengo zaategeezeezza nti katikkiro aleetebwa  mu nkyukakyuka zomulundi guno  muvubuka  ngera ne baminisita abagenda  okulondebwa bavubuka nga kino kabaka akikoze okukkaatiriza yamukuutidde okulaba ngatuukiriza obulombolombo bwonna  obumukakatako nokulambula ebifo byonna ebigwa mu ofiisi ye omuzzukulu dr william ssali ssentebe wakakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku mutindo gwebintu mu ggwanga unbs yagambye nti okutuuza mugema kumazeewo ebbanja abekika lye babadde nalyo nga nekisigalidde kwe kulamba ngatuukiriza ebyo ebigya mu buvunaanyizibwa bwe yakwasiddwaabakungu okuva mu kitongole ekikola ku byobulimi mu gavumenti ya buganda baayitiddwa  okugenda e mukono okulaba obulwadde bwebitooke obupya obugudde mu kitundu kinosam ssegirinya nga ye yavumbula eddagala eriwonnya obulwadde obukaza ebitooke nemwaannyi era nga ye nnannyini kibiina kya save the rural out of povertysrop yomu ku baayitiddwa ku kyalo katoogo mu ggombolola ye nama mu mukono okwetegereza embeera nkolokoloebyokumalawo obutakkaanya mu kika kyemmamba obuva ku kyokufuula nnankere omukulu wekika byongedde okukaluba katikkiro walusimbi bwategeezsezza omutaka gabunga nga bwe waliwo ekibinja kyabantu abalala abagamba nti nabo kika kya mmamba ekyeetongodde era be bavunaanyizibwa ku nankere nga tasobola kubaako kyagonjoola ku bugulumbo obuliwokati emmamba zaesowoddeyo ssatu emu y ennangira eya namunjolobe abagamba nti omutaka nankere muzzukulu waabwe eya gabunga ate neya nankerenewankubadde nga tubadde tusenvudde nga tuliko we tutuuse ku byokusalawo eggoye ku kubeerawo kwa nankere ngekika ekyetongodde oba nedda kati tewali wennyinza kusinziira kusalawo okutuusa nga mumaze okukakasa obuzaale bwa nankere bwatyo katikkiro walusimbi bwe yagambyeyayongeddeko nti bazzukulu ba kiruru nga bano be beddira emmamba e nnangira baagala omutaka gabunga aveeyo yeetondere obuganda olwokugezaako okububuzaabuza ngakaayanira omuntu gwatalinaako na kakwatebano bagamba nti nankere mwana wa kiruru eyali ayitibwa kiwuttakyasooka kyokka oluvannyuma lwokuzaala ennyo abaana ngenkere ne bamukazaako lya nankere era nti bo beetegefu okuvaayo balambulure obuzaale bwe bamalewo obutali bumativu buno katikkiro walusimbi bwe yagasseekookwogera ati yabadde asisinkanye omutaka gabunga abaana be abazzukulu ko ne bammemba ku lukiiko olufuzi olwekika abaamusanze mu bulange e mmengo abaabadde bazze nga baagala ababuulire ekyenkomeredde ekyasaliddwaawo kabaka ku kyokutongoza omutaka nankere ngomukulu wekika ate nga bo bamanyi nti ono musiige akola emirimu ku kabaka ku lwomutaka gabungawabula kyababuseeko katikkiro bwe yabakakasizza nga bwatayinza kugenda mu maaso na kubawa kyankomeredde ku kusaba kwabwe nti kubanga nabemmamba ennangira nabo bazze nensonga zaabwe ezisaana okuwulirizibwa era nga zikwataganira ddala nensonga gabunga zaayagala zigonjoolwekatikkiro yalagidde gabunga ne bazzukulube okuddayo mu kika batuuze akakiiko kaabwe akennono beetegereze obuzaale bwa nankere bwekiba kisoboka naye bamuyite naba kiruru babayite batuule bakkaanye ku buzale bwa nankereolukiiko oluddukanya omulimu gwokuzzaawo amasiro ge kasubi lwolekedde eddimu lyokukunganya obuwumbi bwensimbi gyayiseemu okudibaga ekikaolukiiko luno lwatudde mu lubiri e mmengo wiiki eweddekigambibwa nti abamu ku bataka baasabye omukubiriza wabeewo okwogera ku kugugulana okuliwo mu kika kyeffumbe kwe omumyuka wa katikkiro awabudde gavtomumyuka owokubiri owa katikkiro e mmengo mohamood ssekimpi agambye nti kino kye kiseera bannayuganda okukuba ttooki mu myaka ataano egiyise bamanye bwe gitambudde era enteekateeka eno eyali eyokutandika nga september 6 2012 nga yali yaakumala ennaku ssatu teyasobola kugenda mu maaso ngabasenze bagamba kano kaali kakodyo kaakubagoba ku ttaka ne babalemesawiiki town council mwmamerito mugerwa yagambye nti ebintu bya kabaka byonna tubiddiza mmengomu bino mulimu ekizimbe kyeggombolola nettaka okutudde ekizimbe kino ate nekizimbe okutudde poliisi nakyo bagulaagulamu  poloti nebibanja mu kifo kino kubanga kyongera okufunzibwa era gye  bujja naggalabi yenna ajja kubeera amaamiddwa abasenze bwatyo omu ku  bataka henry kavuma atuula okumpi nolusozi bwe yategeezezzakyokka  ssentebe wa lc1 eddy ssegane yategeezezza nti wadde abantu bongedde  okusenga ku naggalabi abadde tannalabawo mbeera etiisa kubanga abasinga  baana nzaalwa aboku naggalabi kubagaana kukola byabwe bwatyo  ssegane bwe yategeezezzaomutaka john baptist ssemanobe  asumikira abalangira abagenda okulya nnamulondo era omu ku batunuuliddwa  ku kukuuma ettaka lye naggalabi wabateeberewo kikolebwa mu bwangu nabyo  bikyayinza okusengebwako abantu abatafaayo ku makulu gaabyowaliwo  abatuuze abategeezezza nti ekyabantu okusenga ku naggalabi tebakitutte  bubi kubanga ne ebyobuwangwa nennono e mmengo hajji  mohamed ssekimpi yalabudde nti tewali muntu akkirizibwa kumala gatunda  kibanja poloti oba okusenga ku ttaka eryengeri enoyagambye nti aludde ngawulira ebyogerwa basobole nokutundako          mmengo yesibye enteeseganya  ssekandi buganda ugandaomulimu gwokuddaabiriza lutikko ye namirembe gwongedde okuwa abantu essuubi oluvannyuma lwa ssentebe wolukiiko okulwanyisibwaomumyuka wa kaggo atwala ekibuga hajji badru bukendeko ye yakkaatirizza ensonga eno bwe yabadde mu lukungaana lwabaami abemiruka nabatongole beggombolola eyo okubasomesa engeri yokutambuzaamu emirimu gyabwe wiiki eweddemu lukiiko luno abeesenza ku ttaka lya ggombolola yomukulu wekibuga e kakeeka mmengo baweereddwa ennaku 30 okusengukakookusinziira ku bunkeddeko ekitongole kyebyettaka e mmengo ekya buganda land board blb kiriko ebbaluwa gye kyawadde abantu abeesenza ku ttaka lino mu bukyamu era nga kati bakolerako emirimu egitali gimu okusengukakoblb yategeezezza nti erina enteekateeka yokulaba nga liddukanyizibwa mu bulambulukufuabaami okwambala engeri etali ya buvunaanyizibwa yevaako abamu okusongebwamu emimwa era kati yakukkaatirizibwawabaddewo katemba ngolukiiko lutandika bakira buli eyazze okwetaba mu lukungaana luno ngasooka kuweebwa bubonero okusinziira ku nnyambalaeggombolola yomukulu wekibuga ekulirwa edith nambagire          abeesenza ku ttaka lyembuga baweereddwa ennaku 30 baveekojb walusimbi akwasizza abayizi 54 mu kawempe satifikeeti oluvannyuma lwokumaliriza emisomo mu kukola ebintu ebyenjawulo nasaba abantu okutandikawo pulojekiti ezikwatagana ku bye basomye kubanga ze zikulaakulanya eggwanga abayizi babanguddwa mu pulojekiti eyatandikibwawo okukulaakulanya buganda mu byemirimu eya parents concern initiativeomwami wa kabaka owomuluka gwa mpereerwe hajji sulayiman mugerwa yagambye nti kino kijja kuyamba abayizi abatasobodde kugenda mu matendekero ga waggulu okufuna obukugumu bano mulimu abaavudde e mpererwe abakuguse mu kukanika ebidduka okutungisa ebyalaani okukola enviiri zomulembe nokubajjaomukolo gwetabiddwaako kaggo tofiiri malokweza  minisita wa bulungibwansi mariam mayanja eyali ssentebe we kawempe hajji takuba kibirige  omwami wa kabaka mu kawempe nabakungu abalala mu buganda          katikkiro akwasizza abayizi be kawempe satifikeetiekibinja kyabeeyita bazzukulu ba ssendikaddiwa kisisinkanye katikkiro walusimbi ne kimujjukiza nga nabo bwe baasaba edda okwekutula ku ngabi ensamba nabo bafuuke ekika ekyetongodde kyokka nga nokutuusa kati tebafiibwaakotukujjukiza nti ebika ebirala bitaano bwe twasaba okutongozebwa kabaka yabitongoza kyokka ffe fayiro eyaffe nebulira mu kkubo okuva mu lubiri okutuuka wano e mmengotewali nsonga lwaki tetukutulwa ku nsamba nga tulina ebisaanyizo byonna ebitufuula ekika ekyetongodde nga ne nsamba tetumulinaako kakwate konna bwe batyo bazzukulu ba ssendikaddiwa bwe baagambyebaakulembeddwamu omutaka yusufu mukasa bisaali ssengabi ssendikaddiwa owa 53 ne katikkiro we daudi muwonge era ngomuwandiisi waabwe kakeeto mutaawe ye yakwasizza katikkiro walusimbi ebiwandiiko byekika byonna ne fayiro enkadde bbo ze bagamba nti ze bagobererabaategeezezza katikkiro nti bo bazzukulu ba ssendikaddiwa abeddira e ngabi nakabala enjeru era ngobutaka bwabwe buli kalamba mu ssaza lye butambalatulina amasiga agawera ataano agakola kakeeto mutaawe bwe yabuuzizzakatikkiro walusimbi mu kwanukula yategeezezza nti ensonga zekika kino agenda kuzikwasa omumyuka we owokubiri alondoole okuzuula enjawulo wakati wekika kino nengabi ennyunga nokuzuula lwaki abengabi enjeru tebaatongozebwayabawadde wiiki bbiri balabe ekyokubakoleraye omutaka ssendikaddiwa yakunze bazzukulu be mu lulyo lwe okuvaayo bakwasize wamu okulaba abaayokezza ennyumba zabaami ba kabakaentabwe yavudde ku nkaayana zettaka lyobwakabaka eriri mu ggombolola ye wakisi mu disitulikiti ye  buikwe ekitongole kyebibira mu ggwanga nfa kye ligamba nti lyaakyo kyokka nga nobwakabaka bwa buganda bulina ebiwandiiko byalyobino byabaddewo ku nkomerero ya wiiki  ewedde ku byalo naluvule kyambogo ne kalagala  ebisangibwa mu ggombolola  ye wakisi mu buikwe abantu abatannategeereka bwe baatekedde amaka gomwami wa kabaka owomuluka  john wasswa ssekabembeate ennyumba yomwami wa kabaka omutongole muhammad kibirige yakoonedwa negwa ku ttaka ebintu abatuuze ne babigabana nga kat aliira ku nsiko olwabantu okumutiisa  okumuttakibirige yannyonnyodde nti ettaka liriko olubiri lwa ssekabaka edward walugembe muteesa ii olwe mirembe namasiro ga namirembeomumbejja  namirembe bwanga bwa mirembe 6 eyasikira  ekifo kino gwe nnasisinkanye nandaga ebiwandiiko omuli nebya kkooti ebiraga nga ddala  ettaka lya bwakabakaomumbejja namirembe agamba nti aba nfa babadde beekobaana nabatuuze ne batema emiti mu kibira kyobwakabaka          abatuuze be buikwe bookezza ennyumba yomwami wa kabakassentebe wa disitulikiti ye buvuma adrian wasswa ddungu asabye abasawo mu bitundu bye buvuma okwongera amaanyi mu nkola yemirimu gyabwe nabalabula nti si waakugumiikiriza bantu baabwe kufa ngebikozesebwa ebikulu abasawo babirinatufuba nnyo okulaba nga tubawa ebikozesebwa mutuuse obujjanjabi ku bantu si lwa kuba nti tulina ssente nnyingi oba nti gavumenti etuwa ebyenjawulokino mulina okukitwala ngekikulu ebitono bye mulina mubikozese biganyule okulwanyisa omusujja gwensiri mu kitunduyagambye nti abatuuze ku bizinga balumbibwa omusujja gwensiri nendwadde endala ezibaviirako okufa nga tebannatuuka mu malwaliro ngokubawa obugaali limu ku makubo ge basuubira okuyitamu okukendeeza ku muwendo gwabafa olwobutafuna bujjanjabi mu buddeabakulembeze nabaserikale ba poliisi ku ggombolola ye nabweru mu wakiso batongozezza enkola ya bulungibwansi nga batalaaga buli muluka nga bwe bagogola emyala okuyoola ebisaaniiko nokuyigiriza abantu okuyonja ebifo mwe bakolera namaka gaabwe okuziyiza obulwadde obuva ku  bucaafuakulira abakozi ku ggombolola mukyflorence kiiza bwe yabadde atongoza kaweefube ono mu kabuga ke katooke mu muluka gwe wamala yakunze abatunda ebyokulya nokunywa okuyonja ebifo mwe bakolera nabatuuze okuyonja amaka kabaka okuli ekkomera lye kauga erigambibwa nti disitulikiti eyagala kukozesa lukujjukujju eritunde nga yeerimbise mu musajja gwegamba nti ye nnannyiniryossekiboobo yagambye nti aludde ngagulumba yategeezezza          ssekiboobo agugulana naba disitulikiti ku ttakakkooti ya kisekwa egobye empoza ya bazzukulu ba museruka gye baabadde beesigamizza ku bukulu bwessiga lya bakazirwendo ngegamba byabwetuzzeewo enkola yaffe eya bulungibwansi tuleme kulindanga bakulembeze ne ku bintu bye tuyinza okwekolerako nga tetusasaanyizza nsimbi yonna bwanika bwe yasabyeokwogera bino yabadde atongoza okukalondoolambegayiridde temwesamba gavumenti ya wakatissaabasajja atukuutira lunye nti tukolagane nayo mutuule mu nkiiko zamagombolola disitulikiti gye muva kitusobozese okumanya nokulondoola akasente ke tuweebwa nga buganda tukole emirimu gya nnyinimubino bunkeddeko yabituuseko bwe yabadde ayogera mu kutongoza olukiiko olufuzi olwabavubuka mu ssaza lya kyadondo okwabadde ku mbuga e kasangati nga lwatongozeddwa kaggo kivumbi malokwezayabasabye nokwetaba mu byobufuzi baleme kubyesamba kuba be bakulembeze benkya ngababaka ba palamenti bassentebe ba disitulikiti amagombolola nemitendera emiralakatikkiro  ying jb walusimbi gye buvuddeko  yayogedde ku nkwe obunnanfuusi nokwetema enteega byasanze e mmengo mu buweereza bwayolekedde okuwummulaabamu ku baaliko bakatikkiro ba buganda ensonga eno baagyogeddeko bwe batiyali katikkiro wakati wa  january 9 2006  ne february  2007yagambye nti ebintu ebisinga ebyayogeddwa katikkiro ying jb walusimbi bituufu kubanga naye bye bimu ku bye yayitamu nga naye ebimu yabirambika mu lipoota ye entongolemuliika yategeezezza nti mmengo okufaananako ne uganda eyawamu ebyobufuzi byayo byalalambala ne obote ne biva mu buweereza obwesimbu era obwagaliza ne bikwata ekkubo lyokulwanagana enkwe obunnanfuusi nokulemesaokufaananako ne kawenkene obote eyagamba nti bwe nalaba ssekabaka muteesa alayira ku bwapulezidenti nemmanya nti mmumaze ne mmengo abendowooza bwetyo gye bali ate nga tobanenya kubanga uganda gye balimu ebyo byekyalimu ne mu gavumenti eya wakati bwe yategeezezzayagambye nti mmengo si nnyangu kukulembera nti naye okulumagana nokwetema enteega  yabiyitamu era kisoboka okuba nga ne katikkiro alindiridde waakubisangayo nti naye olwokuba katikkiro aba katikkiro wakati mu kusoomoozebwa asobola okukola emirimu gyewabula yagasseeko nti ekiseera kituuse abeenyigira mu bikolwa ebiremesa abakulembeze e mmengo okwekuba mu kifuba kubanga tebalina kye bafunamuyeebazizza walusimbi okuba omuvumu nayogera ku byalabye e mmengo ekiyinza okuvaako okukyusaamukyokka muliika agamba nti buli mukulembeze nga ne katikkiro mwomutwalidde aba nengeri gyayisibwamu obubi abantu bakola nabo naye aba alina okwesalira amagezi obutalemesebwa bimusuubirwamubuvunaanyizibwa bwa buli muganda kinnoomu okulwanyisa emize gino kubanga giremesa obumu nenkulaakulana bwe yakkaatirizzamu lipoota muliika gye yakola ngava ku bwakatikikiro yasimba essira ku kyabakulembeze e mmengo okuwanga ensaasaanya ku buli kintu ekikolebwa okusobola okusiga empeereza ennambulukufu nobutayonoona ssente entono eziba zifunise okukulaakulanya obugandaeyali katikkiro wa ssekabaka muteesa ii mayanja nkangi yategeezezza nti ebigambo bya katikkiro walusimbi ku nneeyisa yabakungu abamu yagitutte ngensonga enkulu era buganda gyeteekeddwa okulwanyisayagambye nti katikkiro yenna asindikibwa e mmengo ateekwa okumanya nti waliwo abayinza okumulwanyisa e mmengo oba ebweru waayo naye buvunaanyizibwa bwe  okuwagaanya mu kusoomoozebwa okwo nawereza kabaka nobuganda nga bwasuubirwatewali watali kusoomoozebwa nabalala okwagala okuggya omuntu ku mulamwa kyokka kino ate omukulembeze talina kukifuula kyekwaso nkangi bwe yategeezezzayagambye  nti mmengo gye yakoleramu mu gyenkaaga teyawukana kinene neriwo kati kubanga obwami kabaka bwagaba waliwo abalala be bulumakwe kugattako nti obwakatikkiro kye kitiibwa ekisingayo mu buganda nolwekyo buli muganda alina obusobozi aba abwagala era afuba kabaka amulabe nolwekyo oyo abeera abulidde tabulwako bamulwanyisakyokka yalabudde nti enkola yabaganda okulyangana okwetema enteega  nenkwe mbi kubanga enafuya buganda yonna ate esobola okuyamba abalabe ba buganda okufuna omukisa ogutuukiriza ebigenderwa byabweyeebazizza katikkiro walusimbi olwokwolesa obuvumu bwakugamba kyaliko toyinza kukitwalira awo          muliika ne nkangi boogedde ku bye mengobya angel lubowattabamiruka womulundi ogwokuna eyakomekkerezeddwa ku nkomerero ya wiiki mu hotel africana ebintu ebitalina kubula ku mukolomuno mulimu embugo zabazadde ne ssengakuno ogattako sukaali omunnyo obutto ssabbuuni ettu lyatmennyama natmebirungo ebiyamba mu kugifumbaebintu ebyo ne bwe bijja mu
